        <td id="L670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="670"></td>
        <td id="LC670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="671"></td>
        <td id="LC671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That I learn of others, I replied, is quite true; but that I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="672"></td>
        <td id="LC672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ungrateful I wholly deny. Money I have none, and therefore I pay in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="673"></td>
        <td id="LC673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">praise, which is all I have; and how ready I am to praise any one who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="674"></td>
        <td id="LC674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appears to me to speak well you will very soon find out when you answer;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="675"></td>
        <td id="LC675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for I expect that you will answer well.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="676"></td>
        <td id="LC676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="677"></td>
        <td id="LC677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Listen, then, he said; I proclaim that justice is nothing else than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="678"></td>
        <td id="LC678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the interest of the stronger. And now why do you not praise me? But of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="679"></td>
        <td id="LC679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">course you won&#39;t.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="680"></td>
        <td id="LC680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="681"></td>
        <td id="LC681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let me first understand you, I replied. Justice, as you say, is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="682"></td>
        <td id="LC682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest of the stronger. What, Thrasymachus, is the meaning of this?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="683"></td>
        <td id="LC683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You cannot mean to say that because Polydamas, the pancratiast, is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="684"></td>
        <td id="LC684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stronger than we are, and finds the eating of beef conducive to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="685"></td>
        <td id="LC685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bodily strength, that to eat beef is therefore equally for our good who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="686"></td>
        <td id="LC686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are weaker than he is, and right and just for us?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="687"></td>
        <td id="LC687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="688"></td>
        <td id="LC688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That&#39;s abominable of you, Socrates; you take the words in the sense</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="689"></td>
        <td id="LC689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which is most damaging to the argument.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="690"></td>
        <td id="LC690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="691"></td>
        <td id="LC691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Not at all, my good sir, I said; I am trying to understand them; and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="692"></td>
        <td id="LC692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wish that you would be a little clearer.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="693"></td>
        <td id="LC693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="694"></td>
        <td id="LC694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, he said, have you never heard that forms of government differ;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="695"></td>
        <td id="LC695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there are tyrannies, and there are democracies, and there are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="696"></td>
        <td id="LC696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aristocracies?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="697"></td>
        <td id="LC697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="698"></td>
        <td id="LC698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I know.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="699"></td>
        <td id="LC699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="700"></td>
        <td id="LC700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the government is the ruling power in each state?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="701"></td>
        <td id="LC701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="702"></td>
        <td id="LC702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="703"></td>
        <td id="LC703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="704"></td>
        <td id="LC704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the different forms of government make laws democratical,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="705"></td>
        <td id="LC705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aristocratical, tyrannical, with a view to their several interests;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="706"></td>
        <td id="LC706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and these laws, which are made by them for their own interests, are the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="707"></td>
        <td id="LC707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice which they deliver to their subjects, and him who transgresses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="708"></td>
        <td id="LC708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them they punish as a breaker of the law, and unjust. And that is what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="709"></td>
        <td id="LC709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I mean when I say that in all states there is the same principle of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="710"></td>
        <td id="LC710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice, which is the interest of the government; and as the government</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="711"></td>
        <td id="LC711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must be supposed to have power, the only reasonable conclusion is, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="712"></td>
        <td id="LC712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everywhere there is one principle of justice, which is the interest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="713"></td>
        <td id="LC713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the stronger.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="714"></td>
        <td id="LC714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="715"></td>
        <td id="LC715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now I understand you, I said; and whether you are right or not I will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="716"></td>
        <td id="LC716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">try to discover. But let me remark, that in defining justice you have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="717"></td>
        <td id="LC717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yourself used the word &#39;interest&#39; which you forbade me to use. It is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="718"></td>
        <td id="LC718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">true, however, that in your definition the words &#39;of the stronger&#39; are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="719"></td>
        <td id="LC719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">added.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="720"></td>
        <td id="LC720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="721"></td>
        <td id="LC721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A small addition, you must allow, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="722"></td>
        <td id="LC722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="723"></td>
        <td id="LC723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Great or small, never mind about that: we must first enquire whether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="724"></td>
        <td id="LC724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what you are saying is the truth. Now we are both agreed that justice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="725"></td>
        <td id="LC725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is interest of some sort, but you go on to say &#39;of the stronger&#39;; about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="726"></td>
        <td id="LC726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this addition I am not so sure, and must therefore consider further.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="727"></td>
        <td id="LC727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="728"></td>
        <td id="LC728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Proceed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="729"></td>
        <td id="LC729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="730"></td>
        <td id="LC730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will; and first tell me, Do you admit that it is just for subjects to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="731"></td>
        <td id="LC731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">obey their rulers?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="732"></td>
        <td id="LC732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="733"></td>
        <td id="LC733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="734"></td>
        <td id="LC734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="735"></td>
        <td id="LC735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But are the rulers of states absolutely infallible, or are they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="736"></td>
        <td id="LC736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sometimes liable to err?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="737"></td>
        <td id="LC737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="738"></td>
        <td id="LC738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To be sure, he replied, they are liable to err.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="739"></td>
        <td id="LC739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="740"></td>
        <td id="LC740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then in making their laws they may sometimes make them rightly, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="741"></td>
        <td id="LC741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sometimes not?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="742"></td>
        <td id="LC742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="743"></td>
        <td id="LC743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="744"></td>
        <td id="LC744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="745"></td>
        <td id="LC745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When they make them rightly, they make them agreeably to their interest;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="746"></td>
        <td id="LC746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when they are mistaken, contrary to their interest; you admit that?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="747"></td>
        <td id="LC747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="748"></td>
        <td id="LC748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="749"></td>
        <td id="LC749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="750"></td>
        <td id="LC750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the laws which they make must be obeyed by their subjects,--and that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="751"></td>
        <td id="LC751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is what you call justice?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="752"></td>
        <td id="LC752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="753"></td>
        <td id="LC753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Doubtless.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="754"></td>
        <td id="LC754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="755"></td>
        <td id="LC755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then justice, according to your argument, is not only obedience to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="756"></td>
        <td id="LC756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest of the stronger but the reverse?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="757"></td>
        <td id="LC757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="758"></td>
        <td id="LC758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What is that you are saying? he asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="759"></td>
        <td id="LC759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="760"></td>
        <td id="LC760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am only repeating what you are saying, I believe. But let us consider:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="761"></td>
        <td id="LC761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Have we not admitted that the rulers may be mistaken about their own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="762"></td>
        <td id="LC762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest in what they command, and also that to obey them is justice?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="763"></td>
        <td id="LC763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Has not that been admitted?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="764"></td>
        <td id="LC764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="765"></td>
        <td id="LC765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="766"></td>
        <td id="LC766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="767"></td>
        <td id="LC767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then you must also have acknowledged justice not to be for the interest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="768"></td>
        <td id="LC768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the stronger, when the rulers unintentionally command things to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="769"></td>
        <td id="LC769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done which are to their own injury. For if, as you say, justice is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="770"></td>
        <td id="LC770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">obedience which the subject renders to their commands, in that case, O</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="771"></td>
        <td id="LC771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wisest of men, is there any escape from the conclusion that the weaker</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="772"></td>
        <td id="LC772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are commanded to do, not what is for the interest, but what is for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="773"></td>
        <td id="LC773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injury of the stronger?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="774"></td>
        <td id="LC774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="775"></td>
        <td id="LC775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nothing can be clearer, Socrates, said Polemarchus.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="776"></td>
        <td id="LC776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="777"></td>
        <td id="LC777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, said Cleitophon, interposing, if you are allowed to be his witness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="778"></td>
        <td id="LC778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="779"></td>
        <td id="LC779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But there is no need of any witness, said Polemarchus, for Thrasymachus</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="780"></td>
        <td id="LC780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself acknowledges that rulers may sometimes command what is not for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="781"></td>
        <td id="LC781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their own interest, and that for subjects to obey them is justice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="782"></td>
        <td id="LC782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="783"></td>
        <td id="LC783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, Polemarchus,--Thrasymachus said that for subjects to do what was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="784"></td>
        <td id="LC784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">commanded by their rulers is just.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="785"></td>
        <td id="LC785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="786"></td>
        <td id="LC786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, Cleitophon, but he also said that justice is the interest of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="787"></td>
        <td id="LC787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stronger, and, while admitting both these propositions, he further</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="788"></td>
        <td id="LC788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acknowledged that the stronger may command the weaker who are his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="789"></td>
        <td id="LC789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subjects to do what is not for his own interest; whence follows that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="790"></td>
        <td id="LC790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice is the injury quite as much as the interest of the stronger.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="791"></td>
        <td id="LC791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="792"></td>
        <td id="LC792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, said Cleitophon, he meant by the interest of the stronger what the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="793"></td>
        <td id="LC793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stronger thought to be his interest,--this was what the weaker had to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="794"></td>
        <td id="LC794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do; and this was affirmed by him to be justice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="795"></td>
        <td id="LC795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="796"></td>
        <td id="LC796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Those were not his words, rejoined Polemarchus.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="797"></td>
        <td id="LC797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="798"></td>
        <td id="LC798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Never mind, I replied, if he now says that they are, let us accept his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="799"></td>
        <td id="LC799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">statement. Tell me, Thrasymachus, I said, did you mean by justice what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="800"></td>
        <td id="LC800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the stronger thought to be his interest, whether really so or not?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="801"></td>
        <td id="LC801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="802"></td>
        <td id="LC802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not, he said. Do you suppose that I call him who is mistaken</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="803"></td>
        <td id="LC803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the stronger at the time when he is mistaken?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="804"></td>
        <td id="LC804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="805"></td>
        <td id="LC805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said, my impression was that you did so, when you admitted that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="806"></td>
        <td id="LC806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ruler was not infallible but might be sometimes mistaken.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="807"></td>
        <td id="LC807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="808"></td>
        <td id="LC808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You argue like an informer, Socrates. Do you mean, for example, that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="809"></td>
        <td id="LC809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who is mistaken about the sick is a physician in that he is mistaken?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="810"></td>
        <td id="LC810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or that he who errs in arithmetic or grammar is an arithmetician or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="811"></td>
        <td id="LC811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grammarian at the time when he is making the mistake, in respect of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="812"></td>
        <td id="LC812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mistake? True, we say that the physician or arithmetician or grammarian</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="813"></td>
        <td id="LC813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has made a mistake, but this is only a way of speaking; for the fact is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="814"></td>
        <td id="LC814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that neither the grammarian nor any other person of skill ever makes a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="815"></td>
        <td id="LC815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mistake in so far as he is what his name implies; they none of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="816"></td>
        <td id="LC816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">err unless their skill fails them, and then they cease to be skilled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="817"></td>
        <td id="LC817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">artists. No artist or sage or ruler errs at the time when he is what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="818"></td>
        <td id="LC818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his name implies; though he is commonly said to err, and I adopted the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="819"></td>
        <td id="LC819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">common mode of speaking. But to be perfectly accurate, since you are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="820"></td>
        <td id="LC820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such a lover of accuracy, we should say that the ruler, in so far as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="821"></td>
        <td id="LC821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is a ruler, is unerring, and, being unerring, always commands that which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="822"></td>
        <td id="LC822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is for his own interest; and the subject is required to execute his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="823"></td>
        <td id="LC823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">commands; and therefore, as I said at first and now repeat, justice is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="824"></td>
        <td id="LC824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the interest of the stronger.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="825"></td>
        <td id="LC825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="826"></td>
        <td id="LC826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Indeed, Thrasymachus, and do I really appear to you to argue like an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="827"></td>
        <td id="LC827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">informer?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="828"></td>
        <td id="LC828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="829"></td>
        <td id="LC829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="830"></td>
        <td id="LC830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="831"></td>
        <td id="LC831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And do you suppose that I ask these questions with any design of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="832"></td>
        <td id="LC832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injuring you in the argument?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="833"></td>
        <td id="LC833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="834"></td>
        <td id="LC834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nay, he replied, &#39;suppose&#39; is not the word--I know it; but you will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="835"></td>
        <td id="LC835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found out, and by sheer force of argument you will never prevail.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="836"></td>
        <td id="LC836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="837"></td>
        <td id="LC837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I shall not make the attempt, my dear man; but to avoid any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="838"></td>
        <td id="LC838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">misunderstanding occurring between us in future, let me ask, in what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="839"></td>
        <td id="LC839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sense do you speak of a ruler or stronger whose interest, as you were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="840"></td>
        <td id="LC840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying, he being the superior, it is just that the inferior should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="841"></td>
        <td id="LC841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">execute--is he a ruler in the popular or in the strict sense of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="842"></td>
        <td id="LC842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">term?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="843"></td>
        <td id="LC843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="844"></td>
        <td id="LC844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the strictest of all senses, he said. And now cheat and play the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="845"></td>
        <td id="LC845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">informer if you can; I ask no quarter at your hands. But you never will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="846"></td>
        <td id="LC846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be able, never.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="847"></td>
        <td id="LC847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="848"></td>
        <td id="LC848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And do you imagine, I said, that I am such a madman as to try and cheat,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="849"></td>
        <td id="LC849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thrasymachus? I might as well shave a lion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="850"></td>
        <td id="LC850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="851"></td>
        <td id="LC851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, he said, you made the attempt a minute ago, and you failed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="852"></td>
        <td id="LC852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="853"></td>
        <td id="LC853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Enough, I said, of these civilities. It will be better that I should ask</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="854"></td>
        <td id="LC854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you a question: Is the physician, taken in that strict sense of which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="855"></td>
        <td id="LC855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you are speaking, a healer of the sick or a maker of money? And remember</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="856"></td>
        <td id="LC856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I am now speaking of the true physician.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="857"></td>
        <td id="LC857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="858"></td>
        <td id="LC858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A healer of the sick, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="859"></td>
        <td id="LC859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="860"></td>
        <td id="LC860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the pilot--that is to say, the true pilot--is he a captain of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="861"></td>
        <td id="LC861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sailors or a mere sailor?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="862"></td>
        <td id="LC862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="863"></td>
        <td id="LC863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A captain of sailors.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="864"></td>
        <td id="LC864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="865"></td>
        <td id="LC865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The circumstance that he sails in the ship is not to be taken into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="866"></td>
        <td id="LC866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">account; neither is he to be called a sailor; the name pilot by which he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="867"></td>
        <td id="LC867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is distinguished has nothing to do with sailing, but is significant of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="868"></td>
        <td id="LC868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his skill and of his authority over the sailors.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="869"></td>
        <td id="LC869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="870"></td>
        <td id="LC870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="871"></td>
        <td id="LC871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="872"></td>
        <td id="LC872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, I said, every art has an interest?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="873"></td>
        <td id="LC873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="874"></td>
        <td id="LC874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="875"></td>
        <td id="LC875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="876"></td>
        <td id="LC876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For which the art has to consider and provide?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="877"></td>
        <td id="LC877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="878"></td>
        <td id="LC878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, that is the aim of art.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="879"></td>
        <td id="LC879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="880"></td>
        <td id="LC880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the interest of any art is the perfection of it--this and nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="881"></td>
        <td id="LC881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">else?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="882"></td>
        <td id="LC882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="883"></td>
        <td id="LC883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="884"></td>
        <td id="LC884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="885"></td>
        <td id="LC885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I mean what I may illustrate negatively by the example of the body.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="886"></td>
        <td id="LC886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suppose you were to ask me whether the body is self-sufficing or has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="887"></td>
        <td id="LC887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wants, I should reply: Certainly the body has wants; for the body may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="888"></td>
        <td id="LC888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be ill and require to be cured, and has therefore interests to which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="889"></td>
        <td id="LC889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the art of medicine ministers; and this is the origin and intention of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="890"></td>
        <td id="LC890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">medicine, as you will acknowledge. Am I not right?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="891"></td>
        <td id="LC891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="892"></td>
        <td id="LC892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quite right, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="893"></td>
        <td id="LC893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="894"></td>
        <td id="LC894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But is the art of medicine or any other art faulty or deficient in any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="895"></td>
        <td id="LC895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quality in the same way that the eye may be deficient in sight or the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="896"></td>
        <td id="LC896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ear fail of hearing, and therefore requires another art to provide</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="897"></td>
        <td id="LC897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the interests of seeing and hearing--has art in itself, I say, any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="898"></td>
        <td id="LC898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">similar liability to fault or defect, and does every art require another</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="899"></td>
        <td id="LC899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supplementary art to provide for its interests, and that another and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="900"></td>
        <td id="LC900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another without end? Or have the arts to look only after their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="901"></td>
        <td id="LC901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own interests? Or have they no need either of themselves or of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="902"></td>
        <td id="LC902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another?--having no faults or defects, they have no need to correct</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="903"></td>
        <td id="LC903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, either by the exercise of their own art or of any other; they have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="904"></td>
        <td id="LC904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only to consider the interest of their subject-matter. For every art</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="905"></td>
        <td id="LC905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remains pure and faultless while remaining true--that is to say, while</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="906"></td>
        <td id="LC906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perfect and unimpaired. Take the words in your precise sense, and tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="907"></td>
        <td id="LC907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me whether I am not right.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="908"></td>
        <td id="LC908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="909"></td>
        <td id="LC909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, clearly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="910"></td>
        <td id="LC910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="911"></td>
        <td id="LC911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then medicine does not consider the interest of medicine, but the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="912"></td>
        <td id="LC912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest of the body?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="913"></td>
        <td id="LC913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="914"></td>
        <td id="LC914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="915"></td>
        <td id="LC915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="916"></td>
        <td id="LC916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nor does the art of horsemanship consider the interests of the art of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="917"></td>
        <td id="LC917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horsemanship, but the interests of the horse; neither do any other arts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="918"></td>
        <td id="LC918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">care for themselves, for they have no needs; they care only for that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="919"></td>
        <td id="LC919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which is the subject of their art?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="920"></td>
        <td id="LC920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="921"></td>
        <td id="LC921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="922"></td>
        <td id="LC922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="923"></td>
        <td id="LC923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But surely, Thrasymachus, the arts are the superiors and rulers of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="924"></td>
        <td id="LC924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own subjects?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="925"></td>
        <td id="LC925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="926"></td>
        <td id="LC926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To this he assented with a good deal of reluctance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="927"></td>
        <td id="LC927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="928"></td>
        <td id="LC928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, I said, no science or art considers or enjoins the interest of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="929"></td>
        <td id="LC929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stronger or superior, but only the interest of the subject and weaker?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="930"></td>
        <td id="LC930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="931"></td>
        <td id="LC931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He made an attempt to contest this proposition also, but finally</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="932"></td>
        <td id="LC932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquiesced.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="933"></td>
        <td id="LC933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="934"></td>
        <td id="LC934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, I continued, no physician, in so far as he is a physician,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="935"></td>
        <td id="LC935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considers his own good in what he prescribes, but the good of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="936"></td>
        <td id="LC936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patient; for the true physician is also a ruler having the human body as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="937"></td>
        <td id="LC937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a subject, and is not a mere money-maker; that has been admitted?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="938"></td>
        <td id="LC938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="939"></td>
        <td id="LC939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="940"></td>
        <td id="LC940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="941"></td>
        <td id="LC941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the pilot likewise, in the strict sense of the term, is a ruler of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="942"></td>
        <td id="LC942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sailors and not a mere sailor?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="943"></td>
        <td id="LC943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="944"></td>
        <td id="LC944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That has been admitted.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="945"></td>
        <td id="LC945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="946"></td>
        <td id="LC946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And such a pilot and ruler will provide and prescribe for the interest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="947"></td>
        <td id="LC947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the sailor who is under him, and not for his own or the ruler&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="948"></td>
        <td id="LC948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="949"></td>
        <td id="LC949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="950"></td>
        <td id="LC950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He gave a reluctant &#39;Yes.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="951"></td>
        <td id="LC951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="952"></td>
        <td id="LC952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, I said, Thrasymachus, there is no one in any rule who, in so far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="953"></td>
        <td id="LC953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as he is a ruler, considers or enjoins what is for his own interest, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="954"></td>
        <td id="LC954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always what is for the interest of his subject or suitable to his art;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="955"></td>
        <td id="LC955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to that he looks, and that alone he considers in everything which he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="956"></td>
        <td id="LC956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">says and does.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="957"></td>
        <td id="LC957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="958"></td>
        <td id="LC958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When we had got to this point in the argument, and every one saw that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="959"></td>
        <td id="LC959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the definition of justice had been completely upset, Thrasymachus,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="960"></td>
        <td id="LC960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instead of replying to me, said: Tell me, Socrates, have you got a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="961"></td>
        <td id="LC961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nurse?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="962"></td>
        <td id="LC962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="963"></td>
        <td id="LC963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why do you ask such a question, I said, when you ought rather to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="964"></td>
        <td id="LC964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answering?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="965"></td>
        <td id="LC965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="966"></td>
        <td id="LC966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Because she leaves you to snivel, and never wipes your nose: she has not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="967"></td>
        <td id="LC967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even taught you to know the shepherd from the sheep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="968"></td>
        <td id="LC968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="969"></td>
        <td id="LC969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What makes you say that? I replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="970"></td>
        <td id="LC970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="971"></td>
        <td id="LC971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Because you fancy that the shepherd or neatherd fattens or tends the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="972"></td>
        <td id="LC972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sheep or oxen with a view to their own good and not to the good of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="973"></td>
        <td id="LC973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself or his master; and you further imagine that the rulers of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="974"></td>
        <td id="LC974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">states, if they are true rulers, never think of their subjects as sheep,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="975"></td>
        <td id="LC975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that they are not studying their own advantage day and night. Oh,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="976"></td>
        <td id="LC976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no; and so entirely astray are you in your ideas about the just and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="977"></td>
        <td id="LC977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unjust as not even to know that justice and the just are in reality</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="978"></td>
        <td id="LC978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another&#39;s good; that is to say, the interest of the ruler and stronger,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="979"></td>
        <td id="LC979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the loss of the subject and servant; and injustice the opposite; for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="980"></td>
        <td id="LC980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the unjust is lord over the truly simple and just: he is the stronger,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="981"></td>
        <td id="LC981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and his subjects do what is for his interest, and minister to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="982"></td>
        <td id="LC982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happiness, which is very far from being their own. Consider further,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="983"></td>
        <td id="LC983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most foolish Socrates, that the just is always a loser in comparison</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="984"></td>
        <td id="LC984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the unjust. First of all, in private contracts: wherever the unjust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="985"></td>
        <td id="LC985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is the partner of the just you will find that, when the partnership is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="986"></td>
        <td id="LC986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dissolved, the unjust man has always more and the just less. Secondly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="987"></td>
        <td id="LC987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in their dealings with the State: when there is an income-tax, the just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="988"></td>
        <td id="LC988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man will pay more and the unjust less on the same amount of income;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="989"></td>
        <td id="LC989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and when there is anything to be received the one gains nothing and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="990"></td>
        <td id="LC990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other much. Observe also what happens when they take an office; there is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="991"></td>
        <td id="LC991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the just man neglecting his affairs and perhaps suffering other losses,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="992"></td>
        <td id="LC992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and getting nothing out of the public, because he is just; moreover he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="993"></td>
        <td id="LC993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is hated by his friends and acquaintance for refusing to serve them in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="994"></td>
        <td id="LC994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unlawful ways. But all this is reversed in the case of the unjust man.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="995"></td>
        <td id="LC995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am speaking, as before, of injustice on a large scale in which the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="996"></td>
        <td id="LC996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantage of the unjust is most apparent; and my meaning will be most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="997"></td>
        <td id="LC997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clearly seen if we turn to that highest form of injustice in which the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="998"></td>
        <td id="LC998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">criminal is the happiest of men, and the sufferers or those who refuse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="999"></td>
        <td id="LC999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to do injustice are the most miserable--that is to say tyranny, which by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1000"></td>
        <td id="LC1000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fraud and force takes away the property of others, not little by little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1001"></td>
        <td id="LC1001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but wholesale; comprehending in one, things sacred as well as profane,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1002"></td>
        <td id="LC1002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">private and public; for which acts of wrong, if he were detected</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1003"></td>
        <td id="LC1003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perpetrating any one of them singly, he would be punished and incur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1004"></td>
        <td id="LC1004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great disgrace--they who do such wrong in particular cases are called</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1005"></td>
        <td id="LC1005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">robbers of temples, and man-stealers and burglars and swindlers and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1006"></td>
        <td id="LC1006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thieves. But when a man besides taking away the money of the citizens</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1007"></td>
        <td id="LC1007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has made slaves of them, then, instead of these names of reproach, he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1008"></td>
        <td id="LC1008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">termed happy and blessed, not only by the citizens but by all who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1009"></td>
        <td id="LC1009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hear of his having achieved the consummation of injustice. For mankind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1010"></td>
        <td id="LC1010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">censure injustice, fearing that they may be the victims of it and not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1011"></td>
        <td id="LC1011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because they shrink from committing it. And thus, as I have shown,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1012"></td>
        <td id="LC1012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Socrates, injustice, when on a sufficient scale, has more strength and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1013"></td>
        <td id="LC1013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">freedom and mastery than justice; and, as I said at first, justice is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1014"></td>
        <td id="LC1014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the interest of the stronger, whereas injustice is a man&#39;s own profit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1015"></td>
        <td id="LC1015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and interest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1016"></td>
        <td id="LC1016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1017"></td>
        <td id="LC1017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thrasymachus, when he had thus spoken, having, like a bath-man, deluged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1018"></td>
        <td id="LC1018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our ears with his words, had a mind to go away. But the company</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1019"></td>
        <td id="LC1019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would not let him; they insisted that he should remain and defend his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1020"></td>
        <td id="LC1020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">position; and I myself added my own humble request that he would not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1021"></td>
        <td id="LC1021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leave us. Thrasymachus, I said to him, excellent man, how suggestive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1022"></td>
        <td id="LC1022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are your remarks! And are you going to run away before you have fairly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1023"></td>
        <td id="LC1023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taught or learned whether they are true or not? Is the attempt to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
