        <td id="L1024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1024"></td>
        <td id="LC1024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">determine the way of man&#39;s life so small a matter in your eyes--to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1025"></td>
        <td id="LC1025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">determine how life may be passed by each one of us to the greatest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1026"></td>
        <td id="LC1026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantage?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1027"></td>
        <td id="LC1027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1028"></td>
        <td id="LC1028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And do I differ from you, he said, as to the importance of the enquiry?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1029"></td>
        <td id="LC1029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1030"></td>
        <td id="LC1030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You appear rather, I replied, to have no care or thought about us,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1031"></td>
        <td id="LC1031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thrasymachus--whether we live better or worse from not knowing what you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1032"></td>
        <td id="LC1032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say you know, is to you a matter of indifference. Prithee, friend,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1033"></td>
        <td id="LC1033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do not keep your knowledge to yourself; we are a large party; and any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1034"></td>
        <td id="LC1034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">benefit which you confer upon us will be amply rewarded. For my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1035"></td>
        <td id="LC1035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part I openly declare that I am not convinced, and that I do not believe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1036"></td>
        <td id="LC1036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injustice to be more gainful than justice, even if uncontrolled and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1037"></td>
        <td id="LC1037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allowed to have free play. For, granting that there may be an unjust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1038"></td>
        <td id="LC1038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man who is able to commit injustice either by fraud or force, still this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1039"></td>
        <td id="LC1039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">does not convince me of the superior advantage of injustice, and there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1040"></td>
        <td id="LC1040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may be others who are in the same predicament with myself. Perhaps we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1041"></td>
        <td id="LC1041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may be wrong; if so, you in your wisdom should convince us that we are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1042"></td>
        <td id="LC1042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mistaken in preferring justice to injustice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1043"></td>
        <td id="LC1043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1044"></td>
        <td id="LC1044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And how am I to convince you, he said, if you are not already convinced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1045"></td>
        <td id="LC1045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by what I have just said; what more can I do for you? Would you have me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1046"></td>
        <td id="LC1046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put the proof bodily into your souls?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1047"></td>
        <td id="LC1047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1048"></td>
        <td id="LC1048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heaven forbid! I said; I would only ask you to be consistent; or, if you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1049"></td>
        <td id="LC1049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">change, change openly and let there be no deception. For I must remark,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1050"></td>
        <td id="LC1050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thrasymachus, if you will recall what was previously said, that although</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1051"></td>
        <td id="LC1051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you began by defining the true physician in an exact sense, you did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1052"></td>
        <td id="LC1052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observe a like exactness when speaking of the shepherd; you thought that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1053"></td>
        <td id="LC1053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the shepherd as a shepherd tends the sheep not with a view to their own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1054"></td>
        <td id="LC1054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good, but like a mere diner or banquetter with a view to the pleasures</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1055"></td>
        <td id="LC1055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the table; or, again, as a trader for sale in the market, and not as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1056"></td>
        <td id="LC1056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a shepherd. Yet surely the art of the shepherd is concerned only with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1057"></td>
        <td id="LC1057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the good of his subjects; he has only to provide the best for them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1058"></td>
        <td id="LC1058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since the perfection of the art is already ensured whenever all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1059"></td>
        <td id="LC1059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">requirements of it are satisfied. And that was what I was saying just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1060"></td>
        <td id="LC1060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now about the ruler. I conceived that the art of the ruler, considered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1061"></td>
        <td id="LC1061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as ruler, whether in a state or in private life, could only regard the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1062"></td>
        <td id="LC1062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good of his flock or subjects; whereas you seem to think that the rulers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1063"></td>
        <td id="LC1063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in states, that is to say, the true rulers, like being in authority.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1064"></td>
        <td id="LC1064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1065"></td>
        <td id="LC1065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Think! Nay, I am sure of it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1066"></td>
        <td id="LC1066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1067"></td>
        <td id="LC1067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then why in the case of lesser offices do men never take them willingly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1068"></td>
        <td id="LC1068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without payment, unless under the idea that they govern for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1069"></td>
        <td id="LC1069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantage not of themselves but of others? Let me ask you a question:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1070"></td>
        <td id="LC1070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Are not the several arts different, by reason of their each having a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1071"></td>
        <td id="LC1071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">separate function? And, my dear illustrious friend, do say what you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1072"></td>
        <td id="LC1072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think, that we may make a little progress.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1073"></td>
        <td id="LC1073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1074"></td>
        <td id="LC1074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, that is the difference, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1075"></td>
        <td id="LC1075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1076"></td>
        <td id="LC1076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And each art gives us a particular good and not merely a general</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1077"></td>
        <td id="LC1077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one--medicine, for example, gives us health; navigation, safety at sea,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1078"></td>
        <td id="LC1078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and so on?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1079"></td>
        <td id="LC1079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1080"></td>
        <td id="LC1080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1081"></td>
        <td id="LC1081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1082"></td>
        <td id="LC1082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the art of payment has the special function of giving pay: but we do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1083"></td>
        <td id="LC1083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not confuse this with other arts, any more than the art of the pilot is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1084"></td>
        <td id="LC1084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be confused with the art of medicine, because the health of the pilot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1085"></td>
        <td id="LC1085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may be improved by a sea voyage. You would not be inclined to say, would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1086"></td>
        <td id="LC1086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you, that navigation is the art of medicine, at least if we are to adopt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1087"></td>
        <td id="LC1087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your exact use of language?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1088"></td>
        <td id="LC1088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1089"></td>
        <td id="LC1089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1090"></td>
        <td id="LC1090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1091"></td>
        <td id="LC1091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Or because a man is in good health when he receives pay you would not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1092"></td>
        <td id="LC1092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say that the art of payment is medicine?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1093"></td>
        <td id="LC1093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1094"></td>
        <td id="LC1094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1095"></td>
        <td id="LC1095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1096"></td>
        <td id="LC1096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nor would you say that medicine is the art of receiving pay because a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1097"></td>
        <td id="LC1097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man takes fees when he is engaged in healing?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1098"></td>
        <td id="LC1098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1099"></td>
        <td id="LC1099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1100"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1101"></td>
        <td id="LC1101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And we have admitted, I said, that the good of each art is specially</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1102"></td>
        <td id="LC1102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confined to the art?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1103"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1104"></td>
        <td id="LC1104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1105"></td>
        <td id="LC1105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1106"></td>
        <td id="LC1106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, if there be any good which all artists have in common, that is to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1107"></td>
        <td id="LC1107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be attributed to something of which they all have the common use?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1108"></td>
        <td id="LC1108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1109"></td>
        <td id="LC1109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1110"></td>
        <td id="LC1110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1111"></td>
        <td id="LC1111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And when the artist is benefited by receiving pay the advantage is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1112"></td>
        <td id="LC1112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gained by an additional use of the art of pay, which is not the art</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1113"></td>
        <td id="LC1113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">professed by him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1114"></td>
        <td id="LC1114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1115"></td>
        <td id="LC1115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He gave a reluctant assent to this.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1116"></td>
        <td id="LC1116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1117"></td>
        <td id="LC1117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the pay is not derived by the several artists from their respective</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1118"></td>
        <td id="LC1118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arts. But the truth is, that while the art of medicine gives health, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1119"></td>
        <td id="LC1119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the art of the builder builds a house, another art attends them which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1120"></td>
        <td id="LC1120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is the art of pay. The various arts may be doing their own business and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1121"></td>
        <td id="LC1121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">benefiting that over which they preside, but would the artist receive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1122"></td>
        <td id="LC1122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any benefit from his art unless he were paid as well?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1123"></td>
        <td id="LC1123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1124"></td>
        <td id="LC1124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I suppose not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1125"></td>
        <td id="LC1125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1126"></td>
        <td id="LC1126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But does he therefore confer no benefit when he works for nothing?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1127"></td>
        <td id="LC1127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1128"></td>
        <td id="LC1128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, he confers a benefit.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1129"></td>
        <td id="LC1129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1130"></td>
        <td id="LC1130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then now, Thrasymachus, there is no longer any doubt that neither arts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1131"></td>
        <td id="LC1131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nor governments provide for their own interests; but, as we were before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1132"></td>
        <td id="LC1132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying, they rule and provide for the interests of their subjects who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1133"></td>
        <td id="LC1133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are the weaker and not the stronger--to their good they attend and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1134"></td>
        <td id="LC1134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not to the good of the superior. And this is the reason, my dear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1135"></td>
        <td id="LC1135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thrasymachus, why, as I was just now saying, no one is willing to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1136"></td>
        <td id="LC1136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">govern; because no one likes to take in hand the reformation of evils</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1137"></td>
        <td id="LC1137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which are not his concern without remuneration. For, in the execution of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1138"></td>
        <td id="LC1138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his work, and in giving his orders to another, the true artist does not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1139"></td>
        <td id="LC1139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">regard his own interest, but always that of his subjects; and therefore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1140"></td>
        <td id="LC1140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in order that rulers may be willing to rule, they must be paid in one of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1141"></td>
        <td id="LC1141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three modes of payment, money, or honour, or a penalty for refusing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1142"></td>
        <td id="LC1142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1143"></td>
        <td id="LC1143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean, Socrates? said Glaucon. The first two modes of payment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1144"></td>
        <td id="LC1144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are intelligible enough, but what the penalty is I do not understand, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1145"></td>
        <td id="LC1145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how a penalty can be a payment.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1146"></td>
        <td id="LC1146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1147"></td>
        <td id="LC1147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You mean that you do not understand the nature of this payment which to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1148"></td>
        <td id="LC1148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the best men is the great inducement to rule? Of course you know that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1149"></td>
        <td id="LC1149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ambition and avarice are held to be, as indeed they are, a disgrace?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1150"></td>
        <td id="LC1150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1151"></td>
        <td id="LC1151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1152"></td>
        <td id="LC1152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1153"></td>
        <td id="LC1153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And for this reason, I said, money and honour have no attraction for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1154"></td>
        <td id="LC1154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them; good men do not wish to be openly demanding payment for governing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1155"></td>
        <td id="LC1155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and so to get the name of hirelings, nor by secretly helping themselves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1156"></td>
        <td id="LC1156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of the public revenues to get the name of thieves. And not being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1157"></td>
        <td id="LC1157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ambitious they do not care about honour. Wherefore necessity must be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1158"></td>
        <td id="LC1158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laid upon them, and they must be induced to serve from the fear of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1159"></td>
        <td id="LC1159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">punishment. And this, as I imagine, is the reason why the forwardness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1160"></td>
        <td id="LC1160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to take office, instead of waiting to be compelled, has been deemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1161"></td>
        <td id="LC1161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dishonourable. Now the worst part of the punishment is that he who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1162"></td>
        <td id="LC1162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">refuses to rule is liable to be ruled by one who is worse than himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1163"></td>
        <td id="LC1163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the fear of this, as I conceive, induces the good to take office,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1164"></td>
        <td id="LC1164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not because they would, but because they cannot help--not under the idea</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1165"></td>
        <td id="LC1165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that they are going to have any benefit or enjoyment themselves, but as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1166"></td>
        <td id="LC1166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a necessity, and because they are not able to commit the task of ruling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1167"></td>
        <td id="LC1167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to any one who is better than themselves, or indeed as good. For there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1168"></td>
        <td id="LC1168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is reason to think that if a city were composed entirely of good men,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1169"></td>
        <td id="LC1169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then to avoid office would be as much an object of contention as to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1170"></td>
        <td id="LC1170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">obtain office is at present; then we should have plain proof that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1171"></td>
        <td id="LC1171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">true ruler is not meant by nature to regard his own interest, but that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1172"></td>
        <td id="LC1172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his subjects; and every one who knew this would choose rather to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1173"></td>
        <td id="LC1173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">receive a benefit from another than to have the trouble of conferring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1174"></td>
        <td id="LC1174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one. So far am I from agreeing with Thrasymachus that justice is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1175"></td>
        <td id="LC1175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest of the stronger. This latter question need not be further</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1176"></td>
        <td id="LC1176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discussed at present; but when Thrasymachus says that the life of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1177"></td>
        <td id="LC1177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unjust is more advantageous than that of the just, his new statement</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1178"></td>
        <td id="LC1178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appears to me to be of a far more serious character. Which of us has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1179"></td>
        <td id="LC1179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoken truly? And which sort of life, Glaucon, do you prefer?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1180"></td>
        <td id="LC1180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1181"></td>
        <td id="LC1181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I for my part deem the life of the just to be the more advantageous, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1182"></td>
        <td id="LC1182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1183"></td>
        <td id="LC1183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1184"></td>
        <td id="LC1184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Did you hear all the advantages of the unjust which Thrasymachus was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1185"></td>
        <td id="LC1185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rehearsing?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1186"></td>
        <td id="LC1186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1187"></td>
        <td id="LC1187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I heard him, he replied, but he has not convinced me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1188"></td>
        <td id="LC1188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1189"></td>
        <td id="LC1189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then shall we try to find some way of convincing him, if we can, that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1190"></td>
        <td id="LC1190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is saying what is not true?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1191"></td>
        <td id="LC1191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1192"></td>
        <td id="LC1192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most certainly, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1193"></td>
        <td id="LC1193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1194"></td>
        <td id="LC1194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If, I said, he makes a set speech and we make another recounting all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1195"></td>
        <td id="LC1195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantages of being just, and he answers and we rejoin, there must be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1196"></td>
        <td id="LC1196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">numbering and measuring of the goods which are claimed on either side,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1197"></td>
        <td id="LC1197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and in the end we shall want judges to decide; but if we proceed in our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1198"></td>
        <td id="LC1198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enquiry as we lately did, by making admissions to one another, we shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1199"></td>
        <td id="LC1199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unite the offices of judge and advocate in our own persons.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1200"></td>
        <td id="LC1200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1201"></td>
        <td id="LC1201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very good, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1202"></td>
        <td id="LC1202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1203"></td>
        <td id="LC1203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And which method do I understand you to prefer? I said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1204"></td>
        <td id="LC1204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1205"></td>
        <td id="LC1205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That which you propose.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1206"></td>
        <td id="LC1206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1207"></td>
        <td id="LC1207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, then, Thrasymachus, I said, suppose you begin at the beginning and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1208"></td>
        <td id="LC1208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer me. You say that perfect injustice is more gainful than perfect</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1209"></td>
        <td id="LC1209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1210"></td>
        <td id="LC1210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1211"></td>
        <td id="LC1211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, that is what I say, and I have given you my reasons.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1212"></td>
        <td id="LC1212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1213"></td>
        <td id="LC1213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what is your view about them? Would you call one of them virtue and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1214"></td>
        <td id="LC1214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other vice?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1215"></td>
        <td id="LC1215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1216"></td>
        <td id="LC1216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1217"></td>
        <td id="LC1217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1218"></td>
        <td id="LC1218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I suppose that you would call justice virtue and injustice vice?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1219"></td>
        <td id="LC1219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1220"></td>
        <td id="LC1220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What a charming notion! So likely too, seeing that I affirm injustice to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1221"></td>
        <td id="LC1221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be profitable and justice not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1222"></td>
        <td id="LC1222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1223"></td>
        <td id="LC1223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What else then would you say?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1224"></td>
        <td id="LC1224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1225"></td>
        <td id="LC1225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The opposite, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1226"></td>
        <td id="LC1226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1227"></td>
        <td id="LC1227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And would you call justice vice?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1228"></td>
        <td id="LC1228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1229"></td>
        <td id="LC1229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No, I would rather say sublime simplicity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1230"></td>
        <td id="LC1230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1231"></td>
        <td id="LC1231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then would you call injustice malignity?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1232"></td>
        <td id="LC1232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1233"></td>
        <td id="LC1233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No; I would rather say discretion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1234"></td>
        <td id="LC1234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1235"></td>
        <td id="LC1235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And do the unjust appear to you to be wise and good?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1236"></td>
        <td id="LC1236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1237"></td>
        <td id="LC1237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said; at any rate those of them who are able to be perfectly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1238"></td>
        <td id="LC1238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unjust, and who have the power of subduing states and nations; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1239"></td>
        <td id="LC1239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perhaps you imagine me to be talking of cutpurses. Even this profession</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1240"></td>
        <td id="LC1240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if undetected has advantages, though they are not to be compared with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1241"></td>
        <td id="LC1241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those of which I was just now speaking.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1242"></td>
        <td id="LC1242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1243"></td>
        <td id="LC1243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do not think that I misapprehend your meaning, Thrasymachus, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1244"></td>
        <td id="LC1244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">replied; but still I cannot hear without amazement that you class</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1245"></td>
        <td id="LC1245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injustice with wisdom and virtue, and justice with the opposite.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1246"></td>
        <td id="LC1246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1247"></td>
        <td id="LC1247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly I do so class them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1248"></td>
        <td id="LC1248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1249"></td>
        <td id="LC1249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, I said, you are on more substantial and almost unanswerable ground;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1250"></td>
        <td id="LC1250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for if the injustice which you were maintaining to be profitable had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1251"></td>
        <td id="LC1251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been admitted by you as by others to be vice and deformity, an answer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1252"></td>
        <td id="LC1252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might have been given to you on received principles; but now I perceive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1253"></td>
        <td id="LC1253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that you will call injustice honourable and strong, and to the unjust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1254"></td>
        <td id="LC1254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you will attribute all the qualities which were attributed by us before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1255"></td>
        <td id="LC1255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the just, seeing that you do not hesitate to rank injustice with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1256"></td>
        <td id="LC1256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wisdom and virtue.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1257"></td>
        <td id="LC1257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1258"></td>
        <td id="LC1258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You have guessed most infallibly, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1259"></td>
        <td id="LC1259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1260"></td>
        <td id="LC1260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then I certainly ought not to shrink from going through with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1261"></td>
        <td id="LC1261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">argument so long as I have reason to think that you, Thrasymachus, are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1262"></td>
        <td id="LC1262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speaking your real mind; for I do believe that you are now in earnest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1263"></td>
        <td id="LC1263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and are not amusing yourself at our expense.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1264"></td>
        <td id="LC1264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1265"></td>
        <td id="LC1265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I may be in earnest or not, but what is that to you?--to refute the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1266"></td>
        <td id="LC1266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">argument is your business.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1267"></td>
        <td id="LC1267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1268"></td>
        <td id="LC1268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, I said; that is what I have to do: But will you be so good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1269"></td>
        <td id="LC1269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as answer yet one more question? Does the just man try to gain any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1270"></td>
        <td id="LC1270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantage over the just?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1271"></td>
        <td id="LC1271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1272"></td>
        <td id="LC1272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Far otherwise; if he did he would not be the simple amusing creature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1273"></td>
        <td id="LC1273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which he is.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1274"></td>
        <td id="LC1274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1275"></td>
        <td id="LC1275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And would he try to go beyond just action?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1276"></td>
        <td id="LC1276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1277"></td>
        <td id="LC1277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He would not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1278"></td>
        <td id="LC1278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1279"></td>
        <td id="LC1279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And how would he regard the attempt to gain an advantage over the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1280"></td>
        <td id="LC1280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unjust; would that be considered by him as just or unjust?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1281"></td>
        <td id="LC1281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1282"></td>
        <td id="LC1282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He would think it just, and would try to gain the advantage; but he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1283"></td>
        <td id="LC1283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would not be able.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1284"></td>
        <td id="LC1284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1285"></td>
        <td id="LC1285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whether he would or would not be able, I said, is not to the point. My</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1286"></td>
        <td id="LC1286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">question is only whether the just man, while refusing to have more than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1287"></td>
        <td id="LC1287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another just man, would wish and claim to have more than the unjust?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1288"></td>
        <td id="LC1288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1289"></td>
        <td id="LC1289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he would.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1290"></td>
        <td id="LC1290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1291"></td>
        <td id="LC1291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what of the unjust--does he claim to have more than the just man and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1292"></td>
        <td id="LC1292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to do more than is just?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1293"></td>
        <td id="LC1293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1294"></td>
        <td id="LC1294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of course, he said, for he claims to have more than all men.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1295"></td>
        <td id="LC1295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1296"></td>
        <td id="LC1296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the unjust man will strive and struggle to obtain more than the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1297"></td>
        <td id="LC1297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unjust man or action, in order that he may have more than all?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1298"></td>
        <td id="LC1298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1299"></td>
        <td id="LC1299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1300"></td>
        <td id="LC1300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1301"></td>
        <td id="LC1301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We may put the matter thus, I said--the just does not desire more than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1302"></td>
        <td id="LC1302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his like but more than his unlike, whereas the unjust desires more than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1303"></td>
        <td id="LC1303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both his like and his unlike?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1304"></td>
        <td id="LC1304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1305"></td>
        <td id="LC1305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nothing, he said, can be better than that statement.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1306"></td>
        <td id="LC1306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1307"></td>
        <td id="LC1307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the unjust is good and wise, and the just is neither?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1308"></td>
        <td id="LC1308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1309"></td>
        <td id="LC1309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Good again, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1310"></td>
        <td id="LC1310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1311"></td>
        <td id="LC1311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is not the unjust like the wise and good and the just unlike them?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1312"></td>
        <td id="LC1312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1313"></td>
        <td id="LC1313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of course, he said, he who is of a certain nature, is like those who are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1314"></td>
        <td id="LC1314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a certain nature; he who is not, not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1315"></td>
        <td id="LC1315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1316"></td>
        <td id="LC1316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Each of them, I said, is such as his like is?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1317"></td>
        <td id="LC1317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1318"></td>
        <td id="LC1318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1319"></td>
        <td id="LC1319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1320"></td>
        <td id="LC1320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very good, Thrasymachus, I said; and now to take the case of the arts:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1321"></td>
        <td id="LC1321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you would admit that one man is a musician and another not a musician?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1322"></td>
        <td id="LC1322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1323"></td>
        <td id="LC1323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1324"></td>
        <td id="LC1324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1325"></td>
        <td id="LC1325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And which is wise and which is foolish?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1326"></td>
        <td id="LC1326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1327"></td>
        <td id="LC1327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Clearly the musician is wise, and he who is not a musician is foolish.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1328"></td>
        <td id="LC1328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1329"></td>
        <td id="LC1329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And he is good in as far as he is wise, and bad in as far as he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1330"></td>
        <td id="LC1330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foolish?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1331"></td>
        <td id="LC1331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1332"></td>
        <td id="LC1332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1333"></td>
        <td id="LC1333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1334"></td>
        <td id="LC1334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And you would say the same sort of thing of the physician?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1335"></td>
        <td id="LC1335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1336"></td>
        <td id="LC1336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1337"></td>
        <td id="LC1337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1338"></td>
        <td id="LC1338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And do you think, my excellent friend, that a musician when he adjusts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1339"></td>
        <td id="LC1339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lyre would desire or claim to exceed or go beyond a musician in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1340"></td>
        <td id="LC1340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tightening and loosening the strings?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1341"></td>
        <td id="LC1341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1342"></td>
        <td id="LC1342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do not think that he would.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1343"></td>
        <td id="LC1343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1344"></td>
        <td id="LC1344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But he would claim to exceed the non-musician?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1345"></td>
        <td id="LC1345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1346"></td>
        <td id="LC1346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of course.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1347"></td>
        <td id="LC1347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1348"></td>
        <td id="LC1348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what would you say of the physician? In prescribing meats and drinks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1349"></td>
        <td id="LC1349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would he wish to go beyond another physician or beyond the practice of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1350"></td>
        <td id="LC1350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">medicine?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1351"></td>
        <td id="LC1351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1352"></td>
        <td id="LC1352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He would not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1353"></td>
        <td id="LC1353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1354"></td>
        <td id="LC1354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But he would wish to go beyond the non-physician?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1355"></td>
        <td id="LC1355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1356"></td>
        <td id="LC1356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1357"></td>
        <td id="LC1357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1358"></td>
        <td id="LC1358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And about knowledge and ignorance in general; see whether you think that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1359"></td>
        <td id="LC1359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any man who has knowledge ever would wish to have the choice of saying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1360"></td>
        <td id="LC1360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or doing more than another man who has knowledge. Would he not rather</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1361"></td>
        <td id="LC1361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say or do the same as his like in the same case?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1362"></td>
        <td id="LC1362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1363"></td>
        <td id="LC1363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That, I suppose, can hardly be denied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1364"></td>
        <td id="LC1364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1365"></td>
        <td id="LC1365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what of the ignorant? would he not desire to have more than either</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1366"></td>
        <td id="LC1366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the knowing or the ignorant?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1367"></td>
        <td id="LC1367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1368"></td>
        <td id="LC1368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I dare say.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1369"></td>
        <td id="LC1369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1370"></td>
        <td id="LC1370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the knowing is wise?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1371"></td>
        <td id="LC1371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1372"></td>
        <td id="LC1372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1373"></td>
        <td id="LC1373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1374"></td>
        <td id="LC1374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the wise is good?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1375"></td>
        <td id="LC1375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1376"></td>
        <td id="LC1376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1377"></td>
        <td id="LC1377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1378"></td>
        <td id="LC1378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the wise and good will not desire to gain more than his like, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1379"></td>
        <td id="LC1379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more than his unlike and opposite?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1380"></td>
        <td id="LC1380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1381"></td>
        <td id="LC1381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I suppose so.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1382"></td>
