        <td id="LC1382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1383"></td>
        <td id="LC1383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whereas the bad and ignorant will desire to gain more than both?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1384"></td>
        <td id="LC1384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1385"></td>
        <td id="LC1385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1386"></td>
        <td id="LC1386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1387"></td>
        <td id="LC1387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But did we not say, Thrasymachus, that the unjust goes beyond both his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1388"></td>
        <td id="LC1388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like and unlike? Were not these your words?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1389"></td>
        <td id="LC1389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1390"></td>
        <td id="LC1390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They were.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1391"></td>
        <td id="LC1391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1392"></td>
        <td id="LC1392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And you also said that the just will not go beyond his like but his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1393"></td>
        <td id="LC1393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unlike?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1394"></td>
        <td id="LC1394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1395"></td>
        <td id="LC1395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1396"></td>
        <td id="LC1396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1397"></td>
        <td id="LC1397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the just is like the wise and good, and the unjust like the evil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1398"></td>
        <td id="LC1398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and ignorant?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1399"></td>
        <td id="LC1399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1400"></td>
        <td id="LC1400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is the inference.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1401"></td>
        <td id="LC1401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1402"></td>
        <td id="LC1402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And each of them is such as his like is?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1403"></td>
        <td id="LC1403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1404"></td>
        <td id="LC1404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That was admitted.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1405"></td>
        <td id="LC1405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1406"></td>
        <td id="LC1406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the just has turned out to be wise and good and the unjust evil and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1407"></td>
        <td id="LC1407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ignorant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1408"></td>
        <td id="LC1408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1409"></td>
        <td id="LC1409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thrasymachus made all these admissions, not fluently, as I repeat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1410"></td>
        <td id="LC1410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, but with extreme reluctance; it was a hot summer&#39;s day, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1411"></td>
        <td id="LC1411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perspiration poured from him in torrents; and then I saw what I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1412"></td>
        <td id="LC1412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never seen before, Thrasymachus blushing. As we were now agreed that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1413"></td>
        <td id="LC1413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice was virtue and wisdom, and injustice vice and ignorance, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1414"></td>
        <td id="LC1414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proceeded to another point:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1415"></td>
        <td id="LC1415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1416"></td>
        <td id="LC1416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, I said, Thrasymachus, that matter is now settled; but were we not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1417"></td>
        <td id="LC1417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also saying that injustice had strength; do you remember?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1418"></td>
        <td id="LC1418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1419"></td>
        <td id="LC1419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I remember, he said, but do not suppose that I approve of what you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1420"></td>
        <td id="LC1420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are saying or have no answer; if however I were to answer, you would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1421"></td>
        <td id="LC1421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite certain to accuse me of haranguing; therefore either permit me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1422"></td>
        <td id="LC1422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have my say out, or if you would rather ask, do so, and I will answer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1423"></td>
        <td id="LC1423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Very good,&#39; as they say to story-telling old women, and will nod &#39;Yes&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1424"></td>
        <td id="LC1424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and &#39;No.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1425"></td>
        <td id="LC1425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1426"></td>
        <td id="LC1426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not, I said, if contrary to your real opinion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1427"></td>
        <td id="LC1427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1428"></td>
        <td id="LC1428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, I will, to please you, since you will not let me speak.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1429"></td>
        <td id="LC1429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What else would you have?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1430"></td>
        <td id="LC1430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1431"></td>
        <td id="LC1431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nothing in the world, I said; and if you are so disposed I will ask and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1432"></td>
        <td id="LC1432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you shall answer.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1433"></td>
        <td id="LC1433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1434"></td>
        <td id="LC1434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Proceed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1435"></td>
        <td id="LC1435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1436"></td>
        <td id="LC1436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then I will repeat the question which I asked before, in order that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1437"></td>
        <td id="LC1437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our examination of the relative nature of justice and injustice may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1438"></td>
        <td id="LC1438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carried on regularly. A statement was made that injustice is stronger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1439"></td>
        <td id="LC1439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and more powerful than justice, but now justice, having been identified</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1440"></td>
        <td id="LC1440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with wisdom and virtue, is easily shown to be stronger than injustice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1441"></td>
        <td id="LC1441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if injustice is ignorance; this can no longer be questioned by any one.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1442"></td>
        <td id="LC1442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But I want to view the matter, Thrasymachus, in a different way: You</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1443"></td>
        <td id="LC1443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would not deny that a state may be unjust and may be unjustly attempting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1444"></td>
        <td id="LC1444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to enslave other states, or may have already enslaved them, and may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1445"></td>
        <td id="LC1445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">holding many of them in subjection?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1446"></td>
        <td id="LC1446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1447"></td>
        <td id="LC1447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he replied; and I will add that the best and most perfectly unjust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1448"></td>
        <td id="LC1448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">state will be most likely to do so.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1449"></td>
        <td id="LC1449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1450"></td>
        <td id="LC1450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I know, I said, that such was your position; but what I would further</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1451"></td>
        <td id="LC1451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consider is, whether this power which is possessed by the superior state</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1452"></td>
        <td id="LC1452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can exist or be exercised without justice or only with justice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1453"></td>
        <td id="LC1453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1454"></td>
        <td id="LC1454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If you are right in your view, and justice is wisdom, then only with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1455"></td>
        <td id="LC1455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice; but if I am right, then without justice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1456"></td>
        <td id="LC1456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1457"></td>
        <td id="LC1457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am delighted, Thrasymachus, to see you not only nodding assent and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1458"></td>
        <td id="LC1458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dissent, but making answers which are quite excellent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1459"></td>
        <td id="LC1459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1460"></td>
        <td id="LC1460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is out of civility to you, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1461"></td>
        <td id="LC1461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1462"></td>
        <td id="LC1462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You are very kind, I said; and would you have the goodness also to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1463"></td>
        <td id="LC1463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inform me, whether you think that a state, or an army, or a band of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1464"></td>
        <td id="LC1464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">robbers and thieves, or any other gang of evil-doers could act at all if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1465"></td>
        <td id="LC1465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they injured one another?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1466"></td>
        <td id="LC1466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1467"></td>
        <td id="LC1467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No indeed, he said, they could not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1468"></td>
        <td id="LC1468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1469"></td>
        <td id="LC1469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But if they abstained from injuring one another, then they might act</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1470"></td>
        <td id="LC1470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together better?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1471"></td>
        <td id="LC1471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1472"></td>
        <td id="LC1472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1473"></td>
        <td id="LC1473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1474"></td>
        <td id="LC1474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And this is because injustice creates divisions and hatreds and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1475"></td>
        <td id="LC1475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fighting, and justice imparts harmony and friendship; is not that true,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1476"></td>
        <td id="LC1476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thrasymachus?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1477"></td>
        <td id="LC1477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1478"></td>
        <td id="LC1478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I agree, he said, because I do not wish to quarrel with you.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1479"></td>
        <td id="LC1479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1480"></td>
        <td id="LC1480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How good of you, I said; but I should like to know also whether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1481"></td>
        <td id="LC1481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injustice, having this tendency to arouse hatred, wherever existing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1482"></td>
        <td id="LC1482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among slaves or among freemen, will not make them hate one another and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1483"></td>
        <td id="LC1483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">set them at variance and render them incapable of common action?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1484"></td>
        <td id="LC1484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1485"></td>
        <td id="LC1485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1486"></td>
        <td id="LC1486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1487"></td>
        <td id="LC1487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And even if injustice be found in two only, will they not quarrel and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1488"></td>
        <td id="LC1488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fight, and become enemies to one another and to the just?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1489"></td>
        <td id="LC1489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1490"></td>
        <td id="LC1490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They will.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1491"></td>
        <td id="LC1491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1492"></td>
        <td id="LC1492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And suppose injustice abiding in a single person, would your wisdom say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1493"></td>
        <td id="LC1493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that she loses or that she retains her natural power?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1494"></td>
        <td id="LC1494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1495"></td>
        <td id="LC1495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let us assume that she retains her power.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1496"></td>
        <td id="LC1496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1497"></td>
        <td id="LC1497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yet is not the power which injustice exercises of such a nature that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1498"></td>
        <td id="LC1498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wherever she takes up her abode, whether in a city, in an army, in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1499"></td>
        <td id="LC1499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">family, or in any other body, that body is, to begin with, rendered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1500"></td>
        <td id="LC1500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">incapable of united action by reason of sedition and distraction; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1501"></td>
        <td id="LC1501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">does it not become its own enemy and at variance with all that opposes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1502"></td>
        <td id="LC1502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, and with the just? Is not this the case?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1503"></td>
        <td id="LC1503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1504"></td>
        <td id="LC1504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1505"></td>
        <td id="LC1505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1506"></td>
        <td id="LC1506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is not injustice equally fatal when existing in a single person; in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1507"></td>
        <td id="LC1507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the first place rendering him incapable of action because he is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1508"></td>
        <td id="LC1508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at unity with himself, and in the second place making him an enemy to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1509"></td>
        <td id="LC1509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself and the just? Is not that true, Thrasymachus?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1510"></td>
        <td id="LC1510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1511"></td>
        <td id="LC1511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1512"></td>
        <td id="LC1512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1513"></td>
        <td id="LC1513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And O my friend, I said, surely the gods are just?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1514"></td>
        <td id="LC1514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1515"></td>
        <td id="LC1515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Granted that they are.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1516"></td>
        <td id="LC1516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1517"></td>
        <td id="LC1517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But if so, the unjust will be the enemy of the gods, and the just will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1518"></td>
        <td id="LC1518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be their friend?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1519"></td>
        <td id="LC1519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1520"></td>
        <td id="LC1520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Feast away in triumph, and take your fill of the argument; I will not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1521"></td>
        <td id="LC1521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oppose you, lest I should displease the company.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1522"></td>
        <td id="LC1522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1523"></td>
        <td id="LC1523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well then, proceed with your answers, and let me have the remainder of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1524"></td>
        <td id="LC1524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my repast. For we have already shown that the just are clearly wiser and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1525"></td>
        <td id="LC1525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better and abler than the unjust, and that the unjust are incapable of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1526"></td>
        <td id="LC1526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">common action; nay more, that to speak as we did of men who are evil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1527"></td>
        <td id="LC1527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acting at any time vigorously together, is not strictly true, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1528"></td>
        <td id="LC1528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if they had been perfectly evil, they would have laid hands upon one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1529"></td>
        <td id="LC1529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another; but it is evident that there must have been some remnant of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1530"></td>
        <td id="LC1530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice in them, which enabled them to combine; if there had not been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1531"></td>
        <td id="LC1531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they would have injured one another as well as their victims; they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1532"></td>
        <td id="LC1532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were but half-villains in their enterprises; for had they been whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1533"></td>
        <td id="LC1533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">villains, and utterly unjust, they would have been utterly incapable of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1534"></td>
        <td id="LC1534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">action. That, as I believe, is the truth of the matter, and not what you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1535"></td>
        <td id="LC1535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said at first. But whether the just have a better and happier life than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1536"></td>
        <td id="LC1536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the unjust is a further question which we also proposed to consider. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1537"></td>
        <td id="LC1537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think that they have, and for the reasons which I have given; but still</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1538"></td>
        <td id="LC1538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should like to examine further, for no light matter is at stake,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1539"></td>
        <td id="LC1539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing less than the rule of human life.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1540"></td>
        <td id="LC1540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1541"></td>
        <td id="LC1541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Proceed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1542"></td>
        <td id="LC1542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1543"></td>
        <td id="LC1543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will proceed by asking a question: Would you not say that a horse has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1544"></td>
        <td id="LC1544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some end?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1545"></td>
        <td id="LC1545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1546"></td>
        <td id="LC1546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1547"></td>
        <td id="LC1547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1548"></td>
        <td id="LC1548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the end or use of a horse or of anything would be that which could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1549"></td>
        <td id="LC1549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not be accomplished, or not so well accomplished, by any other thing?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1550"></td>
        <td id="LC1550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1551"></td>
        <td id="LC1551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do not understand, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1653"></td>
        <td id="LC1653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That has been admitted.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1654"></td>
        <td id="LC1654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1655"></td>
        <td id="LC1655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the just soul and the just man will live well, and the unjust man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1656"></td>
        <td id="LC1656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will live ill?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1657"></td>
        <td id="LC1657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1658"></td>
        <td id="LC1658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is what your argument proves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1659"></td>
        <td id="LC1659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1660"></td>
        <td id="LC1660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And he who lives well is blessed and happy, and he who lives ill the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1661"></td>
        <td id="LC1661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reverse of happy?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1662"></td>
        <td id="LC1662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1663"></td>
        <td id="LC1663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1664"></td>
        <td id="LC1664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1665"></td>
        <td id="LC1665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the just is happy, and the unjust miserable?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1666"></td>
        <td id="LC1666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1667"></td>
        <td id="LC1667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So be it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1668"></td>
        <td id="LC1668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1669"></td>
        <td id="LC1669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But happiness and not misery is profitable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1670"></td>
        <td id="LC1670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1671"></td>
        <td id="LC1671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of course.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1672"></td>
        <td id="LC1672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1673"></td>
        <td id="LC1673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, my blessed Thrasymachus, injustice can never be more profitable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1674"></td>
        <td id="LC1674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than justice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1675"></td>
        <td id="LC1675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1676"></td>
        <td id="LC1676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let this, Socrates, he said, be your entertainment at the Bendidea.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1677"></td>
        <td id="LC1677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1678"></td>
        <td id="LC1678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For which I am indebted to you, I said, now that you have grown gentle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1679"></td>
        <td id="LC1679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towards me and have left off scolding. Nevertheless, I have not been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1680"></td>
        <td id="LC1680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well entertained; but that was my own fault and not yours. As an epicure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1681"></td>
        <td id="LC1681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snatches a taste of every dish which is successively brought to table,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1682"></td>
        <td id="LC1682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he not having allowed himself time to enjoy the one before, so have I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1683"></td>
        <td id="LC1683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gone from one subject to another without having discovered what I sought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1684"></td>
        <td id="LC1684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at first, the nature of justice. I left that enquiry and turned away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1685"></td>
        <td id="LC1685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to consider whether justice is virtue and wisdom or evil and folly; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1686"></td>
        <td id="LC1686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when there arose a further question about the comparative advantages of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1687"></td>
        <td id="LC1687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice and injustice, I could not refrain from passing on to that. And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1688"></td>
        <td id="LC1688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the result of the whole discussion has been that I know nothing at all.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1689"></td>
        <td id="LC1689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For I know not what justice is, and therefore I am not likely to know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1690"></td>
        <td id="LC1690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether it is or is not a virtue, nor can I say whether the just man is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1691"></td>
        <td id="LC1691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happy or unhappy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1692"></td>
        <td id="LC1692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1693"></td>
        <td id="LC1693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1694"></td>
        <td id="LC1694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1695"></td>
        <td id="LC1695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1696"></td>
        <td id="LC1696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">BOOK II.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1697"></td>
        <td id="LC1697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1698"></td>
        <td id="LC1698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With these words I was thinking that I had made an end of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1699"></td>
        <td id="LC1699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discussion; but the end, in truth, proved to be only a beginning. For</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1700"></td>
        <td id="LC1700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Glaucon, who is always the most pugnacious of men, was dissatisfied at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1701"></td>
        <td id="LC1701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thrasymachus&#39; retirement; he wanted to have the battle out. So he said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1702"></td>
        <td id="LC1702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me: Socrates, do you wish really to persuade us, or only to seem to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1703"></td>
        <td id="LC1703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have persuaded us, that to be just is always better than to be unjust?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1704"></td>
        <td id="LC1704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1705"></td>
        <td id="LC1705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should wish really to persuade you, I replied, if I could.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1706"></td>
        <td id="LC1706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1707"></td>
        <td id="LC1707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then you certainly have not succeeded. Let me ask you now:--How would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1708"></td>
        <td id="LC1708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you arrange goods--are there not some which we welcome for their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1709"></td>
        <td id="LC1709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own sakes, and independently of their consequences, as, for example,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1710"></td>
        <td id="LC1710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harmless pleasures and enjoyments, which delight us at the time,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1711"></td>
        <td id="LC1711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">although nothing follows from them?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1712"></td>
        <td id="LC1712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1713"></td>
        <td id="LC1713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I agree in thinking that there is such a class, I replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1714"></td>
        <td id="LC1714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1715"></td>
        <td id="LC1715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Is there not also a second class of goods, such as knowledge, sight,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1716"></td>
        <td id="LC1716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">health, which are desirable not only in themselves, but also for their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1717"></td>
        <td id="LC1717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">results?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1718"></td>
        <td id="LC1718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1719"></td>
        <td id="LC1719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, I said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1720"></td>
        <td id="LC1720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1721"></td>
        <td id="LC1721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And would you not recognize a third class, such as gymnastic, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1722"></td>
        <td id="LC1722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">care of the sick, and the physician&#39;s art; also the various ways of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1723"></td>
        <td id="LC1723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">money-making--these do us good but we regard them as disagreeable; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1724"></td>
        <td id="LC1724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no one would choose them for their own sakes, but only for the sake of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1725"></td>
        <td id="LC1725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some reward or result which flows from them?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1726"></td>
        <td id="LC1726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1727"></td>
        <td id="LC1727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is, I said, this third class also. But why do you ask?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1728"></td>
        <td id="LC1728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1729"></td>
        <td id="LC1729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Because I want to know in which of the three classes you would place</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1730"></td>
        <td id="LC1730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1731"></td>
        <td id="LC1731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1732"></td>
        <td id="LC1732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the highest class, I replied,--among those goods which he who would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1733"></td>
        <td id="LC1733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be happy desires both for their own sake and for the sake of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1734"></td>
        <td id="LC1734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">results.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1735"></td>
        <td id="LC1735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1736"></td>
        <td id="LC1736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the many are of another mind; they think that justice is to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1737"></td>
        <td id="LC1737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reckoned in the troublesome class, among goods which are to be pursued</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1738"></td>
        <td id="LC1738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the sake of rewards and of reputation, but in themselves are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1739"></td>
        <td id="LC1739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disagreeable and rather to be avoided.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1740"></td>
        <td id="LC1740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1741"></td>
        <td id="LC1741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I know, I said, that this is their manner of thinking, and that this was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1742"></td>
        <td id="LC1742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the thesis which Thrasymachus was maintaining just now, when he censured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1743"></td>
        <td id="LC1743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice and praised injustice. But I am too stupid to be convinced by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1744"></td>
        <td id="LC1744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1745"></td>
        <td id="LC1745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1746"></td>
        <td id="LC1746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I wish, he said, that you would hear me as well as him, and then I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1747"></td>
        <td id="LC1747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see whether you and I agree. For Thrasymachus seems to me, like a snake,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1748"></td>
        <td id="LC1748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to have been charmed by your voice sooner than he ought to have been;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1749"></td>
        <td id="LC1749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but to my mind the nature of justice and injustice have not yet been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1750"></td>
        <td id="LC1750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made clear. Setting aside their rewards and results, I want to know what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1751"></td>
        <td id="LC1751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they are in themselves, and how they inwardly work in the soul. If you,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1752"></td>
        <td id="LC1752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">please, then, I will revive the argument of Thrasymachus. And first I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1753"></td>
        <td id="LC1753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will speak of the nature and origin of justice according to the common</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1754"></td>
        <td id="LC1754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">view of them. Secondly, I will show that all men who practise justice do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1755"></td>
        <td id="LC1755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so against their will, of necessity, but not as a good. And thirdly, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1756"></td>
        <td id="LC1756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will argue that there is reason in this view, for the life of the unjust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1757"></td>
        <td id="LC1757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is after all better far than the life of the just--if what they say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1758"></td>
        <td id="LC1758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is true, Socrates, since I myself am not of their opinion. But still I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1759"></td>
        <td id="LC1759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acknowledge that I am perplexed when I hear the voices of Thrasymachus</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1760"></td>
        <td id="LC1760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and myriads of others dinning in my ears; and, on the other hand, I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1761"></td>
        <td id="LC1761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never yet heard the superiority of justice to injustice maintained by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1762"></td>
        <td id="LC1762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any one in a satisfactory way. I want to hear justice praised in respect</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1763"></td>
        <td id="LC1763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of itself; then I shall be satisfied, and you are the person from whom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1764"></td>
        <td id="LC1764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I think that I am most likely to hear this; and therefore I will praise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1765"></td>
        <td id="LC1765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the unjust life to the utmost of my power, and my manner of speaking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1766"></td>
        <td id="LC1766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will indicate the manner in which I desire to hear you too praising</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1767"></td>
        <td id="LC1767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice and censuring injustice. Will you say whether you approve of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1768"></td>
        <td id="LC1768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proposal?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1769"></td>
        <td id="LC1769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1770"></td>
        <td id="LC1770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Indeed I do; nor can I imagine any theme about which a man of sense</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1771"></td>
        <td id="LC1771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would oftener wish to converse.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1772"></td>
        <td id="LC1772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1773"></td>
        <td id="LC1773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am delighted, he replied, to hear you say so, and shall begin by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1774"></td>
        <td id="LC1774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speaking, as I proposed, of the nature and origin of justice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1775"></td>
        <td id="LC1775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1776"></td>
        <td id="LC1776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They say that to do injustice is, by nature, good; to suffer injustice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1777"></td>
        <td id="LC1777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evil; but that the evil is greater than the good. And so when men have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1778"></td>
        <td id="LC1778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both done and suffered injustice and have had experience of both, not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1779"></td>
        <td id="LC1779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being able to avoid the one and obtain the other, they think that they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1780"></td>
        <td id="LC1780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had better agree among themselves to have neither; hence there arise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1781"></td>
        <td id="LC1781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laws and mutual covenants; and that which is ordained by law is termed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1782"></td>
        <td id="LC1782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by them lawful and just. This they affirm to be the origin and nature of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1783"></td>
        <td id="LC1783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice;--it is a mean or compromise, between the best of all, which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1784"></td>
        <td id="LC1784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to do injustice and not be punished, and the worst of all, which is to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1785"></td>
        <td id="LC1785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suffer injustice without the power of retaliation; and justice, being at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1786"></td>
        <td id="LC1786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a middle point between the two, is tolerated not as a good, but as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1787"></td>
        <td id="LC1787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lesser evil, and honoured by reason of the inability of men to do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1788"></td>
        <td id="LC1788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injustice. For no man who is worthy to be called a man would ever submit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1789"></td>
        <td id="LC1789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to such an agreement if he were able to resist; he would be mad if he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1790"></td>
        <td id="LC1790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did. Such is the received account, Socrates, of the nature and origin of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1791"></td>
        <td id="LC1791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1792"></td>
        <td id="LC1792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1793"></td>
        <td id="LC1793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now that those who practise justice do so involuntarily and because they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1794"></td>
        <td id="LC1794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have not the power to be unjust will best appear if we imagine something</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1795"></td>
        <td id="LC1795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of this kind: having given both to the just and the unjust power to do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1796"></td>
        <td id="LC1796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what they will, let us watch and see whither desire will lead them;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1797"></td>
        <td id="LC1797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then we shall discover in the very act the just and unjust man to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1798"></td>
        <td id="LC1798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proceeding along the same road, following their interest, which all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1799"></td>
        <td id="LC1799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">natures deem to be their good, and are only diverted into the path of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1800"></td>
        <td id="LC1800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice by the force of law. The liberty which we are supposing may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1801"></td>
        <td id="LC1801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most completely given to them in the form of such a power as is said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1802"></td>
        <td id="LC1802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to have been possessed by Gyges, the ancestor of Croesus the Lydian.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1803"></td>
        <td id="LC1803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">According to the tradition, Gyges was a shepherd in the service of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1804"></td>
        <td id="LC1804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the king of Lydia; there was a great storm, and an earthquake made an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1805"></td>
        <td id="LC1805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opening in the earth at the place where he was feeding his flock. Amazed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1806"></td>
        <td id="LC1806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the sight, he descended into the opening, where, among other marvels,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1807"></td>
        <td id="LC1807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he beheld a hollow brazen horse, having doors, at which he stooping and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1808"></td>
        <td id="LC1808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking in saw a dead body of stature, as appeared to him, more than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1809"></td>
        <td id="LC1809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">human, and having nothing on but a gold ring; this he took from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1810"></td>
        <td id="LC1810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finger of the dead and reascended. Now the shepherds met together,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1811"></td>
        <td id="LC1811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">according to custom, that they might send their monthly report about the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1812"></td>
        <td id="LC1812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flocks to the king; into their assembly he came having the ring on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1813"></td>
        <td id="LC1813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finger, and as he was sitting among them he chanced to turn the collet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1814"></td>
        <td id="LC1814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the ring inside his hand, when instantly he became invisible to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1815"></td>
        <td id="LC1815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest of the company and they began to speak of him as if he were no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1816"></td>
        <td id="LC1816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">longer present. He was astonished at this, and again touching the ring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1817"></td>
        <td id="LC1817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he turned the collet outwards and reappeared; he made several trials</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1818"></td>
        <td id="LC1818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the ring, and always with the same result--when he turned the collet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1819"></td>
        <td id="LC1819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inwards he became invisible, when outwards he reappeared. Whereupon he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1820"></td>
        <td id="LC1820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contrived to be chosen one of the messengers who were sent to the court;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1821"></td>
        <td id="LC1821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whereas soon as he arrived he seduced the queen, and with her help</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1822"></td>
        <td id="LC1822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conspired against the king and slew him, and took the kingdom. Suppose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1823"></td>
        <td id="LC1823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now that there were two such magic rings, and the just put on one of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1824"></td>
        <td id="LC1824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them and the unjust the other; no man can be imagined to be of such an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1825"></td>
        <td id="LC1825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">iron nature that he would stand fast in justice. No man would keep his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1826"></td>
        <td id="LC1826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hands off what was not his own when he could safely take what he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1827"></td>
        <td id="LC1827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">liked out of the market, or go into houses and lie with any one at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1828"></td>
        <td id="LC1828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his pleasure, or kill or release from prison whom he would, and in all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1829"></td>
        <td id="LC1829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">respects be like a God among men. Then the actions of the just would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1830"></td>
        <td id="LC1830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as the actions of the unjust; they would both come at last to the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1831"></td>
        <td id="LC1831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">point. And this we may truly affirm to be a great proof that a man is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
