        <td id="L1832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1832"></td>
        <td id="LC1832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just, not willingly or because he thinks that justice is any good to him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1833"></td>
        <td id="LC1833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">individually, but of necessity, for wherever any one thinks that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1834"></td>
        <td id="LC1834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can safely be unjust, there he is unjust. For all men believe in their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1835"></td>
        <td id="LC1835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hearts that injustice is far more profitable to the individual than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1836"></td>
        <td id="LC1836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice, and he who argues as I have been supposing, will say that they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1837"></td>
        <td id="LC1837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are right. If you could imagine any one obtaining this power of becoming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1838"></td>
        <td id="LC1838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invisible, and never doing any wrong or touching what was another&#39;s, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1839"></td>
        <td id="LC1839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would be thought by the lookers-on to be a most wretched idiot, although</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1840"></td>
        <td id="LC1840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they would praise him to one another&#39;s faces, and keep up appearances</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1841"></td>
        <td id="LC1841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with one another from a fear that they too might suffer injustice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1842"></td>
        <td id="LC1842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Enough of this.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1843"></td>
        <td id="LC1843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1844"></td>
        <td id="LC1844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, if we are to form a real judgment of the life of the just and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1845"></td>
        <td id="LC1845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unjust, we must isolate them; there is no other way; and how is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1846"></td>
        <td id="LC1846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">isolation to be effected? I answer: Let the unjust man be entirely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1847"></td>
        <td id="LC1847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unjust, and the just man entirely just; nothing is to be taken away from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1848"></td>
        <td id="LC1848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either of them, and both are to be perfectly furnished for the work</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1849"></td>
        <td id="LC1849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of their respective lives. First, let the unjust be like other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1850"></td>
        <td id="LC1850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distinguished masters of craft; like the skilful pilot or physician, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1851"></td>
        <td id="LC1851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knows intuitively his own powers and keeps within their limits, and who,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1852"></td>
        <td id="LC1852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if he fails at any point, is able to recover himself. So let the unjust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1853"></td>
        <td id="LC1853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make his unjust attempts in the right way, and lie hidden if he means</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1854"></td>
        <td id="LC1854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be great in his injustice: (he who is found out is nobody:) for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1855"></td>
        <td id="LC1855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the highest reach of injustice is, to be deemed just when you are not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1856"></td>
        <td id="LC1856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Therefore I say that in the perfectly unjust man we must assume the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1857"></td>
        <td id="LC1857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perfect injustice; there is to be no deduction, but we must allow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1858"></td>
        <td id="LC1858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, while doing the most unjust acts, to have acquired the greatest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1859"></td>
        <td id="LC1859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reputation for justice. If he have taken a false step he must be able to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1860"></td>
        <td id="LC1860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recover himself; he must be one who can speak with effect, if any of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1861"></td>
        <td id="LC1861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deeds come to light, and who can force his way where force is required</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1862"></td>
        <td id="LC1862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by his courage and strength, and command of money and friends. And at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1863"></td>
        <td id="LC1863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his side let us place the just man in his nobleness and simplicity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1864"></td>
        <td id="LC1864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wishing, as Aeschylus says, to be and not to seem good. There must be no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1865"></td>
        <td id="LC1865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seeming, for if he seem to be just he will be honoured and rewarded, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1866"></td>
        <td id="LC1866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then we shall not know whether he is just for the sake of justice or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1867"></td>
        <td id="LC1867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the sake of honours and rewards; therefore, let him be clothed in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1868"></td>
        <td id="LC1868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice only, and have no other covering; and he must be imagined in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1869"></td>
        <td id="LC1869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">state of life the opposite of the former. Let him be the best of men,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1870"></td>
        <td id="LC1870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and let him be thought the worst; then he will have been put to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1871"></td>
        <td id="LC1871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proof; and we shall see whether he will be affected by the fear of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1872"></td>
        <td id="LC1872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">infamy and its consequences. And let him continue thus to the hour of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1873"></td>
        <td id="LC1873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death; being just and seeming to be unjust. When both have reached the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1874"></td>
        <td id="LC1874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uttermost extreme, the one of justice and the other of injustice, let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1875"></td>
        <td id="LC1875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judgment be given which of them is the happier of the two.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1876"></td>
        <td id="LC1876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1877"></td>
        <td id="LC1877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heavens! my dear Glaucon, I said, how energetically you polish them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1878"></td>
        <td id="LC1878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up for the decision, first one and then the other, as if they were two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1879"></td>
        <td id="LC1879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">statues.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1880"></td>
        <td id="LC1880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1881"></td>
        <td id="LC1881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do my best, he said. And now that we know what they are like there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1882"></td>
        <td id="LC1882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is no difficulty in tracing out the sort of life which awaits either</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1883"></td>
        <td id="LC1883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them. This I will proceed to describe; but as you may think the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1884"></td>
        <td id="LC1884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">description a little too coarse, I ask you to suppose, Socrates, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1885"></td>
        <td id="LC1885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the words which follow are not mine.--Let me put them into the mouths of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1886"></td>
        <td id="LC1886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the eulogists of injustice: They will tell you that the just man who is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1887"></td>
        <td id="LC1887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought unjust will be scourged, racked, bound--will have his eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1888"></td>
        <td id="LC1888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">burnt out; and, at last, after suffering every kind of evil, he will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1889"></td>
        <td id="LC1889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impaled: Then he will understand that he ought to seem only, and not to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1890"></td>
        <td id="LC1890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be, just; the words of Aeschylus may be more truly spoken of the unjust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1891"></td>
        <td id="LC1891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than of the just. For the unjust is pursuing a reality; he does not live</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1892"></td>
        <td id="LC1892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a view to appearances--he wants to be really unjust and not to seem</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1893"></td>
        <td id="LC1893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1894"></td>
        <td id="LC1894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1895"></td>
        <td id="LC1895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;His mind has a soil deep and fertile, Out of which spring his prudent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1896"></td>
        <td id="LC1896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">counsels.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1897"></td>
        <td id="LC1897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1898"></td>
        <td id="LC1898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the first place, he is thought just, and therefore bears rule in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1899"></td>
        <td id="LC1899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">city; he can marry whom he will, and give in marriage to whom he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1900"></td>
        <td id="LC1900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will; also he can trade and deal where he likes, and always to his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1901"></td>
        <td id="LC1901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantage, because he has no misgivings about injustice; and at every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1902"></td>
        <td id="LC1902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contest, whether in public or private, he gets the better of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1903"></td>
        <td id="LC1903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">antagonists, and gains at their expense, and is rich, and out of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1904"></td>
        <td id="LC1904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gains he can benefit his friends, and harm his enemies; moreover, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1905"></td>
        <td id="LC1905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can offer sacrifices, and dedicate gifts to the gods abundantly and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1906"></td>
        <td id="LC1906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">magnificently, and can honour the gods or any man whom he wants to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1907"></td>
        <td id="LC1907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honour in a far better style than the just, and therefore he is likely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1908"></td>
        <td id="LC1908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be dearer than they are to the gods. And thus, Socrates, gods and men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1909"></td>
        <td id="LC1909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are said to unite in making the life of the unjust better than the life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1910"></td>
        <td id="LC1910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the just.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1911"></td>
        <td id="LC1911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1912"></td>
        <td id="LC1912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was going to say something in answer to Glaucon, when Adeimantus, his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1913"></td>
        <td id="LC1913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brother, interposed: Socrates, he said, you do not suppose that there is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1914"></td>
        <td id="LC1914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing more to be urged?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1915"></td>
        <td id="LC1915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1916"></td>
        <td id="LC1916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, what else is there? I answered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1917"></td>
        <td id="LC1917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1918"></td>
        <td id="LC1918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The strongest point of all has not been even mentioned, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1919"></td>
        <td id="LC1919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1920"></td>
        <td id="LC1920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, then, according to the proverb, &#39;Let brother help brother&#39;--if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1921"></td>
        <td id="LC1921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he fails in any part do you assist him; although I must confess that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1922"></td>
        <td id="LC1922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Glaucon has already said quite enough to lay me in the dust, and take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1923"></td>
        <td id="LC1923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from me the power of helping justice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1924"></td>
        <td id="LC1924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1925"></td>
        <td id="LC1925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nonsense, he replied. But let me add something more: There is another</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1926"></td>
        <td id="LC1926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">side to Glaucon&#39;s argument about the praise and censure of justice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1927"></td>
        <td id="LC1927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and injustice, which is equally required in order to bring out what I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1928"></td>
        <td id="LC1928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believe to be his meaning. Parents and tutors are always telling their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1929"></td>
        <td id="LC1929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sons and their wards that they are to be just; but why? not for the sake</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1930"></td>
        <td id="LC1930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of justice, but for the sake of character and reputation; in the hope of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1931"></td>
        <td id="LC1931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">obtaining for him who is reputed just some of those offices, marriages,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1932"></td>
        <td id="LC1932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the like which Glaucon has enumerated among the advantages accruing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1933"></td>
        <td id="LC1933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the unjust from the reputation of justice. More, however, is made of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1934"></td>
        <td id="LC1934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appearances by this class of persons than by the others; for they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1935"></td>
        <td id="LC1935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throw in the good opinion of the gods, and will tell you of a shower of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1936"></td>
        <td id="LC1936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">benefits which the heavens, as they say, rain upon the pious; and this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1937"></td>
        <td id="LC1937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accords with the testimony of the noble Hesiod and Homer, the first of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1938"></td>
        <td id="LC1938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom says, that the gods make the oaks of the just--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1939"></td>
        <td id="LC1939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1940"></td>
        <td id="LC1940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">   &#39;To bear acorns at their summit, and bees in the middle;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1941"></td>
        <td id="LC1941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">   And the sheep are bowed down with the weight of their fleeces,&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1942"></td>
        <td id="LC1942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1943"></td>
        <td id="LC1943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and many other blessings of a like kind are provided for them. And Homer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1944"></td>
        <td id="LC1944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has a very similar strain; for he speaks of one whose fame is--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1945"></td>
        <td id="LC1945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1946"></td>
        <td id="LC1946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;As the fame of some blameless king who, like a god, Maintains justice;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1947"></td>
        <td id="LC1947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to whom the black earth brings forth Wheat and barley, whose trees are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1948"></td>
        <td id="LC1948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bowed with fruit, And his sheep never fail to bear, and the sea gives</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1949"></td>
        <td id="LC1949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him fish.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1950"></td>
        <td id="LC1950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1951"></td>
        <td id="LC1951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Still grander are the gifts of heaven which Musaeus and his son</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1952"></td>
        <td id="LC1952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vouchsafe to the just; they take them down into the world below, where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1953"></td>
        <td id="LC1953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they have the saints lying on couches at a feast, everlastingly drunk,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1954"></td>
        <td id="LC1954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crowned with garlands; their idea seems to be that an immortality of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1955"></td>
        <td id="LC1955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drunkenness is the highest meed of virtue. Some extend their rewards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1956"></td>
        <td id="LC1956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet further; the posterity, as they say, of the faithful and just shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1957"></td>
        <td id="LC1957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">survive to the third and fourth generation. This is the style in which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1958"></td>
        <td id="LC1958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they praise justice. But about the wicked there is another strain; they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1959"></td>
        <td id="LC1959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bury them in a slough in Hades, and make them carry water in a sieve;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1960"></td>
        <td id="LC1960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also while they are yet living they bring them to infamy, and inflict</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1961"></td>
        <td id="LC1961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon them the punishments which Glaucon described as the portion of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1962"></td>
        <td id="LC1962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just who are reputed to be unjust; nothing else does their invention</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1963"></td>
        <td id="LC1963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supply. Such is their manner of praising the one and censuring the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1964"></td>
        <td id="LC1964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1965"></td>
        <td id="LC1965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1966"></td>
        <td id="LC1966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Once more, Socrates, I will ask you to consider another way of speaking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1967"></td>
        <td id="LC1967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about justice and injustice, which is not confined to the poets, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1968"></td>
        <td id="LC1968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is found in prose writers. The universal voice of mankind is always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1969"></td>
        <td id="LC1969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">declaring that justice and virtue are honourable, but grievous and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1970"></td>
        <td id="LC1970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">toilsome; and that the pleasures of vice and injustice are easy of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1971"></td>
        <td id="LC1971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attainment, and are only censured by law and opinion. They say also that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1972"></td>
        <td id="LC1972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honesty is for the most part less profitable than dishonesty; and they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1973"></td>
        <td id="LC1973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are quite ready to call wicked men happy, and to honour them both in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1974"></td>
        <td id="LC1974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">public and private when they are rich or in any other way influential,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1975"></td>
        <td id="LC1975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">while they despise and overlook those who may be weak and poor, even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1976"></td>
        <td id="LC1976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though acknowledging them to be better than the others. But most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1977"></td>
        <td id="LC1977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extraordinary of all is their mode of speaking about virtue and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1978"></td>
        <td id="LC1978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gods: they say that the gods apportion calamity and misery to many good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1979"></td>
        <td id="LC1979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men, and good and happiness to the wicked. And mendicant prophets go to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1980"></td>
        <td id="LC1980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rich men&#39;s doors and persuade them that they have a power committed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1981"></td>
        <td id="LC1981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to them by the gods of making an atonement for a man&#39;s own or his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1982"></td>
        <td id="LC1982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ancestor&#39;s sins by sacrifices or charms, with rejoicings and feasts; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1983"></td>
        <td id="LC1983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they promise to harm an enemy, whether just or unjust, at a small cost;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1984"></td>
        <td id="LC1984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with magic arts and incantations binding heaven, as they say, to execute</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1985"></td>
        <td id="LC1985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their will. And the poets are the authorities to whom they appeal, now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1986"></td>
        <td id="LC1986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smoothing the path of vice with the words of Hesiod;--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1987"></td>
        <td id="LC1987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1988"></td>
        <td id="LC1988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Vice may be had in abundance without trouble; the way is smooth and her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1989"></td>
        <td id="LC1989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dwelling-place is near. But before virtue the gods have set toil,&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1990"></td>
        <td id="LC1990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1991"></td>
        <td id="LC1991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a tedious and uphill road: then citing Homer as a witness that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1992"></td>
        <td id="LC1992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gods may be influenced by men; for he also says:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1993"></td>
        <td id="LC1993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1994"></td>
        <td id="LC1994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;The gods, too, may be turned from their purpose; and men pray to them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1995"></td>
        <td id="LC1995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and avert their wrath by sacrifices and soothing entreaties, and by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1996"></td>
        <td id="LC1996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">libations and the odour of fat, when they have sinned and transgressed.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1997"></td>
        <td id="LC1997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1998"></td>
        <td id="LC1998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And they produce a host of books written by Musaeus and Orpheus,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1999"></td>
        <td id="LC1999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who were children of the Moon and the Muses--that is what they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2000"></td>
        <td id="LC2000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say--according to which they perform their ritual, and persuade not only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2001"></td>
        <td id="LC2001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">individuals, but whole cities, that expiations and atonements for sin</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2002"></td>
        <td id="LC2002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may be made by sacrifices and amusements which fill a vacant hour, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2003"></td>
        <td id="LC2003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are equally at the service of the living and the dead; the latter sort</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2004"></td>
        <td id="LC2004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they call mysteries, and they redeem us from the pains of hell, but if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2005"></td>
        <td id="LC2005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we neglect them no one knows what awaits us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2006"></td>
        <td id="LC2006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2007"></td>
        <td id="LC2007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He proceeded: And now when the young hear all this said about virtue and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2008"></td>
        <td id="LC2008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vice, and the way in which gods and men regard them, how are their minds</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2009"></td>
        <td id="LC2009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">likely to be affected, my dear Socrates,--those of them, I mean, who are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2010"></td>
        <td id="LC2010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quickwitted, and, like bees on the wing, light on every flower, and from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2011"></td>
        <td id="LC2011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all that they hear are prone to draw conclusions as to what manner of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2012"></td>
        <td id="LC2012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persons they should be and in what way they should walk if they would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2013"></td>
        <td id="LC2013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make the best of life? Probably the youth will say to himself in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2014"></td>
        <td id="LC2014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words of Pindar--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2015"></td>
        <td id="LC2015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2016"></td>
        <td id="LC2016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Can I by justice or by crooked ways of deceit ascend a loftier tower</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2017"></td>
        <td id="LC2017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which may be a fortress to me all my days?&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2018"></td>
        <td id="LC2018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2019"></td>
        <td id="LC2019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For what men say is that, if I am really just and am not also thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2020"></td>
        <td id="LC2020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just profit there is none, but the pain and loss on the other hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2021"></td>
        <td id="LC2021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are unmistakeable. But if, though unjust, I acquire the reputation of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2022"></td>
        <td id="LC2022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice, a heavenly life is promised to me. Since then, as philosophers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2023"></td>
        <td id="LC2023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prove, appearance tyrannizes over truth and is lord of happiness, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2024"></td>
        <td id="LC2024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appearance I must devote myself. I will describe around me a picture and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2025"></td>
        <td id="LC2025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shadow of virtue to be the vestibule and exterior of my house; behind I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2026"></td>
        <td id="LC2026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will trail the subtle and crafty fox, as Archilochus, greatest of sages,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2027"></td>
        <td id="LC2027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recommends. But I hear some one exclaiming that the concealment of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2028"></td>
        <td id="LC2028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wickedness is often difficult; to which I answer, Nothing great is easy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2029"></td>
        <td id="LC2029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nevertheless, the argument indicates this, if we would be happy, to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2030"></td>
        <td id="LC2030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the path along which we should proceed. With a view to concealment we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2031"></td>
        <td id="LC2031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will establish secret brotherhoods and political clubs. And there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2032"></td>
        <td id="LC2032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are professors of rhetoric who teach the art of persuading courts and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2033"></td>
        <td id="LC2033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assemblies; and so, partly by persuasion and partly by force, I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2034"></td>
        <td id="LC2034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make unlawful gains and not be punished. Still I hear a voice saying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2035"></td>
        <td id="LC2035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the gods cannot be deceived, neither can they be compelled. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2036"></td>
        <td id="LC2036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what if there are no gods? or, suppose them to have no care of human</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2037"></td>
        <td id="LC2037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things--why in either case should we mind about concealment? And even if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2038"></td>
        <td id="LC2038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there are gods, and they do care about us, yet we know of them only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2039"></td>
        <td id="LC2039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from tradition and the genealogies of the poets; and these are the very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2040"></td>
        <td id="LC2040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persons who say that they may be influenced and turned by &#39;sacrifices</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2041"></td>
        <td id="LC2041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and soothing entreaties and by offerings.&#39; Let us be consistent then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2042"></td>
        <td id="LC2042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and believe both or neither. If the poets speak truly, why then we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2043"></td>
        <td id="LC2043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better be unjust, and offer of the fruits of injustice; for if we are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2044"></td>
        <td id="LC2044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just, although we may escape the vengeance of heaven, we shall lose the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2045"></td>
        <td id="LC2045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gains of injustice; but, if we are unjust, we shall keep the gains, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2046"></td>
        <td id="LC2046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by our sinning and praying, and praying and sinning, the gods will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2047"></td>
        <td id="LC2047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">propitiated, and we shall not be punished. &#39;But there is a world below</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2048"></td>
        <td id="LC2048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in which either we or our posterity will suffer for our unjust deeds.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2049"></td>
        <td id="LC2049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, my friend, will be the reflection, but there are mysteries and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2050"></td>
        <td id="LC2050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">atoning deities, and these have great power. That is what mighty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2051"></td>
        <td id="LC2051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cities declare; and the children of the gods, who were their poets and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2052"></td>
        <td id="LC2052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prophets, bear a like testimony.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2053"></td>
        <td id="LC2053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2054"></td>
        <td id="LC2054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On what principle, then, shall we any longer choose justice rather than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2055"></td>
        <td id="LC2055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the worst injustice? when, if we only unite the latter with a deceitful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2056"></td>
        <td id="LC2056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">regard to appearances, we shall fare to our mind both with gods and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2057"></td>
        <td id="LC2057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men, in life and after death, as the most numerous and the highest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2058"></td>
        <td id="LC2058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">authorities tell us. Knowing all this, Socrates, how can a man who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2059"></td>
        <td id="LC2059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has any superiority of mind or person or rank or wealth, be willing to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2060"></td>
        <td id="LC2060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honour justice; or indeed to refrain from laughing when he hears justice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2061"></td>
        <td id="LC2061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">praised? And even if there should be some one who is able to disprove</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2062"></td>
        <td id="LC2062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the truth of my words, and who is satisfied that justice is best, still</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2063"></td>
        <td id="LC2063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he is not angry with the unjust, but is very ready to forgive them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2064"></td>
        <td id="LC2064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because he also knows that men are not just of their own free will;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2065"></td>
        <td id="LC2065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unless, peradventure, there be some one whom the divinity within him may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2066"></td>
        <td id="LC2066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have inspired with a hatred of injustice, or who has attained knowledge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2067"></td>
        <td id="LC2067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the truth--but no other man. He only blames injustice who, owing to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2068"></td>
        <td id="LC2068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cowardice or age or some weakness, has not the power of being unjust.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2069"></td>
        <td id="LC2069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And this is proved by the fact that when he obtains the power, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2070"></td>
        <td id="LC2070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">immediately becomes unjust as far as he can be.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2071"></td>
        <td id="LC2071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2072"></td>
        <td id="LC2072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The cause of all this, Socrates, was indicated by us at the beginning of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2073"></td>
        <td id="LC2073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the argument, when my brother and I told you how astonished we were to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2074"></td>
        <td id="LC2074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">find that of all the professing panegyrists of justice--beginning with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2075"></td>
        <td id="LC2075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ancient heroes of whom any memorial has been preserved to us, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2076"></td>
        <td id="LC2076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ending with the men of our own time--no one has ever blamed injustice or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2077"></td>
        <td id="LC2077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">praised justice except with a view to the glories, honours, and benefits</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2078"></td>
        <td id="LC2078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which flow from them. No one has ever adequately described either in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2079"></td>
        <td id="LC2079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">verse or prose the true essential nature of either of them abiding in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2080"></td>
        <td id="LC2080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the soul, and invisible to any human or divine eye; or shown that of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2081"></td>
        <td id="LC2081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the things of a man&#39;s soul which he has within him, justice is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2082"></td>
        <td id="LC2082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the greatest good, and injustice the greatest evil. Had this been the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2083"></td>
        <td id="LC2083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">universal strain, had you sought to persuade us of this from our youth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2084"></td>
        <td id="LC2084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upwards, we should not have been on the watch to keep one another from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2085"></td>
        <td id="LC2085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doing wrong, but every one would have been his own watchman, because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2086"></td>
        <td id="LC2086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afraid, if he did wrong, of harbouring in himself the greatest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2087"></td>
        <td id="LC2087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evils. I dare say that Thrasymachus and others would seriously hold the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2088"></td>
        <td id="LC2088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">language which I have been merely repeating, and words even stronger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2089"></td>
        <td id="LC2089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than these about justice and injustice, grossly, as I conceive,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2090"></td>
        <td id="LC2090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perverting their true nature. But I speak in this vehement manner, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2091"></td>
        <td id="LC2091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I must frankly confess to you, because I want to hear from you the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2092"></td>
        <td id="LC2092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opposite side; and I would ask you to show not only the superiority</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2093"></td>
        <td id="LC2093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which justice has over injustice, but what effect they have on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2094"></td>
        <td id="LC2094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possessor of them which makes the one to be a good and the other an evil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2095"></td>
        <td id="LC2095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him. And please, as Glaucon requested of you, to exclude reputations;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2096"></td>
        <td id="LC2096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for unless you take away from each of them his true reputation and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2097"></td>
        <td id="LC2097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">add on the false, we shall say that you do not praise justice, but the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2098"></td>
        <td id="LC2098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appearance of it; we shall think that you are only exhorting us to keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2099"></td>
        <td id="LC2099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injustice dark, and that you really agree with Thrasymachus in thinking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2100"></td>
        <td id="LC2100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that justice is another&#39;s good and the interest of the stronger, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2101"></td>
        <td id="LC2101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that injustice is a man&#39;s own profit and interest, though injurious to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2102"></td>
        <td id="LC2102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the weaker. Now as you have admitted that justice is one of that highest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2103"></td>
        <td id="LC2103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">class of goods which are desired indeed for their results, but in a far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2104"></td>
        <td id="LC2104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greater degree for their own sakes--like sight or hearing or knowledge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2105"></td>
        <td id="LC2105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or health, or any other real and natural and not merely conventional</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2106"></td>
        <td id="LC2106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good--I would ask you in your praise of justice to regard one point</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2107"></td>
        <td id="LC2107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only: I mean the essential good and evil which justice and injustice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2108"></td>
        <td id="LC2108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work in the possessors of them. Let others praise justice and censure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2109"></td>
        <td id="LC2109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injustice, magnifying the rewards and honours of the one and abusing the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2110"></td>
        <td id="LC2110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other; that is a manner of arguing which, coming from them, I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2111"></td>
        <td id="LC2111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ready to tolerate, but from you who have spent your whole life in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2112"></td>
        <td id="LC2112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consideration of this question, unless I hear the contrary from your own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2113"></td>
        <td id="LC2113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lips, I expect something better. And therefore, I say, not only prove to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2114"></td>
        <td id="LC2114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us that justice is better than injustice, but show what they either of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2115"></td>
        <td id="LC2115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them do to the possessor of them, which makes the one to be a good and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2116"></td>
        <td id="LC2116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other an evil, whether seen or unseen by gods and men.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2117"></td>
        <td id="LC2117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2118"></td>
        <td id="LC2118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had always admired the genius of Glaucon and Adeimantus, but on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2119"></td>
        <td id="LC2119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hearing these words I was quite delighted, and said: Sons of an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2120"></td>
        <td id="LC2120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">illustrious father, that was not a bad beginning of the Elegiac verses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2121"></td>
        <td id="LC2121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which the admirer of Glaucon made in honour of you after you had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2122"></td>
        <td id="LC2122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distinguished yourselves at the battle of Megara:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2123"></td>
        <td id="LC2123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2124"></td>
        <td id="LC2124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Sons of Ariston,&#39; he sang, &#39;divine offspring of an illustrious hero.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2125"></td>
        <td id="LC2125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2126"></td>
        <td id="LC2126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The epithet is very appropriate, for there is something truly divine in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2127"></td>
        <td id="LC2127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being able to argue as you have done for the superiority of injustice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2128"></td>
        <td id="LC2128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and remaining unconvinced by your own arguments. And I do believe that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2129"></td>
        <td id="LC2129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you are not convinced--this I infer from your general character, for had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2130"></td>
        <td id="LC2130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I judged only from your speeches I should have mistrusted you. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2131"></td>
        <td id="LC2131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now, the greater my confidence in you, the greater is my difficulty in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2132"></td>
        <td id="LC2132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowing what to say. For I am in a strait between two; on the one hand I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2133"></td>
        <td id="LC2133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feel that I am unequal to the task; and my inability is brought home to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2134"></td>
        <td id="LC2134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me by the fact that you were not satisfied with the answer which I made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2135"></td>
        <td id="LC2135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Thrasymachus, proving, as I thought, the superiority which justice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2136"></td>
        <td id="LC2136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has over injustice. And yet I cannot refuse to help, while breath and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2137"></td>
        <td id="LC2137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speech remain to me; I am afraid that there would be an impiety in being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2138"></td>
        <td id="LC2138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present when justice is evil spoken of and not lifting up a hand in her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2139"></td>
        <td id="LC2139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">defence. And therefore I had best give such help as I can.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2140"></td>
        <td id="LC2140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2141"></td>
        <td id="LC2141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Glaucon and the rest entreated me by all means not to let the question</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2142"></td>
        <td id="LC2142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drop, but to proceed in the investigation. They wanted to arrive at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2143"></td>
        <td id="LC2143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">truth, first, about the nature of justice and injustice, and secondly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2144"></td>
        <td id="LC2144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about their relative advantages. I told them, what I really thought,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2145"></td>
        <td id="LC2145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the enquiry would be of a serious nature, and would require very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2146"></td>
        <td id="LC2146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good eyes. Seeing then, I said, that we are no great wits, I think that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2147"></td>
        <td id="LC2147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we had better adopt a method which I may illustrate thus; suppose that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2148"></td>
        <td id="LC2148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a short-sighted person had been asked by some one to read small letters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2149"></td>
        <td id="LC2149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from a distance; and it occurred to some one else that they might be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2150"></td>
        <td id="LC2150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found in another place which was larger and in which the letters were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2151"></td>
        <td id="LC2151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">larger--if they were the same and he could read the larger letters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2152"></td>
        <td id="LC2152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first, and then proceed to the lesser--this would have been thought a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2153"></td>
        <td id="LC2153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rare piece of good fortune.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2154"></td>
        <td id="LC2154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2155"></td>
        <td id="LC2155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, said Adeimantus; but how does the illustration apply to our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2156"></td>
        <td id="LC2156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enquiry?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2157"></td>
        <td id="LC2157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
