      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2158"></td>
        <td id="LC2158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will tell you, I replied; justice, which is the subject of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2159"></td>
        <td id="LC2159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enquiry, is, as you know, sometimes spoken of as the virtue of an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2160"></td>
        <td id="LC2160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">individual, and sometimes as the virtue of a State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2161"></td>
        <td id="LC2161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2162"></td>
        <td id="LC2162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2163"></td>
        <td id="LC2163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2164"></td>
        <td id="LC2164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is not a State larger than an individual?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2165"></td>
        <td id="LC2165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2166"></td>
        <td id="LC2166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2167"></td>
        <td id="LC2167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2168"></td>
        <td id="LC2168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then in the larger the quantity of justice is likely to be larger and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2169"></td>
        <td id="LC2169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more easily discernible. I propose therefore that we enquire into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2170"></td>
        <td id="LC2170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature of justice and injustice, first as they appear in the State, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2171"></td>
        <td id="LC2171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secondly in the individual, proceeding from the greater to the lesser</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2172"></td>
        <td id="LC2172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and comparing them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2173"></td>
        <td id="LC2173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2174"></td>
        <td id="LC2174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That, he said, is an excellent proposal.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2175"></td>
        <td id="LC2175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2176"></td>
        <td id="LC2176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And if we imagine the State in process of creation, we shall see the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2177"></td>
        <td id="LC2177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice and injustice of the State in process of creation also.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2178"></td>
        <td id="LC2178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2179"></td>
        <td id="LC2179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I dare say.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2180"></td>
        <td id="LC2180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2181"></td>
        <td id="LC2181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the State is completed there may be a hope that the object of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2182"></td>
        <td id="LC2182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">search will be more easily discovered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2183"></td>
        <td id="LC2183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2184"></td>
        <td id="LC2184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, far more easily.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2185"></td>
        <td id="LC2185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2186"></td>
        <td id="LC2186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But ought we to attempt to construct one? I said; for to do so, as I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2187"></td>
        <td id="LC2187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inclined to think, will be a very serious task. Reflect therefore.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2188"></td>
        <td id="LC2188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2189"></td>
        <td id="LC2189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have reflected, said Adeimantus, and am anxious that you should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2190"></td>
        <td id="LC2190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proceed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2191"></td>
        <td id="LC2191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2192"></td>
        <td id="LC2192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A State, I said, arises, as I conceive, out of the needs of mankind;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2193"></td>
        <td id="LC2193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no one is self-sufficing, but all of us have many wants. Can any other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2194"></td>
        <td id="LC2194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">origin of a State be imagined?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2195"></td>
        <td id="LC2195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2196"></td>
        <td id="LC2196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There can be no other.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2197"></td>
        <td id="LC2197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2198"></td>
        <td id="LC2198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, as we have many wants, and many persons are needed to supply them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2199"></td>
        <td id="LC2199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one takes a helper for one purpose and another for another; and when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2200"></td>
        <td id="LC2200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these partners and helpers are gathered together in one habitation the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2201"></td>
        <td id="LC2201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body of inhabitants is termed a State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2202"></td>
        <td id="LC2202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2203"></td>
        <td id="LC2203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2204"></td>
        <td id="LC2204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2205"></td>
        <td id="LC2205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And they exchange with one another, and one gives, and another receives,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2206"></td>
        <td id="LC2206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under the idea that the exchange will be for their good.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2207"></td>
        <td id="LC2207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2208"></td>
        <td id="LC2208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2209"></td>
        <td id="LC2209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2210"></td>
        <td id="LC2210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, I said, let us begin and create in idea a State; and yet the true</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2211"></td>
        <td id="LC2211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creator is necessity, who is the mother of our invention.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2212"></td>
        <td id="LC2212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is certain.</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suppose now that a husbandman, or an artisan, brings some production</td>

        <td id="L2349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2349"></td>
        <td id="LC2349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to market, and he comes at a time when there is no one to exchange with</td>

        <td id="L2353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2353"></td>
        <td id="LC2353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the office of salesmen. In well-ordered states they are commonly those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2354"></td>
        <td id="LC2354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who are the weakest in bodily strength, and therefore of little use for</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any other purpose; their duty is to be in the market, and to give money</td>

        <td id="L2356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2356"></td>
        <td id="LC2356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in exchange for goods to those who desire to sell and to take money from</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those who desire to buy.</td>

        <td id="L2358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2358"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2359"></td>
        <td id="LC2359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This want, then, creates a class of retail-traders in our State. Is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2360"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L2385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2385"></td>

        <td id="L2386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2386"></td>
        <td id="LC2386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imagine that they are more likely to be found any where else.</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2390"></td>
        <td id="LC2390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2391"></td>
        <td id="LC2391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let us then consider, first of all, what will be their way of life,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2392"></td>
        <td id="LC2392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now that we have thus established them. Will they not produce corn, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2393"></td>
        <td id="LC2393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wine, and clothes, and shoes, and build houses for themselves? And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2394"></td>
        <td id="LC2394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when they are housed, they will work, in summer, commonly, stripped and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2395"></td>
        <td id="LC2395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">barefoot, but in winter substantially clothed and shod. They will feed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2396"></td>
        <td id="LC2396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on barley-meal and flour of wheat, baking and kneading them, making</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2397"></td>
        <td id="LC2397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noble cakes and loaves; these they will serve up on a mat of reeds or on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2398"></td>
        <td id="LC2398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clean leaves, themselves reclining the while upon beds strewn with yew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2399"></td>
        <td id="LC2399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or myrtle. And they and their children will feast, drinking of the wine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2400"></td>
        <td id="LC2400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which they have made, wearing garlands on their heads, and hymning the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2401"></td>
        <td id="LC2401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">praises of the gods, in happy converse with one another. And they will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2402"></td>
        <td id="LC2402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take care that their families do not exceed their means; having an eye</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2403"></td>
        <td id="LC2403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to poverty or war.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2404"></td>
        <td id="LC2404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2405"></td>
        <td id="LC2405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, said Glaucon, interposing, you have not given them a relish to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2406"></td>
        <td id="LC2406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their meal.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2407"></td>
        <td id="LC2407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2408"></td>
        <td id="LC2408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, I replied, I had forgotten; of course they must have a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2409"></td>
        <td id="LC2409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relish--salt, and olives, and cheese, and they will boil roots and herbs</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2410"></td>
        <td id="LC2410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such as country people prepare; for a dessert we shall give them figs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2411"></td>
        <td id="LC2411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and peas, and beans; and they will roast myrtle-berries and acorns</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2412"></td>
        <td id="LC2412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the fire, drinking in moderation. And with such a diet they may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2413"></td>
        <td id="LC2413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expected to live in peace and health to a good old age, and bequeath a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2414"></td>
        <td id="LC2414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">similar life to their children after them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2415"></td>
        <td id="LC2415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2416"></td>
        <td id="LC2416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, Socrates, he said, and if you were providing for a city of pigs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2417"></td>
        <td id="LC2417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how else would you feed the beasts?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2418"></td>
        <td id="LC2418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2419"></td>
        <td id="LC2419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But what would you have, Glaucon? I replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2420"></td>
        <td id="LC2420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2421"></td>
        <td id="LC2421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, he said, you should give them the ordinary conveniences of life.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2422"></td>
        <td id="LC2422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">People who are to be comfortable are accustomed to lie on sofas, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2423"></td>
        <td id="LC2423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dine off tables, and they should have sauces and sweets in the modern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2424"></td>
        <td id="LC2424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">style.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2425"></td>
        <td id="LC2425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2426"></td>
        <td id="LC2426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said, now I understand: the question which you would have me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2427"></td>
        <td id="LC2427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consider is, not only how a State, but how a luxurious State is created;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2428"></td>
        <td id="LC2428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and possibly there is no harm in this, for in such a State we shall be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2429"></td>
        <td id="LC2429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more likely to see how justice and injustice originate. In my opinion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2430"></td>
        <td id="LC2430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the true and healthy constitution of the State is the one which I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2431"></td>
        <td id="LC2431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">described. But if you wish also to see a State at fever-heat, I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2432"></td>
        <td id="LC2432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no objection. For I suspect that many will not be satisfied with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2433"></td>
        <td id="LC2433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">simpler way of life. They will be for adding sofas, and tables,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2434"></td>
        <td id="LC2434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and other furniture; also dainties, and perfumes, and incense, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2435"></td>
        <td id="LC2435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">courtesans, and cakes, all these not of one sort only, but in every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2436"></td>
        <td id="LC2436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">variety; we must go beyond the necessaries of which I was at first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2437"></td>
        <td id="LC2437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speaking, such as houses, and clothes, and shoes: the arts of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2438"></td>
        <td id="LC2438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">painter and the embroiderer will have to be set in motion, and gold and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2439"></td>
        <td id="LC2439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ivory and all sorts of materials must be procured.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2440"></td>
        <td id="LC2440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2441"></td>
        <td id="LC2441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2442"></td>
        <td id="LC2442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2443"></td>
        <td id="LC2443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then we must enlarge our borders; for the original healthy State is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2444"></td>
        <td id="LC2444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no longer sufficient. Now will the city have to fill and swell with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2445"></td>
        <td id="LC2445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">multitude of callings which are not required by any natural want; such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2446"></td>
        <td id="LC2446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as the whole tribe of hunters and actors, of whom one large class</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2447"></td>
        <td id="LC2447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have to do with forms and colours; another will be the votaries of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2448"></td>
        <td id="LC2448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">music--poets and their attendant train of rhapsodists, players, dancers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2449"></td>
        <td id="LC2449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contractors; also makers of divers kinds of articles, including women&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2450"></td>
        <td id="LC2450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dresses. And we shall want more servants. Will not tutors be also in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2451"></td>
        <td id="LC2451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">request, and nurses wet and dry, tirewomen and barbers, as well as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2452"></td>
        <td id="LC2452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confectioners and cooks; and swineherds, too, who were not needed and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2453"></td>
        <td id="LC2453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">therefore had no place in the former edition of our State, but are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2454"></td>
        <td id="LC2454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">needed now? They must not be forgotten: and there will be animals of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2455"></td>
        <td id="LC2455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many other kinds, if people eat them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2456"></td>
        <td id="LC2456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2457"></td>
        <td id="LC2457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2458"></td>
        <td id="LC2458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2459"></td>
        <td id="LC2459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And living in this way we shall have much greater need of physicians</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2460"></td>
        <td id="LC2460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than before?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2461"></td>
        <td id="LC2461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2462"></td>
        <td id="LC2462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Much greater.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2463"></td>
        <td id="LC2463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2464"></td>
        <td id="LC2464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the country which was enough to support the original inhabitants</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2465"></td>
        <td id="LC2465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be too small now, and not enough?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2466"></td>
        <td id="LC2466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2467"></td>
        <td id="LC2467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quite true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2468"></td>
        <td id="LC2468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2469"></td>
        <td id="LC2469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then a slice of our neighbours&#39; land will be wanted by us for pasture</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2470"></td>
        <td id="LC2470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and tillage, and they will want a slice of ours, if, like ourselves,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2471"></td>
        <td id="LC2471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they exceed the limit of necessity, and give themselves up to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2472"></td>
        <td id="LC2472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unlimited accumulation of wealth?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2473"></td>
        <td id="LC2473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2474"></td>
        <td id="LC2474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That, Socrates, will be inevitable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2475"></td>
        <td id="LC2475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2476"></td>
        <td id="LC2476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so we shall go to war, Glaucon. Shall we not?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2477"></td>
        <td id="LC2477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2478"></td>
        <td id="LC2478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most certainly, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2479"></td>
        <td id="LC2479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2480"></td>
        <td id="LC2480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then without determining as yet whether war does good or harm, thus much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2481"></td>
        <td id="LC2481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we may affirm, that now we have discovered war to be derived from causes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2482"></td>
        <td id="LC2482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which are also the causes of almost all the evils in States, private as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2483"></td>
        <td id="LC2483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well as public.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2484"></td>
        <td id="LC2484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2485"></td>
        <td id="LC2485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Undoubtedly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2486"></td>
        <td id="LC2486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2487"></td>
        <td id="LC2487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And our State must once more enlarge; and this time the enlargement will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2488"></td>
        <td id="LC2488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be nothing short of a whole army, which will have to go out and fight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2489"></td>
        <td id="LC2489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the invaders for all that we have, as well as for the things and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2490"></td>
        <td id="LC2490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persons whom we were describing above.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2491"></td>
        <td id="LC2491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2492"></td>
        <td id="LC2492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why? he said; are they not capable of defending themselves?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2493"></td>
        <td id="LC2493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2494"></td>
        <td id="LC2494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No, I said; not if we were right in the principle which was acknowledged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2495"></td>
        <td id="LC2495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by all of us when we were framing the State: the principle, as you will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2496"></td>
        <td id="LC2496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remember, was that one man cannot practise many arts with success.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2497"></td>
        <td id="LC2497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2498"></td>
        <td id="LC2498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2499"></td>
        <td id="LC2499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2500"></td>
        <td id="LC2500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But is not war an art?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2501"></td>
        <td id="LC2501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2502"></td>
        <td id="LC2502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2503"></td>
        <td id="LC2503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2504"></td>
        <td id="LC2504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And an art requiring as much attention as shoemaking?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2505"></td>
        <td id="LC2505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2506"></td>
        <td id="LC2506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quite true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2507"></td>
        <td id="LC2507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2508"></td>
        <td id="LC2508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the shoemaker was not allowed by us to be a husbandman, or a weaver,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2509"></td>
        <td id="LC2509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or a builder--in order that we might have our shoes well made; but to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2510"></td>
        <td id="LC2510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him and to every other worker was assigned one work for which he was by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2511"></td>
        <td id="LC2511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature fitted, and at that he was to continue working all his life long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2512"></td>
        <td id="LC2512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and at no other; he was not to let opportunities slip, and then he would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2513"></td>
        <td id="LC2513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">become a good workman. Now nothing can be more important than that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2514"></td>
        <td id="LC2514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the work of a soldier should be well done. But is war an art so easily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2515"></td>
        <td id="LC2515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquired that a man may be a warrior who is also a husbandman, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2516"></td>
        <td id="LC2516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shoemaker, or other artisan; although no one in the world would be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2517"></td>
        <td id="LC2517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good dice or draught player who merely took up the game as a recreation,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2518"></td>
        <td id="LC2518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and had not from his earliest years devoted himself to this and nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2519"></td>
        <td id="LC2519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">else? No tools will make a man a skilled workman, or master of defence,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2520"></td>
        <td id="LC2520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nor be of any use to him who has not learned how to handle them, and has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2521"></td>
        <td id="LC2521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never bestowed any attention upon them. How then will he who takes up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2522"></td>
        <td id="LC2522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a shield or other implement of war become a good fighter all in a day,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2523"></td>
        <td id="LC2523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether with heavy-armed or any other kind of troops?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2524"></td>
        <td id="LC2524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2525"></td>
        <td id="LC2525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, the tools which would teach men their own use would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2526"></td>
        <td id="LC2526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beyond price.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2527"></td>
        <td id="LC2527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2528"></td>
        <td id="LC2528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the higher the duties of the guardian, I said, the more time, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2529"></td>
        <td id="LC2529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">skill, and art, and application will be needed by him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2530"></td>
        <td id="LC2530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2531"></td>
        <td id="LC2531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No doubt, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2532"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2533"></td>
        <td id="LC2533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Will he not also require natural aptitude for his calling?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

</td>

        <td id="L2537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2537"></td>
        <td id="LC2537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then it will be our duty to select, if we can, natures which are fitted</td>

        <td id="L2538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2538"></td>
        <td id="LC2538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the task of guarding the city?</td>

        <td id="L2539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2539"></td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2543"></td>
        <td id="LC2543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and do our best.</td>

</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2546"></td>
        <td id="LC2546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2547"></td>
        <td id="LC2547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Is not the noble youth very like a well-bred dog in respect of guarding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2548"></td>
        <td id="LC2548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and watching?</td>

        <td id="L2549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2549"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2550"></td>
        <td id="LC2550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2551"></td>
        <td id="LC2551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2552"></td>
        <td id="LC2552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I mean that both of them ought to be quick to see, and swift to overtake</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2553"></td>
        <td id="LC2553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the enemy when they see him; and strong too if, when they have caught</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2554"></td>
        <td id="LC2554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, they have to fight with him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2555"></td>
        <td id="LC2555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2556"></td>
        <td id="LC2556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All these qualities, he replied, will certainly be required by them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2557"></td>
        <td id="LC2557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2558"></td>
        <td id="LC2558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, and your guardian must be brave if he is to fight well?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2559"></td>
        <td id="LC2559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2560"></td>
        <td id="LC2560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2561"></td>
        <td id="LC2561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2562"></td>
        <td id="LC2562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is he likely to be brave who has no spirit, whether horse or dog</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2563"></td>
        <td id="LC2563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or any other animal? Have you never observed how invincible and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2564"></td>
        <td id="LC2564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unconquerable is spirit and how the presence of it makes the soul of any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2565"></td>
        <td id="LC2565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creature to be absolutely fearless and indomitable?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2566"></td>
        <td id="LC2566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2567"></td>
        <td id="LC2567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2568"></td>
        <td id="LC2568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2569"></td>
        <td id="LC2569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then now we have a clear notion of the bodily qualities which are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2570"></td>
        <td id="LC2570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">required in the guardian.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2571"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2572"></td>

        <td id="L2573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2573"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2574"></td>
        <td id="LC2574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And also of the mental ones; his soul is to be full of spirit?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2575"></td>
        <td id="LC2575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2576"></td>
        <td id="LC2576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2577"></td>
        <td id="LC2577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2578"></td>
        <td id="LC2578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But are not these spirited natures apt to be savage with one another,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2579"></td>
        <td id="LC2579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and with everybody else?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2580"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2581"></td>
        <td id="LC2581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A difficulty by no means easy to overcome, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2582"></td>
        <td id="LC2582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2583"></td>
        <td id="LC2583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whereas, I said, they ought to be dangerous to their enemies, and gentle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2584"></td>
        <td id="LC2584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to their friends; if not, they will destroy themselves without waiting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2585"></td>
        <td id="LC2585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for their enemies to destroy them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2586"></td>
        <td id="LC2586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2587"></td>
        <td id="LC2587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2588"></td>
        <td id="LC2588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2589"></td>
        <td id="LC2589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What is to be done then? I said; how shall we find a gentle nature which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2590"></td>
        <td id="LC2590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has also a great spirit, for the one is the contradiction of the other?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2591"></td>
        <td id="LC2591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2592"></td>
        <td id="LC2592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2593"></td>
        <td id="LC2593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2594"></td>
        <td id="LC2594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He will not be a good guardian who is wanting in either of these two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2595"></td>
        <td id="LC2595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">qualities; and yet the combination of them appears to be impossible; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2596"></td>
        <td id="LC2596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hence we must infer that to be a good guardian is impossible.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2597"></td>
        <td id="LC2597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2598"></td>
        <td id="LC2598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am afraid that what you say is true, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2599"></td>
        <td id="LC2599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2600"></td>
        <td id="LC2600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Here feeling perplexed I began to think over what had preceded.--My</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2601"></td>
        <td id="LC2601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friend, I said, no wonder that we are in a perplexity; for we have lost</td>

        <td id="LC2700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And literature may be either true or false?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2701"></td>
        <td id="LC2701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2702"></td>
        <td id="LC2702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2703"></td>
        <td id="LC2703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2704"></td>
        <td id="LC2704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the young should be trained in both kinds, and we begin with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2705"></td>
        <td id="LC2705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">false?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2706"></td>
        <td id="LC2706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2707"></td>
        <td id="LC2707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do not understand your meaning, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2708"></td>
        <td id="LC2708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2709"></td>
        <td id="LC2709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You know, I said, that we begin by telling children stories which,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2710"></td>
        <td id="LC2710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though not wholly destitute of truth, are in the main fictitious;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2711"></td>
        <td id="LC2711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and these stories are told them when they are not of an age to learn</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2712"></td>
        <td id="LC2712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gymnastics.</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L2716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2716"></td>
        <td id="LC2716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That was my meaning when I said that we must teach music before</td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2728"></td>
        <td id="LC2728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And shall we just carelessly allow children to hear any casual tales</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which may be devised by casual persons, and to receive into their minds</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2730"></td>
        <td id="LC2730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ideas for the most part the very opposite of those which we should wish</td>

        <td id="LC2731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them to have when they are grown up?</td>

      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L2733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2733"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2734"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2735"></td>
        <td id="LC2735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the first thing will be to establish a censorship of the writers of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2736"></td>
        <td id="LC2736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fiction, and let the censors receive any tale of fiction which is good,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2737"></td>
        <td id="LC2737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and reject the bad; and we will desire mothers and nurses to tell their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2738"></td>
        <td id="LC2738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">children the authorised ones only. Let them fashion the mind with such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2739"></td>
        <td id="LC2739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tales, even more fondly than they mould the body with their hands; but</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2740"></td>
        <td id="LC2740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most of those which are now in use must be discarded.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2741"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2742"></td>
        <td id="LC2742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of what tales are you speaking? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L2744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2744"></td>
        <td id="LC2744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You may find a model of the lesser in the greater, I said; for they are</td>

        <td id="L2752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2752"></td>
        <td id="LC2752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the poets, who have ever been the great story-tellers of mankind.</td>

        <td id="L2753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2753"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But which stories do you mean, he said; and what fault do you find with</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2757"></td>
        <td id="LC2757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A fault which is most serious, I said; the fault of telling a lie, and,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2758"></td>
        <td id="LC2758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what is more, a bad lie.</td>

        <td id="L2759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2759"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
