        <td id="LC2760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But when is this fault committed?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2761"></td>
        <td id="LC2761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2762"></td>
        <td id="LC2762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whenever an erroneous representation is made of the nature of gods and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2763"></td>
        <td id="LC2763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heroes,--as when a painter paints a portrait not having the shadow of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2764"></td>
        <td id="LC2764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">likeness to the original.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2765"></td>
        <td id="LC2765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2766"></td>
        <td id="LC2766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, that sort of thing is certainly very blameable; but what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2767"></td>
        <td id="LC2767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are the stories which you mean?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2768"></td>
        <td id="LC2768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2769"></td>
        <td id="LC2769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">First of all, I said, there was that greatest of all lies in high</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2770"></td>
        <td id="LC2770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">places, which the poet told about Uranus, and which was a bad lie</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2771"></td>
        <td id="LC2771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too,--I mean what Hesiod says that Uranus did, and how Cronus retaliated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2772"></td>
        <td id="LC2772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on him. The doings of Cronus, and the sufferings which in turn his son</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2773"></td>
        <td id="LC2773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inflicted upon him, even if they were true, ought certainly not to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2774"></td>
        <td id="LC2774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lightly told to young and thoughtless persons; if possible, they had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2775"></td>
        <td id="LC2775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better be buried in silence. But if there is an absolute necessity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2776"></td>
        <td id="LC2776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for their mention, a chosen few might hear them in a mystery, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2777"></td>
        <td id="LC2777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they should sacrifice not a common (Eleusinian) pig, but some huge and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2778"></td>
        <td id="LC2778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unprocurable victim; and then the number of the hearers will be very few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2779"></td>
        <td id="LC2779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indeed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2780"></td>
        <td id="LC2780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2781"></td>
        <td id="LC2781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, yes, said he, those stories are extremely objectionable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2782"></td>
        <td id="LC2782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2783"></td>
        <td id="LC2783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, Adeimantus, they are stories not to be repeated in our State; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2784"></td>
        <td id="LC2784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young man should not be told that in committing the worst of crimes he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2785"></td>
        <td id="LC2785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is far from doing anything outrageous; and that even if he chastises his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2786"></td>
        <td id="LC2786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father when he does wrong, in whatever manner, he will only be following</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2787"></td>
        <td id="LC2787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the example of the first and greatest among the gods.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2788"></td>
        <td id="LC2788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2789"></td>
        <td id="LC2789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I entirely agree with you, he said; in my opinion those stories are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2790"></td>
        <td id="LC2790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite unfit to be repeated.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2791"></td>
        <td id="LC2791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2792"></td>
        <td id="LC2792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither, if we mean our future guardians to regard the habit of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2793"></td>
        <td id="LC2793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quarrelling among themselves as of all things the basest, should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2794"></td>
        <td id="LC2794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any word be said to them of the wars in heaven, and of the plots and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2795"></td>
        <td id="LC2795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fightings of the gods against one another, for they are not true. No,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2796"></td>
        <td id="LC2796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we shall never mention the battles of the giants, or let them be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2797"></td>
        <td id="LC2797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">embroidered on garments; and we shall be silent about the innumerable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2798"></td>
        <td id="LC2798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other quarrels of gods and heroes with their friends and relatives.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2799"></td>
        <td id="LC2799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If they would only believe us we would tell them that quarrelling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2800"></td>
        <td id="LC2800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is unholy, and that never up to this time has there been any quarrel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2801"></td>
        <td id="LC2801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">between citizens; this is what old men and old women should begin by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2802"></td>
        <td id="LC2802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">telling children; and when they grow up, the poets also should be told</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2803"></td>
        <td id="LC2803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to compose for them in a similar spirit. But the narrative of Hephaestus</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2804"></td>
        <td id="LC2804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">binding Here his mother, or how on another occasion Zeus sent him flying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2805"></td>
        <td id="LC2805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for taking her part when she was being beaten, and all the battles of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2806"></td>
        <td id="LC2806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the gods in Homer--these tales must not be admitted into our State,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2807"></td>
        <td id="LC2807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether they are supposed to have an allegorical meaning or not. For</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2808"></td>
        <td id="LC2808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a young person cannot judge what is allegorical and what is literal;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2809"></td>
        <td id="LC2809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything that he receives into his mind at that age is likely to become</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2810"></td>
        <td id="LC2810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indelible and unalterable; and therefore it is most important that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2811"></td>
        <td id="LC2811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tales which the young first hear should be models of virtuous thoughts.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2812"></td>
        <td id="LC2812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2813"></td>
        <td id="LC2813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There you are right, he replied; but if any one asks where are such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2814"></td>
        <td id="LC2814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">models to be found and of what tales are you speaking--how shall we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2815"></td>
        <td id="LC2815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2816"></td>
        <td id="LC2816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2817"></td>
        <td id="LC2817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I said to him, You and I, Adeimantus, at this moment are not poets,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2818"></td>
        <td id="LC2818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but founders of a State: now the founders of a State ought to know the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2819"></td>
        <td id="LC2819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">general forms in which poets should cast their tales, and the limits</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2820"></td>
        <td id="LC2820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which must be observed by them, but to make the tales is not their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2821"></td>
        <td id="LC2821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">business.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2822"></td>
        <td id="LC2822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2823"></td>
        <td id="LC2823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he said; but what are these forms of theology which you mean?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2824"></td>
        <td id="LC2824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2825"></td>
        <td id="LC2825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Something of this kind, I replied:--God is always to be represented as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2826"></td>
        <td id="LC2826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he truly is, whatever be the sort of poetry, epic, lyric or tragic, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2827"></td>
        <td id="LC2827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which the representation is given.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2828"></td>
        <td id="LC2828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2829"></td>
        <td id="LC2829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Right.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2830"></td>
        <td id="LC2830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2831"></td>
        <td id="LC2831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is he not truly good? and must he not be represented as such?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2832"></td>
        <td id="LC2832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2833"></td>
        <td id="LC2833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2834"></td>
        <td id="LC2834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2835"></td>
        <td id="LC2835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And no good thing is hurtful?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2836"></td>
        <td id="LC2836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2837"></td>
        <td id="LC2837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No, indeed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2838"></td>
        <td id="LC2838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2839"></td>
        <td id="LC2839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And that which is not hurtful hurts not?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2840"></td>
        <td id="LC2840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2841"></td>
        <td id="LC2841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2842"></td>
        <td id="LC2842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2843"></td>
        <td id="LC2843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And that which hurts not does no evil?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2844"></td>
        <td id="LC2844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2845"></td>
        <td id="LC2845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2846"></td>
        <td id="LC2846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2847"></td>
        <td id="LC2847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And can that which does no evil be a cause of evil?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2848"></td>
        <td id="LC2848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2849"></td>
        <td id="LC2849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Impossible.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2850"></td>
        <td id="LC2850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2851"></td>
        <td id="LC2851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the good is advantageous?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2852"></td>
        <td id="LC2852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2853"></td>
        <td id="LC2853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2854"></td>
        <td id="LC2854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2855"></td>
        <td id="LC2855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And therefore the cause of well-being?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2856"></td>
        <td id="LC2856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2857"></td>
        <td id="LC2857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2858"></td>
        <td id="LC2858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2859"></td>
        <td id="LC2859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It follows therefore that the good is not the cause of all things, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2860"></td>
        <td id="LC2860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the good only?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2861"></td>
        <td id="LC2861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2862"></td>
        <td id="LC2862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Assuredly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2863"></td>
        <td id="LC2863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2864"></td>
        <td id="LC2864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then God, if he be good, is not the author of all things, as the many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2865"></td>
        <td id="LC2865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assert, but he is the cause of a few things only, and not of most things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2866"></td>
        <td id="LC2866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that occur to men. For few are the goods of human life, and many are the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2867"></td>
        <td id="LC2867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evils, and the good is to be attributed to God alone; of the evils the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2868"></td>
        <td id="LC2868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">causes are to be sought elsewhere, and not in him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2869"></td>
        <td id="LC2869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2870"></td>
        <td id="LC2870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That appears to me to be most true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2871"></td>
        <td id="LC2871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2872"></td>
        <td id="LC2872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then we must not listen to Homer or to any other poet who is guilty of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2873"></td>
        <td id="LC2873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the folly of saying that two casks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2874"></td>
        <td id="LC2874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2875"></td>
        <td id="LC2875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Lie at the threshold of Zeus, full of lots, one of good, the other of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2876"></td>
        <td id="LC2876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evil lots,&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2877"></td>
        <td id="LC2877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2878"></td>
        <td id="LC2878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that he to whom Zeus gives a mixture of the two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2879"></td>
        <td id="LC2879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2880"></td>
        <td id="LC2880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Sometimes meets with evil fortune, at other times with good;&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2881"></td>
        <td id="LC2881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2882"></td>
        <td id="LC2882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but that he to whom is given the cup of unmingled ill,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2883"></td>
        <td id="LC2883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2884"></td>
        <td id="LC2884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Him wild hunger drives o&#39;er the beauteous earth.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2885"></td>
        <td id="LC2885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2886"></td>
        <td id="LC2886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And again--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2887"></td>
        <td id="LC2887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2888"></td>
        <td id="LC2888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Zeus, who is the dispenser of good and evil to us.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2889"></td>
        <td id="LC2889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2890"></td>
        <td id="LC2890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And if any one asserts that the violation of oaths and treaties, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2891"></td>
        <td id="LC2891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was really the work of Pandarus, was brought about by Athene and Zeus,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2892"></td>
        <td id="LC2892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or that the strife and contention of the gods was instigated by Themis</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2893"></td>
        <td id="LC2893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Zeus, he shall not have our approval; neither will we allow our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2894"></td>
        <td id="LC2894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young men to hear the words of Aeschylus, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2895"></td>
        <td id="LC2895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2896"></td>
        <td id="LC2896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;God plants guilt among men when he desires utterly to destroy a house.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2897"></td>
        <td id="LC2897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2898"></td>
        <td id="LC2898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And if a poet writes of the sufferings of Niobe--the subject of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2899"></td>
        <td id="LC2899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tragedy in which these iambic verses occur--or of the house of Pelops,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2900"></td>
        <td id="LC2900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or of the Trojan war or on any similar theme, either we must not permit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2901"></td>
        <td id="LC2901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him to say that these are the works of God, or if they are of God, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2902"></td>
        <td id="LC2902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must devise some explanation of them such as we are seeking; he must say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2903"></td>
        <td id="LC2903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that God did what was just and right, and they were the better for being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2904"></td>
        <td id="LC2904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">punished; but that those who are punished are miserable, and that God</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2905"></td>
        <td id="LC2905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is the author of their misery--the poet is not to be permitted to say;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2906"></td>
        <td id="LC2906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though he may say that the wicked are miserable because they require</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2907"></td>
        <td id="LC2907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be punished, and are benefited by receiving punishment from God;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2908"></td>
        <td id="LC2908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but that God being good is the author of evil to any one is to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2909"></td>
        <td id="LC2909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strenuously denied, and not to be said or sung or heard in verse or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2910"></td>
        <td id="LC2910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prose by any one whether old or young in any well-ordered commonwealth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2911"></td>
        <td id="LC2911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Such a fiction is suicidal, ruinous, impious.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2912"></td>
        <td id="LC2912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2913"></td>
        <td id="LC2913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I agree with you, he replied, and am ready to give my assent to the law.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2914"></td>
        <td id="LC2914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2915"></td>
        <td id="LC2915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let this then be one of our rules and principles concerning the gods, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2916"></td>
        <td id="LC2916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which our poets and reciters will be expected to conform,--that God is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2917"></td>
        <td id="LC2917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not the author of all things, but of good only.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2918"></td>
        <td id="LC2918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2919"></td>
        <td id="LC2919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That will do, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2920"></td>
        <td id="LC2920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2921"></td>
        <td id="LC2921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what do you think of a second principle? Shall I ask you whether God</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2922"></td>
        <td id="LC2922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is a magician, and of a nature to appear insidiously now in one shape,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2923"></td>
        <td id="LC2923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and now in another--sometimes himself changing and passing into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2924"></td>
        <td id="LC2924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many forms, sometimes deceiving us with the semblance of such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2925"></td>
        <td id="LC2925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">transformations; or is he one and the same immutably fixed in his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2926"></td>
        <td id="LC2926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proper image?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2927"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2928"></td>
        <td id="LC2928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I cannot answer you, he said, without more thought.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2929"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2930"></td>

        <td id="L2931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2931"></td>
        <td id="LC2931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be effected either by the thing itself, or by some other thing?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2932"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L2934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2934"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2935"></td>
        <td id="LC2935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And things which are at their best are also least liable to be altered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2936"></td>
        <td id="LC2936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or discomposed; for example, when healthiest and strongest, the human</td>

        <td id="L2937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2937"></td>
        <td id="LC2937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frame is least liable to be affected by meats and drinks, and the plant</td>

        <td id="L2938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2938"></td>
        <td id="LC2938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which is in the fullest vigour also suffers least from winds or the heat</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L2943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2943"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shapes?</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2967"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2968"></td>
        <td id="LC2968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But may he not change and transform himself?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2969"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L2970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2970"></td>
        <td id="LC2970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Clearly, he said, that must be the case if he is changed at all.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2971"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worse and more unsightly?</td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2976"></td>
        <td id="LC2976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suppose him to be deficient either in virtue or beauty.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L2978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2978"></td>
        <td id="LC2978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, Adeimantus; but then, would any one, whether God or man,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2979"></td>
        <td id="LC2979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desire to make himself worse?</td>

        <td id="L2980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2980"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2981"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2982"></td>
        <td id="LC2982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2983"></td>
        <td id="LC2983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then it is impossible that God should ever be willing to change; being,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2984"></td>
        <td id="LC2984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as is supposed, the fairest and best that is conceivable, every God</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2985"></td>
        <td id="LC2985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remains absolutely and for ever in his own form.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2986"></td>
        <td id="LC2986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2987"></td>
        <td id="LC2987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That necessarily follows, he said, in my judgment.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2988"></td>
        <td id="LC2988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2989"></td>
        <td id="LC2989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, I said, my dear friend, let none of the poets tell us that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2990"></td>
        <td id="LC2990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2991"></td>
        <td id="LC2991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;The gods, taking the disguise of strangers from other lands, walk up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2992"></td>
        <td id="LC2992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and down cities in all sorts of forms;&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2993"></td>
        <td id="LC2993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2994"></td>
        <td id="LC2994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and let no one slander Proteus and Thetis, neither let any one, either</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2995"></td>
        <td id="LC2995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in tragedy or in any other kind of poetry, introduce Here disguised in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2996"></td>
        <td id="LC2996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the likeness of a priestess asking an alms</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2997"></td>
        <td id="LC2997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2998"></td>
        <td id="LC2998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;For the life-giving daughters of Inachus the river of Argos;&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2999"></td>
        <td id="LC2999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3000"></td>
        <td id="LC3000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">--let us have no more lies of that sort. Neither must we have mothers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3001"></td>
        <td id="LC3001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under the influence of the poets scaring their children with a bad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3002"></td>
        <td id="LC3002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">version of these myths--telling how certain gods, as they say, &#39;Go about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3003"></td>
        <td id="LC3003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by night in the likeness of so many strangers and in divers forms;&#39; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3004"></td>
        <td id="LC3004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">let them take heed lest they make cowards of their children, and at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3005"></td>
        <td id="LC3005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same time speak blasphemy against the gods.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3006"></td>
        <td id="LC3006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3007"></td>
        <td id="LC3007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heaven forbid, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3008"></td>
        <td id="LC3008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3009"></td>
        <td id="LC3009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But although the gods are themselves unchangeable, still by witchcraft</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3010"></td>
        <td id="LC3010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and deception they may make us think that they appear in various forms?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3011"></td>
        <td id="LC3011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3012"></td>
        <td id="LC3012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Perhaps, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3013"></td>
        <td id="LC3013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3014"></td>
        <td id="LC3014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, but can you imagine that God will be willing to lie, whether in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3015"></td>
        <td id="LC3015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">word or deed, or to put forth a phantom of himself?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3016"></td>
        <td id="LC3016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3017"></td>
        <td id="LC3017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I cannot say, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3018"></td>
        <td id="LC3018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3019"></td>
        <td id="LC3019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Do you not know, I said, that the true lie, if such an expression may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3020"></td>
        <td id="LC3020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allowed, is hated of gods and men?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3021"></td>
        <td id="LC3021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3022"></td>
        <td id="LC3022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3023"></td>
        <td id="LC3023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3024"></td>
        <td id="LC3024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I mean that no one is willingly deceived in that which is the truest and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3025"></td>
        <td id="LC3025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">highest part of himself, or about the truest and highest matters; there,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3026"></td>
        <td id="LC3026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">above all, he is most afraid of a lie having possession of him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3027"></td>
        <td id="LC3027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3028"></td>
        <td id="LC3028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Still, he said, I do not comprehend you.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3029"></td>
        <td id="LC3029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3030"></td>
        <td id="LC3030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The reason is, I replied, that you attribute some profound meaning to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3031"></td>
        <td id="LC3031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my words; but I am only saying that deception, or being deceived</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3032"></td>
        <td id="LC3032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or uninformed about the highest realities in the highest part of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3033"></td>
        <td id="LC3033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves, which is the soul, and in that part of them to have and to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3034"></td>
        <td id="LC3034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hold the lie, is what mankind least like;--that, I say, is what they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3035"></td>
        <td id="LC3035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">utterly detest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3036"></td>
        <td id="LC3036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3037"></td>
        <td id="LC3037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is nothing more hateful to them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3038"></td>
        <td id="LC3038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3039"></td>
        <td id="LC3039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And, as I was just now remarking, this ignorance in the soul of him who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3040"></td>
        <td id="LC3040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is deceived may be called the true lie; for the lie in words is only a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3041"></td>
        <td id="LC3041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind of imitation and shadowy image of a previous affection of the soul,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3042"></td>
        <td id="LC3042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not pure unadulterated falsehood. Am I not right?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3043"></td>
        <td id="LC3043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3044"></td>
        <td id="LC3044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Perfectly right.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3045"></td>
        <td id="LC3045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3046"></td>
        <td id="LC3046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The true lie is hated not only by the gods, but also by men?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3047"></td>
        <td id="LC3047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3048"></td>
        <td id="LC3048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3049"></td>
        <td id="LC3049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3050"></td>
        <td id="LC3050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whereas the lie in words is in certain cases useful and not hateful; in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3051"></td>
        <td id="LC3051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dealing with enemies--that would be an instance; or again, when those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3052"></td>
        <td id="LC3052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom we call our friends in a fit of madness or illusion are going to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3053"></td>
        <td id="LC3053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do some harm, then it is useful and is a sort of medicine or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3054"></td>
        <td id="LC3054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preventive; also in the tales of mythology, of which we were just now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3055"></td>
        <td id="LC3055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speaking--because we do not know the truth about ancient times, we make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3056"></td>
        <td id="LC3056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">falsehood as much like truth as we can, and so turn it to account.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3057"></td>
        <td id="LC3057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3058"></td>
        <td id="LC3058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3059"></td>
        <td id="LC3059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3060"></td>
        <td id="LC3060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But can any of these reasons apply to God? Can we suppose that he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3061"></td>
        <td id="LC3061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ignorant of antiquity, and therefore has recourse to invention?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3062"></td>
        <td id="LC3062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3063"></td>
        <td id="LC3063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That would be ridiculous, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3064"></td>
        <td id="LC3064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3065"></td>
        <td id="LC3065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the lying poet has no place in our idea of God?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3066"></td>
        <td id="LC3066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3067"></td>
        <td id="LC3067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should say not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3068"></td>
        <td id="LC3068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3069"></td>
        <td id="LC3069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Or perhaps he may tell a lie because he is afraid of enemies?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3070"></td>
        <td id="LC3070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3071"></td>
        <td id="LC3071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is inconceivable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3072"></td>
        <td id="LC3072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3073"></td>
        <td id="LC3073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But he may have friends who are senseless or mad?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3074"></td>
        <td id="LC3074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3075"></td>
        <td id="LC3075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But no mad or senseless person can be a friend of God.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3076"></td>
        <td id="LC3076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3077"></td>
        <td id="LC3077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then no motive can be imagined why God should lie?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3078"></td>
        <td id="LC3078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3079"></td>
        <td id="LC3079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">None whatever.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3080"></td>
        <td id="LC3080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3081"></td>
        <td id="LC3081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the superhuman and divine is absolutely incapable of falsehood?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3082"></td>
        <td id="LC3082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3083"></td>
        <td id="LC3083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3084"></td>
        <td id="LC3084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3085"></td>
        <td id="LC3085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then is God perfectly simple and true both in word and deed; he changes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3086"></td>
        <td id="LC3086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not; he deceives not, either by sign or word, by dream or waking vision.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3087"></td>
        <td id="LC3087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3088"></td>
        <td id="LC3088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Your thoughts, he said, are the reflection of my own.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3089"></td>
        <td id="LC3089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3090"></td>
        <td id="LC3090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You agree with me then, I said, that this is the second type or form in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3091"></td>
        <td id="LC3091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which we should write and speak about divine things. The gods are not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3092"></td>
        <td id="LC3092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">magicians who transform themselves, neither do they deceive mankind in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3093"></td>
        <td id="LC3093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any way.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3094"></td>
        <td id="LC3094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3095"></td>
        <td id="LC3095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I grant that.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3096"></td>
        <td id="LC3096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3097"></td>
        <td id="LC3097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, although we are admirers of Homer, we do not admire the lying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3098"></td>
        <td id="LC3098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dream which Zeus sends to Agamemnon; neither will we praise the verses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3099"></td>
        <td id="LC3099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Aeschylus in which Thetis says that Apollo at her nuptials</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3100"></td>
        <td id="LC3100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3101"></td>
        <td id="LC3101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Was celebrating in song her fair progeny whose days were to be long,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3102"></td>
        <td id="LC3102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and to know no sickness. And when he had spoken of my lot as in all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3103"></td>
        <td id="LC3103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things blessed of heaven he raised a note of triumph and cheered my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3104"></td>
        <td id="LC3104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soul. And I thought that the word of Phoebus, being divine and full of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3105"></td>
        <td id="LC3105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prophecy, would not fail. And now he himself who uttered the strain,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3106"></td>
        <td id="LC3106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he who was present at the banquet, and who said this--he it is who has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3107"></td>
        <td id="LC3107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slain my son.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3108"></td>
        <td id="LC3108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3109"></td>
        <td id="LC3109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These are the kind of sentiments about the gods which will arouse our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3110"></td>
        <td id="LC3110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anger; and he who utters them shall be refused a chorus; neither shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3111"></td>
        <td id="LC3111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we allow teachers to make use of them in the instruction of the young,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3112"></td>
        <td id="LC3112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meaning, as we do, that our guardians, as far as men can be, should be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3113"></td>
        <td id="LC3113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">true worshippers of the gods and like them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3114"></td>
        <td id="LC3114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3115"></td>
        <td id="LC3115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I entirely agree, he said, in these principles, and promise to make them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3116"></td>
        <td id="LC3116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my laws.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3117"></td>
        <td id="LC3117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3118"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3120"></td>
