</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3121"></td>
        <td id="LC3121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">BOOK III.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3122"></td>
        <td id="LC3122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3123"></td>
        <td id="LC3123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Such then, I said, are our principles of theology--some tales are to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3124"></td>
        <td id="LC3124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told, and others are not to be told to our disciples from their youth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3125"></td>
        <td id="LC3125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upwards, if we mean them to honour the gods and their parents, and to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3126"></td>
        <td id="LC3126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">value friendship with one another.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3127"></td>
        <td id="LC3127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3128"></td>
        <td id="LC3128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes; and I think that our principles are right, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3129"></td>
        <td id="LC3129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3130"></td>
        <td id="LC3130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But if they are to be courageous, must they not learn other lessons</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3131"></td>
        <td id="LC3131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">besides these, and lessons of such a kind as will take away the fear of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3132"></td>
        <td id="LC3132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death? Can any man be courageous who has the fear of death in him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3133"></td>
        <td id="LC3133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3134"></td>
        <td id="LC3134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3135"></td>
        <td id="LC3135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3136"></td>
        <td id="LC3136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And can he be fearless of death, or will he choose death in battle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3137"></td>
        <td id="LC3137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rather than defeat and slavery, who believes the world below to be real</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3138"></td>
        <td id="LC3138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and terrible?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3139"></td>
        <td id="LC3139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3140"></td>
        <td id="LC3140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Impossible.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3141"></td>
        <td id="LC3141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3142"></td>
        <td id="LC3142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then we must assume a control over the narrators of this class of tales</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3143"></td>
        <td id="LC3143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as well as over the others, and beg them not simply to revile but rather</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3144"></td>
        <td id="LC3144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to commend the world below, intimating to them that their descriptions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3145"></td>
        <td id="LC3145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are untrue, and will do harm to our future warriors.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3146"></td>
        <td id="LC3146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3147"></td>
        <td id="LC3147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That will be our duty, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3148"></td>
        <td id="LC3148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3149"></td>
        <td id="LC3149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, I said, we shall have to obliterate many obnoxious passages,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3150"></td>
        <td id="LC3150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beginning with the verses,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3151"></td>
        <td id="LC3151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3152"></td>
        <td id="LC3152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;I would rather be a serf on the land of a poor and portionless man than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3153"></td>
        <td id="LC3153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rule over all the dead who have come to nought.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3154"></td>
        <td id="LC3154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3155"></td>
        <td id="LC3155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We must also expunge the verse, which tells us how Pluto feared,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3156"></td>
        <td id="LC3156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3157"></td>
        <td id="LC3157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Lest the mansions grim and squalid which the gods abhor should be seen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3158"></td>
        <td id="LC3158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both of mortals and immortals.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3159"></td>
        <td id="LC3159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3160"></td>
        <td id="LC3160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And again:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3161"></td>
        <td id="LC3161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3162"></td>
        <td id="LC3162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;O heavens! verily in the house of Hades there is soul and ghostly form</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3163"></td>
        <td id="LC3163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but no mind at all!&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3164"></td>
        <td id="LC3164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3165"></td>
        <td id="LC3165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Again of Tiresias:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3166"></td>
        <td id="LC3166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3167"></td>
        <td id="LC3167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;(To him even after death did Persephone grant mind,) that he alone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3168"></td>
        <td id="LC3168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should be wise; but the other souls are flitting shades.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3169"></td>
        <td id="LC3169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3170"></td>
        <td id="LC3170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Again:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3171"></td>
        <td id="LC3171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3172"></td>
        <td id="LC3172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;The soul flying from the limbs had gone to Hades, lamenting her fate,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3173"></td>
        <td id="LC3173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leaving manhood and youth.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3174"></td>
        <td id="LC3174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3175"></td>
        <td id="LC3175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Again:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3176"></td>
        <td id="LC3176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3177"></td>
        <td id="LC3177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;And the soul, with shrilling cry, passed like smoke beneath the earth.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3178"></td>
        <td id="LC3178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3179"></td>
        <td id="LC3179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3180"></td>
        <td id="LC3180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3181"></td>
        <td id="LC3181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;As bats in hollow of mystic cavern, whenever any of them has dropped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3182"></td>
        <td id="LC3182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of the string and falls from the rock, fly shrilling and cling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3183"></td>
        <td id="LC3183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to one another, so did they with shrilling cry hold together as they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3184"></td>
        <td id="LC3184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moved.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3185"></td>
        <td id="LC3185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3186"></td>
        <td id="LC3186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And we must beg Homer and the other poets not to be angry if we strike</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3187"></td>
        <td id="LC3187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out these and similar passages, not because they are unpoetical, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3188"></td>
        <td id="LC3188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unattractive to the popular ear, but because the greater the poetical</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3189"></td>
        <td id="LC3189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charm of them, the less are they meet for the ears of boys and men who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3190"></td>
        <td id="LC3190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are meant to be free, and who should fear slavery more than death.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3191"></td>
        <td id="LC3191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3192"></td>
        <td id="LC3192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Undoubtedly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3193"></td>
        <td id="LC3193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3194"></td>
        <td id="LC3194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Also we shall have to reject all the terrible and appalling names which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3195"></td>
        <td id="LC3195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">describe the world below--Cocytus and Styx, ghosts under the earth, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3196"></td>
        <td id="LC3196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sapless shades, and any similar words of which the very mention causes a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3197"></td>
        <td id="LC3197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shudder to pass through the inmost soul of him who hears them. I do not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3198"></td>
        <td id="LC3198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say that these horrible stories may not have a use of some kind; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3199"></td>
        <td id="LC3199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there is a danger that the nerves of our guardians may be rendered too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3200"></td>
        <td id="LC3200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excitable and effeminate by them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3201"></td>
        <td id="LC3201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3202"></td>
        <td id="LC3202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is a real danger, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3203"></td>
        <td id="LC3203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3204"></td>
        <td id="LC3204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then we must have no more of them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3205"></td>
        <td id="LC3205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3206"></td>
        <td id="LC3206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3207"></td>
        <td id="LC3207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3208"></td>
        <td id="LC3208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Another and a nobler strain must be composed and sung by us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3209"></td>
        <td id="LC3209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3210"></td>
        <td id="LC3210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Clearly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3211"></td>
        <td id="LC3211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3212"></td>
        <td id="LC3212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And shall we proceed to get rid of the weepings and wailings of famous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3213"></td>
        <td id="LC3213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3214"></td>
        <td id="LC3214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3215"></td>
        <td id="LC3215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They will go with the rest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3216"></td>
        <td id="LC3216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3217"></td>
        <td id="LC3217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But shall we be right in getting rid of them? Reflect: our principle is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3218"></td>
        <td id="LC3218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the good man will not consider death terrible to any other good man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3219"></td>
        <td id="LC3219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who is his comrade.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3220"></td>
        <td id="LC3220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3221"></td>
        <td id="LC3221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes; that is our principle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3222"></td>
        <td id="LC3222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3223"></td>
        <td id="LC3223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And therefore he will not sorrow for his departed friend as though he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3224"></td>
        <td id="LC3224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had suffered anything terrible?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3225"></td>
        <td id="LC3225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3226"></td>
        <td id="LC3226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He will not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3227"></td>
        <td id="LC3227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3228"></td>
        <td id="LC3228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Such an one, as we further maintain, is sufficient for himself and his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3229"></td>
        <td id="LC3229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own happiness, and therefore is least in need of other men.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3230"></td>
        <td id="LC3230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3231"></td>
        <td id="LC3231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3232"></td>
        <td id="LC3232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3233"></td>
        <td id="LC3233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And for this reason the loss of a son or brother, or the deprivation of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3234"></td>
        <td id="LC3234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fortune, is to him of all men least terrible.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3235"></td>
        <td id="LC3235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3236"></td>
        <td id="LC3236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Assuredly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3237"></td>
        <td id="LC3237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3238"></td>
        <td id="LC3238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And therefore he will be least likely to lament, and will bear with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3239"></td>
        <td id="LC3239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greatest equanimity any misfortune of this sort which may befall him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3240"></td>
        <td id="LC3240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3241"></td>
        <td id="LC3241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he will feel such a misfortune far less than another.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3242"></td>
        <td id="LC3242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3243"></td>
        <td id="LC3243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then we shall be right in getting rid of the lamentations of famous men,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3244"></td>
        <td id="LC3244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and making them over to women (and not even to women who are good for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3245"></td>
        <td id="LC3245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything), or to men of a baser sort, that those who are being educated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3246"></td>
        <td id="LC3246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by us to be the defenders of their country may scorn to do the like.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3247"></td>
        <td id="LC3247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3248"></td>
        <td id="LC3248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That will be very right.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3249"></td>
        <td id="LC3249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3250"></td>
        <td id="LC3250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then we will once more entreat Homer and the other poets not to depict</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3251"></td>
        <td id="LC3251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Achilles, who is the son of a goddess, first lying on his side, then on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3252"></td>
        <td id="LC3252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his back, and then on his face; then starting up and sailing in a frenzy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3253"></td>
        <td id="LC3253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along the shores of the barren sea; now taking the sooty ashes in both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3254"></td>
        <td id="LC3254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his hands and pouring them over his head, or weeping and wailing in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3255"></td>
        <td id="LC3255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">various modes which Homer has delineated. Nor should he describe Priam</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3256"></td>
        <td id="LC3256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the kinsman of the gods as praying and beseeching,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3257"></td>
        <td id="LC3257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3258"></td>
        <td id="LC3258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Rolling in the dirt, calling each man loudly by his name.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3259"></td>
        <td id="LC3259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3260"></td>
        <td id="LC3260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Still more earnestly will we beg of him at all events not to introduce</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3261"></td>
        <td id="LC3261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the gods lamenting and saying,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3262"></td>
        <td id="LC3262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3263"></td>
        <td id="LC3263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Alas! my misery! Alas! that I bore the bravest to my sorrow.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3264"></td>
        <td id="LC3264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3265"></td>
        <td id="LC3265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But if he must introduce the gods, at any rate let him not dare so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3266"></td>
        <td id="LC3266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">completely to misrepresent the greatest of the gods, as to make him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3267"></td>
        <td id="LC3267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3268"></td>
        <td id="LC3268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3269"></td>
        <td id="LC3269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;O heavens! with my eyes verily I behold a dear friend of mine chased</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3270"></td>
        <td id="LC3270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">round and round the city, and my heart is sorrowful.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3271"></td>
        <td id="LC3271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3272"></td>
        <td id="LC3272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Or again:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3273"></td>
        <td id="LC3273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3274"></td>
        <td id="LC3274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Woe is me that I am fated to have Sarpedon, dearest of men to me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3275"></td>
        <td id="LC3275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subdued at the hands of Patroclus the son of Menoetius.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3276"></td>
        <td id="LC3276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3277"></td>
        <td id="LC3277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For if, my sweet Adeimantus, our youth seriously listen to such unworthy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3278"></td>
        <td id="LC3278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">representations of the gods, instead of laughing at them as they ought,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3279"></td>
        <td id="LC3279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hardly will any of them deem that he himself, being but a man, can be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3280"></td>
        <td id="LC3280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dishonoured by similar actions; neither will he rebuke any inclination</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3281"></td>
        <td id="LC3281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which may arise in his mind to say and do the like. And instead</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3282"></td>
        <td id="LC3282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of having any shame or self-control, he will be always whining and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3283"></td>
        <td id="LC3283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lamenting on slight occasions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3284"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3285"></td>
        <td id="LC3285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, that is most true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3286"></td>
        <td id="LC3286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3287"></td>
        <td id="LC3287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I replied; but that surely is what ought not to be, as the argument</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3288"></td>
        <td id="LC3288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has just proved to us; and by that proof we must abide until it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3289"></td>
        <td id="LC3289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disproved by a better.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3290"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3292"></td>
        <td id="LC3292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3293"></td>
        <td id="LC3293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither ought our guardians to be given to laughter. For a fit of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3294"></td>
        <td id="LC3294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laughter which has been indulged to excess almost always produces a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3295"></td>
        <td id="LC3295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">violent reaction.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3296"></td>
        <td id="LC3296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3297"></td>
        <td id="LC3297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So I believe.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3298"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3299"></td>
        <td id="LC3299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then persons of worth, even if only mortal men, must not be represented</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3300"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC3314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them is certain.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L3316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3316"></td>
        <td id="LC3316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Again, truth should be highly valued; if, as we were saying, a lie is</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3317"></td>
        <td id="LC3317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">useless to the gods, and useful only as a medicine to men, then the</td>

        <td id="L3321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3321"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3322"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC3323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then if any one at all is to have the privilege of lying, the rulers of</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3324"></td>
        <td id="LC3324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the State should be the persons; and they, in their dealings either with</td>

        <td id="L3325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3325"></td>
        <td id="LC3325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enemies or with their own citizens, may be allowed to lie for the public</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3326"></td>
        <td id="LC3326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good. But nobody else should meddle with anything of the kind; and</td>

        <td id="LC3327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">although the rulers have this privilege, for a private man to lie to</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3329"></td>
        <td id="LC3329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or the pupil of a gymnasium not to speak the truth about his own bodily</td>

        <td id="L3330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3330"></td>
        <td id="LC3330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">illnesses to the physician or to the trainer, or for a sailor not to</td>

        <td id="L3331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3331"></td>

      <tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3372"></td>
        <td id="LC3372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impertinences which private individuals are supposed to address to their</td>

        <td id="L3373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3373"></td>
        <td id="LC3373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rulers, whether in verse or prose, are well or ill spoken?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3374"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3376"></td>
        <td id="LC3376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3377"></td>
        <td id="LC3377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They may very possibly afford some amusement, but they do not conduce</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3378"></td>
        <td id="LC3378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to temperance. And therefore they are likely to do harm to our young</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3468"></td>
        <td id="LC3468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than men--sentiments which, as we were saying, are neither pious nor</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3469"></td>
        <td id="LC3469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">true, for we have already proved that evil cannot come from the gods.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3470"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3471"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3473"></td>
        <td id="LC3473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And further they are likely to have a bad effect on those who hear them;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3474"></td>
        <td id="LC3474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for everybody will begin to excuse his own vices when he is convinced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3475"></td>
        <td id="LC3475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that similar wickednesses are always being perpetrated by--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3476"></td>
        <td id="LC3476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3477"></td>
        <td id="LC3477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;The kindred of the gods, the relatives of Zeus, whose ancestral altar,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3478"></td>
        <td id="LC3478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the altar of Zeus, is aloft in air on the peak of Ida,&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3479"></td>
        <td id="LC3479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3480"></td>
        <td id="LC3480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and who have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3481"></td>
        <td id="LC3481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3482"></td>
        <td id="LC3482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;the blood of deities yet flowing in their veins.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3483"></td>
        <td id="LC3483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3484"></td>
        <td id="LC3484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And therefore let us put an end to such tales, lest they engender laxity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3485"></td>
        <td id="LC3485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of morals among the young.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3486"></td>
        <td id="LC3486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3487"></td>
        <td id="LC3487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By all means, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3488"></td>
        <td id="LC3488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3489"></td>
        <td id="LC3489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But now that we are determining what classes of subjects are or are not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3490"></td>
        <td id="LC3490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be spoken of, let us see whether any have been omitted by us. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3491"></td>
        <td id="LC3491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner in which gods and demigods and heroes and the world below should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3492"></td>
        <td id="LC3492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be treated has been already laid down.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3493"></td>
        <td id="LC3493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3494"></td>
        <td id="LC3494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3495"></td>
        <td id="LC3495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3496"></td>
        <td id="LC3496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what shall we say about men? That is clearly the remaining portion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3497"></td>
        <td id="LC3497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of our subject.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3498"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3499"></td>
        <td id="LC3499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Clearly so.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3500"></td>
        <td id="LC3500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3501"></td>
        <td id="LC3501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But we are not in a condition to answer this question at present, my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3502"></td>
        <td id="LC3502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friend.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3504"></td>
        <td id="LC3504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why not?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3505"></td>
        <td id="LC3505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3506"></td>
        <td id="LC3506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Because, if I am not mistaken, we shall have to say that about men poets</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3507"></td>
        <td id="LC3507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and story-tellers are guilty of making the gravest misstatements when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3508"></td>
        <td id="LC3508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they tell us that wicked men are often happy, and the good miserable;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3509"></td>
        <td id="LC3509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that injustice is profitable when undetected, but that justice is a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3510"></td>
        <td id="LC3510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man&#39;s own loss and another&#39;s gain--these things we shall forbid them to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3511"></td>
        <td id="LC3511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">utter, and command them to sing and say the opposite.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3512"></td>
        <td id="LC3512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3513"></td>
        <td id="LC3513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To be sure we shall, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3514"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3515"></td>
        <td id="LC3515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But if you admit that I am right in this, then I shall maintain that you</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3516"></td>
        <td id="LC3516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have implied the principle for which we have been all along contending.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3517"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC3518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I grant the truth of your inference.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC3519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3520"></td>
        <td id="LC3520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That such things are or are not to be said about men is a question which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3521"></td>
        <td id="LC3521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we cannot determine until we have discovered what justice is, and how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3522"></td>
        <td id="LC3522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">naturally advantageous to the possessor, whether he seem to be just or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3523"></td>
        <td id="LC3523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3524"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3525"></td>
        <td id="LC3525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3526"></td>
        <td id="LC3526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3527"></td>
        <td id="LC3527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Enough of the subjects of poetry: let us now speak of the style; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3528"></td>
        <td id="LC3528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when this has been considered, both matter and manner will have been</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3529"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC3531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do not understand what you mean, said Adeimantus.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3533"></td>
        <td id="LC3533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then I must make you understand; and perhaps I may be more intelligible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3534"></td>
        <td id="LC3534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if I put the matter in this way. You are aware, I suppose, that all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3535"></td>
        <td id="LC3535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mythology and poetry is a narration of events, either past, present, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3536"></td>
        <td id="LC3536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to come?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3537"></td>
