</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3538"></td>
        <td id="LC3538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3539"></td>
        <td id="LC3539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3540"></td>
        <td id="LC3540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And narration may be either simple narration, or imitation, or a union</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3541"></td>
        <td id="LC3541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the two?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3542"></td>
        <td id="LC3542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3543"></td>
        <td id="LC3543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That again, he said, I do not quite understand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3544"></td>
        <td id="LC3544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3545"></td>
        <td id="LC3545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I fear that I must be a ridiculous teacher when I have so much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3546"></td>
        <td id="LC3546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difficulty in making myself apprehended. Like a bad speaker, therefore,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3547"></td>
        <td id="LC3547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will not take the whole of the subject, but will break a piece off in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3548"></td>
        <td id="LC3548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">illustration of my meaning. You know the first lines of the Iliad,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3549"></td>
        <td id="LC3549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in which the poet says that Chryses prayed Agamemnon to release his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3550"></td>
        <td id="LC3550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">daughter, and that Agamemnon flew into a passion with him; whereupon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3551"></td>
        <td id="LC3551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chryses, failing of his object, invoked the anger of the God against the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3552"></td>
        <td id="LC3552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Achaeans. Now as far as these lines,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3553"></td>
        <td id="LC3553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3554"></td>
        <td id="LC3554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;And he prayed all the Greeks, but especially the two sons of Atreus,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3555"></td>
        <td id="LC3555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the chiefs of the people,&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3556"></td>
        <td id="LC3556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3557"></td>
        <td id="LC3557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the poet is speaking in his own person; he never leads us to suppose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3558"></td>
        <td id="LC3558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he is any one else. But in what follows he takes the person of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3559"></td>
        <td id="LC3559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chryses, and then he does all that he can to make us believe that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3560"></td>
        <td id="LC3560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speaker is not Homer, but the aged priest himself. And in this double</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3561"></td>
        <td id="LC3561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">form he has cast the entire narrative of the events which occurred at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3562"></td>
        <td id="LC3562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Troy and in Ithaca and throughout the Odyssey.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3563"></td>
        <td id="LC3563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3564"></td>
        <td id="LC3564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3565"></td>
        <td id="LC3565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3566"></td>
        <td id="LC3566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And a narrative it remains both in the speeches which the poet recites</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3567"></td>
        <td id="LC3567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from time to time and in the intermediate passages?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3568"></td>
        <td id="LC3568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3569"></td>
        <td id="LC3569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quite true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3570"></td>
        <td id="LC3570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3571"></td>
        <td id="LC3571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But when the poet speaks in the person of another, may we not say that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3572"></td>
        <td id="LC3572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he assimilates his style to that of the person who, as he informs you,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3573"></td>
        <td id="LC3573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is going to speak?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3574"></td>
        <td id="LC3574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3575"></td>
        <td id="LC3575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3576"></td>
        <td id="LC3576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3577"></td>
        <td id="LC3577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And this assimilation of himself to another, either by the use of voice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3578"></td>
        <td id="LC3578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or gesture, is the imitation of the person whose character he assumes?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3579"></td>
        <td id="LC3579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3580"></td>
        <td id="LC3580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of course.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3581"></td>
        <td id="LC3581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3582"></td>
        <td id="LC3582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then in this case the narrative of the poet may be said to proceed by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3583"></td>
        <td id="LC3583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way of imitation?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3584"></td>
        <td id="LC3584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3585"></td>
        <td id="LC3585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3586"></td>
        <td id="LC3586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3587"></td>
        <td id="LC3587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Or, if the poet everywhere appears and never conceals himself, then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3588"></td>
        <td id="LC3588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again the imitation is dropped, and his poetry becomes simple narration.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3589"></td>
        <td id="LC3589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">However, in order that I may make my meaning quite clear, and that you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3590"></td>
        <td id="LC3590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may no more say, &#39;I don&#39;t understand,&#39; I will show how the change might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3591"></td>
        <td id="LC3591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be effected. If Homer had said, &#39;The priest came, having his daughter&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3592"></td>
        <td id="LC3592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ransom in his hands, supplicating the Achaeans, and above all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3593"></td>
        <td id="LC3593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kings;&#39; and then if, instead of speaking in the person of Chryses,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3594"></td>
        <td id="LC3594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he had continued in his own person, the words would have been, not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3595"></td>
        <td id="LC3595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imitation, but simple narration. The passage would have run as follows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3596"></td>
        <td id="LC3596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(I am no poet, and therefore I drop the metre), &#39;The priest came and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3597"></td>
        <td id="LC3597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prayed the gods on behalf of the Greeks that they might capture Troy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3598"></td>
        <td id="LC3598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and return safely home, but begged that they would give him back his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3599"></td>
        <td id="LC3599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">daughter, and take the ransom which he brought, and respect the God.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3600"></td>
        <td id="LC3600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thus he spoke, and the other Greeks revered the priest and assented. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3601"></td>
        <td id="LC3601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Agamemnon was wroth, and bade him depart and not come again, lest the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3602"></td>
        <td id="LC3602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">staff and chaplets of the God should be of no avail to him--the daughter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3603"></td>
        <td id="LC3603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Chryses should not be released, he said--she should grow old with him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3604"></td>
        <td id="LC3604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in Argos. And then he told him to go away and not to provoke him, if he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3605"></td>
        <td id="LC3605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intended to get home unscathed. And the old man went away in fear and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3606"></td>
        <td id="LC3606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silence, and, when he had left the camp, he called upon Apollo by his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3607"></td>
        <td id="LC3607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many names, reminding him of everything which he had done pleasing to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3608"></td>
        <td id="LC3608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, whether in building his temples, or in offering sacrifice, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3609"></td>
        <td id="LC3609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">praying that his good deeds might be returned to him, and that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3610"></td>
        <td id="LC3610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Achaeans might expiate his tears by the arrows of the god,&#39;--and so on.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3611"></td>
        <td id="LC3611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In this way the whole becomes simple narrative.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3612"></td>
        <td id="LC3612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3613"></td>
        <td id="LC3613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I understand, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3614"></td>
        <td id="LC3614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3615"></td>
        <td id="LC3615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Or you may suppose the opposite case--that the intermediate passages are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3616"></td>
        <td id="LC3616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">omitted, and the dialogue only left.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3617"></td>
        <td id="LC3617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3618"></td>
        <td id="LC3618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That also, he said, I understand; you mean, for example, as in tragedy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3619"></td>
        <td id="LC3619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3620"></td>
        <td id="LC3620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You have conceived my meaning perfectly; and if I mistake not, what you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3621"></td>
        <td id="LC3621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">failed to apprehend before is now made clear to you, that poetry and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3622"></td>
        <td id="LC3622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mythology are, in some cases, wholly imitative--instances of this are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3623"></td>
        <td id="LC3623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supplied by tragedy and comedy; there is likewise the opposite style,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3624"></td>
        <td id="LC3624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in which the poet is the only speaker--of this the dithyramb affords</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3625"></td>
        <td id="LC3625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the best example; and the combination of both is found in epic, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3626"></td>
        <td id="LC3626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several other styles of poetry. Do I take you with me?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3627"></td>
        <td id="LC3627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3628"></td>
        <td id="LC3628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said; I see now what you meant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3629"></td>
        <td id="LC3629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3630"></td>
        <td id="LC3630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will ask you to remember also what I began by saying, that we had done</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3631"></td>
        <td id="LC3631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the subject and might proceed to the style.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3632"></td>
        <td id="LC3632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3633"></td>
        <td id="LC3633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I remember.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3634"></td>
        <td id="LC3634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3635"></td>
        <td id="LC3635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In saying this, I intended to imply that we must come to an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3636"></td>
        <td id="LC3636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understanding about the mimetic art,--whether the poets, in narrating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3637"></td>
        <td id="LC3637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their stories, are to be allowed by us to imitate, and if so, whether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3638"></td>
        <td id="LC3638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in whole or in part, and if the latter, in what parts; or should all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3639"></td>
        <td id="LC3639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imitation be prohibited?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3640"></td>
        <td id="LC3640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3641"></td>
        <td id="LC3641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You mean, I suspect, to ask whether tragedy and comedy shall be admitted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3642"></td>
        <td id="LC3642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into our State?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3643"></td>
        <td id="LC3643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3644"></td>
        <td id="LC3644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said; but there may be more than this in question: I really do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3645"></td>
        <td id="LC3645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not know as yet, but whither the argument may blow, thither we go.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3646"></td>
        <td id="LC3646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3647"></td>
        <td id="LC3647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And go we will, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3648"></td>
        <td id="LC3648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3649"></td>
        <td id="LC3649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, Adeimantus, let me ask you whether our guardians ought to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3650"></td>
        <td id="LC3650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imitators; or rather, has not this question been decided by the rule</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3651"></td>
        <td id="LC3651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">already laid down that one man can only do one thing well, and not many;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3652"></td>
        <td id="LC3652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that if he attempt many, he will altogether fail of gaining much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3653"></td>
        <td id="LC3653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reputation in any?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3654"></td>
        <td id="LC3654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3655"></td>
        <td id="LC3655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3656"></td>
        <td id="LC3656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3657"></td>
        <td id="LC3657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And this is equally true of imitation; no one man can imitate many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3658"></td>
        <td id="LC3658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things as well as he would imitate a single one?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3659"></td>
        <td id="LC3659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3660"></td>
        <td id="LC3660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He cannot.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3661"></td>
        <td id="LC3661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3662"></td>
        <td id="LC3662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the same person will hardly be able to play a serious part in life,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3663"></td>
        <td id="LC3663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and at the same time to be an imitator and imitate many other parts as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3664"></td>
        <td id="LC3664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well; for even when two species of imitation are nearly allied, the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3665"></td>
        <td id="LC3665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persons cannot succeed in both, as, for example, the writers of tragedy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3666"></td>
        <td id="LC3666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and comedy--did you not just now call them imitations?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3667"></td>
        <td id="LC3667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3668"></td>
        <td id="LC3668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I did; and you are right in thinking that the same persons cannot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3669"></td>
        <td id="LC3669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">succeed in both.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3670"></td>
        <td id="LC3670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3671"></td>
        <td id="LC3671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Any more than they can be rhapsodists and actors at once?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3672"></td>
        <td id="LC3672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3673"></td>
        <td id="LC3673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3674"></td>
        <td id="LC3674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3675"></td>
        <td id="LC3675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither are comic and tragic actors the same; yet all these things are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3676"></td>
        <td id="LC3676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but imitations.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3677"></td>
        <td id="LC3677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3678"></td>
        <td id="LC3678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They are so.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3679"></td>
        <td id="LC3679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3680"></td>
        <td id="LC3680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And human nature, Adeimantus, appears to have been coined into yet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3681"></td>
        <td id="LC3681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smaller pieces, and to be as incapable of imitating many things well, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3682"></td>
        <td id="LC3682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of performing well the actions of which the imitations are copies.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3683"></td>
        <td id="LC3683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3684"></td>
        <td id="LC3684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quite true, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3685"></td>
        <td id="LC3685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3686"></td>
        <td id="LC3686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If then we adhere to our original notion and bear in mind that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3687"></td>
        <td id="LC3687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our guardians, setting aside every other business, are to dedicate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3688"></td>
        <td id="LC3688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves wholly to the maintenance of freedom in the State, making</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3689"></td>
        <td id="LC3689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this their craft, and engaging in no work which does not bear on this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3690"></td>
        <td id="LC3690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">end, they ought not to practise or imitate anything else; if they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3691"></td>
        <td id="LC3691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imitate at all, they should imitate from youth upward only those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3692"></td>
        <td id="LC3692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">characters which are suitable to their profession--the courageous,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3693"></td>
        <td id="LC3693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">temperate, holy, free, and the like; but they should not depict or be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3694"></td>
        <td id="LC3694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">skilful at imitating any kind of illiberality or baseness, lest from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3695"></td>
        <td id="LC3695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imitation they should come to be what they imitate. Did you never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3696"></td>
        <td id="LC3696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observe how imitations, beginning in early youth and continuing far into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3697"></td>
        <td id="LC3697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life, at length grow into habits and become a second nature, affecting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3698"></td>
        <td id="LC3698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body, voice, and mind?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3699"></td>
        <td id="LC3699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3700"></td>
        <td id="LC3700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, certainly, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3701"></td>
        <td id="LC3701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3702"></td>
        <td id="LC3702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, I said, we will not allow those for whom we profess a care and of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3703"></td>
        <td id="LC3703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom we say that they ought to be good men, to imitate a woman, whether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3704"></td>
        <td id="LC3704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young or old, quarrelling with her husband, or striving and vaunting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3705"></td>
        <td id="LC3705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against the gods in conceit of her happiness, or when she is in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3706"></td>
        <td id="LC3706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affliction, or sorrow, or weeping; and certainly not one who is in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3707"></td>
        <td id="LC3707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sickness, love, or labour.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3708"></td>
        <td id="LC3708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3709"></td>
        <td id="LC3709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very right, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3710"></td>
        <td id="LC3710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3711"></td>
        <td id="LC3711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither must they represent slaves, male or female, performing the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3712"></td>
        <td id="LC3712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">offices of slaves?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3713"></td>
        <td id="LC3713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3714"></td>
        <td id="LC3714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They must not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3715"></td>
        <td id="LC3715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3716"></td>
        <td id="LC3716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And surely not bad men, whether cowards or any others, who do the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3717"></td>
        <td id="LC3717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reverse of what we have just been prescribing, who scold or mock or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3718"></td>
        <td id="LC3718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">revile one another in drink or out of drink, or who in any other manner</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3719"></td>
        <td id="LC3719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sin against themselves and their neighbours in word or deed, as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3720"></td>
        <td id="LC3720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner of such is. Neither should they be trained to imitate the action</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3721"></td>
        <td id="LC3721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or speech of men or women who are mad or bad; for madness, like vice, is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3722"></td>
        <td id="LC3722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be known but not to be practised or imitated.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3723"></td>
        <td id="LC3723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3724"></td>
        <td id="LC3724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3725"></td>
        <td id="LC3725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3726"></td>
        <td id="LC3726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither may they imitate smiths or other artificers, or oarsmen, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3727"></td>
        <td id="LC3727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boatswains, or the like?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3728"></td>
        <td id="LC3728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3729"></td>
        <td id="LC3729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How can they, he said, when they are not allowed to apply their minds to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3730"></td>
        <td id="LC3730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the callings of any of these?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3731"></td>
        <td id="LC3731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3732"></td>
        <td id="LC3732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nor may they imitate the neighing of horses, the bellowing of bulls, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3733"></td>
        <td id="LC3733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">murmur of rivers and roll of the ocean, thunder, and all that sort of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3734"></td>
        <td id="LC3734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3735"></td>
        <td id="LC3735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3736"></td>
        <td id="LC3736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nay, he said, if madness be forbidden, neither may they copy the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3737"></td>
        <td id="LC3737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behaviour of madmen.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3738"></td>
        <td id="LC3738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3739"></td>
        <td id="LC3739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You mean, I said, if I understand you aright, that there is one sort of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3740"></td>
        <td id="LC3740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">narrative style which may be employed by a truly good man when he has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3741"></td>
        <td id="LC3741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything to say, and that another sort will be used by a man of an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3742"></td>
        <td id="LC3742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opposite character and education.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3743"></td>
        <td id="LC3743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3744"></td>
        <td id="LC3744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And which are these two sorts? he asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3745"></td>
        <td id="LC3745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3746"></td>
        <td id="LC3746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suppose, I answered, that a just and good man in the course of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3747"></td>
        <td id="LC3747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">narration comes on some saying or action of another good man,--I should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3748"></td>
        <td id="LC3748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imagine that he will like to personate him, and will not be ashamed of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3749"></td>
        <td id="LC3749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this sort of imitation: he will be most ready to play the part of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3750"></td>
        <td id="LC3750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good man when he is acting firmly and wisely; in a less degree when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3751"></td>
        <td id="LC3751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he is overtaken by illness or love or drink, or has met with any other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3752"></td>
        <td id="LC3752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disaster. But when he comes to a character which is unworthy of him, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3753"></td>
        <td id="LC3753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will not make a study of that; he will disdain such a person, and will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3754"></td>
        <td id="LC3754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assume his likeness, if at all, for a moment only when he is performing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3755"></td>
        <td id="LC3755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some good action; at other times he will be ashamed to play a part which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3756"></td>
        <td id="LC3756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he has never practised, nor will he like to fashion and frame himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3757"></td>
        <td id="LC3757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after the baser models; he feels the employment of such an art, unless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3758"></td>
        <td id="LC3758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in jest, to be beneath him, and his mind revolts at it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3759"></td>
        <td id="LC3759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3760"></td>
        <td id="LC3760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So I should expect, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3761"></td>
        <td id="LC3761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3762"></td>
        <td id="LC3762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then he will adopt a mode of narration such as we have illustrated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3763"></td>
        <td id="LC3763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of Homer, that is to say, his style will be both imitative and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3764"></td>
        <td id="LC3764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">narrative; but there will be very little of the former, and a great deal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3765"></td>
        <td id="LC3765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the latter. Do you agree?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3766"></td>
        <td id="LC3766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3767"></td>
        <td id="LC3767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, he said; that is the model which such a speaker must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3768"></td>
        <td id="LC3768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessarily take.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3769"></td>
        <td id="LC3769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3770"></td>
        <td id="LC3770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But there is another sort of character who will narrate anything, and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3771"></td>
        <td id="LC3771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the worse he is, the more unscrupulous he will be; nothing will be too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3772"></td>
        <td id="LC3772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bad for him: and he will be ready to imitate anything, not as a joke,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3773"></td>
        <td id="LC3773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but in right good earnest, and before a large company. As I was just now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3774"></td>
        <td id="LC3774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying, he will attempt to represent the roll of thunder, the noise of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3775"></td>
        <td id="LC3775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wind and hail, or the creaking of wheels, and pulleys, and the various</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3776"></td>
        <td id="LC3776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sounds of flutes, pipes, trumpets, and all sorts of instruments: he will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3777"></td>
        <td id="LC3777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bark like a dog, bleat like a sheep, or crow like a cock; his entire art</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3778"></td>
        <td id="LC3778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will consist in imitation of voice and gesture, and there will be very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3779"></td>
        <td id="LC3779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little narration.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3780"></td>
        <td id="LC3780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3781"></td>
        <td id="LC3781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That, he said, will be his mode of speaking.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3782"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3783"></td>
        <td id="LC3783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These, then, are the two kinds of style?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3784"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3785"></td>
        <td id="LC3785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3786"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3787"></td>
        <td id="LC3787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And you would agree with me in saying that one of them is simple and has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3788"></td>
        <td id="LC3788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but slight changes; and if the harmony and rhythm are also chosen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3789"></td>
        <td id="LC3789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for their simplicity, the result is that the speaker, if he speaks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3790"></td>
        <td id="LC3790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">correctly, is always pretty much the same in style, and he will keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3791"></td>
        <td id="LC3791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">within the limits of a single harmony (for the changes are not great),</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3792"></td>
        <td id="LC3792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and in like manner he will make use of nearly the same rhythm?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3793"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3794"></td>
        <td id="LC3794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is quite true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3795"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3796"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC3813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said, Adeimantus, but the mixed style is also very charming: and</td>

        <td id="L3814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3814"></td>

        <td id="L3815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3815"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L3826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3826"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3833"></td>
        <td id="LC3833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And therefore when any one of these pantomimic gentlemen, who are so</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3835"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allow them. And so when we have anointed him with myrrh, and set a</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For we mean to employ for our souls&#39; health the rougher and severer poet</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC3849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the matter and manner have both been discussed.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L3853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3853"></td>
        <td id="LC3853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Next in order will follow melody and song.</td>

        <td id="L3854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3854"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3856"></td>
        <td id="LC3856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3857"></td>
        <td id="LC3857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Every one can see already what we ought to say about them, if we are to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3858"></td>
        <td id="LC3858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be consistent with ourselves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3859"></td>
        <td id="LC3859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3860"></td>
        <td id="LC3860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I fear, said Glaucon, laughing, that the word &#39;every one&#39; hardly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3861"></td>
        <td id="LC3861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">includes me, for I cannot at the moment say what they should be; though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3862"></td>
        <td id="LC3862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I may guess.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3863"></td>
        <td id="LC3863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3864"></td>
        <td id="LC3864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At any rate you can tell that a song or ode has three parts--the words,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3865"></td>
        <td id="LC3865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the melody, and the rhythm; that degree of knowledge I may presuppose?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3866"></td>
        <td id="LC3866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3867"></td>
        <td id="LC3867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said; so much as that you may.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3868"></td>
        <td id="LC3868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3869"></td>
        <td id="LC3869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And as for the words, there will surely be no difference between words</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3870"></td>
        <td id="LC3870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which are and which are not set to music; both will conform to the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3871"></td>
        <td id="LC3871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laws, and these have been already determined by us?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3872"></td>
        <td id="LC3872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3873"></td>
        <td id="LC3873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3874"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3875"></td>
        <td id="LC3875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the melody and rhythm will depend upon the words?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3876"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3879"></td>
        <td id="LC3879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We were saying, when we spoke of the subject-matter, that we had no need</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3880"></td>
        <td id="LC3880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of lamentation and strains of sorrow?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3881"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3882"></td>
        <td id="LC3882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3884"></td>
        <td id="LC3884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And which are the harmonies expressive of sorrow? You are musical, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3885"></td>
        <td id="LC3885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can tell me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3886"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3887"></td>
        <td id="LC3887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The harmonies which you mean are the mixed or tenor Lydian, and the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC3888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">full-toned or bass Lydian, and such like.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3889"></td>
        <td id="LC3889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3890"></td>
        <td id="LC3890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These then, I said, must be banished; even to women who have a character</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3891"></td>
        <td id="LC3891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to maintain they are of no use, and much less to men.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3892"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3893"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3894"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3895"></td>
        <td id="LC3895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the next place, drunkenness and softness and indolence are utterly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3896"></td>
        <td id="LC3896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unbecoming the character of our guardians.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3897"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3898"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3899"></td>
        <td id="LC3899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3900"></td>
        <td id="LC3900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And which are the soft or drinking harmonies?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3901"></td>
        <td id="LC3901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3902"></td>
        <td id="LC3902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Ionian, he replied, and the Lydian; they are termed &#39;relaxed.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3903"></td>
        <td id="LC3903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3904"></td>
        <td id="LC3904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, and are these of any military use?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3905"></td>
        <td id="LC3905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3906"></td>
        <td id="LC3906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quite the reverse, he replied; and if so the Dorian and the Phrygian are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3907"></td>
        <td id="LC3907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the only ones which you have left.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3908"></td>
        <td id="LC3908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3909"></td>
        <td id="LC3909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I answered: Of the harmonies I know nothing, but I want to have one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3910"></td>
        <td id="LC3910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warlike, to sound the note or accent which a brave man utters in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3911"></td>
        <td id="LC3911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hour of danger and stern resolve, or when his cause is failing, and he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3912"></td>
        <td id="LC3912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is going to wounds or death or is overtaken by some other evil, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3913"></td>
        <td id="LC3913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at every such crisis meets the blows of fortune with firm step and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3914"></td>
        <td id="LC3914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">determination to endure; and another to be used by him in times of peace</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3915"></td>
        <td id="LC3915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and freedom of action, when there is no pressure of necessity, and he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3916"></td>
        <td id="LC3916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seeking to persuade God by prayer, or man by instruction and admonition,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3917"></td>
        <td id="LC3917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or on the other hand, when he is expressing his willingness to yield to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3918"></td>
        <td id="LC3918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persuasion or entreaty or admonition, and which represents him when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3919"></td>
        <td id="LC3919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by prudent conduct he has attained his end, not carried away by his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3920"></td>
        <td id="LC3920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">success, but acting moderately and wisely under the circumstances, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3921"></td>
        <td id="LC3921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquiescing in the event. These two harmonies I ask you to leave;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3922"></td>
        <td id="LC3922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the strain of necessity and the strain of freedom, the strain of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3923"></td>
        <td id="LC3923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unfortunate and the strain of the fortunate, the strain of courage, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3924"></td>
        <td id="LC3924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the strain of temperance; these, I say, leave.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3925"></td>
        <td id="LC3925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3926"></td>
        <td id="LC3926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And these, he replied, are the Dorian and Phrygian harmonies of which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3927"></td>
        <td id="LC3927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was just now speaking.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3928"></td>
        <td id="LC3928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3929"></td>
        <td id="LC3929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, I said, if these and these only are to be used in our songs and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3930"></td>
        <td id="LC3930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">melodies, we shall not want multiplicity of notes or a panharmonic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3931"></td>
        <td id="LC3931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scale?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3932"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3933"></td>
        <td id="LC3933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I suppose not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3934"></td>
        <td id="LC3934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3935"></td>
        <td id="LC3935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then we shall not maintain the artificers of lyres with three</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3936"></td>
        <td id="LC3936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corners and complex scales, or the makers of any other many-stringed</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3937"></td>
        <td id="LC3937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curiously-harmonised instruments?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3938"></td>
