</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3939"></td>
        <td id="LC3939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3940"></td>
        <td id="LC3940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3941"></td>
        <td id="LC3941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But what do you say to flute-makers and flute-players? Would you admit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3942"></td>
        <td id="LC3942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them into our State when you reflect that in this composite use of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3943"></td>
        <td id="LC3943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harmony the flute is worse than all the stringed instruments put</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3944"></td>
        <td id="LC3944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together; even the panharmonic music is only an imitation of the flute?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3945"></td>
        <td id="LC3945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3946"></td>
        <td id="LC3946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Clearly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3947"></td>
        <td id="LC3947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3948"></td>
        <td id="LC3948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There remain then only the lyre and the harp for use in the city, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3949"></td>
        <td id="LC3949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the shepherds may have a pipe in the country.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3950"></td>
        <td id="LC3950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3951"></td>
        <td id="LC3951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is surely the conclusion to be drawn from the argument.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3952"></td>
        <td id="LC3952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3953"></td>
        <td id="LC3953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The preferring of Apollo and his instruments to Marsyas and his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3954"></td>
        <td id="LC3954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instruments is not at all strange, I said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3955"></td>
        <td id="LC3955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3956"></td>
        <td id="LC3956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Not at all, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3957"></td>
        <td id="LC3957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3958"></td>
        <td id="LC3958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so, by the dog of Egypt, we have been unconsciously purging the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3959"></td>
        <td id="LC3959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">State, which not long ago we termed luxurious.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3960"></td>
        <td id="LC3960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3961"></td>
        <td id="LC3961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And we have done wisely, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3962"></td>
        <td id="LC3962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3963"></td>
        <td id="LC3963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then let us now finish the purgation, I said. Next in order to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3964"></td>
        <td id="LC3964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harmonies, rhythms will naturally follow, and they should be subject to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3965"></td>
        <td id="LC3965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same rules, for we ought not to seek out complex systems of metre,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3966"></td>
        <td id="LC3966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or metres of every kind, but rather to discover what rhythms are the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3967"></td>
        <td id="LC3967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expressions of a courageous and harmonious life; and when we have found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3968"></td>
        <td id="LC3968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, we shall adapt the foot and the melody to words having a like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3969"></td>
        <td id="LC3969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spirit, not the words to the foot and melody. To say what these rhythms</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3970"></td>
        <td id="LC3970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are will be your duty--you must teach me them, as you have already</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3971"></td>
        <td id="LC3971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taught me the harmonies.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3972"></td>
        <td id="LC3972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3973"></td>
        <td id="LC3973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, indeed, he replied, I cannot tell you. I only know that there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3974"></td>
        <td id="LC3974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are some three principles of rhythm out of which metrical systems are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3975"></td>
        <td id="LC3975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">framed, just as in sounds there are four notes (i.e. the four notes of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3976"></td>
        <td id="LC3976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the tetrachord.) out of which all the harmonies are composed; that is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3977"></td>
        <td id="LC3977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an observation which I have made. But of what sort of lives they are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3978"></td>
        <td id="LC3978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">severally the imitations I am unable to say.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3979"></td>
        <td id="LC3979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3980"></td>
        <td id="LC3980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, I said, we must take Damon into our counsels; and he will tell us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3981"></td>
        <td id="LC3981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what rhythms are expressive of meanness, or insolence, or fury, or other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3982"></td>
        <td id="LC3982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unworthiness, and what are to be reserved for the expression of opposite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3983"></td>
        <td id="LC3983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feelings. And I think that I have an indistinct recollection of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3984"></td>
        <td id="LC3984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mentioning a complex Cretic rhythm; also a dactylic or heroic, and he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3985"></td>
        <td id="LC3985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arranged them in some manner which I do not quite understand, making</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3986"></td>
        <td id="LC3986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rhythms equal in the rise and fall of the foot, long and short</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3987"></td>
        <td id="LC3987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alternating; and, unless I am mistaken, he spoke of an iambic as well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3988"></td>
        <td id="LC3988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as of a trochaic rhythm, and assigned to them short and long quantities.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3989"></td>
        <td id="LC3989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Also in some cases he appeared to praise or censure the movement of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3990"></td>
        <td id="LC3990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foot quite as much as the rhythm; or perhaps a combination of the two;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3991"></td>
        <td id="LC3991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for I am not certain what he meant. These matters, however, as I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3992"></td>
        <td id="LC3992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying, had better be referred to Damon himself, for the analysis of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3993"></td>
        <td id="LC3993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the subject would be difficult, you know? (Socrates expresses himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3994"></td>
        <td id="LC3994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carelessly in accordance with his assumed ignorance of the details of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3995"></td>
        <td id="LC3995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the subject. In the first part of the sentence he appears to be speaking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3996"></td>
        <td id="LC3996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of paeonic rhythms which are in the ratio of 3/2; in the second part, of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3997"></td>
        <td id="LC3997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dactylic and anapaestic rhythms, which are in the ratio of 1/1; in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3998"></td>
        <td id="LC3998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last clause, of iambic and trochaic rhythms, which are in the ratio of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3999"></td>
        <td id="LC3999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">1/2 or 2/1.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4000"></td>
        <td id="LC4000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4001"></td>
        <td id="LC4001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Rather so, I should say.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4002"></td>
        <td id="LC4002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4003"></td>
        <td id="LC4003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But there is no difficulty in seeing that grace or the absence of grace</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4004"></td>
        <td id="LC4004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is an effect of good or bad rhythm.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4005"></td>
        <td id="LC4005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4006"></td>
        <td id="LC4006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">None at all.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4007"></td>
        <td id="LC4007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4008"></td>
        <td id="LC4008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And also that good and bad rhythm naturally assimilate to a good and bad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4009"></td>
        <td id="LC4009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">style; and that harmony and discord in like manner follow style; for our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4010"></td>
        <td id="LC4010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">principle is that rhythm and harmony are regulated by the words, and not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4011"></td>
        <td id="LC4011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the words by them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4012"></td>
        <td id="LC4012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4013"></td>
        <td id="LC4013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just so, he said, they should follow the words.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4014"></td>
        <td id="LC4014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4015"></td>
        <td id="LC4015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And will not the words and the character of the style depend on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4016"></td>
        <td id="LC4016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">temper of the soul?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4017"></td>
        <td id="LC4017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4018"></td>
        <td id="LC4018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4019"></td>
        <td id="LC4019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4020"></td>
        <td id="LC4020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And everything else on the style?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4021"></td>
        <td id="LC4021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4022"></td>
        <td id="LC4022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4023"></td>
        <td id="LC4023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4024"></td>
        <td id="LC4024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then beauty of style and harmony and grace and good rhythm depend on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4025"></td>
        <td id="LC4025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">simplicity,--I mean the true simplicity of a rightly and nobly ordered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4026"></td>
        <td id="LC4026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind and character, not that other simplicity which is only an euphemism</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4027"></td>
        <td id="LC4027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for folly?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4028"></td>
        <td id="LC4028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4029"></td>
        <td id="LC4029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4030"></td>
        <td id="LC4030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4031"></td>
        <td id="LC4031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And if our youth are to do their work in life, must they not make these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4032"></td>
        <td id="LC4032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">graces and harmonies their perpetual aim?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4033"></td>
        <td id="LC4033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4034"></td>
        <td id="LC4034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They must.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4035"></td>
        <td id="LC4035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4036"></td>
        <td id="LC4036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And surely the art of the painter and every other creative and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4037"></td>
        <td id="LC4037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constructive art are full of them,--weaving, embroidery, architecture,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4038"></td>
        <td id="LC4038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and every kind of manufacture; also nature, animal and vegetable,--in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4039"></td>
        <td id="LC4039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all of them there is grace or the absence of grace. And ugliness and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4040"></td>
        <td id="LC4040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discord and inharmonious motion are nearly allied to ill words and ill</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4041"></td>
        <td id="LC4041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature, as grace and harmony are the twin sisters of goodness and virtue</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4042"></td>
        <td id="LC4042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and bear their likeness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4043"></td>
        <td id="LC4043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4044"></td>
        <td id="LC4044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is quite true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4045"></td>
        <td id="LC4045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4046"></td>
        <td id="LC4046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But shall our superintendence go no further, and are the poets only to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4047"></td>
        <td id="LC4047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be required by us to express the image of the good in their works, on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4048"></td>
        <td id="LC4048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pain, if they do anything else, of expulsion from our State? Or is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4049"></td>
        <td id="LC4049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same control to be extended to other artists, and are they also to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4050"></td>
        <td id="LC4050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prohibited from exhibiting the opposite forms of vice and intemperance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4051"></td>
        <td id="LC4051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and meanness and indecency in sculpture and building and the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4052"></td>
        <td id="LC4052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creative arts; and is he who cannot conform to this rule of ours to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4053"></td>
        <td id="LC4053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prevented from practising his art in our State, lest the taste of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4054"></td>
        <td id="LC4054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">citizens be corrupted by him? We would not have our guardians grow up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4055"></td>
        <td id="LC4055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amid images of moral deformity, as in some noxious pasture, and there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4056"></td>
        <td id="LC4056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">browse and feed upon many a baneful herb and flower day by day, little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4057"></td>
        <td id="LC4057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by little, until they silently gather a festering mass of corruption</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4058"></td>
        <td id="LC4058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in their own soul. Let our artists rather be those who are gifted to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4059"></td>
        <td id="LC4059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discern the true nature of the beautiful and graceful; then will our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4060"></td>
        <td id="LC4060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">youth dwell in a land of health, amid fair sights and sounds, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4061"></td>
        <td id="LC4061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">receive the good in everything; and beauty, the effluence of fair works,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4062"></td>
        <td id="LC4062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall flow into the eye and ear, like a health-giving breeze from a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4063"></td>
        <td id="LC4063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purer region, and insensibly draw the soul from earliest years into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4064"></td>
        <td id="LC4064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">likeness and sympathy with the beauty of reason.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4065"></td>
        <td id="LC4065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4066"></td>
        <td id="LC4066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There can be no nobler training than that, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4067"></td>
        <td id="LC4067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4068"></td>
        <td id="LC4068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And therefore, I said, Glaucon, musical training is a more potent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4069"></td>
        <td id="LC4069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instrument than any other, because rhythm and harmony find their way</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4070"></td>
        <td id="LC4070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the inward places of the soul, on which they mightily fasten,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4071"></td>
        <td id="LC4071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imparting grace, and making the soul of him who is rightly educated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4072"></td>
        <td id="LC4072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">graceful, or of him who is ill-educated ungraceful; and also because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4073"></td>
        <td id="LC4073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he who has received this true education of the inner being will most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4074"></td>
        <td id="LC4074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shrewdly perceive omissions or faults in art and nature, and with a true</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4075"></td>
        <td id="LC4075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taste, while he praises and rejoices over and receives into his soul the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4076"></td>
        <td id="LC4076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good, and becomes noble and good, he will justly blame and hate the bad,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4077"></td>
        <td id="LC4077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now in the days of his youth, even before he is able to know the reason</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4078"></td>
        <td id="LC4078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">why; and when reason comes he will recognise and salute the friend with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4079"></td>
        <td id="LC4079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom his education has made him long familiar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4080"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4081"></td>
        <td id="LC4081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, I quite agree with you in thinking that our youth should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4082"></td>
        <td id="LC4082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be trained in music and on the grounds which you mention.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4083"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4084"></td>
        <td id="LC4084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just as in learning to read, I said, we were satisfied when we knew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4085"></td>
        <td id="LC4085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the letters of the alphabet, which are very few, in all their recurring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4086"></td>
        <td id="LC4086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sizes and combinations; not slighting them as unimportant whether they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4087"></td>
        <td id="LC4087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occupy a space large or small, but everywhere eager to make them out;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4088"></td>
        <td id="LC4088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and not thinking ourselves perfect in the art of reading until we</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4089"></td>
        <td id="LC4089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recognise them wherever they are found:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4090"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4091"></td>
        <td id="LC4091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4092"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4093"></td>
        <td id="LC4093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Or, as we recognise the reflection of letters in the water, or in a</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4094"></td>
        <td id="LC4094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mirror, only when we know the letters themselves; the same art and study</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4095"></td>
        <td id="LC4095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">giving us the knowledge of both:</td>

</td>

        <td id="L4097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4097"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4098"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4099"></td>
        <td id="LC4099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Even so, as I maintain, neither we nor our guardians, whom we have to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4100"></td>
        <td id="LC4100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">educate, can ever become musical until we and they know the essential</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4101"></td>
        <td id="LC4101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forms of temperance, courage, liberality, magnificence, and their</td>

        <td id="L4102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4102"></td>
        <td id="LC4102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kindred, as well as the contrary forms, in all their combinations,</td>

        <td id="L4103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4103"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4110"></td>
        <td id="LC4110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are cast in one mould, that will be the fairest of sights to him who has</td>

        <td id="L4111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4111"></td>
        <td id="LC4111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an eye to see it?</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC4115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the fairest is also the loveliest?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4116"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4117"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4118"></td>
        <td id="LC4118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4119"></td>
        <td id="LC4119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the man who has the spirit of harmony will be most in love with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4120"></td>
        <td id="LC4120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">loveliest; but he will not love him who is of an inharmonious soul?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4121"></td>
        <td id="LC4121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4122"></td>
        <td id="LC4122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is true, he replied, if the deficiency be in his soul; but if there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4123"></td>
        <td id="LC4123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be any merely bodily defect in another he will be patient of it, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4124"></td>
        <td id="LC4124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will love all the same.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4125"></td>
        <td id="LC4125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4126"></td>
        <td id="LC4126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I perceive, I said, that you have or have had experiences of this sort,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4127"></td>
        <td id="LC4127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I agree. But let me ask you another question: Has excess of pleasure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4128"></td>
        <td id="LC4128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any affinity to temperance?</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4129"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4130"></td>
        <td id="LC4130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How can that be? he replied; pleasure deprives a man of the use of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4131"></td>
        <td id="LC4131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faculties quite as much as pain.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4132"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4133"></td>
        <td id="LC4133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Or any affinity to virtue in general?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4134"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4137"></td>
        <td id="LC4137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Any affinity to wantonness and intemperance?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4138"></td>
        <td id="LC4138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4139"></td>
        <td id="LC4139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, the greatest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4140"></td>
        <td id="LC4140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4141"></td>
        <td id="LC4141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is there any greater or keener pleasure than that of sensual love?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4142"></td>
        <td id="LC4142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4143"></td>
        <td id="LC4143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No, nor a madder.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4144"></td>
        <td id="LC4144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4145"></td>
        <td id="LC4145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whereas true love is a love of beauty and order--temperate and</td>
      </tr>
