      <tr>
        <td id="L4338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4338"></td>
        <td id="LC4338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the world.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4339"></td>
        <td id="LC4339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4340"></td>
        <td id="LC4340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How was that? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4341"></td>
        <td id="LC4341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4342"></td>
        <td id="LC4342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By the invention of lingering death; for he had a mortal disease which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4343"></td>
        <td id="LC4343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he perpetually tended, and as recovery was out of the question, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4344"></td>
        <td id="LC4344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed his entire life as a valetudinarian; he could do nothing but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4345"></td>
        <td id="LC4345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attend upon himself, and he was in constant torment whenever he departed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4346"></td>
        <td id="LC4346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in anything from his usual regimen, and so dying hard, by the help of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4347"></td>
        <td id="LC4347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">science he struggled on to old age.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4348"></td>
        <td id="LC4348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4349"></td>
        <td id="LC4349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A rare reward of his skill!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4350"></td>
        <td id="LC4350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4351"></td>
        <td id="LC4351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said; a reward which a man might fairly expect who never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4352"></td>
        <td id="LC4352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understood that, if Asclepius did not instruct his descendants</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4353"></td>
        <td id="LC4353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in valetudinarian arts, the omission arose, not from ignorance or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4354"></td>
        <td id="LC4354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inexperience of such a branch of medicine, but because he knew that in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4355"></td>
        <td id="LC4355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all well-ordered states every individual has an occupation to which he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4356"></td>
        <td id="LC4356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must attend, and has therefore no leisure to spend in continually being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4357"></td>
        <td id="LC4357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ill. This we remark in the case of the artisan, but, ludicrously enough,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4358"></td>
        <td id="LC4358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do not apply the same rule to people of the richer sort.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4359"></td>
        <td id="LC4359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4360"></td>
        <td id="LC4360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How do you mean? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4361"></td>
        <td id="LC4361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4362"></td>
        <td id="LC4362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I mean this: When a carpenter is ill he asks the physician for a rough</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4363"></td>
        <td id="LC4363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and ready cure; an emetic or a purge or a cautery or the knife,--these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4364"></td>
        <td id="LC4364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are his remedies. And if some one prescribes for him a course of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4365"></td>
        <td id="LC4365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dietetics, and tells him that he must swathe and swaddle his head, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4366"></td>
        <td id="LC4366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all that sort of thing, he replies at once that he has no time to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4367"></td>
        <td id="LC4367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ill, and that he sees no good in a life which is spent in nursing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4368"></td>
        <td id="LC4368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his disease to the neglect of his customary employment; and therefore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4369"></td>
        <td id="LC4369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bidding good-bye to this sort of physician, he resumes his ordinary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4370"></td>
        <td id="LC4370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">habits, and either gets well and lives and does his business, or, if his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4371"></td>
        <td id="LC4371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constitution fails, he dies and has no more trouble.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4372"></td>
        <td id="LC4372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4373"></td>
        <td id="LC4373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, and a man in his condition of life ought to use the art of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4374"></td>
        <td id="LC4374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">medicine thus far only.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4375"></td>
        <td id="LC4375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4376"></td>
        <td id="LC4376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Has he not, I said, an occupation; and what profit would there be in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4377"></td>
        <td id="LC4377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life if he were deprived of his occupation?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4378"></td>
        <td id="LC4378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4379"></td>
        <td id="LC4379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quite true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4380"></td>
        <td id="LC4380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4381"></td>
        <td id="LC4381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But with the rich man this is otherwise; of him we do not say that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4382"></td>
        <td id="LC4382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has any specially appointed work which he must perform, if he would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4383"></td>
        <td id="LC4383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">live.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4384"></td>
        <td id="LC4384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4385"></td>
        <td id="LC4385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He is generally supposed to have nothing to do.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4386"></td>
        <td id="LC4386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4387"></td>
        <td id="LC4387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then you never heard of the saying of Phocylides, that as soon as a man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4388"></td>
        <td id="LC4388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has a livelihood he should practise virtue?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4389"></td>
        <td id="LC4389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4390"></td>
        <td id="LC4390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nay, he said, I think that he had better begin somewhat sooner.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4391"></td>
        <td id="LC4391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4392"></td>
        <td id="LC4392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let us not have a dispute with him about this, I said; but rather ask</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4393"></td>
        <td id="LC4393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ourselves: Is the practice of virtue obligatory on the rich man, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4394"></td>
        <td id="LC4394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can he live without it? And if obligatory on him, then let us raise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4395"></td>
        <td id="LC4395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a further question, whether this dieting of disorders, which is an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4396"></td>
        <td id="LC4396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impediment to the application of the mind in carpentering and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4397"></td>
        <td id="LC4397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mechanical arts, does not equally stand in the way of the sentiment of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4398"></td>
        <td id="LC4398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Phocylides?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4399"></td>
        <td id="LC4399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4400"></td>
        <td id="LC4400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of that, he replied, there can be no doubt; such excessive care of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4401"></td>
        <td id="LC4401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body, when carried beyond the rules of gymnastic, is most inimical to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4402"></td>
        <td id="LC4402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the practice of virtue.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4403"></td>
        <td id="LC4403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4404"></td>
        <td id="LC4404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, indeed, I replied, and equally incompatible with the management of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4405"></td>
        <td id="LC4405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a house, an army, or an office of state; and, what is most important</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4406"></td>
        <td id="LC4406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of all, irreconcileable with any kind of study or thought or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4407"></td>
        <td id="LC4407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">self-reflection--there is a constant suspicion that headache and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4408"></td>
        <td id="LC4408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">giddiness are to be ascribed to philosophy, and hence all practising or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4409"></td>
        <td id="LC4409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">making trial of virtue in the higher sense is absolutely stopped; for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4410"></td>
        <td id="LC4410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a man is always fancying that he is being made ill, and is in constant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4411"></td>
        <td id="LC4411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anxiety about the state of his body.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4412"></td>
        <td id="LC4412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4413"></td>
        <td id="LC4413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, likely enough.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4414"></td>
        <td id="LC4414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4415"></td>
        <td id="LC4415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And therefore our politic Asclepius may be supposed to have exhibited</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4416"></td>
        <td id="LC4416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the power of his art only to persons who, being generally of healthy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4417"></td>
        <td id="LC4417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constitution and habits of life, had a definite ailment; such as these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4418"></td>
        <td id="LC4418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he cured by purges and operations, and bade them live as usual, herein</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4419"></td>
        <td id="LC4419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consulting the interests of the State; but bodies which disease had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4420"></td>
        <td id="LC4420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">penetrated through and through he would not have attempted to cure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4421"></td>
        <td id="LC4421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by gradual processes of evacuation and infusion: he did not want to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4422"></td>
        <td id="LC4422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lengthen out good-for-nothing lives, or to have weak fathers begetting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4423"></td>
        <td id="LC4423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weaker sons;--if a man was not able to live in the ordinary way he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4424"></td>
        <td id="LC4424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had no business to cure him; for such a cure would have been of no use</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4425"></td>
        <td id="LC4425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either to himself, or to the State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4426"></td>
        <td id="LC4426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4427"></td>
        <td id="LC4427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, he said, you regard Asclepius as a statesman.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4428"></td>
        <td id="LC4428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4429"></td>
        <td id="LC4429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Clearly; and his character is further illustrated by his sons. Note that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4430"></td>
        <td id="LC4430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were heroes in the days of old and practised the medicines of which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4431"></td>
        <td id="LC4431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am speaking at the siege of Troy: You will remember how, when Pandarus</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4432"></td>
        <td id="LC4432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wounded Menelaus, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4433"></td>
        <td id="LC4433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4434"></td>
        <td id="LC4434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Sucked the blood out of the wound, and sprinkled soothing remedies,&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4435"></td>
        <td id="LC4435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4436"></td>
        <td id="LC4436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but they never prescribed what the patient was afterwards to eat or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4437"></td>
        <td id="LC4437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drink in the case of Menelaus, any more than in the case of Eurypylus;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4438"></td>
        <td id="LC4438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the remedies, as they conceived, were enough to heal any man who before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4439"></td>
        <td id="LC4439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was wounded was healthy and regular in his habits; and even though he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4440"></td>
        <td id="LC4440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did happen to drink a posset of Pramnian wine, he might get well all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4441"></td>
        <td id="LC4441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same. But they would have nothing to do with unhealthy and intemperate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4442"></td>
        <td id="LC4442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subjects, whose lives were of no use either to themselves or others; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4443"></td>
        <td id="LC4443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">art of medicine was not designed for their good, and though they were as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4444"></td>
        <td id="LC4444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rich as Midas, the sons of Asclepius would have declined to attend them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4445"></td>
        <td id="LC4445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4446"></td>
        <td id="LC4446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They were very acute persons, those sons of Asclepius.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4447"></td>
        <td id="LC4447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4448"></td>
        <td id="LC4448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Naturally so, I replied. Nevertheless, the tragedians and Pindar</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4449"></td>
        <td id="LC4449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disobeying our behests, although they acknowledge that Asclepius was the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4450"></td>
        <td id="LC4450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">son of Apollo, say also that he was bribed into healing a rich man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4451"></td>
        <td id="LC4451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who was at the point of death, and for this reason he was struck by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4452"></td>
        <td id="LC4452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lightning. But we, in accordance with the principle already affirmed by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4453"></td>
        <td id="LC4453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us, will not believe them when they tell us both;--if he was the son of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4454"></td>
        <td id="LC4454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a god, we maintain that he was not avaricious; or, if he was avaricious,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4455"></td>
        <td id="LC4455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was not the son of a god.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4456"></td>
        <td id="LC4456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4457"></td>
        <td id="LC4457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All that, Socrates, is excellent; but I should like to put a question to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4458"></td>
        <td id="LC4458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you: Ought there not to be good physicians in a State, and are not the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4459"></td>
        <td id="LC4459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">best those who have treated the greatest number of constitutions good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4460"></td>
        <td id="LC4460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and bad? and are not the best judges in like manner those who are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4461"></td>
        <td id="LC4461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquainted with all sorts of moral natures?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4462"></td>
        <td id="LC4462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4463"></td>
        <td id="LC4463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said, I too would have good judges and good physicians. But do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4464"></td>
        <td id="LC4464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you know whom I think good?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4465"></td>
        <td id="LC4465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4466"></td>
        <td id="LC4466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Will you tell me?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4467"></td>
        <td id="LC4467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4468"></td>
        <td id="LC4468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will, if I can. Let me however note that in the same question you join</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4469"></td>
        <td id="LC4469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two things which are not the same.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4470"></td>
        <td id="LC4470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4471"></td>
        <td id="LC4471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How so? he asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4472"></td>
        <td id="LC4472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4473"></td>
        <td id="LC4473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, I said, you join physicians and judges. Now the most skilful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4474"></td>
        <td id="LC4474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">physicians are those who, from their youth upwards, have combined with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4475"></td>
        <td id="LC4475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the knowledge of their art the greatest experience of disease; they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4476"></td>
        <td id="LC4476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had better not be robust in health, and should have had all manner of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4477"></td>
        <td id="LC4477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">diseases in their own persons. For the body, as I conceive, is not the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4478"></td>
        <td id="LC4478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instrument with which they cure the body; in that case we could not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4479"></td>
        <td id="LC4479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allow them ever to be or to have been sickly; but they cure the body</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4480"></td>
        <td id="LC4480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the mind, and the mind which has become and is sick can cure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4481"></td>
        <td id="LC4481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4482"></td>
        <td id="LC4482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4483"></td>
        <td id="LC4483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is very true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4484"></td>
        <td id="LC4484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4485"></td>
        <td id="LC4485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But with the judge it is otherwise; since he governs mind by mind; he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4486"></td>
        <td id="LC4486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ought not therefore to have been trained among vicious minds, and to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4487"></td>
        <td id="LC4487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have associated with them from youth upwards, and to have gone through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4488"></td>
        <td id="LC4488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the whole calendar of crime, only in order that he may quickly infer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4489"></td>
        <td id="LC4489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the crimes of others as he might their bodily diseases from his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4490"></td>
        <td id="LC4490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">self-consciousness; the honourable mind which is to form a healthy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4491"></td>
        <td id="LC4491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judgment should have had no experience or contamination of evil habits</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4492"></td>
        <td id="LC4492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when young. And this is the reason why in youth good men often appear to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4493"></td>
        <td id="LC4493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be simple, and are easily practised upon by the dishonest, because they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4494"></td>
        <td id="LC4494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have no examples of what evil is in their own souls.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4495"></td>
        <td id="LC4495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4496"></td>
        <td id="LC4496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, they are far too apt to be deceived.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4497"></td>
        <td id="LC4497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4498"></td>
        <td id="LC4498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Therefore, I said, the judge should not be young; he should have learned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4499"></td>
        <td id="LC4499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to know evil, not from his own soul, but from late and long observation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4500"></td>
        <td id="LC4500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the nature of evil in others: knowledge should be his guide, not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4501"></td>
        <td id="LC4501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">personal experience.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4502"></td>
        <td id="LC4502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4503"></td>
        <td id="LC4503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, that is the ideal of a judge.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4504"></td>
        <td id="LC4504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4505"></td>
        <td id="LC4505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I replied, and he will be a good man (which is my answer to your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4506"></td>
        <td id="LC4506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">question); for he is good who has a good soul. But the cunning and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4507"></td>
        <td id="LC4507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suspicious nature of which we spoke,--he who has committed many crimes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4508"></td>
        <td id="LC4508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and fancies himself to be a master in wickedness, when he is amongst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4509"></td>
        <td id="LC4509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his fellows, is wonderful in the precautions which he takes, because he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4510"></td>
        <td id="LC4510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judges of them by himself: but when he gets into the company of men of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4511"></td>
        <td id="LC4511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">virtue, who have the experience of age, he appears to be a fool again,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4512"></td>
        <td id="LC4512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">owing to his unseasonable suspicions; he cannot recognise an honest man,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4513"></td>
        <td id="LC4513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because he has no pattern of honesty in himself; at the same time, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4514"></td>
        <td id="LC4514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bad are more numerous than the good, and he meets with them oftener,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4515"></td>
        <td id="LC4515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he thinks himself, and is by others thought to be, rather wise than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4516"></td>
        <td id="LC4516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foolish.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4517"></td>
        <td id="LC4517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4518"></td>
        <td id="LC4518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4519"></td>
        <td id="LC4519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4520"></td>
        <td id="LC4520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the good and wise judge whom we are seeking is not this man, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4521"></td>
        <td id="LC4521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other; for vice cannot know virtue too, but a virtuous nature,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4522"></td>
        <td id="LC4522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">educated by time, will acquire a knowledge both of virtue and vice: the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4523"></td>
        <td id="LC4523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">virtuous, and not the vicious, man has wisdom--in my opinion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4524"></td>
        <td id="LC4524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4525"></td>
        <td id="LC4525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And in mine also.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4526"></td>
        <td id="LC4526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4527"></td>
        <td id="LC4527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This is the sort of medicine, and this is the sort of law, which you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4528"></td>
        <td id="LC4528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will sanction in your state. They will minister to better natures,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4529"></td>
        <td id="LC4529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">giving health both of soul and of body; but those who are diseased in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4530"></td>
        <td id="LC4530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their bodies they will leave to die, and the corrupt and incurable souls</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4531"></td>
        <td id="LC4531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they will put an end to themselves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4532"></td>
        <td id="LC4532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4533"></td>
        <td id="LC4533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is clearly the best thing both for the patients and for the State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4534"></td>
        <td id="LC4534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4535"></td>
        <td id="LC4535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And thus our youth, having been educated only in that simple music</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4536"></td>
        <td id="LC4536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which, as we said, inspires temperance, will be reluctant to go to law.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4537"></td>
        <td id="LC4537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4538"></td>
        <td id="LC4538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Clearly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4539"></td>
        <td id="LC4539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4540"></td>
        <td id="LC4540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the musician, who, keeping to the same track, is content to practise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4541"></td>
        <td id="LC4541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the simple gymnastic, will have nothing to do with medicine unless in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4542"></td>
        <td id="LC4542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some extreme case.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4543"></td>
        <td id="LC4543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4544"></td>
        <td id="LC4544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That I quite believe.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4545"></td>
        <td id="LC4545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4546"></td>
        <td id="LC4546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The very exercises and tolls which he undergoes are intended to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4547"></td>
        <td id="LC4547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stimulate the spirited element of his nature, and not to increase his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4548"></td>
        <td id="LC4548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strength; he will not, like common athletes, use exercise and regimen to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4549"></td>
        <td id="LC4549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">develope his muscles.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4550"></td>
        <td id="LC4550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4551"></td>
        <td id="LC4551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very right, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4552"></td>
        <td id="LC4552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4553"></td>
        <td id="LC4553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither are the two arts of music and gymnastic really designed, as is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4554"></td>
        <td id="LC4554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">often supposed, the one for the training of the soul, the other for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4555"></td>
        <td id="LC4555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">training of the body.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L4557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4557"></td>
        <td id="LC4557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What then is the real object of them?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4558"></td>
        <td id="LC4558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4559"></td>
        <td id="LC4559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I believe, I said, that the teachers of both have in view chiefly the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4560"></td>
        <td id="LC4560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">improvement of the soul.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4562"></td>
        <td id="LC4562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How can that be? he asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4563"></td>
        <td id="LC4563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4564"></td>
        <td id="LC4564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Did you never observe, I said, the effect on the mind itself of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4565"></td>
        <td id="LC4565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exclusive devotion to gymnastic, or the opposite effect of an exclusive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4566"></td>
        <td id="LC4566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">devotion to music?</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4567"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4568"></td>
        <td id="LC4568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In what way shown? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4569"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4570"></td>
        <td id="LC4570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The one producing a temper of hardness and ferocity, the other of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4571"></td>
        <td id="LC4571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">softness and effeminacy, I replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4572"></td>
        <td id="LC4572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4573"></td>
        <td id="LC4573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, I am quite aware that the mere athlete becomes too much of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4574"></td>
        <td id="LC4574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a savage, and that the mere musician is melted and softened beyond what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4575"></td>
        <td id="LC4575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is good for him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4576"></td>
        <td id="LC4576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4577"></td>
        <td id="LC4577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yet surely, I said, this ferocity only comes from spirit, which, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4578"></td>
        <td id="LC4578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rightly educated, would give courage, but, if too much intensified, is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4579"></td>
        <td id="LC4579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">liable to become hard and brutal.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4580"></td>
        <td id="LC4580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4581"></td>
        <td id="LC4581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That I quite think.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4582"></td>
        <td id="LC4582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4583"></td>
        <td id="LC4583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On the other hand the philosopher will have the quality of gentleness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4584"></td>
        <td id="LC4584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And this also, when too much indulged, will turn to softness, but, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4585"></td>
        <td id="LC4585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">educated rightly, will be gentle and moderate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4586"></td>
        <td id="LC4586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4587"></td>
        <td id="LC4587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4588"></td>
        <td id="LC4588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4589"></td>
        <td id="LC4589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And in our opinion the guardians ought to have both these qualities?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4590"></td>
        <td id="LC4590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L4591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4591"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC4593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And both should be in harmony?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4594"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4597"></td>
        <td id="LC4597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the harmonious soul is both temperate and courageous?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4598"></td>
        <td id="LC4598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4599"></td>
        <td id="LC4599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4600"></td>
        <td id="LC4600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4601"></td>
        <td id="LC4601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the inharmonious is cowardly and boorish?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4602"></td>
        <td id="LC4602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4603"></td>
        <td id="LC4603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4604"></td>
        <td id="LC4604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4605"></td>
        <td id="LC4605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And, when a man allows music to play upon him and to pour into his soul</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4606"></td>
        <td id="LC4606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the funnel of his ears those sweet and soft and melancholy airs</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4607"></td>
        <td id="LC4607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of which we were just now speaking, and his whole life is passed in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4608"></td>
        <td id="LC4608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warbling and the delights of song; in the first stage of the process</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4609"></td>
        <td id="LC4609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the passion or spirit which is in him is tempered like iron, and made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4610"></td>
        <td id="LC4610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">useful, instead of brittle and useless. But, if he carries on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4611"></td>
        <td id="LC4611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">softening and soothing process, in the next stage he begins to melt and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4612"></td>
        <td id="LC4612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waste, until he has wasted away his spirit and cut out the sinews of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4613"></td>
        <td id="LC4613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soul; and he becomes a feeble warrior.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4614"></td>
        <td id="LC4614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4615"></td>
        <td id="LC4615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4616"></td>
        <td id="LC4616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4617"></td>
        <td id="LC4617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If the element of spirit is naturally weak in him the change is speedily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4618"></td>
        <td id="LC4618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accomplished, but if he have a good deal, then the power of music</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4619"></td>
        <td id="LC4619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weakening the spirit renders him excitable;--on the least provocation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4620"></td>
        <td id="LC4620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he flames up at once, and is speedily extinguished; instead of having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4621"></td>
        <td id="LC4621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spirit he grows irritable and passionate and is quite impracticable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4622"></td>
        <td id="LC4622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4623"></td>
        <td id="LC4623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Exactly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4624"></td>
        <td id="LC4624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4625"></td>
        <td id="LC4625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so in gymnastics, if a man takes violent exercise and is a great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4626"></td>
        <td id="LC4626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feeder, and the reverse of a great student of music and philosophy, at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4627"></td>
        <td id="LC4627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first the high condition of his body fills him with pride and spirit,</td>

        <td id="L4628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4628"></td>
        <td id="LC4628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and he becomes twice the man that he was.</td>

        <td id="L4633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4633"></td>
        <td id="LC4633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Muses, does not even that intelligence which there may be in him, having</td>

        <td id="LC4721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether they preserve their resolution, and never, under the influence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4722"></td>
        <td id="LC4722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either of force or enchantment, forget or cast off their sense of duty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4723"></td>
        <td id="LC4723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4724"></td>
        <td id="LC4724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4725"></td>
        <td id="LC4725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How cast off? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4726"></td>
        <td id="LC4726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4727"></td>
        <td id="LC4727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will explain to you, I replied. A resolution may go out of a man&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4728"></td>
        <td id="LC4728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind either with his will or against his will; with his will when he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4729"></td>
        <td id="LC4729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gets rid of a falsehood and learns better, against his will whenever he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4730"></td>
        <td id="LC4730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is deprived of a truth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4731"></td>
        <td id="LC4731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4732"></td>
        <td id="LC4732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I understand, he said, the willing loss of a resolution; the meaning of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4733"></td>
        <td id="LC4733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the unwilling I have yet to learn.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4734"></td>
        <td id="LC4734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4735"></td>
        <td id="LC4735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, I said, do you not see that men are unwillingly deprived of good,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4736"></td>
        <td id="LC4736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and willingly of evil? Is not to have lost the truth an evil, and to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4737"></td>
        <td id="LC4737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possess the truth a good? and you would agree that to conceive things as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4738"></td>
        <td id="LC4738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they are is to possess the truth?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4739"></td>
        <td id="LC4739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4740"></td>
        <td id="LC4740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he replied; I agree with you in thinking that mankind are deprived</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4741"></td>
        <td id="LC4741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of truth against their will.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4742"></td>
        <td id="LC4742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4743"></td>
        <td id="LC4743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is not this involuntary deprivation caused either by theft, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4744"></td>
        <td id="LC4744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">force, or enchantment?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4745"></td>
        <td id="LC4745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4746"></td>
        <td id="LC4746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Still, he replied, I do not understand you.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4747"></td>
        <td id="LC4747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4748"></td>
        <td id="LC4748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I fear that I must have been talking darkly, like the tragedians. I only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4749"></td>
        <td id="LC4749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mean that some men are changed by persuasion and that others forget;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4750"></td>
        <td id="LC4750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">argument steals away the hearts of one class, and time of the other; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4751"></td>
        <td id="LC4751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this I call theft. Now you understand me?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4752"></td>
        <td id="LC4752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4753"></td>
        <td id="LC4753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4754"></td>
        <td id="LC4754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4755"></td>
        <td id="LC4755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Those again who are forced, are those whom the violence of some pain or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4756"></td>
        <td id="LC4756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grief compels to change their opinion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4757"></td>
        <td id="LC4757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4758"></td>
        <td id="LC4758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I understand, he said, and you are quite right.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4759"></td>
        <td id="LC4759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4760"></td>
        <td id="LC4760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And you would also acknowledge that the enchanted are those who change</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4761"></td>
        <td id="LC4761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their minds either under the softer influence of pleasure, or the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4762"></td>
        <td id="LC4762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sterner influence of fear?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4763"></td>
        <td id="LC4763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4764"></td>
        <td id="LC4764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said; everything that deceives may be said to enchant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4765"></td>
        <td id="LC4765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4766"></td>
        <td id="LC4766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Therefore, as I was just now saying, we must enquire who are the best</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4767"></td>
        <td id="LC4767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guardians of their own conviction that what they think the interest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4768"></td>
        <td id="LC4768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the State is to be the rule of their lives. We must watch them from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4769"></td>
        <td id="LC4769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their youth upwards, and make them perform actions in which they are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4770"></td>
        <td id="LC4770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most likely to forget or to be deceived, and he who remembers and is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4771"></td>
        <td id="LC4771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not deceived is to be selected, and he who fails in the trial is to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4772"></td>
        <td id="LC4772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rejected. That will be the way?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4773"></td>
        <td id="LC4773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4774"></td>
        <td id="LC4774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4775"></td>
        <td id="LC4775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4776"></td>
        <td id="LC4776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And there should also be toils and pains and conflicts prescribed for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4777"></td>
        <td id="LC4777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, in which they will be made to give further proof of the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4778"></td>
        <td id="LC4778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">qualities.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4779"></td>
        <td id="LC4779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4780"></td>
        <td id="LC4780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very right, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4781"></td>
        <td id="LC4781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4782"></td>
        <td id="LC4782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And then, I said, we must try them with enchantments--that is the third</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4783"></td>
        <td id="LC4783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sort of test--and see what will be their behaviour: like those who take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4784"></td>
        <td id="LC4784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">colts amid noise and tumult to see if they are of a timid nature, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4785"></td>
        <td id="LC4785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must we take our youth amid terrors of some kind, and again pass them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4786"></td>
        <td id="LC4786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into pleasures, and prove them more thoroughly than gold is proved in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4787"></td>
