        <td id="LC4787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the furnace, that we may discover whether they are armed against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4788"></td>
        <td id="LC4788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all enchantments, and of a noble bearing always, good guardians of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4789"></td>
        <td id="LC4789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves and of the music which they have learned, and retaining under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4790"></td>
        <td id="LC4790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all circumstances a rhythmical and harmonious nature, such as will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4791"></td>
        <td id="LC4791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most serviceable to the individual and to the State. And he who at every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4792"></td>
        <td id="LC4792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">age, as boy and youth and in mature life, has come out of the trial</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4793"></td>
        <td id="LC4793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">victorious and pure, shall be appointed a ruler and guardian of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4794"></td>
        <td id="LC4794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">State; he shall be honoured in life and death, and shall receive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4795"></td>
        <td id="LC4795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sepulture and other memorials of honour, the greatest that we have to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4796"></td>
        <td id="LC4796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give. But him who fails, we must reject. I am inclined to think that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4797"></td>
        <td id="LC4797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this is the sort of way in which our rulers and guardians should be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4798"></td>
        <td id="LC4798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chosen and appointed. I speak generally, and not with any pretension to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4799"></td>
        <td id="LC4799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exactness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4800"></td>
        <td id="LC4800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4801"></td>
        <td id="LC4801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And, speaking generally, I agree with you, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4802"></td>
        <td id="LC4802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4803"></td>
        <td id="LC4803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And perhaps the word &#39;guardian&#39; in the fullest sense ought to be applied</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4804"></td>
        <td id="LC4804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to this higher class only who preserve us against foreign enemies and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4805"></td>
        <td id="LC4805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maintain peace among our citizens at home, that the one may not have the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4806"></td>
        <td id="LC4806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will, or the others the power, to harm us. The young men whom we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4807"></td>
        <td id="LC4807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before called guardians may be more properly designated auxiliaries and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4808"></td>
        <td id="LC4808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supporters of the principles of the rulers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4809"></td>
        <td id="LC4809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4810"></td>
        <td id="LC4810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I agree with you, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4811"></td>
        <td id="LC4811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4812"></td>
        <td id="LC4812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How then may we devise one of those needful falsehoods of which we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4813"></td>
        <td id="LC4813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lately spoke--just one royal lie which may deceive the rulers, if that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4814"></td>
        <td id="LC4814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be possible, and at any rate the rest of the city?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4815"></td>
        <td id="LC4815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4816"></td>
        <td id="LC4816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What sort of lie? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4817"></td>
        <td id="LC4817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4818"></td>
        <td id="LC4818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nothing new, I replied; only an old Phoenician tale (Laws) of what has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4819"></td>
        <td id="LC4819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">often occurred before now in other places, (as the poets say, and have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4820"></td>
        <td id="LC4820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made the world believe,) though not in our time, and I do not know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4821"></td>
        <td id="LC4821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether such an event could ever happen again, or could now even be made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4822"></td>
        <td id="LC4822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">probable, if it did.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4823"></td>
        <td id="LC4823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4824"></td>
        <td id="LC4824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How your words seem to hesitate on your lips!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4825"></td>
        <td id="LC4825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4826"></td>
        <td id="LC4826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You will not wonder, I replied, at my hesitation when you have heard.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4827"></td>
        <td id="LC4827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4828"></td>
        <td id="LC4828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Speak, he said, and fear not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4829"></td>
        <td id="LC4829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4830"></td>
        <td id="LC4830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well then, I will speak, although I really know not how to look you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4831"></td>
        <td id="LC4831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the face, or in what words to utter the audacious fiction, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4832"></td>
        <td id="LC4832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I propose to communicate gradually, first to the rulers, then to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4833"></td>
        <td id="LC4833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soldiers, and lastly to the people. They are to be told that their youth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4834"></td>
        <td id="LC4834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a dream, and the education and training which they received from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4835"></td>
        <td id="LC4835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us, an appearance only; in reality during all that time they were being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4836"></td>
        <td id="LC4836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">formed and fed in the womb of the earth, where they themselves and their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4837"></td>
        <td id="LC4837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arms and appurtenances were manufactured; when they were completed, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4838"></td>
        <td id="LC4838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earth, their mother, sent them up; and so, their country being their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4839"></td>
        <td id="LC4839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mother and also their nurse, they are bound to advise for her good, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4840"></td>
        <td id="LC4840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to defend her against attacks, and her citizens they are to regard as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4841"></td>
        <td id="LC4841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">children of the earth and their own brothers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4842"></td>
        <td id="LC4842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4843"></td>
        <td id="LC4843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You had good reason, he said, to be ashamed of the lie which you were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4844"></td>
        <td id="LC4844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going to tell.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4845"></td>
        <td id="LC4845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4846"></td>
        <td id="LC4846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, I replied, but there is more coming; I have only told you half.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4847"></td>
        <td id="LC4847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Citizens, we shall say to them in our tale, you are brothers, yet God</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4848"></td>
        <td id="LC4848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has framed you differently. Some of you have the power of command, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4849"></td>
        <td id="LC4849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the composition of these he has mingled gold, wherefore also</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4850"></td>
        <td id="LC4850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they have the greatest honour; others he has made of silver, to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4851"></td>
        <td id="LC4851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">auxiliaries; others again who are to be husbandmen and craftsmen he has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4852"></td>
        <td id="LC4852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">composed of brass and iron; and the species will generally be preserved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4853"></td>
        <td id="LC4853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the children. But as all are of the same original stock, a golden</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4854"></td>
        <td id="LC4854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parent will sometimes have a silver son, or a silver parent a golden</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4855"></td>
        <td id="LC4855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">son. And God proclaims as a first principle to the rulers, and above all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4856"></td>
        <td id="LC4856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">else, that there is nothing which they should so anxiously guard, or of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4857"></td>
        <td id="LC4857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which they are to be such good guardians, as of the purity of the race.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4858"></td>
        <td id="LC4858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They should observe what elements mingle in their offspring; for if the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4859"></td>
        <td id="LC4859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">son of a golden or silver parent has an admixture of brass and iron,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4860"></td>
        <td id="LC4860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then nature orders a transposition of ranks, and the eye of the ruler</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4861"></td>
        <td id="LC4861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must not be pitiful towards the child because he has to descend in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4862"></td>
        <td id="LC4862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scale and become a husbandman or artisan, just as there may be sons of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4863"></td>
        <td id="LC4863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">artisans who having an admixture of gold or silver in them are raised</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4864"></td>
        <td id="LC4864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to honour, and become guardians or auxiliaries. For an oracle says that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4865"></td>
        <td id="LC4865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when a man of brass or iron guards the State, it will be destroyed. Such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4866"></td>
        <td id="LC4866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is the tale; is there any possibility of making our citizens believe in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4867"></td>
        <td id="LC4867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4868"></td>
        <td id="LC4868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4869"></td>
        <td id="LC4869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Not in the present generation, he replied; there is no way of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4870"></td>
        <td id="LC4870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accomplishing this; but their sons may be made to believe in the tale,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4871"></td>
        <td id="LC4871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and their sons&#39; sons, and posterity after them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4872"></td>
        <td id="LC4872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4873"></td>
        <td id="LC4873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I see the difficulty, I replied; yet the fostering of such a belief will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4874"></td>
        <td id="LC4874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make them care more for the city and for one another. Enough, however,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4875"></td>
        <td id="LC4875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the fiction, which may now fly abroad upon the wings of rumour, while</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4876"></td>
        <td id="LC4876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we arm our earth-born heroes, and lead them forth under the command of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4877"></td>
        <td id="LC4877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their rulers. Let them look round and select a spot whence they can best</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4878"></td>
        <td id="LC4878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suppress insurrection, if any prove refractory within, and also defend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4879"></td>
        <td id="LC4879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves against enemies, who like wolves may come down on the fold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4880"></td>
        <td id="LC4880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from without; there let them encamp, and when they have encamped, let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4881"></td>
        <td id="LC4881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them sacrifice to the proper Gods and prepare their dwellings.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4882"></td>
        <td id="LC4882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4883"></td>
        <td id="LC4883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just so, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4884"></td>
        <td id="LC4884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4885"></td>
        <td id="LC4885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And their dwellings must be such as will shield them against the cold of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4886"></td>
        <td id="LC4886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">winter and the heat of summer.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4887"></td>
        <td id="LC4887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4888"></td>
        <td id="LC4888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I suppose that you mean houses, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4889"></td>
        <td id="LC4889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4890"></td>
        <td id="LC4890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said; but they must be the houses of soldiers, and not of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4891"></td>
        <td id="LC4891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shop-keepers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4892"></td>
        <td id="LC4892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4893"></td>
        <td id="LC4893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What is the difference? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4894"></td>
        <td id="LC4894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4895"></td>
        <td id="LC4895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That I will endeavour to explain, I replied. To keep watch-dogs, who,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4896"></td>
        <td id="LC4896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from want of discipline or hunger, or some evil habit or other, would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4897"></td>
        <td id="LC4897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turn upon the sheep and worry them, and behave not like dogs but wolves,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4898"></td>
        <td id="LC4898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would be a foul and monstrous thing in a shepherd?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4899"></td>
        <td id="LC4899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4900"></td>
        <td id="LC4900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Truly monstrous, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4901"></td>
        <td id="LC4901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4902"></td>
        <td id="LC4902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And therefore every care must be taken that our auxiliaries, being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4903"></td>
        <td id="LC4903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stronger than our citizens, may not grow to be too much for them and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4904"></td>
        <td id="LC4904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">become savage tyrants instead of friends and allies?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4905"></td>
        <td id="LC4905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4906"></td>
        <td id="LC4906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, great care should be taken.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4907"></td>
        <td id="LC4907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4908"></td>
        <td id="LC4908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And would not a really good education furnish the best safeguard?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4909"></td>
        <td id="LC4909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4910"></td>
        <td id="LC4910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But they are well-educated already, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4911"></td>
        <td id="LC4911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4912"></td>
        <td id="LC4912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I cannot be so confident, my dear Glaucon, I said; I am much more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4913"></td>
        <td id="LC4913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain that they ought to be, and that true education, whatever that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4914"></td>
        <td id="LC4914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may be, will have the greatest tendency to civilize and humanize them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4915"></td>
        <td id="LC4915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in their relations to one another, and to those who are under their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4916"></td>
        <td id="LC4916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">protection.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4917"></td>
        <td id="LC4917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4918"></td>
        <td id="LC4918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4919"></td>
        <td id="LC4919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4920"></td>
        <td id="LC4920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And not only their education, but their habitations, and all that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4921"></td>
        <td id="LC4921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">belongs to them, should be such as will neither impair their virtue as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4922"></td>
        <td id="LC4922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guardians, nor tempt them to prey upon the other citizens. Any man of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4923"></td>
        <td id="LC4923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sense must acknowledge that.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4924"></td>
        <td id="LC4924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4925"></td>
        <td id="LC4925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He must.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4926"></td>
        <td id="LC4926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4927"></td>
        <td id="LC4927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then now let us consider what will be their way of life, if they are to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4928"></td>
        <td id="LC4928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">realize our idea of them. In the first place, none of them should have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4929"></td>
        <td id="LC4929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any property of his own beyond what is absolutely necessary; neither</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4930"></td>
        <td id="LC4930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should they have a private house or store closed against any one who has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4931"></td>
        <td id="LC4931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a mind to enter; their provisions should be only such as are required</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4932"></td>
        <td id="LC4932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by trained warriors, who are men of temperance and courage; they should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4933"></td>
        <td id="LC4933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agree to receive from the citizens a fixed rate of pay, enough to meet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4934"></td>
        <td id="LC4934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the expenses of the year and no more; and they will go to mess and live</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4935"></td>
        <td id="LC4935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together like soldiers in a camp. Gold and silver we will tell them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4936"></td>
        <td id="LC4936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that they have from God; the diviner metal is within them, and they have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4937"></td>
        <td id="LC4937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">therefore no need of the dross which is current among men, and ought not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4938"></td>
        <td id="LC4938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to pollute the divine by any such earthly admixture; for that commoner</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4939"></td>
        <td id="LC4939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">metal has been the source of many unholy deeds, but their own is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4940"></td>
        <td id="LC4940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">undefiled. And they alone of all the citizens may not touch or handle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4941"></td>
        <td id="LC4941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silver or gold, or be under the same roof with them, or wear them, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4942"></td>
        <td id="LC4942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drink from them. And this will be their salvation, and they will be the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4943"></td>
        <td id="LC4943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saviours of the State. But should they ever acquire homes or lands</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4944"></td>
        <td id="LC4944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or moneys of their own, they will become housekeepers and husbandmen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4945"></td>
        <td id="LC4945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instead of guardians, enemies and tyrants instead of allies of the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4946"></td>
        <td id="LC4946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">citizens; hating and being hated, plotting and being plotted against,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4947"></td>
        <td id="LC4947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they will pass their whole life in much greater terror of internal than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4948"></td>
        <td id="LC4948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of external enemies, and the hour of ruin, both to themselves and to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4949"></td>
        <td id="LC4949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest of the State, will be at hand. For all which reasons may we not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4950"></td>
        <td id="LC4950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say that thus shall our State be ordered, and that these shall be the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4951"></td>
        <td id="LC4951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">regulations appointed by us for guardians concerning their houses and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4952"></td>
        <td id="LC4952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all other matters?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4953"></td>
        <td id="LC4953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4954"></td>
        <td id="LC4954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, said Glaucon.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4955"></td>
        <td id="LC4955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4956"></td>
        <td id="LC4956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4957"></td>
        <td id="LC4957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4958"></td>
        <td id="LC4958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4959"></td>
        <td id="LC4959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">BOOK IV.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4960"></td>
        <td id="LC4960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4961"></td>
        <td id="LC4961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Here Adeimantus interposed a question: How would you answer, Socrates,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4962"></td>
        <td id="LC4962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said he, if a person were to say that you are making these people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4963"></td>
        <td id="LC4963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">miserable, and that they are the cause of their own unhappiness; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4964"></td>
        <td id="LC4964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">city in fact belongs to them, but they are none the better for it;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4965"></td>
        <td id="LC4965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whereas other men acquire lands, and build large and handsome houses,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4966"></td>
        <td id="LC4966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and have everything handsome about them, offering sacrifices to the gods</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4967"></td>
        <td id="LC4967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on their own account, and practising hospitality; moreover, as you were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4968"></td>
        <td id="LC4968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying just now, they have gold and silver, and all that is usual among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4969"></td>
        <td id="LC4969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the favourites of fortune; but our poor citizens are no better than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4970"></td>
        <td id="LC4970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mercenaries who are quartered in the city and are always mounting guard?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4971"></td>
        <td id="LC4971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4972"></td>
        <td id="LC4972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said; and you may add that they are only fed, and not paid in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4973"></td>
        <td id="LC4973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">addition to their food, like other men; and therefore they cannot, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4974"></td>
        <td id="LC4974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they would, take a journey of pleasure; they have no money to spend on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4975"></td>
        <td id="LC4975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a mistress or any other luxurious fancy, which, as the world goes, is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4976"></td>
        <td id="LC4976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought to be happiness; and many other accusations of the same nature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4977"></td>
        <td id="LC4977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might be added.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4978"></td>
        <td id="LC4978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4979"></td>
        <td id="LC4979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, said he, let us suppose all this to be included in the charge.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4980"></td>
        <td id="LC4980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4981"></td>
        <td id="LC4981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You mean to ask, I said, what will be our answer?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4982"></td>
        <td id="LC4982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4983"></td>
        <td id="LC4983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4984"></td>
        <td id="LC4984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4985"></td>
        <td id="LC4985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If we proceed along the old path, my belief, I said, is that we shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4986"></td>
        <td id="LC4986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">find the answer. And our answer will be that, even as they are, our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4987"></td>
        <td id="LC4987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guardians may very likely be the happiest of men; but that our aim in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4988"></td>
        <td id="LC4988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">founding the State was not the disproportionate happiness of any one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4989"></td>
        <td id="LC4989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">class, but the greatest happiness of the whole; we thought that in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4990"></td>
        <td id="LC4990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">State which is ordered with a view to the good of the whole we should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4991"></td>
        <td id="LC4991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be most likely to find justice, and in the ill-ordered State injustice:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4992"></td>
        <td id="LC4992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, having found them, we might then decide which of the two is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4993"></td>
        <td id="LC4993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happier. At present, I take it, we are fashioning the happy State,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4994"></td>
        <td id="LC4994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not piecemeal, or with a view of making a few happy citizens, but as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4995"></td>
        <td id="LC4995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whole; and by-and-by we will proceed to view the opposite kind of State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4996"></td>
        <td id="LC4996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suppose that we were painting a statue, and some one came up to us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4997"></td>
        <td id="LC4997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and said, Why do you not put the most beautiful colours on the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4998"></td>
        <td id="LC4998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beautiful parts of the body--the eyes ought to be purple, but you have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4999"></td>
        <td id="LC4999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made them black--to him we might fairly answer, Sir, you would not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5000"></td>
        <td id="LC5000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surely have us beautify the eyes to such a degree that they are no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5001"></td>
        <td id="LC5001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">longer eyes; consider rather whether, by giving this and the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5002"></td>
        <td id="LC5002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">features their due proportion, we make the whole beautiful. And so I say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5003"></td>
        <td id="LC5003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to you, do not compel us to assign to the guardians a sort of happiness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5004"></td>
        <td id="LC5004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which will make them anything but guardians; for we too can clothe our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5005"></td>
        <td id="LC5005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">husbandmen in royal apparel, and set crowns of gold on their heads, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5006"></td>
        <td id="LC5006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bid them till the ground as much as they like, and no more. Our potters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5007"></td>
        <td id="LC5007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also might be allowed to repose on couches, and feast by the fireside,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5008"></td>
        <td id="LC5008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passing round the winecup, while their wheel is conveniently at hand,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5009"></td>
        <td id="LC5009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and working at pottery only as much as they like; in this way we might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5010"></td>
        <td id="LC5010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make every class happy--and then, as you imagine, the whole State would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5011"></td>
        <td id="LC5011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be happy. But do not put this idea into our heads; for, if we listen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5012"></td>
        <td id="LC5012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to you, the husbandman will be no longer a husbandman, the potter will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5013"></td>
        <td id="LC5013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cease to be a potter, and no one will have the character of any distinct</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5014"></td>
        <td id="LC5014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">class in the State. Now this is not of much consequence where the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5015"></td>
        <td id="LC5015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corruption of society, and pretension to be what you are not, is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5016"></td>
        <td id="LC5016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confined to cobblers; but when the guardians of the laws and of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5017"></td>
        <td id="LC5017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">government are only seeming and not real guardians, then see how they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5018"></td>
        <td id="LC5018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turn the State upside down; and on the other hand they alone have the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5019"></td>
        <td id="LC5019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power of giving order and happiness to the State. We mean our guardians</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5020"></td>
        <td id="LC5020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be true saviours and not the destroyers of the State, whereas our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5021"></td>
        <td id="LC5021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opponent is thinking of peasants at a festival, who are enjoying a life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5022"></td>
        <td id="LC5022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of revelry, not of citizens who are doing their duty to the State. But,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5023"></td>
        <td id="LC5023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if so, we mean different things, and he is speaking of something which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5024"></td>
        <td id="LC5024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is not a State. And therefore we must consider whether in appointing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5025"></td>
        <td id="LC5025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our guardians we would look to their greatest happiness individually, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5026"></td>
        <td id="LC5026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether this principle of happiness does not rather reside in the State</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5027"></td>
        <td id="LC5027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as a whole. But if the latter be the truth, then the guardians and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5028"></td>
        <td id="LC5028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">auxiliaries, and all others equally with them, must be compelled or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5029"></td>
        <td id="LC5029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">induced to do their own work in the best way. And thus the whole State</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5030"></td>
        <td id="LC5030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will grow up in a noble order, and the several classes will receive the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5031"></td>
        <td id="LC5031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proportion of happiness which nature assigns to them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5032"></td>
        <td id="LC5032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5033"></td>
        <td id="LC5033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I think that you are quite right.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5034"></td>
        <td id="LC5034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5035"></td>
        <td id="LC5035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I wonder whether you will agree with another remark which occurs to me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5036"></td>
        <td id="LC5036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5037"></td>
        <td id="LC5037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What may that be?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5038"></td>
        <td id="LC5038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5039"></td>
        <td id="LC5039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There seem to be two causes of the deterioration of the arts.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5040"></td>
        <td id="LC5040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5041"></td>
        <td id="LC5041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What are they?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5042"></td>
        <td id="LC5042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5043"></td>
        <td id="LC5043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wealth, I said, and poverty.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5044"></td>
        <td id="LC5044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5045"></td>
        <td id="LC5045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How do they act?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5046"></td>
        <td id="LC5046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5047"></td>
        <td id="LC5047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The process is as follows: When a potter becomes rich, will he, think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5048"></td>
        <td id="LC5048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you, any longer take the same pains with his art?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5049"></td>
        <td id="LC5049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5050"></td>
        <td id="LC5050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5051"></td>
        <td id="LC5051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5052"></td>
        <td id="LC5052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He will grow more and more indolent and careless?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5053"></td>
        <td id="LC5053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5054"></td>
        <td id="LC5054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5055"></td>
        <td id="LC5055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5056"></td>
        <td id="LC5056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the result will be that he becomes a worse potter?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5057"></td>
        <td id="LC5057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5058"></td>
        <td id="LC5058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes; he greatly deteriorates.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5059"></td>
        <td id="LC5059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5060"></td>
        <td id="LC5060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, on the other hand, if he has no money, and cannot provide himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5061"></td>
        <td id="LC5061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with tools or instruments, he will not work equally well himself, nor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5062"></td>
        <td id="LC5062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will he teach his sons or apprentices to work equally well.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5063"></td>
        <td id="LC5063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5064"></td>
        <td id="LC5064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5065"></td>
        <td id="LC5065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5066"></td>
        <td id="LC5066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, under the influence either of poverty or of wealth, workmen and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5067"></td>
        <td id="LC5067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their work are equally liable to degenerate?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5068"></td>
        <td id="LC5068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5069"></td>
        <td id="LC5069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is evident.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5070"></td>
        <td id="LC5070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5071"></td>
        <td id="LC5071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Here, then, is a discovery of new evils, I said, against which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5072"></td>
        <td id="LC5072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the guardians will have to watch, or they will creep into the city</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5073"></td>
        <td id="LC5073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unobserved.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5074"></td>
        <td id="LC5074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5075"></td>
        <td id="LC5075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What evils?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5076"></td>
        <td id="LC5076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5077"></td>
        <td id="LC5077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wealth, I said, and poverty; the one is the parent of luxury and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5078"></td>
        <td id="LC5078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indolence, and the other of meanness and viciousness, and both of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5079"></td>
        <td id="LC5079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discontent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5080"></td>
        <td id="LC5080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5081"></td>
        <td id="LC5081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is very true, he replied; but still I should like to know,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5082"></td>
        <td id="LC5082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Socrates, how our city will be able to go to war, especially against an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5083"></td>
        <td id="LC5083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enemy who is rich and powerful, if deprived of the sinews of war.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5084"></td>
        <td id="LC5084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5085"></td>
        <td id="LC5085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There would certainly be a difficulty, I replied, in going to war with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5086"></td>
        <td id="LC5086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one such enemy; but there is no difficulty where there are two of them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5087"></td>
        <td id="LC5087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5088"></td>
        <td id="LC5088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How so? he asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5089"></td>
        <td id="LC5089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5090"></td>
        <td id="LC5090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the first place, I said, if we have to fight, our side will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5091"></td>
        <td id="LC5091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trained warriors fighting against an army of rich men.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5092"></td>
        <td id="LC5092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5093"></td>
        <td id="LC5093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5094"></td>
        <td id="LC5094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5095"></td>
        <td id="LC5095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And do you not suppose, Adeimantus, that a single boxer who was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5096"></td>
        <td id="LC5096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perfect in his art would easily be a match for two stout and well-to-do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5097"></td>
        <td id="LC5097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentlemen who were not boxers?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5098"></td>
        <td id="LC5098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5099"></td>
        <td id="LC5099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hardly, if they came upon him at once.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5100"></td>
        <td id="LC5100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5101"></td>
        <td id="LC5101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What, now, I said, if he were able to run away and then turn and strike</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5102"></td>
        <td id="LC5102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the one who first came up? And supposing he were to do this several</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5103"></td>
        <td id="LC5103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">times under the heat of a scorching sun, might he not, being an expert,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5104"></td>
        <td id="LC5104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overturn more than one stout personage?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5105"></td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5118"></td>
        <td id="LC5118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And suppose that, before engaging, our citizens send an embassy to one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5119"></td>
        <td id="LC5119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the two cities, telling them what is the truth: Silver and gold we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5120"></td>
        <td id="LC5120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neither have nor are permitted to have, but you may; do you therefore</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5121"></td>
        <td id="LC5121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come and help us in war, and take the spoils of the other city: Who,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5122"></td>
        <td id="LC5122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on hearing these words, would choose to fight against lean wiry dogs,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5123"></td>
        <td id="LC5123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rather than, with the dogs on their side, against fat and tender sheep?</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC5125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is not likely; and yet there might be a danger to the poor State if</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5126"></td>
        <td id="LC5126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wealth of many States were to be gathered into one.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5128"></td>
        <td id="LC5128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But how simple of you to use the term State at all of any but our own!</td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5132"></td>
        <td id="LC5132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You ought to speak of other States in the plural number; not one of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5133"></td>
        <td id="LC5133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them is a city, but many cities, as they say in the game. For indeed any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5134"></td>
        <td id="LC5134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">city, however small, is in fact divided into two, one the city of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5135"></td>
        <td id="LC5135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor, the other of the rich; these are at war with one another; and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5136"></td>
        <td id="LC5136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either there are many smaller divisions, and you would be altogether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5137"></td>
        <td id="LC5137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beside the mark if you treated them all as a single State. But if you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5138"></td>
        <td id="LC5138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deal with them as many, and give the wealth or power or persons of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5139"></td>
        <td id="LC5139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one to the others, you will always have a great many friends and not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5140"></td>
        <td id="LC5140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many enemies. And your State, while the wise order which has now been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5141"></td>
        <td id="LC5141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prescribed continues to prevail in her, will be the greatest of States,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5142"></td>
        <td id="LC5142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do not mean to say in reputation or appearance, but in deed and truth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5143"></td>
        <td id="LC5143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though she number not more than a thousand defenders. A single State</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5144"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5145"></td>
        <td id="LC5145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">barbarians, though many that appear to be as great and many times</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5146"></td>
        <td id="LC5146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greater.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5168"></td>

        <td id="L5169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5169"></td>
        <td id="LC5169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still,--I mean the duty of degrading the offspring of the guardians when</td>

        <td id="LC5171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lower classes, when naturally superior. The intention was, that, in</td>
