        <td id="L5172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5172"></td>
        <td id="LC5172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the case of the citizens generally, each individual should be put to the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5173"></td>
        <td id="LC5173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">use for which nature intended him, one to one work, and then every man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5174"></td>
        <td id="LC5174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would do his own business, and be one and not many; and so the whole</td>

        <td id="L5175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5175"></td>
        <td id="LC5175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">city would be one and not many.</td>

      <tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5177"></td>
        <td id="LC5177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said; that is not so difficult.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5178"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5179"></td>
        <td id="LC5179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The regulations which we are prescribing, my good Adeimantus, are not,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5180"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5181"></td>
        <td id="LC5181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if care be taken, as the saying is, of the one great thing,--a thing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5182"></td>
        <td id="LC5182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, which I would rather call, not great, but sufficient for our</td>

        <td id="LC5183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purpose.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5185"></td>
        <td id="LC5185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What may that be? he asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5186"></td>
        <td id="LC5186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5187"></td>
        <td id="LC5187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Education, I said, and nurture: If our citizens are well educated,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5188"></td>
        <td id="LC5188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and grow into sensible men, they will easily see their way through all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5189"></td>
        <td id="LC5189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these, as well as other matters which I omit; such, for example, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5190"></td>
        <td id="LC5190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marriage, the possession of women and the procreation of children, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5191"></td>
        <td id="LC5191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will all follow the general principle that friends have all things in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5192"></td>
        <td id="LC5192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">common, as the proverb says.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5193"></td>
        <td id="LC5193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5194"></td>
        <td id="LC5194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That will be the best way of settling them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5195"></td>
        <td id="LC5195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5196"></td>
        <td id="LC5196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Also, I said, the State, if once started well, moves with accumulating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5197"></td>
        <td id="LC5197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">force like a wheel. For good nurture and education implant good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5198"></td>
        <td id="LC5198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constitutions, and these good constitutions taking root in a good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5199"></td>
        <td id="LC5199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">education improve more and more, and this improvement affects the breed</td>

        <td id="L5200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5200"></td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5295"></td>
        <td id="LC5295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be required, and in general about the regulations of markets, police,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5296"></td>
        <td id="LC5296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harbours, and the like. But, oh heavens! shall we condescend to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5297"></td>
        <td id="LC5297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">legislate on any of these particulars?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5298"></td>
        <td id="LC5298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5299"></td>
        <td id="LC5299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I think, he said, that there is no need to impose laws about them on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5300"></td>
        <td id="LC5300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good men; what regulations are necessary they will find out soon enough</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5301"></td>
        <td id="LC5301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for themselves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5302"></td>
        <td id="LC5302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5303"></td>
        <td id="LC5303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said, my friend, if God will only preserve to them the laws which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5304"></td>
        <td id="LC5304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we have given them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5305"></td>
        <td id="LC5305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5306"></td>
        <td id="LC5306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And without divine help, said Adeimantus, they will go on for ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5307"></td>
        <td id="LC5307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">making and mending their laws and their lives in the hope of attaining</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5308"></td>
        <td id="LC5308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perfection.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5309"></td>
        <td id="LC5309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5310"></td>
        <td id="LC5310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You would compare them, I said, to those invalids who, having no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5311"></td>
        <td id="LC5311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">self-restraint, will not leave off their habits of intemperance?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5312"></td>
        <td id="LC5312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5313"></td>
        <td id="LC5313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Exactly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5314"></td>
        <td id="LC5314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5315"></td>
        <td id="LC5315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said; and what a delightful life they lead! they are always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5316"></td>
        <td id="LC5316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doctoring and increasing and complicating their disorders, and always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5317"></td>
        <td id="LC5317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fancying that they will be cured by any nostrum which anybody advises</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5318"></td>
        <td id="LC5318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them to try.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5319"></td>
        <td id="LC5319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5320"></td>
        <td id="LC5320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Such cases are very common, he said, with invalids of this sort.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5321"></td>
        <td id="LC5321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5322"></td>
        <td id="LC5322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I replied; and the charming thing is that they deem him their worst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5323"></td>
        <td id="LC5323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enemy who tells them the truth, which is simply that, unless they give</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5324"></td>
        <td id="LC5324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up eating and drinking and wenching and idling, neither drug nor cautery</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5325"></td>
        <td id="LC5325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nor spell nor amulet nor any other remedy will avail.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5326"></td>
        <td id="LC5326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5327"></td>
        <td id="LC5327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Charming! he replied. I see nothing charming in going into a passion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5328"></td>
        <td id="LC5328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a man who tells you what is right.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5329"></td>
        <td id="LC5329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5330"></td>
        <td id="LC5330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These gentlemen, I said, do not seem to be in your good graces.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5331"></td>
        <td id="LC5331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5332"></td>
        <td id="LC5332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Assuredly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5333"></td>
        <td id="LC5333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5334"></td>
        <td id="LC5334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nor would you praise the behaviour of States which act like the men whom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5335"></td>
        <td id="LC5335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was just now describing. For are there not ill-ordered States in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5336"></td>
        <td id="LC5336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which the citizens are forbidden under pain of death to alter the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5337"></td>
        <td id="LC5337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constitution; and yet he who most sweetly courts those who live under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5338"></td>
        <td id="LC5338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this regime and indulges them and fawns upon them and is skilful in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5339"></td>
        <td id="LC5339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anticipating and gratifying their humours is held to be a great and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5340"></td>
        <td id="LC5340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good statesman--do not these States resemble the persons whom I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5341"></td>
        <td id="LC5341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">describing?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5342"></td>
        <td id="LC5342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5343"></td>
        <td id="LC5343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said; the States are as bad as the men; and I am very far from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5344"></td>
        <td id="LC5344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">praising them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5345"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5346"></td>
        <td id="LC5346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But do you not admire, I said, the coolness and dexterity of these ready</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5347"></td>
        <td id="LC5347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ministers of political corruption?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5348"></td>
        <td id="LC5348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5349"></td>
        <td id="LC5349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, I do; but not of all of them, for there are some whom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5350"></td>
        <td id="LC5350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the applause of the multitude has deluded into the belief that they are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5351"></td>
        <td id="LC5351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">really statesmen, and these are not much to be admired.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5352"></td>
        <td id="LC5352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5353"></td>
        <td id="LC5353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean? I said; you should have more feeling for them. When a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5354"></td>
        <td id="LC5354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man cannot measure, and a great many others who cannot measure declare</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5355"></td>
        <td id="LC5355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he is four cubits high, can he help believing what they say?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5356"></td>
        <td id="LC5356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5357"></td>
        <td id="LC5357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nay, he said, certainly not in that case.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5358"></td>
        <td id="LC5358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5359"></td>
        <td id="LC5359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, then, do not be angry with them; for are they not as good as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5360"></td>
        <td id="LC5360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">play, trying their hand at paltry reforms such as I was describing; they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5361"></td>
        <td id="LC5361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are always fancying that by legislation they will make an end of frauds</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5362"></td>
        <td id="LC5362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in contracts, and the other rascalities which I was mentioning, not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5363"></td>
        <td id="LC5363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowing that they are in reality cutting off the heads of a hydra?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5364"></td>
        <td id="LC5364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5365"></td>
        <td id="LC5365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said; that is just what they are doing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5366"></td>
        <td id="LC5366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5367"></td>
        <td id="LC5367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I conceive, I said, that the true legislator will not trouble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5368"></td>
        <td id="LC5368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself with this class of enactments whether concerning laws or the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5369"></td>
        <td id="LC5369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constitution either in an ill-ordered or in a well-ordered State; for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5370"></td>
        <td id="LC5370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the former they are quite useless, and in the latter there will be no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5371"></td>
        <td id="LC5371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difficulty in devising them; and many of them will naturally flow out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5372"></td>
        <td id="LC5372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our previous regulations.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5373"></td>
        <td id="LC5373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5374"></td>
        <td id="LC5374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What, then, he said, is still remaining to us of the work of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5375"></td>
        <td id="LC5375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">legislation?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5376"></td>
        <td id="LC5376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5377"></td>
        <td id="LC5377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nothing to us, I replied; but to Apollo, the God of Delphi, there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5378"></td>
        <td id="LC5378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remains the ordering of the greatest and noblest and chiefest things of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5379"></td>
        <td id="LC5379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5380"></td>
        <td id="LC5380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5381"></td>
        <td id="LC5381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Which are they? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5382"></td>
        <td id="LC5382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5383"></td>
        <td id="LC5383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The institution of temples and sacrifices, and the entire service of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5384"></td>
        <td id="LC5384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gods, demigods, and heroes; also the ordering of the repositories of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5385"></td>
        <td id="LC5385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dead, and the rites which have to be observed by him who would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5386"></td>
        <td id="LC5386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">propitiate the inhabitants of the world below. These are matters of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5387"></td>
        <td id="LC5387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which we are ignorant ourselves, and as founders of a city we should be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5388"></td>
        <td id="LC5388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unwise in trusting them to any interpreter but our ancestral deity. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5389"></td>
        <td id="LC5389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is the god who sits in the centre, on the navel of the earth, and he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5390"></td>
        <td id="LC5390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the interpreter of religion to all mankind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5391"></td>
        <td id="LC5391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5392"></td>
        <td id="LC5392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You are right, and we will do as you propose.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5393"></td>
        <td id="LC5393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5394"></td>
        <td id="LC5394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But where, amid all this, is justice? son of Ariston, tell me where. Now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5395"></td>
        <td id="LC5395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that our city has been made habitable, light a candle and search, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5396"></td>
        <td id="LC5396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">get your brother and Polemarchus and the rest of our friends to help,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5397"></td>
        <td id="LC5397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and let us see where in it we can discover justice and where injustice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5398"></td>
        <td id="LC5398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and in what they differ from one another, and which of them the man who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5399"></td>
        <td id="LC5399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would be happy should have for his portion, whether seen or unseen by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5400"></td>
        <td id="LC5400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gods and men.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5401"></td>
        <td id="LC5401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5402"></td>
        <td id="LC5402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nonsense, said Glaucon: did you not promise to search yourself, saying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5403"></td>
        <td id="LC5403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that for you not to help justice in her need would be an impiety?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5404"></td>
        <td id="LC5404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5405"></td>
        <td id="LC5405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do not deny that I said so, and as you remind me, I will be as good as</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5406"></td>
        <td id="LC5406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my word; but you must join.</td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5411"></td>
        <td id="LC5411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the assumption that our State, if rightly ordered, is perfect.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5412"></td>
        <td id="LC5412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC5415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And being perfect, is therefore wise and valiant and temperate and just.</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC5420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not found will be the residue?</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5422"></td>
        <td id="LC5422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very good.</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5424"></td>
        <td id="LC5424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If there were four things, and we were searching for one of them,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5425"></td>
        <td id="LC5425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wherever it might be, the one sought for might be known to us from the</td>

        <td id="LC5426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first, and there would be no further trouble; or we might know the other</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC5451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the kinds of knowledge in a State are many and diverse?</td>

        <td id="LC5459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carpentering.</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC5476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, I said, and is there any knowledge in our recently-founded State</td>

        <td id="L5477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5477"></td>
        <td id="LC5477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among any of the citizens which advises, not about any particular thing</td>

        <td id="L5479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5479"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5481"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5482"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5483"></td>
        <td id="LC5483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what is this knowledge, and among whom is it found? I asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5484"></td>
        <td id="LC5484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5485"></td>
        <td id="LC5485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is the knowledge of the guardians, he replied, and is found among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5486"></td>
        <td id="LC5486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those whom we were just now describing as perfect guardians.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5487"></td>
        <td id="LC5487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5488"></td>
        <td id="LC5488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what is the name which the city derives from the possession of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC5585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then I may infer courage to be such as you describe?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5586"></td>
        <td id="LC5586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5587"></td>
        <td id="LC5587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, yes, said I, you may, and if you add the words &#39;of a citizen,&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5588"></td>
        <td id="LC5588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you will not be far wrong;--hereafter, if you like, we will carry the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5589"></td>
        <td id="LC5589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">examination further, but at present we are seeking not for courage but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5590"></td>
        <td id="LC5590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice; and for the purpose of our enquiry we have said enough.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5591"></td>
        <td id="LC5591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5592"></td>
        <td id="LC5592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You are right, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5593"></td>
        <td id="LC5593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5594"></td>
        <td id="LC5594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two virtues remain to be discovered in the State--first, temperance, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5595"></td>
        <td id="LC5595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then justice which is the end of our search.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5596"></td>
        <td id="LC5596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5597"></td>
        <td id="LC5597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5598"></td>
        <td id="LC5598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5599"></td>
        <td id="LC5599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, can we find justice without troubling ourselves about temperance?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5600"></td>
        <td id="LC5600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5601"></td>
        <td id="LC5601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do not know how that can be accomplished, he said, nor do I desire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5602"></td>
        <td id="LC5602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that justice should be brought to light and temperance lost sight of;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5603"></td>
        <td id="LC5603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and therefore I wish that you would do me the favour of considering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5604"></td>
        <td id="LC5604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">temperance first.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5605"></td>
        <td id="LC5605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5606"></td>
        <td id="LC5606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, I replied, I should not be justified in refusing your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5607"></td>
        <td id="LC5607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">request.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5608"></td>
        <td id="LC5608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5609"></td>
        <td id="LC5609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then consider, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5610"></td>
        <td id="LC5610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5611"></td>
        <td id="LC5611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I replied; I will; and as far as I can at present see, the virtue</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5612"></td>
        <td id="LC5612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of temperance has more of the nature of harmony and symphony than the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5613"></td>
        <td id="LC5613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preceding.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5614"></td>
        <td id="LC5614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5615"></td>
        <td id="LC5615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How so? he asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5616"></td>
        <td id="LC5616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5617"></td>
        <td id="LC5617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Temperance, I replied, is the ordering or controlling of certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5618"></td>
        <td id="LC5618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasures and desires; this is curiously enough implied in the saying of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5619"></td>
        <td id="LC5619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;a man being his own master;&#39; and other traces of the same notion may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5620"></td>
        <td id="LC5620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found in language.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5621"></td>
        <td id="LC5621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5622"></td>
        <td id="LC5622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No doubt, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5623"></td>
        <td id="LC5623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5624"></td>
        <td id="LC5624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is something ridiculous in the expression &#39;master of himself;&#39; for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5625"></td>
        <td id="LC5625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the master is also the servant and the servant the master; and in all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5626"></td>
        <td id="LC5626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these modes of speaking the same person is denoted.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5627"></td>
        <td id="LC5627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5628"></td>
        <td id="LC5628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5629"></td>
        <td id="LC5629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5630"></td>
        <td id="LC5630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The meaning is, I believe, that in the human soul there is a better and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5631"></td>
        <td id="LC5631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also a worse principle; and when the better has the worse under control,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5632"></td>
        <td id="LC5632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then a man is said to be master of himself; and this is a term of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5633"></td>
        <td id="LC5633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">praise: but when, owing to evil education or association, the better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5634"></td>
        <td id="LC5634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">principle, which is also the smaller, is overwhelmed by the greater mass</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5635"></td>
        <td id="LC5635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the worse--in this case he is blamed and is called the slave of self</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5636"></td>
        <td id="LC5636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and unprincipled.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5637"></td>
        <td id="LC5637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5638"></td>
        <td id="LC5638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, there is reason in that.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5639"></td>
        <td id="LC5639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5640"></td>
        <td id="LC5640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now, I said, look at our newly-created State, and there you will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5641"></td>
        <td id="LC5641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">find one of these two conditions realized; for the State, as you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5642"></td>
        <td id="LC5642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will acknowledge, may be justly called master of itself, if the words</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5643"></td>
        <td id="LC5643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;temperance&#39; and &#39;self-mastery&#39; truly express the rule of the better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5644"></td>
        <td id="LC5644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part over the worse.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5645"></td>
        <td id="LC5645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5646"></td>
        <td id="LC5646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, I see that what you say is true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5647"></td>
        <td id="LC5647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5648"></td>
        <td id="LC5648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let me further note that the manifold and complex pleasures and desires</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5649"></td>
        <td id="LC5649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and pains are generally found in children and women and servants, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5650"></td>
        <td id="LC5650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the freemen so called who are of the lowest and more numerous class.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5651"></td>
        <td id="LC5651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5652"></td>
        <td id="LC5652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5653"></td>
        <td id="LC5653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5654"></td>
        <td id="LC5654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whereas the simple and moderate desires which follow reason, and are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5655"></td>
        <td id="LC5655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under the guidance of mind and true opinion, are to be found only in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5656"></td>
        <td id="LC5656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">few, and those the best born and best educated.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5657"></td>
        <td id="LC5657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5658"></td>
        <td id="LC5658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5659"></td>
        <td id="LC5659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5660"></td>
        <td id="LC5660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These two, as you may perceive, have a place in our State; and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5661"></td>
        <td id="LC5661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meaner desires of the many are held down by the virtuous desires and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5662"></td>
        <td id="LC5662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wisdom of the few.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5663"></td>
        <td id="LC5663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5664"></td>
        <td id="LC5664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That I perceive, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5665"></td>
        <td id="LC5665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5666"></td>
        <td id="LC5666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then if there be any city which may be described as master of its own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5667"></td>
        <td id="LC5667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasures and desires, and master of itself, ours may claim such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5668"></td>
        <td id="LC5668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">designation?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5669"></td>
        <td id="LC5669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5670"></td>
        <td id="LC5670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5671"></td>
        <td id="LC5671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5672"></td>
        <td id="LC5672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It may also be called temperate, and for the same reasons?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5673"></td>
        <td id="LC5673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5674"></td>
        <td id="LC5674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5675"></td>
        <td id="LC5675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5676"></td>
        <td id="LC5676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And if there be any State in which rulers and subjects will be agreed as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5677"></td>
        <td id="LC5677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the question who are to rule, that again will be our State?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5678"></td>
        <td id="LC5678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5679"></td>
        <td id="LC5679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Undoubtedly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5680"></td>
        <td id="LC5680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5681"></td>
        <td id="LC5681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the citizens being thus agreed among themselves, in which class will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5682"></td>
        <td id="LC5682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">temperance be found--in the rulers or in the subjects?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5683"></td>
        <td id="LC5683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5684"></td>
        <td id="LC5684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In both, as I should imagine, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5685"></td>
        <td id="LC5685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5686"></td>
        <td id="LC5686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Do you observe that we were not far wrong in our guess that temperance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5687"></td>
        <td id="LC5687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a sort of harmony?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5688"></td>
        <td id="LC5688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5689"></td>
        <td id="LC5689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why so?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5690"></td>
        <td id="LC5690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5691"></td>
        <td id="LC5691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, because temperance is unlike courage and wisdom, each of which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5692"></td>
        <td id="LC5692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resides in a part only, the one making the State wise and the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5693"></td>
        <td id="LC5693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">valiant; not so temperance, which extends to the whole, and runs through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5694"></td>
        <td id="LC5694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the notes of the scale, and produces a harmony of the weaker and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5695"></td>
        <td id="LC5695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stronger and the middle class, whether you suppose them to be stronger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5696"></td>
        <td id="LC5696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or weaker in wisdom or power or numbers or wealth, or anything else.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5697"></td>
        <td id="LC5697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most truly then may we deem temperance to be the agreement of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5698"></td>
        <td id="LC5698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">naturally superior and inferior, as to the right to rule of either, both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5699"></td>
        <td id="LC5699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in states and individuals.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5700"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5701"></td>
        <td id="LC5701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I entirely agree with you.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5702"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5703"></td>
        <td id="LC5703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so, I said, we may consider three out of the four virtues to have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5704"></td>
        <td id="LC5704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been discovered in our State. The last of those qualities which make a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5705"></td>
        <td id="LC5705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">state virtuous must be justice, if we only knew what that was.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5706"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5709"></td>
        <td id="LC5709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The time then has arrived, Glaucon, when, like huntsmen, we should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5710"></td>
        <td id="LC5710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surround the cover, and look sharp that justice does not steal away, and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5711"></td>
        <td id="LC5711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pass out of sight and escape us; for beyond a doubt she is somewhere in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5712"></td>
        <td id="LC5712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this country: watch therefore and strive to catch a sight of her, and if</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5713"></td>
        <td id="LC5713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you see her first, let me know.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5715"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5739"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5751"></td>
        <td id="LC5751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well then, tell me, I said, whether I am right or not: You remember the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5752"></td>
        <td id="LC5752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">original principle which we were always laying down at the foundation</td>

        <td id="L5753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5753"></td>

        <td id="LC5754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which his nature was best adapted;--now justice is this principle or a</td>

        <td id="L5756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5756"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5757"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5759"></td>
        <td id="LC5759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Further, we affirmed that justice was doing one&#39;s own business, and not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5760"></td>

        <td id="L5761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5761"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5764"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5765"></td>
        <td id="LC5765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then to do one&#39;s own business in a certain way may be assumed to be</td>

        <td id="L5766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5766"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5769"></td>
        <td id="LC5769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5770"></td>
        <td id="LC5770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Because I think that this is the only virtue which remains in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5771"></td>
        <td id="LC5771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">State when the other virtues of temperance and courage and wisdom are</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5772"></td>
        <td id="LC5772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">abstracted; and, that this is the ultimate cause and condition of the</td>

        <td id="L5773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5773"></td>
        <td id="LC5773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">existence of all of them, and while remaining in them is also their</td>

        <td id="L5775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5775"></td>
        <td id="LC5775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us, justice would be the fourth or remaining one.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5776"></td>
        <td id="LC5776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5777"></td>
        <td id="LC5777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That follows of necessity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5778"></td>
        <td id="LC5778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5779"></td>
        <td id="LC5779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If we are asked to determine which of these four qualities by its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5780"></td>
        <td id="LC5780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presence contributes most to the excellence of the State, whether the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5781"></td>

        <td id="L5870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5870"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5874"></td>
        <td id="LC5874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That will be in regular course; let us do as you say.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5875"></td>
        <td id="LC5875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5876"></td>
        <td id="LC5876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I proceeded to ask: When two things, a greater and less, are called by</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5974"></td>
        <td id="LC5974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">round with their pegs fixed on the spot, are at rest and in motion at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5975"></td>
        <td id="LC5975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same time (and he may say the same of anything which revolves in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5976"></td>
        <td id="LC5976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same spot), his objection would not be admitted by us, because in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5977"></td>

        <td id="LC5980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the perpendicular; and that the circumference goes round. But if,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6069"></td>
        <td id="LC6069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the sometime greater to the sometime less, and the greater that is</td>
      </tr>
