      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6168"></td>
        <td id="LC6168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the soul. And what of passion, or spirit? Is it a third, or akin to one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6169"></td>
        <td id="LC6169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the preceding?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6170"></td>
        <td id="LC6170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6171"></td>
        <td id="LC6171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should be inclined to say--akin to desire.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6172"></td>
        <td id="LC6172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6173"></td>
        <td id="LC6173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, I said, there is a story which I remember to have heard, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6174"></td>
        <td id="LC6174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I put faith. The story is, that Leontius, the son of Aglaion,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6175"></td>
        <td id="LC6175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming up one day from the Piraeus, under the north wall on the outside,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6176"></td>
        <td id="LC6176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observed some dead bodies lying on the ground at the place of execution.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6177"></td>
        <td id="LC6177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He felt a desire to see them, and also a dread and abhorrence of them;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6178"></td>
        <td id="LC6178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for a time he struggled and covered his eyes, but at length the desire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6179"></td>
        <td id="LC6179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got the better of him; and forcing them open, he ran up to the dead</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6180"></td>
        <td id="LC6180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bodies, saying, Look, ye wretches, take your fill of the fair sight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6181"></td>
        <td id="LC6181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6182"></td>
        <td id="LC6182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have heard the story myself, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6183"></td>
        <td id="LC6183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6184"></td>
        <td id="LC6184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The moral of the tale is, that anger at times goes to war with desire,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6185"></td>
        <td id="LC6185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as though they were two distinct things.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6186"></td>
        <td id="LC6186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6187"></td>
        <td id="LC6187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes; that is the meaning, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6188"></td>
        <td id="LC6188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6189"></td>
        <td id="LC6189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And are there not many other cases in which we observe that when a man&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6190"></td>
        <td id="LC6190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desires violently prevail over his reason, he reviles himself, and is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6191"></td>
        <td id="LC6191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">angry at the violence within him, and that in this struggle, which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6192"></td>
        <td id="LC6192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like the struggle of factions in a State, his spirit is on the side of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6193"></td>
        <td id="LC6193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his reason;--but for the passionate or spirited element to take part</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6194"></td>
        <td id="LC6194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the desires when reason decides that she should not be opposed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6195"></td>
        <td id="LC6195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is a sort of thing which I believe that you never observed occurring in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6196"></td>
        <td id="LC6196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yourself, nor, as I should imagine, in any one else?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6197"></td>
        <td id="LC6197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6198"></td>
        <td id="LC6198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6199"></td>
        <td id="LC6199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6200"></td>
        <td id="LC6200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suppose that a man thinks he has done a wrong to another, the nobler</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6201"></td>
        <td id="LC6201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he is the less able is he to feel indignant at any suffering, such as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6202"></td>
        <td id="LC6202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hunger, or cold, or any other pain which the injured person may inflict</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6203"></td>
        <td id="LC6203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon him--these he deems to be just, and, as I say, his anger refuses to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6204"></td>
        <td id="LC6204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be excited by them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6205"></td>
        <td id="LC6205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6206"></td>
        <td id="LC6206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6207"></td>
        <td id="LC6207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6208"></td>
        <td id="LC6208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But when he thinks that he is the sufferer of the wrong, then he boils</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6209"></td>
        <td id="LC6209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and chafes, and is on the side of what he believes to be justice; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6210"></td>
        <td id="LC6210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because he suffers hunger or cold or other pain he is only the more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6211"></td>
        <td id="LC6211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">determined to persevere and conquer. His noble spirit will not be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6212"></td>
        <td id="LC6212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quelled until he either slays or is slain; or until he hears the voice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6213"></td>
        <td id="LC6213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the shepherd, that is, reason, bidding his dog bark no more.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6214"></td>
        <td id="LC6214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6215"></td>
        <td id="LC6215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The illustration is perfect, he replied; and in our State, as we were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6216"></td>
        <td id="LC6216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying, the auxiliaries were to be dogs, and to hear the voice of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6217"></td>
        <td id="LC6217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rulers, who are their shepherds.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6218"></td>
        <td id="LC6218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6219"></td>
        <td id="LC6219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I perceive, I said, that you quite understand me; there is, however, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6220"></td>
        <td id="LC6220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">further point which I wish you to consider.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6221"></td>
        <td id="LC6221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6222"></td>
        <td id="LC6222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What point?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6223"></td>
        <td id="LC6223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6224"></td>
        <td id="LC6224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You remember that passion or spirit appeared at first sight to be a kind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6225"></td>
        <td id="LC6225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of desire, but now we should say quite the contrary; for in the conflict</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6226"></td>
        <td id="LC6226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the soul spirit is arrayed on the side of the rational principle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6227"></td>
        <td id="LC6227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6228"></td>
        <td id="LC6228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most assuredly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6229"></td>
        <td id="LC6229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6230"></td>
        <td id="LC6230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But a further question arises: Is passion different from reason also, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6231"></td>
        <td id="LC6231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only a kind of reason; in which latter case, instead of three principles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6232"></td>
        <td id="LC6232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the soul, there will only be two, the rational and the concupiscent;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6233"></td>
        <td id="LC6233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or rather, as the State was composed of three classes, traders,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6234"></td>
        <td id="LC6234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">auxiliaries, counsellors, so may there not be in the individual soul a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6235"></td>
        <td id="LC6235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">third element which is passion or spirit, and when not corrupted by bad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6236"></td>
        <td id="LC6236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">education is the natural auxiliary of reason?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6237"></td>
        <td id="LC6237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6238"></td>
        <td id="LC6238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, there must be a third.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6239"></td>
        <td id="LC6239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6240"></td>
        <td id="LC6240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I replied, if passion, which has already been shown to be different</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6241"></td>
        <td id="LC6241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from desire, turn out also to be different from reason.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6242"></td>
        <td id="LC6242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6243"></td>
        <td id="LC6243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But that is easily proved:--We may observe even in young children that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6244"></td>
        <td id="LC6244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they are full of spirit almost as soon as they are born, whereas some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6245"></td>
        <td id="LC6245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them never seem to attain to the use of reason, and most of them late</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6246"></td>
        <td id="LC6246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6247"></td>
        <td id="LC6247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6248"></td>
        <td id="LC6248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Excellent, I said, and you may see passion equally in brute animals,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6249"></td>
        <td id="LC6249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which is a further proof of the truth of what you are saying. And we may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6250"></td>
        <td id="LC6250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">once more appeal to the words of Homer, which have been already quoted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6251"></td>
        <td id="LC6251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by us,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6252"></td>
        <td id="LC6252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6253"></td>
        <td id="LC6253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;He smote his breast, and thus rebuked his soul,&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6254"></td>
        <td id="LC6254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6255"></td>
        <td id="LC6255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for in this verse Homer has clearly supposed the power which reasons</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6256"></td>
        <td id="LC6256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about the better and worse to be different from the unreasoning anger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6257"></td>
        <td id="LC6257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which is rebuked by it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6258"></td>
        <td id="LC6258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6259"></td>
        <td id="LC6259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6260"></td>
        <td id="LC6260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6261"></td>
        <td id="LC6261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so, after much tossing, we have reached land, and are fairly agreed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6262"></td>
        <td id="LC6262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the same principles which exist in the State exist also in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6263"></td>

        <td id="L6361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6361"></td>
        <td id="LC6361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">likely than the unjust to make away with a deposit of gold or silver?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6362"></td>
        <td id="LC6362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Would any one deny this?</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6406"></td>
        <td id="LC6406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, not with the outward man, but with the inward, which is the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6407"></td>
        <td id="LC6407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">true self and concernment of man: for the just man does not permit the</td>

        <td id="L6408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6408"></td>
        <td id="LC6408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several elements within him to interfere with one another, or any of</td>

        <td id="LC6409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them to do the work of others,--he sets in order his own inner life, and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6410"></td>
        <td id="LC6410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is his own master and his own law, and at peace with himself; and when</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6411"></td>
        <td id="LC6411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he has bound together the three principles within him, which may be</td>

        <td id="L6412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6412"></td>
        <td id="LC6412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">compared to the higher, lower, and middle notes of the scale, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6413"></td>
        <td id="LC6413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intermediate intervals--when he has bound all these together, and is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6414"></td>
        <td id="LC6414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no longer many, but has become one entirely temperate and perfectly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6415"></td>
        <td id="LC6415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">adjusted nature, then he proceeds to act, if he has to act, whether in</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC6416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a matter of property, or in the treatment of the body, or in some affair</td>

        <td id="LC6419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">action, and the knowledge which presides over it, wisdom, and that which</td>

        <td id="L6439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6439"></td>
        <td id="LC6439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Must not injustice be a strife which arises among the three</td>

</td>

        <td id="L6448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6448"></td>
        <td id="LC6448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And if the nature of justice and injustice be known, then the meaning of</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC6452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean? he said.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6453"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC6455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what disease and health are in the body.</td>

        <td id="L6456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6456"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6457"></td>
        <td id="LC6457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How so? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6458"></td>
        <td id="LC6458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6459"></td>
        <td id="LC6459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, I said, that which is healthy causes health, and that which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6460"></td>
        <td id="LC6460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unhealthy causes disease.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6461"></td>
        <td id="LC6461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6462"></td>
        <td id="LC6462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6463"></td>
        <td id="LC6463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6464"></td>
        <td id="LC6464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And just actions cause justice, and unjust actions cause injustice?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6465"></td>
        <td id="LC6465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6466"></td>
        <td id="LC6466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is certain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6467"></td>
        <td id="LC6467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6468"></td>
        <td id="LC6468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the creation of health is the institution of a natural order and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6469"></td>
        <td id="LC6469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">government of one by another in the parts of the body; and the creation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6470"></td>
        <td id="LC6470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of disease is the production of a state of things at variance with this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6471"></td>
        <td id="LC6471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">natural order?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6472"></td>
        <td id="LC6472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6473"></td>
        <td id="LC6473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6474"></td>
        <td id="LC6474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6475"></td>
        <td id="LC6475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is not the creation of justice the institution of a natural order</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6476"></td>
        <td id="LC6476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and government of one by another in the parts of the soul, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6477"></td>
        <td id="LC6477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creation of injustice the production of a state of things at variance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6478"></td>
        <td id="LC6478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the natural order?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6479"></td>
        <td id="LC6479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6480"></td>
        <td id="LC6480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Exactly so, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6481"></td>
        <td id="LC6481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6482"></td>
        <td id="LC6482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then virtue is the health and beauty and well-being of the soul, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6483"></td>
        <td id="LC6483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vice the disease and weakness and deformity of the same?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6484"></td>
        <td id="LC6484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6485"></td>
        <td id="LC6485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6486"></td>
        <td id="LC6486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6487"></td>
        <td id="LC6487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And do not good practices lead to virtue, and evil practices to vice?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6488"></td>
        <td id="LC6488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6489"></td>
        <td id="LC6489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Assuredly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6490"></td>
        <td id="LC6490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6491"></td>
        <td id="LC6491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Still our old question of the comparative advantage of justice and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6492"></td>
        <td id="LC6492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injustice has not been answered: Which is the more profitable, to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6493"></td>
        <td id="LC6493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just and act justly and practise virtue, whether seen or unseen of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6494"></td>
        <td id="LC6494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gods and men, or to be unjust and act unjustly, if only unpunished and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6495"></td>
        <td id="LC6495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unreformed?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6496"></td>
        <td id="LC6496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6497"></td>
        <td id="LC6497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In my judgment, Socrates, the question has now become ridiculous. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6498"></td>
        <td id="LC6498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know that, when the bodily constitution is gone, life is no longer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6499"></td>
        <td id="LC6499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">endurable, though pampered with all kinds of meats and drinks, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6500"></td>
        <td id="LC6500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">having all wealth and all power; and shall we be told that when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6501"></td>
        <td id="LC6501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very essence of the vital principle is undermined and corrupted, life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6502"></td>
        <td id="LC6502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is still worth having to a man, if only he be allowed to do whatever he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6503"></td>
        <td id="LC6503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">likes with the single exception that he is not to acquire justice and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6504"></td>
        <td id="LC6504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">virtue, or to escape from injustice and vice; assuming them both to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6505"></td>
        <td id="LC6505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such as we have described?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6506"></td>
        <td id="LC6506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6507"></td>
        <td id="LC6507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said, the question is, as you say, ridiculous. Still, as we are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6508"></td>
        <td id="LC6508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">near the spot at which we may see the truth in the clearest manner with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6509"></td>
        <td id="LC6509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our own eyes, let us not faint by the way.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6510"></td>
        <td id="LC6510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6511"></td>
        <td id="LC6511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6512"></td>
        <td id="LC6512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6513"></td>
        <td id="LC6513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Come up hither, I said, and behold the various forms of vice, those of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6514"></td>
        <td id="LC6514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, I mean, which are worth looking at.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6515"></td>
        <td id="LC6515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6516"></td>
        <td id="LC6516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am following you, he replied: proceed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6517"></td>
        <td id="LC6517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6518"></td>
        <td id="LC6518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I said, The argument seems to have reached a height from which, as from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6519"></td>
        <td id="LC6519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some tower of speculation, a man may look down and see that virtue</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6520"></td>
        <td id="LC6520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is one, but that the forms of vice are innumerable; there being four</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6521"></td>
        <td id="LC6521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">special ones which are deserving of note.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6522"></td>
        <td id="LC6522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6523"></td>
        <td id="LC6523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6524"></td>
        <td id="LC6524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6525"></td>
        <td id="LC6525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I mean, I replied, that there appear to be as many forms of the soul as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6526"></td>
        <td id="LC6526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there are distinct forms of the State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6527"></td>
        <td id="LC6527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6528"></td>
        <td id="LC6528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How many?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6529"></td>
        <td id="LC6529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6530"></td>
        <td id="LC6530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There are five of the State, and five of the soul, I said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6531"></td>
        <td id="LC6531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6532"></td>
        <td id="LC6532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What are they?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6533"></td>
        <td id="LC6533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6534"></td>
        <td id="LC6534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The first, I said, is that which we have been describing, and which may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6535"></td>
        <td id="LC6535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be said to have two names, monarchy and aristocracy, accordingly as rule</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6536"></td>
        <td id="LC6536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is exercised by one distinguished man or by many.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6537"></td>
        <td id="LC6537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6538"></td>
        <td id="LC6538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6539"></td>
        <td id="LC6539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6540"></td>
        <td id="LC6540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But I regard the two names as describing one form only; for whether the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6541"></td>
        <td id="LC6541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">government is in the hands of one or many, if the governors have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6542"></td>
        <td id="LC6542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trained in the manner which we have supposed, the fundamental laws of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6543"></td>
        <td id="LC6543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the State will be maintained.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6544"></td>
        <td id="LC6544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6545"></td>
        <td id="LC6545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is true, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6546"></td>
        <td id="LC6546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6547"></td>
        <td id="LC6547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6548"></td>
        <td id="LC6548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6549"></td>
        <td id="LC6549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6550"></td>
        <td id="LC6550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">BOOK V.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6551"></td>
        <td id="LC6551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6552"></td>
        <td id="LC6552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Such is the good and true City or State, and the good and true man is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6553"></td>
        <td id="LC6553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the same pattern; and if this is right every other is wrong; and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6554"></td>
        <td id="LC6554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evil is one which affects not only the ordering of the State, but also</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6555"></td>
        <td id="LC6555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the regulation of the individual soul, and is exhibited in four forms.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6556"></td>
        <td id="LC6556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6557"></td>
        <td id="LC6557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What are they? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6558"></td>
        <td id="LC6558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6559"></td>
        <td id="LC6559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was proceeding to tell the order in which the four evil forms appeared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6560"></td>
        <td id="LC6560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me to succeed one another, when Polemarchus, who was sitting a little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6561"></td>
        <td id="LC6561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way off, just beyond Adeimantus, began to whisper to him: stretching</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6562"></td>
        <td id="LC6562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forth his hand, he took hold of the upper part of his coat by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6563"></td>
        <td id="LC6563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shoulder, and drew him towards him, leaning forward himself so as to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6564"></td>
        <td id="LC6564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite close and saying something in his ear, of which I only caught the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6565"></td>
        <td id="LC6565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words, &#39;Shall we let him off, or what shall we do?&#39;</td>

      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L6567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6567"></td>
        <td id="LC6567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not, said Adeimantus, raising his voice.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L6569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6569"></td>
        <td id="LC6569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Who is it, I said, whom you are refusing to let off?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6570"></td>
        <td id="LC6570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L6571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6571"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6572"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6573"></td>
        <td id="LC6573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I repeated, Why am I especially not to be let off?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6574"></td>
        <td id="LC6574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6575"></td>
        <td id="LC6575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, he said, we think that you are lazy, and mean to cheat us out of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6576"></td>
        <td id="LC6576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whole chapter which is a very important part of the story; and you fancy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6577"></td>
        <td id="LC6577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that we shall not notice your airy way of proceeding; as if it were</td>

        <td id="L6578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6578"></td>
        <td id="LC6578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">self-evident to everybody, that in the matter of women and children</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6579"></td>
        <td id="LC6579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;friends have all things in common.&#39;</td>

</td>

        <td id="L6581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6581"></td>
        <td id="LC6581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And was I not right, Adeimantus?</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC6584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">else, requires to be explained; for community may be of many kinds.</td>

        <td id="L6586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6586"></td>
        <td id="LC6586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long expecting that you would tell us something about the family life</td>

        <td id="LC6589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">community of women and children--for we are of opinion that the right</td>

        <td id="L6590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6590"></td>
        <td id="LC6590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or wrong management of such matters will have a great and paramount</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6591"></td>
        <td id="LC6591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">influence on the State for good or for evil. And now, since the question</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6592"></td>
        <td id="LC6592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is still undetermined, and you are taking in hand another State, we have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6593"></td>
        <td id="LC6593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolved, as you heard, not to let you go until you give an account of</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6594"></td>
        <td id="LC6594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all this.</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC6596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To that resolution, said Glaucon, you may regard me as saying Agreed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L6600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6600"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6601"></td>
        <td id="LC6601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I said, You know not what you are doing in thus assailing me: What an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6602"></td>
        <td id="LC6602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">argument are you raising about the State! Just as I thought that I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6603"></td>
        <td id="LC6603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finished, and was only too glad that I had laid this question to sleep,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6604"></td>
        <td id="LC6604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and was reflecting how fortunate I was in your acceptance of what I then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6605"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6606"></td>
        <td id="LC6606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a hornet&#39;s nest of words you are stirring. Now I foresaw this gathering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6607"></td>
        <td id="LC6607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trouble, and avoided it.</td>

        <td id="L6608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6608"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6609"></td>
        <td id="LC6609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For what purpose do you conceive that we have come here, said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6610"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L6616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6616"></td>
        <td id="LC6616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about us; take heart yourself and answer the question in your own way:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6617"></td>
        <td id="LC6617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What sort of community of women and children is this which is to prevail</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6618"></td>
        <td id="LC6618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among our guardians? and how shall we manage the period between birth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6619"></td>
        <td id="LC6619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and education, which seems to require the greatest care? Tell us how</td>

        <td id="L6620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6620"></td>

        <td id="L6621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6621"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6622"></td>
        <td id="LC6622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, my simple friend, but the answer is the reverse of easy; many more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6623"></td>
        <td id="LC6623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubts arise about this than about our previous conclusions. For the</td>

        <td id="L6624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6624"></td>
        <td id="LC6624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">practicability of what is said may be doubted; and looked at in another</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6625"></td>
        <td id="LC6625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">point of view, whether the scheme, if ever so practicable, would be for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6626"></td>
        <td id="LC6626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the best, is also doubtful. Hence I feel a reluctance to approach the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6627"></td>
        <td id="LC6627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subject, lest our aspiration, my dear friend, should turn out to be a</td>

        <td id="L6628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6628"></td>
        <td id="LC6628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dream only.</td>

        <td id="L6629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6629"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6630"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6631"></td>
        <td id="LC6631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are not sceptical or hostile.</td>

        <td id="L6632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6632"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6633"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6634"></td>
        <td id="LC6634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6635"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6636"></td>
        <td id="LC6636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6637"></td>
        <td id="LC6637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6638"></td>
        <td id="LC6638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then let me tell you that you are doing just the reverse; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6639"></td>
        <td id="LC6639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">encouragement which you offer would have been all very well had I myself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6640"></td>
        <td id="LC6640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believed that I knew what I was talking about: to declare the truth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6641"></td>
        <td id="LC6641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about matters of high interest which a man honours and loves among wise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6642"></td>
        <td id="LC6642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men who love him need occasion no fear or faltering in his mind; but to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6643"></td>
        <td id="LC6643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carry on an argument when you are yourself only a hesitating enquirer,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6644"></td>
        <td id="LC6644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which is my condition, is a dangerous and slippery thing; and the danger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6645"></td>
        <td id="LC6645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is not that I shall be laughed at (of which the fear would be childish),</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6646"></td>
        <td id="LC6646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but that I shall miss the truth where I have most need to be sure of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6647"></td>
        <td id="LC6647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">footing, and drag my friends after me in my fall. And I pray Nemesis not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6648"></td>
        <td id="LC6648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to visit upon me the words which I am going to utter. For I do indeed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6649"></td>
        <td id="LC6649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believe that to be an involuntary homicide is a less crime than to be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6650"></td>
        <td id="LC6650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deceiver about beauty or goodness or justice in the matter of laws.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6651"></td>

        <td id="L6748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6748"></td>
        <td id="LC6748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man was perceived to be a fool who directs the shafts of his ridicule</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6749"></td>
        <td id="LC6749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at any other sight but that of folly and vice, or seriously inclines to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6750"></td>
        <td id="LC6750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weigh the beautiful by any other standard but that of the good.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6751"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6752"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6753"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6754"></td>
        <td id="LC6754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">First, then, whether the question is to be put in jest or in earnest,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6755"></td>
        <td id="LC6755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">let us come to an understanding about the nature of woman: Is she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6756"></td>
        <td id="LC6756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">capable of sharing either wholly or partially in the actions of men, or</td>

        <td id="L6757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6757"></td>
        <td id="LC6757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not at all? And is the art of war one of those arts in which she can or</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6758"></td>

        <td id="L6759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6759"></td>
        <td id="LC6759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will probably lead to the fairest conclusion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6760"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6763"></td>
        <td id="LC6763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Shall we take the other side first and begin by arguing against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6764"></td>
        <td id="LC6764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ourselves; in this manner the adversary&#39;s position will not be</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6765"></td>
        <td id="LC6765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">undefended.</td>

        <td id="L6767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6767"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6768"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6769"></td>
        <td id="LC6769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then let us put a speech into the mouths of our opponents. They will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6770"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6772"></td>
        <td id="LC6772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that everybody was to do the one work suited to his own nature.&#39; And</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6773"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6774"></td>
        <td id="LC6774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do not the natures of men and women differ very much indeed?&#39; And we</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6775"></td>
        <td id="LC6775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall reply: Of course they do. Then we shall be asked, &#39;Whether the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6776"></td>
        <td id="LC6776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tasks assigned to men and to women should not be different, and such as</td>

        <td id="LC6779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men and women, whose natures are so entirely different, ought to perform</td>

        <td id="L6781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6781"></td>
        <td id="LC6781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against any one who offers these objections?</td>

        <td id="L6782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6782"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6783"></td>
        <td id="LC6783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is not an easy question to answer when asked suddenly; and I shall</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6784"></td>
        <td id="LC6784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I do beg of you to draw out the case on our side.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6785"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6786"></td>
        <td id="LC6786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These are the objections, Glaucon, and there are many others of a like</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC6787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind, which I foresaw long ago; they made me afraid and reluctant to</td>

        <td id="LC6788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take in hand any law about the possession and nurture of women and</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6791"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6792"></td>

        <td id="L6793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6793"></td>

        <td id="L6794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6794"></td>

        <td id="L6801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6801"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6802"></td>
        <td id="LC6802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I suppose so, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6803"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6804"></td>
        <td id="LC6804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well then, let us see if any way of escape can be found. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6808"></td>
        <td id="LC6808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pursuits,--this is the inconsistency which is charged upon us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6809"></td>
        <td id="LC6809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6810"></td>
        <td id="LC6810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Precisely.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6811"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6812"></td>
        <td id="LC6812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Verily, Glaucon, I said, glorious is the power of the art of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6813"></td>
        <td id="LC6813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contradiction!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6814"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6815"></td>
        <td id="LC6815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why do you say so?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6816"></td>
        <td id="LC6816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6817"></td>
        <td id="LC6817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Because I think that many a man falls into the practice against his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6818"></td>
        <td id="LC6818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will. When he thinks that he is reasoning he is really disputing, just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6819"></td>
        <td id="LC6819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because he cannot define and divide, and so know that of which he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6820"></td>
        <td id="LC6820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speaking; and he will pursue a merely verbal opposition in the spirit of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6821"></td>
        <td id="LC6821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contention and not of fair discussion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6822"></td>
        <td id="LC6822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6823"></td>
        <td id="LC6823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he replied, such is very often the case; but what has that to do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6824"></td>
        <td id="LC6824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with us and our argument?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6825"></td>
        <td id="LC6825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6826"></td>
        <td id="LC6826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A great deal; for there is certainly a danger of our getting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6827"></td>
        <td id="LC6827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unintentionally into a verbal opposition.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6828"></td>
        <td id="LC6828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6829"></td>
        <td id="LC6829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In what way?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6830"></td>
        <td id="LC6830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6831"></td>
        <td id="LC6831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why we valiantly and pugnaciously insist upon the verbal truth, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6832"></td>
        <td id="LC6832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">different natures ought to have different pursuits, but we never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6833"></td>
        <td id="LC6833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considered at all what was the meaning of sameness or difference of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6834"></td>
        <td id="LC6834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature, or why we distinguished them when we assigned different pursuits</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6835"></td>
        <td id="LC6835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to different natures and the same to the same natures.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6836"></td>
        <td id="LC6836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6837"></td>
        <td id="LC6837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, no, he said, that was never considered by us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6838"></td>
        <td id="LC6838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6839"></td>
        <td id="LC6839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I said: Suppose that by way of illustration we were to ask the question</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6840"></td>
        <td id="LC6840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether there is not an opposition in nature between bald men and hairy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6841"></td>
        <td id="LC6841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men; and if this is admitted by us, then, if bald men are cobblers, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6842"></td>
        <td id="LC6842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should forbid the hairy men to be cobblers, and conversely?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6843"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>
