        <td id="L6846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6846"></td>
        <td id="LC6846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said, a jest; and why? because we never meant when we constructed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6847"></td>
        <td id="LC6847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the State, that the opposition of natures should extend to every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6848"></td>
        <td id="LC6848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difference, but only to those differences which affected the pursuit</td>

        <td id="L6849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6849"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6850"></td>
        <td id="LC6850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that a physician and one who is in mind a physician may be said to have</td>

        <td id="L6889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6889"></td>

        <td id="LC6890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say that one man will acquire a thing easily, another with difficulty; a</td>

        <td id="LC6894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good servant to his mind, while the body of the other is a hindrance to</td>

        <td id="LC6895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him?--would not these be the sort of differences which distinguish the</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC6915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also, but in all of them a woman is inferior to a man.</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L6939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6939"></td>
        <td id="LC6939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then one woman will have the temper of a guardian, and another not. Was</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L7131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7131"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7133"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7134"></td>
        <td id="LC7134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And how can marriages be made most beneficial?--that is a question which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7135"></td>
        <td id="LC7135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I put to you, because I see in your house dogs for hunting, and of the</td>

        <td id="L7136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7136"></td>
        <td id="LC7136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nobler sort of birds not a few. Now, I beseech you, do tell me, have you</td>

</td>

        <td id="L7230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7230"></td>
        <td id="LC7230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The proper officers will take the offspring of the good parents to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7231"></td>
        <td id="LC7231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pen or fold, and there they will deposit them with certain nurses who</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7232"></td>
        <td id="LC7232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dwell in a separate quarter; but the offspring of the inferior, or of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7322"></td>
        <td id="LC7322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Shall we try to find a common basis by asking of ourselves what ought</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7323"></td>

        <td id="L7324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7324"></td>
        <td id="LC7324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">organization of a State,--what is the greatest good, and what is the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7325"></td>
        <td id="LC7325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greatest evil, and then consider whether our previous description has</td>

        <td id="L7326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7326"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7327"></td>
        <td id="LC7327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7431"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L7434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7434"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC7438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Capital, I said; but let me ask you once more: Shall they be a family in</td>

        <td id="L7441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7441"></td>

        <td id="LC7443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impious and unrighteous person who is not likely to receive much good</td>

</td>

        <td id="L7503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7503"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC7514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither will trials for assault or insult ever be likely to occur among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7515"></td>
        <td id="LC7515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them. For that equals should defend themselves against equals we shall</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7516"></td>

        <td id="L7517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7517"></td>
        <td id="LC7517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">person a matter of necessity.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7518"></td>

        <td id="L7519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7519"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7520"></td>
        <td id="LC7520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7521"></td>
        <td id="LC7521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes; and there is a further good in the law; viz. that if a man has a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7522"></td>
        <td id="LC7522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quarrel with another he will satisfy his resentment then and there, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7523"></td>
        <td id="LC7523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not proceed to more dangerous lengths.</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC7535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mighty to prevent him: shame, which makes men refrain from laying hands</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7610"></td>
        <td id="LC7610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You agree then, I said, that men and women are to have a common way of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7611"></td>
        <td id="LC7611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life such as we have described--common education, common children; and</td>

        <td id="LC7612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they are to watch over the citizens in common whether abiding in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7613"></td>
        <td id="LC7613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">city or going out to war; they are to keep watch together, and to hunt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7614"></td>
        <td id="LC7614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together like dogs; and always and in all things, as far as they are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7615"></td>
        <td id="LC7615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">able, women are to share with the men? And in so doing they will do what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7616"></td>
        <td id="LC7616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is best, and will not violate, but preserve the natural relation of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7617"></td>
        <td id="LC7617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sexes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7618"></td>
        <td id="LC7618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7619"></td>
        <td id="LC7619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I agree with you, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7715"></td>
        <td id="LC7715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other act of cowardice, should be degraded into the rank of a husbandman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7716"></td>
        <td id="LC7716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or artisan. What do you think?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7717"></td>
        <td id="LC7717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7718"></td>
        <td id="LC7718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By all means, I should say.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7719"></td>
        <td id="LC7719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7720"></td>
        <td id="LC7720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And he who allows himself to be taken prisoner may as well be made a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7721"></td>
        <td id="LC7721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present of to his enemies; he is their lawful prey, and let them do what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7722"></td>
        <td id="LC7722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they like with him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7723"></td>
        <td id="LC7723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7724"></td>
        <td id="LC7724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7725"></td>
        <td id="LC7725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7726"></td>
        <td id="LC7726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the hero who has distinguished himself, what shall be done to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7727"></td>
        <td id="LC7727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him? In the first place, he shall receive honour in the army from his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7728"></td>
        <td id="LC7728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">youthful comrades; every one of them in succession shall crown him. What</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7729"></td>
        <td id="LC7729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do you say?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7730"></td>
        <td id="LC7730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7731"></td>
        <td id="LC7731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I approve.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7732"></td>
        <td id="LC7732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7733"></td>
        <td id="LC7733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what do you say to his receiving the right hand of fellowship?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7734"></td>
        <td id="LC7734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7735"></td>
        <td id="LC7735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To that too, I agree.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7736"></td>
        <td id="LC7736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7737"></td>
        <td id="LC7737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But you will hardly agree to my next proposal.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7738"></td>
        <td id="LC7738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7739"></td>
        <td id="LC7739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What is your proposal?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7740"></td>
        <td id="LC7740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7741"></td>
        <td id="LC7741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That he should kiss and be kissed by them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7742"></td>
        <td id="LC7742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7743"></td>
        <td id="LC7743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most certainly, and I should be disposed to go further, and say: Let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7744"></td>
        <td id="LC7744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no one whom he has a mind to kiss refuse to be kissed by him while the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7745"></td>
        <td id="LC7745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expedition lasts. So that if there be a lover in the army, whether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7746"></td>
        <td id="LC7746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his love be youth or maiden, he may be more eager to win the prize of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7747"></td>
        <td id="LC7747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">valour.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7748"></td>
        <td id="LC7748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7749"></td>
        <td id="LC7749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Capital, I said. That the brave man is to have more wives than others</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7750"></td>
        <td id="LC7750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has been already determined: and he is to have first choices in such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7751"></td>
        <td id="LC7751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">matters more than others, in order that he may have as many children as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7752"></td>
        <td id="LC7752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possible?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7753"></td>
        <td id="LC7753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7754"></td>
        <td id="LC7754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Agreed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7755"></td>
        <td id="LC7755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7756"></td>
        <td id="LC7756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Again, there is another manner in which, according to Homer, brave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7757"></td>
        <td id="LC7757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">youths should be honoured; for he tells how Ajax, after he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7758"></td>
        <td id="LC7758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distinguished himself in battle, was rewarded with long chines, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7759"></td>
        <td id="LC7759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seems to be a compliment appropriate to a hero in the flower of his age,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7760"></td>
        <td id="LC7760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being not only a tribute of honour but also a very strengthening thing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7761"></td>
        <td id="LC7761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7762"></td>
        <td id="LC7762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7763"></td>
        <td id="LC7763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7764"></td>
        <td id="LC7764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then in this, I said, Homer shall be our teacher; and we too, at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7765"></td>
        <td id="LC7765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sacrifices and on the like occasions, will honour the brave according to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7766"></td>
        <td id="LC7766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the measure of their valour, whether men or women, with hymns and those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7767"></td>
        <td id="LC7767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other distinctions which we were mentioning; also with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7768"></td>
        <td id="LC7768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7769"></td>
        <td id="LC7769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;seats of precedence, and meats and full cups;&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7770"></td>
        <td id="LC7770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7771"></td>
        <td id="LC7771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and in honouring them, we shall be at the same time training them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7772"></td>
        <td id="LC7772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7773"></td>
        <td id="LC7773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That, he replied, is excellent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7774"></td>
        <td id="LC7774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7775"></td>
        <td id="LC7775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said; and when a man dies gloriously in war shall we not say, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7776"></td>
        <td id="LC7776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the first place, that he is of the golden race?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7777"></td>
        <td id="LC7777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7778"></td>
        <td id="LC7778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To be sure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7779"></td>
        <td id="LC7779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7780"></td>
        <td id="LC7780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nay, have we not the authority of Hesiod for affirming that when they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7781"></td>
        <td id="LC7781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are dead</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7782"></td>
        <td id="LC7782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7783"></td>
        <td id="LC7783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;They are holy angels upon the earth, authors of good, averters of evil,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7784"></td>
        <td id="LC7784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the guardians of speech-gifted men&#39;?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7785"></td>
        <td id="LC7785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7786"></td>
        <td id="LC7786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes; and we accept his authority.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7787"></td>
        <td id="LC7787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7788"></td>
        <td id="LC7788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We must learn of the god how we are to order the sepulture of divine and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7789"></td>
        <td id="LC7789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heroic personages, and what is to be their special distinction; and we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7790"></td>
        <td id="LC7790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must do as he bids?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7791"></td>
        <td id="LC7791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7792"></td>
        <td id="LC7792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By all means.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7793"></td>
        <td id="LC7793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7794"></td>
        <td id="LC7794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And in ages to come we will reverence them and kneel before their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7795"></td>
        <td id="LC7795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sepulchres as at the graves of heroes. And not only they but any who are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7796"></td>
        <td id="LC7796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deemed pre-eminently good, whether they die from age, or in any other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7797"></td>
        <td id="LC7797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way, shall be admitted to the same honours.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7798"></td>
        <td id="LC7798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7799"></td>
        <td id="LC7799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is very right, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7800"></td>
        <td id="LC7800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7801"></td>
        <td id="LC7801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Next, how shall our soldiers treat their enemies? What about this?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7802"></td>
        <td id="LC7802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7803"></td>
        <td id="LC7803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In what respect do you mean?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7804"></td>
        <td id="LC7804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7805"></td>
        <td id="LC7805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">First of all, in regard to slavery? Do you think it right that Hellenes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7806"></td>
        <td id="LC7806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should enslave Hellenic States, or allow others to enslave them, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7807"></td>
        <td id="LC7807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they can help? Should not their custom be to spare them, considering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7808"></td>
        <td id="LC7808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the danger which there is that the whole race may one day fall under the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7809"></td>
        <td id="LC7809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yoke of the barbarians?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7810"></td>
        <td id="LC7810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7811"></td>
        <td id="LC7811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To spare them is infinitely better.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7812"></td>
        <td id="LC7812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7813"></td>
        <td id="LC7813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then no Hellene should be owned by them as a slave; that is a rule which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7814"></td>
        <td id="LC7814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they will observe and advise the other Hellenes to observe.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7815"></td>
        <td id="LC7815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7816"></td>
        <td id="LC7816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, he said; they will in this way be united against the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7817"></td>
        <td id="LC7817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">barbarians and will keep their hands off one another.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7818"></td>
        <td id="LC7818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7819"></td>
        <td id="LC7819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Next as to the slain; ought the conquerors, I said, to take anything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7820"></td>
        <td id="LC7820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but their armour? Does not the practice of despoiling an enemy afford</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7821"></td>
        <td id="LC7821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an excuse for not facing the battle? Cowards skulk about the dead,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7822"></td>
        <td id="LC7822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pretending that they are fulfilling a duty, and many an army before now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7823"></td>
        <td id="LC7823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has been lost from this love of plunder.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7824"></td>
        <td id="LC7824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7825"></td>
        <td id="LC7825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7826"></td>
        <td id="LC7826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7827"></td>
        <td id="LC7827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is there not illiberality and avarice in robbing a corpse, and also</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7828"></td>
        <td id="LC7828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a degree of meanness and womanishness in making an enemy of the dead</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7829"></td>
        <td id="LC7829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body when the real enemy has flown away and left only his fighting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7830"></td>
        <td id="LC7830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gear behind him,--is not this rather like a dog who cannot get at his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7831"></td>
        <td id="LC7831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assailant, quarrelling with the stones which strike him instead?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7832"></td>
        <td id="LC7832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7833"></td>
        <td id="LC7833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very like a dog, he said.</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L7841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7841"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L7857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7857"></td>
        <td id="LC7857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, you see, there is a difference in the names &#39;discord&#39; and &#39;war,&#39;</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7858"></td>
        <td id="LC7858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I imagine that there is also a difference in their natures; the one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7859"></td>
        <td id="LC7859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is expressive of what is internal and domestic, the other of what is</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7860"></td>
        <td id="LC7860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">external and foreign; and the first of the two is termed discord, and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7861"></td>
        <td id="LC7861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only the second, war.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7862"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC7864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7865"></td>
        <td id="LC7865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And may I not observe with equal propriety that the Hellenic race is all</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7866"></td>

        <td id="L7870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7870"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7871"></td>
        <td id="LC7871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And therefore when Hellenes fight with barbarians and barbarians with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7872"></td>
        <td id="LC7872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hellenes, they will be described by us as being at war when they fight,</td>

        <td id="L7873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7873"></td>
        <td id="LC7873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and by nature enemies, and this kind of antagonism should be called war;</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L7880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7880"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7883"></td>
        <td id="LC7883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No true lover of his country would bring himself to tear in pieces his</td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7912"></td>
        <td id="LC7912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They will use friendly correction, but will not enslave or destroy their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7913"></td>
        <td id="LC7913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opponents; they will be correctors, not enemies?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7914"></td>
        <td id="LC7914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7915"></td>
        <td id="LC7915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just so.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7916"></td>
        <td id="LC7916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7917"></td>
        <td id="LC7917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And as they are Hellenes themselves they will not devastate Hellas, nor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7918"></td>
        <td id="LC7918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will they burn houses, nor ever suppose that the whole population of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7919"></td>
        <td id="LC7919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">city--men, women, and children--are equally their enemies, for they know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7920"></td>
        <td id="LC7920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the guilt of war is always confined to a few persons and that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7921"></td>
        <td id="LC7921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many are their friends. And for all these reasons they will be unwilling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7922"></td>
        <td id="LC7922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to waste their lands and rase their houses; their enmity to them will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7923"></td>
        <td id="LC7923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only last until the many innocent sufferers have compelled the guilty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7924"></td>
        <td id="LC7924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">few to give satisfaction?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7925"></td>
        <td id="LC7925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7926"></td>
        <td id="LC7926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I agree, he said, that our citizens should thus deal with their Hellenic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7927"></td>
        <td id="LC7927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enemies; and with barbarians as the Hellenes now deal with one another.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7928"></td>
        <td id="LC7928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7929"></td>
        <td id="LC7929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then let us enact this law also for our guardians:--that they are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7930"></td>
        <td id="LC7930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neither to devastate the lands of Hellenes nor to burn their houses.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7931"></td>
        <td id="LC7931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7932"></td>
        <td id="LC7932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Agreed; and we may agree also in thinking that these, like all our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7933"></td>
        <td id="LC7933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">previous enactments, are very good.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7934"></td>
        <td id="LC7934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7935"></td>
        <td id="LC7935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But still I must say, Socrates, that if you are allowed to go on in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7936"></td>
        <td id="LC7936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this way you will entirely forget the other question which at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7937"></td>
        <td id="LC7937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">commencement of this discussion you thrust aside:--Is such an order of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7938"></td>
        <td id="LC7938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things possible, and how, if at all? For I am quite ready to acknowledge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7939"></td>
        <td id="LC7939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the plan which you propose, if only feasible, would do all sorts of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7940"></td>
        <td id="LC7940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good to the State. I will add, what you have omitted, that your citizens</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7941"></td>
        <td id="LC7941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be the bravest of warriors, and will never leave their ranks, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7942"></td>
        <td id="LC7942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they will all know one another, and each will call the other father,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7943"></td>
        <td id="LC7943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brother, son; and if you suppose the women to join their armies, whether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7944"></td>
        <td id="LC7944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the same rank or in the rear, either as a terror to the enemy, or as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7945"></td>
        <td id="LC7945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">auxiliaries in case of need, I know that they will then be absolutely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7946"></td>
        <td id="LC7946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invincible; and there are many domestic advantages which might also be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7947"></td>
        <td id="LC7947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mentioned and which I also fully acknowledge: but, as I admit all these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7948"></td>
        <td id="LC7948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantages and as many more as you please, if only this State of yours</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7949"></td>
        <td id="LC7949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were to come into existence, we need say no more about them; assuming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7950"></td>
        <td id="LC7950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then the existence of the State, let us now turn to the question of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7951"></td>
        <td id="LC7951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possibility and ways and means--the rest may be left.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7952"></td>
        <td id="LC7952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7953"></td>
        <td id="LC7953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If I loiter for a moment, you instantly make a raid upon me, I said, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7954"></td>
        <td id="LC7954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have no mercy; I have hardly escaped the first and second waves, and you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7955"></td>
        <td id="LC7955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seem not to be aware that you are now bringing upon me the third, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7956"></td>
        <td id="LC7956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is the greatest and heaviest. When you have seen and heard the third</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7957"></td>
        <td id="LC7957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wave, I think you will be more considerate and will acknowledge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7958"></td>
        <td id="LC7958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that some fear and hesitation was natural respecting a proposal so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7959"></td>
        <td id="LC7959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extraordinary as that which I have now to state and investigate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7960"></td>
        <td id="LC7960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7961"></td>
        <td id="LC7961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The more appeals of this sort which you make, he said, the more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7962"></td>
        <td id="LC7962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">determined are we that you shall tell us how such a State is possible:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7963"></td>
        <td id="LC7963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speak out and at once.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7964"></td>
        <td id="LC7964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7965"></td>
        <td id="LC7965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let me begin by reminding you that we found our way hither in the search</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7966"></td>
        <td id="LC7966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after justice and injustice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7967"></td>
        <td id="LC7967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7968"></td>
        <td id="LC7968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he replied; but what of that?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7969"></td>
        <td id="LC7969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7970"></td>
        <td id="LC7970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was only going to ask whether, if we have discovered them, we are to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7971"></td>
        <td id="LC7971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">require that the just man should in nothing fail of absolute justice; or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7972"></td>
        <td id="LC7972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may we be satisfied with an approximation, and the attainment in him of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7973"></td>
        <td id="LC7973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a higher degree of justice than is to be found in other men?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7974"></td>
        <td id="LC7974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7975"></td>
        <td id="LC7975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The approximation will be enough.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7976"></td>
        <td id="LC7976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7977"></td>
        <td id="LC7977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We were enquiring into the nature of absolute justice and into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7978"></td>
        <td id="LC7978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">character of the perfectly just, and into injustice and the perfectly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7979"></td>
        <td id="LC7979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unjust, that we might have an ideal. We were to look at these in order</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7980"></td>
        <td id="LC7980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that we might judge of our own happiness and unhappiness according to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7981"></td>
        <td id="LC7981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the standard which they exhibited and the degree in which we resembled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7982"></td>
        <td id="LC7982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, but not with any view of showing that they could exist in fact.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7983"></td>
        <td id="LC7983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7984"></td>
        <td id="LC7984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7985"></td>
        <td id="LC7985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7986"></td>
        <td id="LC7986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Would a painter be any the worse because, after having delineated with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7987"></td>
        <td id="LC7987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consummate art an ideal of a perfectly beautiful man, he was unable to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7988"></td>
        <td id="LC7988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">show that any such man could ever have existed?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7989"></td>
        <td id="LC7989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7990"></td>
        <td id="LC7990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He would be none the worse.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7991"></td>
        <td id="LC7991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7992"></td>
        <td id="LC7992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, and were we not creating an ideal of a perfect State?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7993"></td>
        <td id="LC7993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7994"></td>
        <td id="LC7994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To be sure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7995"></td>
        <td id="LC7995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7996"></td>
        <td id="LC7996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is our theory a worse theory because we are unable to prove the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7997"></td>
        <td id="LC7997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possibility of a city being ordered in the manner described?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7998"></td>
        <td id="LC7998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7999"></td>
        <td id="LC7999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Surely not, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8000"></td>
        <td id="LC8000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8001"></td>
        <td id="LC8001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is the truth, I said. But if, at your request, I am to try and show</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8002"></td>
        <td id="LC8002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how and under what conditions the possibility is highest, I must ask</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8003"></td>
        <td id="LC8003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you, having this in view, to repeat your former admissions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8004"></td>
        <td id="LC8004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8005"></td>
        <td id="LC8005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What admissions?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8006"></td>
        <td id="LC8006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8007"></td>
        <td id="LC8007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I want to know whether ideals are ever fully realized in language?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8008"></td>

        <td id="L8200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8200"></td>

        <td id="LC8495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8496"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L8497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8497"></td>
