</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8498"></td>
        <td id="LC8498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8499"></td>
        <td id="LC8499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">BOOK VI.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8500"></td>
        <td id="LC8500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8501"></td>
        <td id="LC8501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And thus, Glaucon, after the argument has gone a weary way, the true and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8502"></td>
        <td id="LC8502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the false philosophers have at length appeared in view.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8503"></td>
        <td id="LC8503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8504"></td>
        <td id="LC8504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do not think, he said, that the way could have been shortened.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8505"></td>
        <td id="LC8505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8506"></td>
        <td id="LC8506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I suppose not, I said; and yet I believe that we might have had a better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8507"></td>
        <td id="LC8507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">view of both of them if the discussion could have been confined to this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8508"></td>
        <td id="LC8508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one subject and if there were not many other questions awaiting us,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8509"></td>
        <td id="LC8509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which he who desires to see in what respect the life of the just differs</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8510"></td>
        <td id="LC8510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from that of the unjust must consider.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8511"></td>
        <td id="LC8511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8512"></td>
        <td id="LC8512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what is the next question? he asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8513"></td>
        <td id="LC8513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8514"></td>
        <td id="LC8514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Surely, I said, the one which follows next in order. Inasmuch as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8515"></td>
        <td id="LC8515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosophers only are able to grasp the eternal and unchangeable,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8516"></td>
        <td id="LC8516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and those who wander in the region of the many and variable are not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8517"></td>
        <td id="LC8517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosophers, I must ask you which of the two classes should be the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8518"></td>
        <td id="LC8518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rulers of our State?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8519"></td>
        <td id="LC8519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8520"></td>
        <td id="LC8520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And how can we rightly answer that question?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8521"></td>
        <td id="LC8521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8522"></td>
        <td id="LC8522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whichever of the two are best able to guard the laws and institutions of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8523"></td>
        <td id="LC8523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our State--let them be our guardians.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8524"></td>
        <td id="LC8524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8525"></td>
        <td id="LC8525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very good.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8526"></td>
        <td id="LC8526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8527"></td>
        <td id="LC8527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither, I said, can there be any question that the guardian who is to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8528"></td>
        <td id="LC8528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keep anything should have eyes rather than no eyes?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8529"></td>
        <td id="LC8529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8530"></td>
        <td id="LC8530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There can be no question of that.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8531"></td>
        <td id="LC8531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8532"></td>
        <td id="LC8532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And are not those who are verily and indeed wanting in the knowledge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8533"></td>
        <td id="LC8533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the true being of each thing, and who have in their souls no clear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8534"></td>
        <td id="LC8534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pattern, and are unable as with a painter&#39;s eye to look at the absolute</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8535"></td>
        <td id="LC8535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">truth and to that original to repair, and having perfect vision of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8536"></td>
        <td id="LC8536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other world to order the laws about beauty, goodness, justice in this,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8537"></td>
        <td id="LC8537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if not already ordered, and to guard and preserve the order of them--are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8538"></td>
        <td id="LC8538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not such persons, I ask, simply blind?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8539"></td>
        <td id="LC8539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8540"></td>
        <td id="LC8540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Truly, he replied, they are much in that condition.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8541"></td>
        <td id="LC8541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8542"></td>
        <td id="LC8542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And shall they be our guardians when there are others who, besides being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8543"></td>
        <td id="LC8543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their equals in experience and falling short of them in no particular of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8544"></td>
        <td id="LC8544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">virtue, also know the very truth of each thing?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8545"></td>
        <td id="LC8545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8546"></td>
        <td id="LC8546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There can be no reason, he said, for rejecting those who have this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8547"></td>
        <td id="LC8547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greatest of all great qualities; they must always have the first place</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8548"></td>
        <td id="LC8548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unless they fail in some other respect.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8549"></td>
        <td id="LC8549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8550"></td>
        <td id="LC8550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suppose then, I said, that we determine how far they can unite this and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8551"></td>
        <td id="LC8551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other excellences.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8552"></td>
        <td id="LC8552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8553"></td>
        <td id="LC8553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By all means.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8554"></td>
        <td id="LC8554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8555"></td>
        <td id="LC8555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the first place, as we began by observing, the nature of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8556"></td>
        <td id="LC8556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosopher has to be ascertained. We must come to an understanding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8557"></td>
        <td id="LC8557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about him, and, when we have done so, then, if I am not mistaken, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8558"></td>
        <td id="LC8558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall also acknowledge that such an union of qualities is possible, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8559"></td>
        <td id="LC8559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that those in whom they are united, and those only, should be rulers in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8560"></td>
        <td id="LC8560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8561"></td>
        <td id="LC8561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8562"></td>
        <td id="LC8562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8563"></td>
        <td id="LC8563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8564"></td>
        <td id="LC8564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let us suppose that philosophical minds always love knowledge of a sort</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8565"></td>
        <td id="LC8565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which shows them the eternal nature not varying from generation and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8566"></td>
        <td id="LC8566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corruption.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8567"></td>
        <td id="LC8567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8568"></td>
        <td id="LC8568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Agreed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8569"></td>
        <td id="LC8569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8570"></td>
        <td id="LC8570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And further, I said, let us agree that they are lovers of all true</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8571"></td>
        <td id="LC8571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being; there is no part whether greater or less, or more or less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8572"></td>
        <td id="LC8572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honourable, which they are willing to renounce; as we said before of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8573"></td>
        <td id="LC8573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lover and the man of ambition.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8574"></td>
        <td id="LC8574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8575"></td>
        <td id="LC8575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8576"></td>
        <td id="LC8576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8577"></td>
        <td id="LC8577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And if they are to be what we were describing, is there not another</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8578"></td>
        <td id="LC8578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quality which they should also possess?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8579"></td>
        <td id="LC8579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8580"></td>
        <td id="LC8580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What quality?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8581"></td>
        <td id="LC8581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8582"></td>
        <td id="LC8582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Truthfulness: they will never intentionally receive into their mind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8583"></td>
        <td id="LC8583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">falsehood, which is their detestation, and they will love the truth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8584"></td>
        <td id="LC8584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8585"></td>
        <td id="LC8585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, that may be safely affirmed of them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8586"></td>
        <td id="LC8586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8587"></td>
        <td id="LC8587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;May be,&#39; my friend, I replied, is not the word; say rather &#39;must be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8588"></td>
        <td id="LC8588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affirmed:&#39; for he whose nature is amorous of anything cannot help loving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8589"></td>
        <td id="LC8589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all that belongs or is akin to the object of his affections.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8590"></td>
        <td id="LC8590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8591"></td>
        <td id="LC8591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Right, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8592"></td>
        <td id="LC8592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8593"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8786"></td>
        <td id="LC8786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8787"></td>
        <td id="LC8787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of course, said Adeimantus.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8788"></td>
        <td id="LC8788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8789"></td>
        <td id="LC8789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then you will hardly need, I said, to hear the interpretation of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8790"></td>
        <td id="LC8790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">figure, which describes the true philosopher in his relation to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8791"></td>
        <td id="LC8791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">State; for you understand already.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8792"></td>
        <td id="LC8792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8793"></td>
        <td id="LC8793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8794"></td>
        <td id="LC8794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8795"></td>
        <td id="LC8795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then suppose you now take this parable to the gentleman who is surprised</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8796"></td>
        <td id="LC8796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at finding that philosophers have no honour in their cities; explain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8797"></td>
        <td id="LC8797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it to him and try to convince him that their having honour would be far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8798"></td>
        <td id="LC8798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more extraordinary.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8799"></td>
        <td id="LC8799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8800"></td>
        <td id="LC8800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8801"></td>
        <td id="LC8801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8802"></td>
        <td id="LC8802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Say to him, that, in deeming the best votaries of philosophy to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8803"></td>
        <td id="LC8803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">useless to the rest of the world, he is right; but also tell him to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8804"></td>
        <td id="LC8804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attribute their uselessness to the fault of those who will not use them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8805"></td>
        <td id="LC8805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and not to themselves. The pilot should not humbly beg the sailors to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8806"></td>
        <td id="LC8806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">commanded by him--that is not the order of nature; neither are &#39;the wise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8807"></td>
        <td id="LC8807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to go to the doors of the rich&#39;--the ingenious author of this saying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8808"></td>
        <td id="LC8808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told a lie--but the truth is, that, when a man is ill, whether he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8809"></td>
        <td id="LC8809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be rich or poor, to the physician he must go, and he who wants to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8810"></td>
        <td id="LC8810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be governed, to him who is able to govern. The ruler who is good for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8811"></td>
        <td id="LC8811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything ought not to beg his subjects to be ruled by him; although</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8812"></td>
        <td id="LC8812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the present governors of mankind are of a different stamp; they may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8813"></td>
        <td id="LC8813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justly compared to the mutinous sailors, and the true helmsmen to those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8814"></td>
        <td id="LC8814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who are called by them good-for-nothings and star-gazers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8815"></td>
        <td id="LC8815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8816"></td>
        <td id="LC8816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Precisely so, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8817"></td>
        <td id="LC8817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8818"></td>
        <td id="LC8818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For these reasons, and among men like these, philosophy, the noblest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8819"></td>
        <td id="LC8819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pursuit of all, is not likely to be much esteemed by those of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8820"></td>
        <td id="LC8820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opposite faction; not that the greatest and most lasting injury is done</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8821"></td>
        <td id="LC8821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to her by her opponents, but by her own professing followers, the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8822"></td>
        <td id="LC8822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of whom you suppose the accuser to say, that the greater number of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8823"></td>
        <td id="LC8823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are arrant rogues, and the best are useless; in which opinion I agreed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8824"></td>
        <td id="LC8824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8825"></td>
        <td id="LC8825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8826"></td>
        <td id="LC8826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8827"></td>
        <td id="LC8827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the reason why the good are useless has now been explained?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8828"></td>
        <td id="LC8828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8829"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8830"></td>
        <td id="LC8830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8831"></td>
        <td id="LC8831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then shall we proceed to show that the corruption of the majority is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8832"></td>
        <td id="LC8832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also unavoidable, and that this is not to be laid to the charge of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8833"></td>
        <td id="LC8833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosophy any more than the other?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8834"></td>
        <td id="LC8834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8835"></td>
        <td id="LC8835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By all means.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8836"></td>
        <td id="LC8836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8837"></td>
        <td id="LC8837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And let us ask and answer in turn, first going back to the description</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8838"></td>
        <td id="LC8838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the gentle and noble nature. Truth, as you will remember, was his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8839"></td>
        <td id="LC8839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leader, whom he followed always and in all things; failing in this, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8840"></td>
        <td id="LC8840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was an impostor, and had no part or lot in true philosophy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8841"></td>
        <td id="LC8841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8842"></td>
        <td id="LC8842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, that was said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8843"></td>
        <td id="LC8843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8844"></td>
        <td id="LC8844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, and is not this one quality, to mention no others, greatly at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8845"></td>
        <td id="LC8845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">variance with present notions of him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8846"></td>
        <td id="LC8846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8847"></td>
        <td id="LC8847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8848"></td>
        <td id="LC8848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8849"></td>
        <td id="LC8849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And have we not a right to say in his defence, that the true lover of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8850"></td>
        <td id="LC8850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowledge is always striving after being--that is his nature; he will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8851"></td>
        <td id="LC8851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not rest in the multiplicity of individuals which is an appearance only,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8852"></td>
        <td id="LC8852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but will go on--the keen edge will not be blunted, nor the force of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8853"></td>
        <td id="LC8853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desire abate until he have attained the knowledge of the true nature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8854"></td>
        <td id="LC8854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of every essence by a sympathetic and kindred power in the soul, and by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8855"></td>
        <td id="LC8855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that power drawing near and mingling and becoming incorporate with very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8856"></td>
        <td id="LC8856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being, having begotten mind and truth, he will have knowledge and will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8857"></td>
        <td id="LC8857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">live and grow truly, and then, and not till then, will he cease from his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8858"></td>
        <td id="LC8858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">travail.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8859"></td>
        <td id="LC8859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8860"></td>
        <td id="LC8860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nothing, he said, can be more just than such a description of him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8861"></td>
        <td id="LC8861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8862"></td>
        <td id="LC8862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And will the love of a lie be any part of a philosopher&#39;s nature? Will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8863"></td>
        <td id="LC8863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he not utterly hate a lie?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8864"></td>
        <td id="LC8864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8865"></td>
        <td id="LC8865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He will.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8866"></td>
        <td id="LC8866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8867"></td>
        <td id="LC8867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And when truth is the captain, we cannot suspect any evil of the band</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8868"></td>
        <td id="LC8868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which he leads?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8869"></td>
        <td id="LC8869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8870"></td>
        <td id="LC8870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Impossible.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8871"></td>
        <td id="LC8871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8872"></td>
        <td id="LC8872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Justice and health of mind will be of the company, and temperance will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8873"></td>
        <td id="LC8873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follow after?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8874"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8875"></td>
        <td id="LC8875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8876"></td>
        <td id="LC8876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8877"></td>
        <td id="LC8877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither is there any reason why I should again set in array the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8878"></td>
        <td id="LC8878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosopher&#39;s virtues, as you will doubtless remember that courage,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8879"></td>
        <td id="LC8879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">magnificence, apprehension, memory, were his natural gifts. And you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8880"></td>
        <td id="LC8880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">objected that, although no one could deny what I then said, still, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8881"></td>
        <td id="LC8881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you leave words and look at facts, the persons who are thus described</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8882"></td>
        <td id="LC8882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are some of them manifestly useless, and the greater number utterly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8883"></td>
        <td id="LC8883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">depraved; we were then led to enquire into the grounds of these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8884"></td>
        <td id="LC8884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accusations, and have now arrived at the point of asking why are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8885"></td>
        <td id="LC8885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the majority bad, which question of necessity brought us back to the</td>

        <td id="L8886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8886"></td>
        <td id="LC8886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">examination and definition of the true philosopher.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L8890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8890"></td>
        <td id="LC8890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And we have next to consider the corruptions of the philosophic nature,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC8891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">why so many are spoiled and so few escape spoiling--I am speaking of</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC8892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those who were said to be useless but not wicked--and, when we have done</td>

        <td id="LC8894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men are they who aspire after a profession which is above them and of</td>

</td>

        <td id="L8954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8954"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8966"></td>
        <td id="LC8966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When they meet together, and the world sits down at an assembly, or in</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8968"></td>
        <td id="LC8968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and there is a great uproar, and they praise some things which are</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8969"></td>
        <td id="LC8969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being said or done, and blame other things, equally exaggerating both,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8970"></td>
        <td id="LC8970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shouting and clapping their hands, and the echo of the rocks and the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8971"></td>
        <td id="LC8971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place in which they are assembled redoubles the sound of the praise or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8972"></td>
        <td id="LC8972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blame--at such a time will not a young man&#39;s heart, as they say, leap</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8973"></td>
        <td id="LC8973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">within him? Will any private training enable him to stand firm against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8974"></td>
        <td id="LC8974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the overwhelming flood of popular opinion? or will he be carried away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8975"></td>
        <td id="LC8975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by the stream? Will he not have the notions of good and evil which the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8976"></td>
        <td id="LC8976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">public in general have--he will do as they do, and as they are, such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8977"></td>
        <td id="LC8977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will he be?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8978"></td>
        <td id="LC8978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8979"></td>
        <td id="LC8979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, Socrates; necessity will compel him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8980"></td>
        <td id="LC8980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8981"></td>
        <td id="LC8981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And yet, I said, there is a still greater necessity, which has not been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8982"></td>
        <td id="LC8982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mentioned.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8983"></td>
        <td id="LC8983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8984"></td>
        <td id="LC8984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What is that?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8985"></td>
        <td id="LC8985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8986"></td>
        <td id="LC8986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The gentle force of attainder or confiscation or death, which, as you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8987"></td>
        <td id="LC8987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are aware, these new Sophists and educators, who are the public, apply</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8988"></td>
        <td id="LC8988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when their words are powerless.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8989"></td>
        <td id="LC8989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8990"></td>
        <td id="LC8990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Indeed they do; and in right good earnest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8991"></td>
        <td id="LC8991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8992"></td>
        <td id="LC8992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now what opinion of any other Sophist, or of any private person, can be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8993"></td>
        <td id="LC8993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expected to overcome in such an unequal contest?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8994"></td>
        <td id="LC8994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8995"></td>
        <td id="LC8995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">None, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8996"></td>
        <td id="LC8996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8997"></td>
        <td id="LC8997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No, indeed, I said, even to make the attempt is a great piece of folly;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8998"></td>
        <td id="LC8998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there neither is, nor has been, nor is ever likely to be, any different</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8999"></td>
        <td id="LC8999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">type of character which has had no other training in virtue but that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9000"></td>
        <td id="LC9000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which is supplied by public opinion--I speak, my friend, of human virtue</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9001"></td>
        <td id="LC9001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only; what is more than human, as the proverb says, is not included:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9002"></td>
        <td id="LC9002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for I would not have you ignorant that, in the present evil state of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9003"></td>
        <td id="LC9003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">governments, whatever is saved and comes to good is saved by the power</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9004"></td>
        <td id="LC9004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of God, as we may truly say.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9005"></td>
        <td id="LC9005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9006"></td>
        <td id="LC9006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I quite assent, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9007"></td>
        <td id="LC9007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9008"></td>
        <td id="LC9008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then let me crave your assent also to a further observation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9009"></td>
        <td id="LC9009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9010"></td>
        <td id="LC9010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What are you going to say?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9011"></td>
        <td id="LC9011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9012"></td>
        <td id="LC9012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, that all those mercenary individuals, whom the many call Sophists</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9013"></td>
        <td id="LC9013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and whom they deem to be their adversaries, do, in fact, teach nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9014"></td>
        <td id="LC9014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but the opinion of the many, that is to say, the opinions of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9015"></td>
        <td id="LC9015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assemblies; and this is their wisdom. I might compare them to a man who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9016"></td>
        <td id="LC9016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should study the tempers and desires of a mighty strong beast who is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9017"></td>
        <td id="LC9017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fed by him--he would learn how to approach and handle him, also at what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9018"></td>
        <td id="LC9018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">times and from what causes he is dangerous or the reverse, and what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9019"></td>
        <td id="LC9019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is the meaning of his several cries, and by what sounds, when another</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9020"></td>
        <td id="LC9020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">utters them, he is soothed or infuriated; and you may suppose further,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9021"></td>
        <td id="LC9021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that when, by continually attending upon him, he has become perfect in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9022"></td>
        <td id="LC9022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all this, he calls his knowledge wisdom, and makes of it a system or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9023"></td>
        <td id="LC9023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">art, which he proceeds to teach, although he has no real notion of what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9024"></td>
        <td id="LC9024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he means by the principles or passions of which he is speaking, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9025"></td>
        <td id="LC9025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">calls this honourable and that dishonourable, or good or evil, or just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9026"></td>
        <td id="LC9026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or unjust, all in accordance with the tastes and tempers of the great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9027"></td>
        <td id="LC9027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brute. Good he pronounces to be that in which the beast delights and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9028"></td>
        <td id="LC9028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evil to be that which he dislikes; and he can give no other account</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9029"></td>
        <td id="LC9029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them except that the just and noble are the necessary, having never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9030"></td>
        <td id="LC9030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself seen, and having no power of explaining to others the nature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9031"></td>
        <td id="LC9031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of either, or the difference between them, which is immense. By heaven,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9032"></td>
        <td id="LC9032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would not such an one be a rare educator?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9033"></td>
        <td id="LC9033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9034"></td>
        <td id="LC9034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Indeed he would.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9035"></td>
        <td id="LC9035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9036"></td>
        <td id="LC9036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And in what way does he who thinks that wisdom is the discernment of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9037"></td>
        <td id="LC9037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the tempers and tastes of the motley multitude, whether in painting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9038"></td>
        <td id="LC9038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or music, or, finally, in politics, differ from him whom I have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9039"></td>
        <td id="LC9039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">describing? For when a man consorts with the many, and exhibits to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9040"></td>
        <td id="LC9040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them his poem or other work of art or the service which he has done</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9041"></td>
        <td id="LC9041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the State, making them his judges when he is not obliged, the so-called</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9042"></td>
        <td id="LC9042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessity of Diomede will oblige him to produce whatever they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9043"></td>
        <td id="LC9043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">praise. And yet the reasons are utterly ludicrous which they give in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9044"></td>
        <td id="LC9044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confirmation of their own notions about the honourable and good. Did you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9045"></td>
        <td id="LC9045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever hear any of them which were not?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9046"></td>
        <td id="LC9046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9047"></td>
        <td id="LC9047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No, nor am I likely to hear.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9048"></td>
        <td id="LC9048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9049"></td>
        <td id="LC9049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You recognise the truth of what I have been saying? Then let me ask you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9050"></td>
        <td id="LC9050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to consider further whether the world will ever be induced to believe in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9051"></td>
        <td id="LC9051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the existence of absolute beauty rather than of the many beautiful, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9052"></td>
        <td id="LC9052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the absolute in each kind rather than of the many in each kind?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9053"></td>
        <td id="LC9053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9054"></td>
        <td id="LC9054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9055"></td>
        <td id="LC9055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9056"></td>
        <td id="LC9056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the world cannot possibly be a philosopher?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9057"></td>
        <td id="LC9057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9058"></td>
        <td id="LC9058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Impossible.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9059"></td>
        <td id="LC9059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9060"></td>
        <td id="LC9060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And therefore philosophers must inevitably fall under the censure of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9061"></td>
        <td id="LC9061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">world?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9062"></td>
        <td id="LC9062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9063"></td>
        <td id="LC9063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They must.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9064"></td>
        <td id="LC9064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9065"></td>
        <td id="LC9065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And of individuals who consort with the mob and seek to please them?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9066"></td>
        <td id="LC9066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9067"></td>
        <td id="LC9067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is evident.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9068"></td>
        <td id="LC9068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9069"></td>
        <td id="LC9069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, do you see any way in which the philosopher can be preserved in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9070"></td>
        <td id="LC9070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his calling to the end? and remember what we were saying of him, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9071"></td>
        <td id="LC9071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was to have quickness and memory and courage and magnificence--these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9072"></td>
        <td id="LC9072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were admitted by us to be the true philosopher&#39;s gifts.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9073"></td>
        <td id="LC9073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9170"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9195"></td>

        <td id="L9198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9198"></td>

        <td id="LC9202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away his life without doing any good either to himself or others, he</td>

</td>

        <td id="L9250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9250"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC9252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The question how the study of philosophy may be so ordered as not to be</td>

</td>
