</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9259"></td>
        <td id="LC9259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I shall not be hindered, I said, by any want of will, but, if at all,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9260"></td>
        <td id="LC9260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by a want of power: my zeal you may see for yourselves; and please to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9261"></td>
        <td id="LC9261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remark in what I am about to say how boldly and unhesitatingly I declare</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9262"></td>
        <td id="LC9262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that States should pursue philosophy, not as they do now, but in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9263"></td>
        <td id="LC9263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">different spirit.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9264"></td>
        <td id="LC9264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9265"></td>
        <td id="LC9265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In what manner?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9266"></td>
        <td id="LC9266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9267"></td>
        <td id="LC9267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At present, I said, the students of philosophy are quite young;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9268"></td>
        <td id="LC9268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beginning when they are hardly past childhood, they devote only the time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9269"></td>
        <td id="LC9269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saved from moneymaking and housekeeping to such pursuits; and even those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9270"></td>
        <td id="LC9270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them who are reputed to have most of the philosophic spirit, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9271"></td>
        <td id="LC9271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they come within sight of the great difficulty of the subject, I mean</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9272"></td>
        <td id="LC9272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dialectic, take themselves off. In after life when invited by some one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9273"></td>
        <td id="LC9273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">else, they may, perhaps, go and hear a lecture, and about this they make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9274"></td>
        <td id="LC9274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much ado, for philosophy is not considered by them to be their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9275"></td>
        <td id="LC9275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proper business: at last, when they grow old, in most cases they are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9276"></td>
        <td id="LC9276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extinguished more truly than Heracleitus&#39; sun, inasmuch as they never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9277"></td>
        <td id="LC9277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light up again. (Heraclitus said that the sun was extinguished every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9278"></td>
        <td id="LC9278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evening and relighted every morning.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9279"></td>
        <td id="LC9279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9280"></td>
        <td id="LC9280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But what ought to be their course?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9281"></td>
        <td id="LC9281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9282"></td>
        <td id="LC9282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just the opposite. In childhood and youth their study, and what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9283"></td>
        <td id="LC9283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosophy they learn, should be suited to their tender years: during</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9284"></td>
        <td id="LC9284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this period while they are growing up towards manhood, the chief and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9285"></td>
        <td id="LC9285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">special care should be given to their bodies that they may have them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9286"></td>
        <td id="LC9286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to use in the service of philosophy; as life advances and the intellect</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9287"></td>
        <td id="LC9287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">begins to mature, let them increase the gymnastics of the soul; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9288"></td>
        <td id="LC9288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when the strength of our citizens fails and is past civil and military</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9289"></td>
        <td id="LC9289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">duties, then let them range at will and engage in no serious labour,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9290"></td>
        <td id="LC9290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as we intend them to live happily here, and to crown this life with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9291"></td>
        <td id="LC9291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">similar happiness in another.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9292"></td>
        <td id="LC9292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9293"></td>
        <td id="LC9293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How truly in earnest you are, Socrates! he said; I am sure of that; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9294"></td>
        <td id="LC9294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet most of your hearers, if I am not mistaken, are likely to be still</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9295"></td>
        <td id="LC9295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more earnest in their opposition to you, and will never be convinced;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9296"></td>
        <td id="LC9296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thrasymachus least of all.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9297"></td>
        <td id="LC9297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9298"></td>
        <td id="LC9298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Do not make a quarrel, I said, between Thrasymachus and me, who have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9299"></td>
        <td id="LC9299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recently become friends, although, indeed, we were never enemies; for I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9300"></td>
        <td id="LC9300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall go on striving to the utmost until I either convert him and other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9301"></td>
        <td id="LC9301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men, or do something which may profit them against the day when they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9302"></td>
        <td id="LC9302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">live again, and hold the like discourse in another state of existence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9303"></td>
        <td id="LC9303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9304"></td>
        <td id="LC9304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You are speaking of a time which is not very near.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9305"></td>
        <td id="LC9305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9306"></td>
        <td id="LC9306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Rather, I replied, of a time which is as nothing in comparison with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9307"></td>
        <td id="LC9307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eternity. Nevertheless, I do not wonder that the many refuse to believe;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9308"></td>
        <td id="LC9308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for they have never seen that of which we are now speaking realized;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9309"></td>
        <td id="LC9309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they have seen only a conventional imitation of philosophy, consisting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9310"></td>
        <td id="LC9310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of words artificially brought together, not like these of ours having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9311"></td>
        <td id="LC9311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a natural unity. But a human being who in word and work is perfectly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9312"></td>
        <td id="LC9312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moulded, as far as he can be, into the proportion and likeness of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9313"></td>
        <td id="LC9313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">virtue--such a man ruling in a city which bears the same image, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9314"></td>
        <td id="LC9314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have never yet seen, neither one nor many of them--do you think that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9315"></td>
        <td id="LC9315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they ever did?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9316"></td>
        <td id="LC9316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9317"></td>
        <td id="LC9317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No indeed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9318"></td>
        <td id="LC9318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9319"></td>
        <td id="LC9319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No, my friend, and they have seldom, if ever, heard free and noble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9320"></td>
        <td id="LC9320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sentiments; such as men utter when they are earnestly and by every means</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9321"></td>
        <td id="LC9321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in their power seeking after truth for the sake of knowledge, while</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9322"></td>
        <td id="LC9322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they look coldly on the subtleties of controversy, of which the end is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9323"></td>
        <td id="LC9323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opinion and strife, whether they meet with them in the courts of law or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9324"></td>
        <td id="LC9324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in society.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9325"></td>
        <td id="LC9325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9326"></td>
        <td id="LC9326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They are strangers, he said, to the words of which you speak.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9327"></td>
        <td id="LC9327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9328"></td>
        <td id="LC9328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And this was what we foresaw, and this was the reason why truth forced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9329"></td>
        <td id="LC9329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us to admit, not without fear and hesitation, that neither cities nor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9330"></td>
        <td id="LC9330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">States nor individuals will ever attain perfection until the small</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9331"></td>
        <td id="LC9331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">class of philosophers whom we termed useless but not corrupt are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9332"></td>
        <td id="LC9332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">providentially compelled, whether they will or not, to take care of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9333"></td>
        <td id="LC9333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">State, and until a like necessity be laid on the State to obey them; or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9334"></td>
        <td id="LC9334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">until kings, or if not kings, the sons of kings or princes, are divinely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9335"></td>
        <td id="LC9335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inspired with a true love of true philosophy. That either or both of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9336"></td>
        <td id="LC9336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these alternatives are impossible, I see no reason to affirm: if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9337"></td>
        <td id="LC9337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were so, we might indeed be justly ridiculed as dreamers and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9338"></td>
        <td id="LC9338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">visionaries. Am I not right?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9339"></td>
        <td id="LC9339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9340"></td>
        <td id="LC9340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quite right.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9341"></td>
        <td id="LC9341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9342"></td>
        <td id="LC9342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If then, in the countless ages of the past, or at the present hour in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9343"></td>
        <td id="LC9343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some foreign clime which is far away and beyond our ken, the perfected</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9344"></td>
        <td id="LC9344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosopher is or has been or hereafter shall be compelled by a superior</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9345"></td>
        <td id="LC9345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power to have the charge of the State, we are ready to assert to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9346"></td>
        <td id="LC9346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death, that this our constitution has been, and is--yea, and will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9347"></td>
        <td id="LC9347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whenever the Muse of Philosophy is queen. There is no impossibility in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9348"></td>
        <td id="LC9348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all this; that there is a difficulty, we acknowledge ourselves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9349"></td>
        <td id="LC9349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9350"></td>
        <td id="LC9350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My opinion agrees with yours, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9351"></td>
        <td id="LC9351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9352"></td>
        <td id="LC9352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But do you mean to say that this is not the opinion of the multitude?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9353"></td>
        <td id="LC9353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9354"></td>
        <td id="LC9354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should imagine not, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9355"></td>
        <td id="LC9355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9356"></td>
        <td id="LC9356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">O my friend, I said, do not attack the multitude: they will change their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9357"></td>
        <td id="LC9357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minds, if, not in an aggressive spirit, but gently and with the view</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9358"></td>
        <td id="LC9358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of soothing them and removing their dislike of over-education, you show</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9359"></td>
        <td id="LC9359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them your philosophers as they really are and describe as you were just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9360"></td>
        <td id="LC9360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now doing their character and profession, and then mankind will see that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9361"></td>
        <td id="LC9361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he of whom you are speaking is not such as they supposed--if they view</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9362"></td>
        <td id="LC9362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him in this new light, they will surely change their notion of him, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9363"></td>
        <td id="LC9363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer in another strain. Who can be at enmity with one who loves them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9364"></td>
        <td id="LC9364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who that is himself gentle and free from envy will be jealous of one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9365"></td>
        <td id="LC9365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in whom there is no jealousy? Nay, let me answer for you, that in a few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9366"></td>
        <td id="LC9366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this harsh temper may be found but not in the majority of mankind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9367"></td>
        <td id="LC9367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9368"></td>
        <td id="LC9368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I quite agree with you, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9369"></td>
        <td id="LC9369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9370"></td>
        <td id="LC9370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And do you not also think, as I do, that the harsh feeling which the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9371"></td>
        <td id="LC9371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many entertain towards philosophy originates in the pretenders, who rush</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9372"></td>
        <td id="LC9372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in uninvited, and are always abusing them, and finding fault with them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9373"></td>
        <td id="LC9373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who make persons instead of things the theme of their conversation? and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9374"></td>
        <td id="LC9374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing can be more unbecoming in philosophers than this.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9375"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9376"></td>
        <td id="LC9376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is most unbecoming.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9377"></td>
        <td id="LC9377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9378"></td>
        <td id="LC9378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For he, Adeimantus, whose mind is fixed upon true being, has surely no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9379"></td>
        <td id="LC9379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time to look down upon the affairs of earth, or to be filled with malice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9380"></td>
        <td id="LC9380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and envy, contending against men; his eye is ever directed towards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9381"></td>
        <td id="LC9381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things fixed and immutable, which he sees neither injuring nor injured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9382"></td>
        <td id="LC9382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by one another, but all in order moving according to reason; these he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9383"></td>
        <td id="LC9383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imitates, and to these he will, as far as he can, conform himself. Can a</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9384"></td>
        <td id="LC9384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man help imitating that with which he holds reverential converse?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9385"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9386"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9388"></td>
        <td id="LC9388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the philosopher holding converse with the divine order, becomes</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9389"></td>
        <td id="LC9389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">orderly and divine, as far as the nature of man allows; but like every</td>

        <td id="L9390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9390"></td>
        <td id="LC9390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one else, he will suffer from detraction.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9391"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9392"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9393"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9394"></td>
        <td id="LC9394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And if a necessity be laid upon him of fashioning, not only himself,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9395"></td>
        <td id="LC9395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but human nature generally, whether in States or individuals, into</td>

        <td id="L9396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9396"></td>
        <td id="LC9396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that which he beholds elsewhere, will he, think you, be an unskilful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9397"></td>
        <td id="LC9397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">artificer of justice, temperance, and every civil virtue?</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9401"></td>
        <td id="LC9401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And if the world perceives that what we are saying about him is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9402"></td>
        <td id="LC9402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">truth, will they be angry with philosophy? Will they disbelieve us, when</td>

        <td id="L9403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9403"></td>
        <td id="LC9403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we tell them that no State can be happy which is not designed by artists</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9404"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L9406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9406"></td>

        <td id="L9407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9407"></td>
        <td id="LC9407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">draw out the plan of which you are speaking?</td>

        <td id="L9408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9408"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9409"></td>
        <td id="LC9409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They will begin by taking the State and the manners of men, from which,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9410"></td>
        <td id="LC9410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as from a tablet, they will rub out the picture, and leave a clean</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9411"></td>
        <td id="LC9411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surface. This is no easy task. But whether easy or not, herein will lie</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9412"></td>
        <td id="LC9412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the difference between them and every other legislator,--they will have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9413"></td>
        <td id="LC9413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing to do either with individual or State, and will inscribe no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9414"></td>
        <td id="LC9414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laws, until they have either found, or themselves made, a clean surface.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9415"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L9416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9416"></td>
        <td id="LC9416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They will be very right, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9417"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L9419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9419"></td>
        <td id="LC9419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constitution?</td>

</td>

        <td id="L9421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9421"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9423"></td>
        <td id="LC9423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And when they are filling in the work, as I conceive, they will often</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9424"></td>
        <td id="LC9424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turn their eyes upwards and downwards: I mean that they will first look</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9425"></td>
        <td id="LC9425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at absolute justice and beauty and temperance, and again at the human</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9426"></td>
        <td id="LC9426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">copy; and will mingle and temper the various elements of life into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9427"></td>
        <td id="LC9427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">image of a man; and this they will conceive according to that other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9428"></td>
        <td id="LC9428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">image, which, when existing among men, Homer calls the form and likeness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9429"></td>
        <td id="LC9429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of God.</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L9431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9431"></td>
        <td id="LC9431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9432"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9433"></td>
        <td id="LC9433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And one feature they will erase, and another they will put in, until</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9434"></td>
        <td id="LC9434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they have made the ways of men, as far as possible, agreeable to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9435"></td>
        <td id="LC9435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ways of God?</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9436"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9437"></td>
        <td id="LC9437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Indeed, he said, in no way could they make a fairer picture.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9438"></td>
        <td id="LC9438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9439"></td>
        <td id="LC9439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now, I said, are we beginning to persuade those whom you described</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9440"></td>
        <td id="LC9440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as rushing at us with might and main, that the painter of constitutions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9441"></td>
        <td id="LC9441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is such an one as we are praising; at whom they were so very indignant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9442"></td>
        <td id="LC9442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because to his hands we committed the State; and are they growing a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9443"></td>
        <td id="LC9443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little calmer at what they have just heard?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9444"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L9445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9445"></td>
        <td id="LC9445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Much calmer, if there is any sense in them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9446"></td>
        <td id="LC9446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9447"></td>
        <td id="LC9447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, where can they still find any ground for objection? Will they doubt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9448"></td>
        <td id="LC9448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the philosopher is a lover of truth and being?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9449"></td>
        <td id="LC9449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9450"></td>
        <td id="LC9450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They would not be so unreasonable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9451"></td>
        <td id="LC9451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9452"></td>
        <td id="LC9452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Or that his nature, being such as we have delineated, is akin to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9453"></td>
        <td id="LC9453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">highest good?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9454"></td>
        <td id="LC9454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9455"></td>
        <td id="LC9455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither can they doubt this.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9456"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L9457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9457"></td>
        <td id="LC9457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But again, will they tell us that such a nature, placed under favourable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9458"></td>
        <td id="LC9458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circumstances, will not be perfectly good and wise if any ever was? Or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9459"></td>
        <td id="LC9459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will they prefer those whom we have rejected?</td>

        <td id="L9463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9463"></td>

        <td id="LC9465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this our imaginary State ever be realized?</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC9481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And when they have come into being will any one say that they must of</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9522"></td>
        <td id="LC9522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I omitted the troublesome business of the possession of women, and the</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9528"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9529"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC9530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">test of pleasures and pains, and neither in hardships, nor in dangers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC9531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nor at any other critical moment were to lose their patriotism--he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9532"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9533"></td>
        <td id="LC9533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tried in the refiner&#39;s fire, was to be made a ruler, and to receive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9534"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9535"></td>
        <td id="LC9535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was being said, and then the argument turned aside and veiled her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9536"></td>
        <td id="LC9536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face; not liking to stir the question which has now arisen.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9538"></td>

        <td id="L9539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9539"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9540"></td>
        <td id="LC9540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, my friend, I said, and I then shrank from hazarding the bold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9541"></td>
        <td id="LC9541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">word; but now let me dare to say--that the perfect guardian must be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9542"></td>
        <td id="LC9542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosopher.</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9545"></td>
        <td id="LC9545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9546"></td>
        <td id="LC9546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And do not suppose that there will be many of them; for the gifts which</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9547"></td>
        <td id="LC9547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were deemed by us to be essential rarely grow together; they are mostly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9548"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9549"></td>
        <td id="LC9549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9550"></td>
        <td id="LC9550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9551"></td>
        <td id="LC9551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9552"></td>
        <td id="LC9552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You are aware, I replied, that quick intelligence, memory, sagacity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9553"></td>
        <td id="LC9553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cleverness, and similar qualities, do not often grow together, and that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9554"></td>
        <td id="LC9554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persons who possess them and are at the same time high-spirited and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9555"></td>
        <td id="LC9555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">magnanimous are not so constituted by nature as to live orderly and in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9556"></td>
        <td id="LC9556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peaceful and settled manner; they are driven any way by their impulses,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9557"></td>
        <td id="LC9557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and all solid principle goes out of them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9558"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9559"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L9641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9641"></td>
        <td id="LC9641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nay, I said, ask if you will; but I am certain that you have heard the</td>

        <td id="L9642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9642"></td>
        <td id="LC9642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer many times, and now you either do not understand me or, as I</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9644"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9645"></td>
        <td id="LC9645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other things become useful and advantageous only by their use of this.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9646"></td>
        <td id="LC9646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You can hardly be ignorant that of this I was about to speak, concerning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9647"></td>
        <td id="LC9647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which, as you have often heard me say, we know so little; and, without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9648"></td>
        <td id="LC9648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which, any other knowledge or possession of any kind will profit us</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9649"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10036"></td>
        <td id="LC10036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contemplate them appear to you not to exercise the higher reason</td>

        <td id="L10040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10040"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L10043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10043"></td>

        <td id="L10130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10130"></td>

        <td id="LC10131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rugged ascent, and held fast until he is forced into the presence of</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10132"></td>

        <td id="L10227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10227"></td>

        <td id="L10313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10313"></td>
        <td id="LC10313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean?</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC10316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allowed; they must be made to descend again among the prisoners in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10317"></td>
        <td id="LC10317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">den, and partake of their labours and honours, whether they are worth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10318"></td>
        <td id="LC10318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">having or not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10319"></td>
        <td id="LC10319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10320"></td>
        <td id="LC10320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But is not this unjust? he said; ought we to give them a worse life,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10321"></td>
        <td id="LC10321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when they might have a better?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10322"></td>
        <td id="LC10322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10323"></td>
        <td id="LC10323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You have again forgotten, my friend, I said, the intention of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10324"></td>
        <td id="LC10324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">legislator, who did not aim at making any one class in the State happy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10325"></td>
        <td id="LC10325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">above the rest; the happiness was to be in the whole State, and he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10326"></td>
        <td id="LC10326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">held the citizens together by persuasion and necessity, making them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10327"></td>
        <td id="LC10327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">benefactors of the State, and therefore benefactors of one another;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10328"></td>
        <td id="LC10328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to this end he created them, not to please themselves, but to be his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10329"></td>
        <td id="LC10329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instruments in binding up the State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10330"></td>
        <td id="LC10330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10331"></td>
        <td id="LC10331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he said, I had forgotten.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10332"></td>
        <td id="LC10332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10333"></td>
        <td id="LC10333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Observe, Glaucon, that there will be no injustice in compelling our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10334"></td>
        <td id="LC10334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosophers to have a care and providence of others; we shall explain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10335"></td>
        <td id="LC10335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to them that in other States, men of their class are not obliged to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10336"></td>
        <td id="LC10336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">share in the toils of politics: and this is reasonable, for they grow up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10337"></td>
        <td id="LC10337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at their own sweet will, and the government would rather not have them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10338"></td>
        <td id="LC10338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Being self-taught, they cannot be expected to show any gratitude for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10339"></td>
        <td id="LC10339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">culture which they have never received. But we have brought you into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10340"></td>
        <td id="LC10340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the world to be rulers of the hive, kings of yourselves and of the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10341"></td>
        <td id="LC10341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">citizens, and have educated you far better and more perfectly than they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10342"></td>
        <td id="LC10342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have been educated, and you are better able to share in the double duty.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10343"></td>
        <td id="LC10343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wherefore each of you, when his turn comes, must go down to the general</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10344"></td>
        <td id="LC10344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">underground abode, and get the habit of seeing in the dark. When you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10345"></td>
        <td id="LC10345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have acquired the habit, you will see ten thousand times better than the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10346"></td>
        <td id="LC10346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inhabitants of the den, and you will know what the several images are,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10347"></td>
        <td id="LC10347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and what they represent, because you have seen the beautiful and just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10348"></td>
        <td id="LC10348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and good in their truth. And thus our State, which is also yours, will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10349"></td>
        <td id="LC10349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be a reality, and not a dream only, and will be administered in a spirit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10350"></td>
        <td id="LC10350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unlike that of other States, in which men fight with one another about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10351"></td>
        <td id="LC10351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shadows only and are distracted in the struggle for power, which in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10352"></td>
        <td id="LC10352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their eyes is a great good. Whereas the truth is that the State in which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10353"></td>
        <td id="LC10353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rulers are most reluctant to govern is always the best and most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10354"></td>
        <td id="LC10354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quietly governed, and the State in which they are most eager, the worst.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10355"></td>
        <td id="LC10355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10356"></td>
        <td id="LC10356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quite true, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10357"></td>
        <td id="LC10357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10358"></td>
        <td id="LC10358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And will our pupils, when they hear this, refuse to take their turn at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10359"></td>
        <td id="LC10359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the toils of State, when they are allowed to spend the greater part of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10360"></td>
        <td id="LC10360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their time with one another in the heavenly light?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10361"></td>
        <td id="LC10361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10362"></td>
        <td id="LC10362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Impossible, he answered; for they are just men, and the commands which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10363"></td>
        <td id="LC10363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we impose upon them are just; there can be no doubt that every one of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10364"></td>
        <td id="LC10364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them will take office as a stern necessity, and not after the fashion of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10365"></td>
        <td id="LC10365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our present rulers of State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10366"></td>
        <td id="LC10366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10367"></td>
        <td id="LC10367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, my friend, I said; and there lies the point. You must contrive for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10368"></td>
        <td id="LC10368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your future rulers another and a better life than that of a ruler, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10369"></td>
        <td id="LC10369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then you may have a well-ordered State; for only in the State which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10370"></td>
        <td id="LC10370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">offers this, will they rule who are truly rich, not in silver and gold,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10371"></td>
        <td id="LC10371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but in virtue and wisdom, which are the true blessings of life. Whereas</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10372"></td>
        <td id="LC10372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if they go to the administration of public affairs, poor and hungering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10373"></td>
        <td id="LC10373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after their own private advantage, thinking that hence they are to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10374"></td>
        <td id="LC10374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snatch the chief good, order there can never be; for they will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10375"></td>
        <td id="LC10375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fighting about office, and the civil and domestic broils which thus</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10376"></td>
        <td id="LC10376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arise will be the ruin of the rulers themselves and of the whole State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10377"></td>
        <td id="LC10377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10378"></td>
        <td id="LC10378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most true, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10379"></td>
        <td id="LC10379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10380"></td>
        <td id="LC10380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the only life which looks down upon the life of political ambition</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10381"></td>
        <td id="LC10381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is that of true philosophy. Do you know of any other?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10382"></td>
        <td id="LC10382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10383"></td>
        <td id="LC10383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Indeed, I do not, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10384"></td>
        <td id="LC10384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10385"></td>
        <td id="LC10385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And those who govern ought not to be lovers of the task? For, if they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10386"></td>
        <td id="LC10386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are, there will be rival lovers, and they will fight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10387"></td>
        <td id="LC10387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10388"></td>
        <td id="LC10388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No question.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10389"></td>
        <td id="LC10389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10390"></td>
        <td id="LC10390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Who then are those whom we shall compel to be guardians? Surely they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10391"></td>
        <td id="LC10391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be the men who are wisest about affairs of State, and by whom the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10392"></td>
        <td id="LC10392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">State is best administered, and who at the same time have other honours</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10393"></td>
        <td id="LC10393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and another and a better life than that of politics?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10394"></td>
        <td id="LC10394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10395"></td>
        <td id="LC10395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They are the men, and I will choose them, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10396"></td>
        <td id="LC10396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10397"></td>
        <td id="LC10397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now shall we consider in what way such guardians will be produced,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10398"></td>
        <td id="LC10398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and how they are to be brought from darkness to light,--as some are said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10399"></td>
        <td id="LC10399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to have ascended from the world below to the gods?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10400"></td>
        <td id="LC10400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10401"></td>
        <td id="LC10401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By all means, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10402"></td>
        <td id="LC10402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10403"></td>
        <td id="LC10403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The process, I said, is not the turning over of an oyster-shell (In</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10404"></td>
        <td id="LC10404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allusion to a game in which two parties fled or pursued according as an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10405"></td>
        <td id="LC10405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oyster-shell which was thrown into the air fell with the dark or light</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10406"></td>
        <td id="LC10406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">side uppermost.), but the turning round of a soul passing from a day</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10407"></td>
        <td id="LC10407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which is little better than night to the true day of being, that is, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10408"></td>
        <td id="LC10408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ascent from below, which we affirm to be true philosophy?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10409"></td>
        <td id="LC10409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10410"></td>
        <td id="LC10410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quite so.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10411"></td>
        <td id="LC10411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10412"></td>
        <td id="LC10412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And should we not enquire what sort of knowledge has the power of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10413"></td>
        <td id="LC10413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effecting such a change?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10414"></td>
        <td id="LC10414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10415"></td>
        <td id="LC10415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10416"></td>
        <td id="LC10416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
