      <tr>
        <td id="L10807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10807"></td>
        <td id="LC10807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the soul which, when by other pursuits lost and dimmed, is by these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10808"></td>
        <td id="LC10808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purified and re-illumined; and is more precious far than ten thousand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10809"></td>
        <td id="LC10809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bodily eyes, for by it alone is truth seen. Now there are two classes of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10810"></td>
        <td id="LC10810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persons: one class of those who will agree with you and will take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10811"></td>
        <td id="LC10811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your words as a revelation; another class to whom they will be utterly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10812"></td>
        <td id="LC10812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unmeaning, and who will naturally deem them to be idle tales, for they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10813"></td>
        <td id="LC10813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see no sort of profit which is to be obtained from them. And therefore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10814"></td>
        <td id="LC10814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you had better decide at once with which of the two you are proposing to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10815"></td>
        <td id="LC10815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">argue. You will very likely say with neither, and that your chief aim in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10816"></td>
        <td id="LC10816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carrying on the argument is your own improvement; at the same time you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10817"></td>
        <td id="LC10817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do not grudge to others any benefit which they may receive.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10818"></td>
        <td id="LC10818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10819"></td>
        <td id="LC10819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I think that I should prefer to carry on the argument mainly on my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10820"></td>
        <td id="LC10820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behalf.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10821"></td>
        <td id="LC10821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10822"></td>
        <td id="LC10822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then take a step backward, for we have gone wrong in the order of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10823"></td>
        <td id="LC10823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sciences.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10824"></td>
        <td id="LC10824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10825"></td>
        <td id="LC10825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What was the mistake? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10826"></td>
        <td id="LC10826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10827"></td>
        <td id="LC10827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After plane geometry, I said, we proceeded at once to solids in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10828"></td>
        <td id="LC10828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">revolution, instead of taking solids in themselves; whereas after the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10829"></td>
        <td id="LC10829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">second dimension the third, which is concerned with cubes and dimensions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10830"></td>
        <td id="LC10830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of depth, ought to have followed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10831"></td>
        <td id="LC10831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10832"></td>
        <td id="LC10832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is true, Socrates; but so little seems to be known as yet about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10833"></td>
        <td id="LC10833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these subjects.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10834"></td>
        <td id="LC10834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10835"></td>
        <td id="LC10835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, yes, I said, and for two reasons:--in the first place, no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10836"></td>
        <td id="LC10836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">government patronises them; this leads to a want of energy in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10837"></td>
        <td id="LC10837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pursuit of them, and they are difficult; in the second place, students</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10838"></td>
        <td id="LC10838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cannot learn them unless they have a director. But then a director</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10839"></td>
        <td id="LC10839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can hardly be found, and even if he could, as matters now stand,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10840"></td>
        <td id="LC10840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the students, who are very conceited, would not attend to him. That,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10841"></td>
        <td id="LC10841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, would be otherwise if the whole State became the director of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10842"></td>
        <td id="LC10842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these studies and gave honour to them; then disciples would want to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10843"></td>
        <td id="LC10843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come, and there would be continuous and earnest search, and discoveries</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10844"></td>
        <td id="LC10844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would be made; since even now, disregarded as they are by the world, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10845"></td>
        <td id="LC10845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maimed of their fair proportions, and although none of their votaries</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10846"></td>
        <td id="LC10846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can tell the use of them, still these studies force their way by their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10847"></td>
        <td id="LC10847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">natural charm, and very likely, if they had the help of the State, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10848"></td>
        <td id="LC10848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would some day emerge into light.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10849"></td>
        <td id="LC10849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10850"></td>
        <td id="LC10850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, there is a remarkable charm in them. But I do not clearly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10851"></td>
        <td id="LC10851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understand the change in the order. First you began with a geometry of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10852"></td>
        <td id="LC10852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plane surfaces?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10853"></td>
        <td id="LC10853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10854"></td>
        <td id="LC10854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10855"></td>
        <td id="LC10855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10856"></td>
        <td id="LC10856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And you placed astronomy next, and then you made a step backward?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10857"></td>
        <td id="LC10857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10858"></td>
        <td id="LC10858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, and I have delayed you by my hurry; the ludicrous state of solid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10859"></td>
        <td id="LC10859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">geometry, which, in natural order, should have followed, made me pass</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10860"></td>
        <td id="LC10860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over this branch and go on to astronomy, or motion of solids.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10861"></td>
        <td id="LC10861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10862"></td>
        <td id="LC10862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10863"></td>
        <td id="LC10863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10864"></td>
        <td id="LC10864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then assuming that the science now omitted would come into existence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10865"></td>
        <td id="LC10865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if encouraged by the State, let us go on to astronomy, which will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10866"></td>
        <td id="LC10866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fourth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10867"></td>
        <td id="LC10867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10868"></td>
        <td id="LC10868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The right order, he replied. And now, Socrates, as you rebuked the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10869"></td>
        <td id="LC10869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vulgar manner in which I praised astronomy before, my praise shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10870"></td>
        <td id="LC10870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be given in your own spirit. For every one, as I think, must see that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10871"></td>
        <td id="LC10871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">astronomy compels the soul to look upwards and leads us from this world</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10872"></td>
        <td id="LC10872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to another.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10873"></td>
        <td id="LC10873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10874"></td>
        <td id="LC10874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Every one but myself, I said; to every one else this may be clear, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10875"></td>
        <td id="LC10875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not to me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10876"></td>
        <td id="LC10876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10877"></td>
        <td id="LC10877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what then would you say?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10878"></td>
        <td id="LC10878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10879"></td>
        <td id="LC10879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should rather say that those who elevate astronomy into philosophy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10880"></td>
        <td id="LC10880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appear to me to make us look downwards and not upwards.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10881"></td>
        <td id="LC10881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10882"></td>
        <td id="LC10882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean? he asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10883"></td>
        <td id="LC10883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10884"></td>
        <td id="LC10884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You, I replied, have in your mind a truly sublime conception of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10885"></td>
        <td id="LC10885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowledge of the things above. And I dare say that if a person were to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10886"></td>
        <td id="LC10886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throw his head back and study the fretted ceiling, you would still think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10887"></td>
        <td id="LC10887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that his mind was the percipient, and not his eyes. And you are very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10888"></td>
        <td id="LC10888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">likely right, and I may be a simpleton: but, in my opinion, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10889"></td>
        <td id="LC10889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowledge only which is of being and of the unseen can make the soul</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10890"></td>
        <td id="LC10890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">look upwards, and whether a man gapes at the heavens or blinks on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10891"></td>
        <td id="LC10891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ground, seeking to learn some particular of sense, I would deny that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10892"></td>
        <td id="LC10892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can learn, for nothing of that sort is matter of science; his soul is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10893"></td>
        <td id="LC10893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking downwards, not upwards, whether his way to knowledge is by water</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10894"></td>
        <td id="LC10894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or by land, whether he floats, or only lies on his back.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10895"></td>
        <td id="LC10895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10896"></td>
        <td id="LC10896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I acknowledge, he said, the justice of your rebuke. Still, I should like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10897"></td>
        <td id="LC10897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to ascertain how astronomy can be learned in any manner more conducive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10898"></td>
        <td id="LC10898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to that knowledge of which we are speaking?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10899"></td>
        <td id="LC10899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10900"></td>
        <td id="LC10900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will tell you, I said: The starry heaven which we behold is wrought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10901"></td>
        <td id="LC10901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon a visible ground, and therefore, although the fairest and most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10902"></td>
        <td id="LC10902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perfect of visible things, must necessarily be deemed inferior far to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10903"></td>
        <td id="LC10903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the true motions of absolute swiftness and absolute slowness, which are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10904"></td>
        <td id="LC10904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relative to each other, and carry with them that which is contained in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10905"></td>
        <td id="LC10905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, in the true number and in every true figure. Now, these are to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10906"></td>
        <td id="LC10906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apprehended by reason and intelligence, but not by sight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10907"></td>
        <td id="LC10907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10908"></td>
        <td id="LC10908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10909"></td>
        <td id="LC10909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10910"></td>
        <td id="LC10910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The spangled heavens should be used as a pattern and with a view to that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10911"></td>
        <td id="LC10911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">higher knowledge; their beauty is like the beauty of figures or pictures</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10912"></td>
        <td id="LC10912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excellently wrought by the hand of Daedalus, or some other great artist,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10913"></td>
        <td id="LC10913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which we may chance to behold; any geometrician who saw them would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10914"></td>
        <td id="LC10914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appreciate the exquisiteness of their workmanship, but he would never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10915"></td>
        <td id="LC10915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dream of thinking that in them he could find the true equal or the true</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10916"></td>
        <td id="LC10916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">double, or the truth of any other proportion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10917"></td>
        <td id="LC10917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10918"></td>
        <td id="LC10918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No, he replied, such an idea would be ridiculous.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10919"></td>
        <td id="LC10919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10920"></td>
        <td id="LC10920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And will not a true astronomer have the same feeling when he looks at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10921"></td>
        <td id="LC10921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the movements of the stars? Will he not think that heaven and the things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10922"></td>
        <td id="LC10922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in heaven are framed by the Creator of them in the most perfect manner?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10923"></td>
        <td id="LC10923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But he will never imagine that the proportions of night and day, or of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10924"></td>
        <td id="LC10924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both to the month, or of the month to the year, or of the stars to these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10925"></td>
        <td id="LC10925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and to one another, and any other things that are material and visible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10926"></td>
        <td id="LC10926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can also be eternal and subject to no deviation--that would be absurd;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10927"></td>
        <td id="LC10927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and it is equally absurd to take so much pains in investigating their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10928"></td>
        <td id="LC10928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exact truth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10929"></td>
        <td id="LC10929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10930"></td>
        <td id="LC10930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I quite agree, though I never thought of this before.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10931"></td>
        <td id="LC10931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10932"></td>
        <td id="LC10932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, I said, in astronomy, as in geometry, we should employ problems,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10933"></td>
        <td id="LC10933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and let the heavens alone if we would approach the subject in the right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10934"></td>
        <td id="LC10934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way and so make the natural gift of reason to be of any real use.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10935"></td>
        <td id="LC10935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10936"></td>
        <td id="LC10936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That, he said, is a work infinitely beyond our present astronomers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10937"></td>
        <td id="LC10937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10938"></td>
        <td id="LC10938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said; and there are many other things which must also have a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10939"></td>
        <td id="LC10939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">similar extension given to them, if our legislation is to be of any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10940"></td>
        <td id="LC10940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">value. But can you tell me of any other suitable study?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10941"></td>
        <td id="LC10941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10942"></td>
        <td id="LC10942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No, he said, not without thinking.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10943"></td>
        <td id="LC10943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10944"></td>
        <td id="LC10944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Motion, I said, has many forms, and not one only; two of them are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10945"></td>
        <td id="LC10945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">obvious enough even to wits no better than ours; and there are others,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10946"></td>
        <td id="LC10946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as I imagine, which may be left to wiser persons.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10947"></td>
        <td id="LC10947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10948"></td>
        <td id="LC10948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But where are the two?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10949"></td>
        <td id="LC10949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10950"></td>
        <td id="LC10950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is a second, I said, which is the counterpart of the one already</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10951"></td>
        <td id="LC10951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">named.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10952"></td>
        <td id="LC10952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10953"></td>
        <td id="LC10953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what may that be?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10954"></td>
        <td id="LC10954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10955"></td>
        <td id="LC10955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The second, I said, would seem relatively to the ears to be what the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10956"></td>
        <td id="LC10956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first is to the eyes; for I conceive that as the eyes are designed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10957"></td>
        <td id="LC10957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">look up at the stars, so are the ears to hear harmonious motions; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10958"></td>
        <td id="LC10958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these are sister sciences--as the Pythagoreans say, and we, Glaucon,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10959"></td>
        <td id="LC10959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agree with them?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10960"></td>
        <td id="LC10960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10961"></td>
        <td id="LC10961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10962"></td>
        <td id="LC10962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10963"></td>
        <td id="LC10963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But this, I said, is a laborious study, and therefore we had better go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10964"></td>
        <td id="LC10964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and learn of them; and they will tell us whether there are any other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10965"></td>
        <td id="LC10965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">applications of these sciences. At the same time, we must not lose sight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10966"></td>
        <td id="LC10966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of our own higher object.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10967"></td>
        <td id="LC10967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10968"></td>
        <td id="LC10968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What is that?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10969"></td>
        <td id="LC10969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10970"></td>
        <td id="LC10970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is a perfection which all knowledge ought to reach, and which our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10971"></td>
        <td id="LC10971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pupils ought also to attain, and not to fall short of, as I was saying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10972"></td>
        <td id="LC10972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that they did in astronomy. For in the science of harmony, as you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10973"></td>
        <td id="LC10973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">probably know, the same thing happens. The teachers of harmony compare</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10974"></td>
        <td id="LC10974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sounds and consonances which are heard only, and their labour, like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10975"></td>
        <td id="LC10975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that of the astronomers, is in vain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10976"></td>
        <td id="LC10976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10977"></td>
        <td id="LC10977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, by heaven! he said; and &#39;tis as good as a play to hear them talking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10978"></td>
        <td id="LC10978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about their condensed notes, as they call them; they put their ears</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10979"></td>
        <td id="LC10979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">close alongside of the strings like persons catching a sound from their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10980"></td>
        <td id="LC10980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neighbour&#39;s wall--one set of them declaring that they distinguish an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10981"></td>
        <td id="LC10981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intermediate note and have found the least interval which should be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10982"></td>
        <td id="LC10982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the unit of measurement; the others insisting that the two sounds have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10983"></td>
        <td id="LC10983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed into the same--either party setting their ears before their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10984"></td>
        <td id="LC10984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understanding.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10985"></td>
        <td id="LC10985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10986"></td>
        <td id="LC10986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You mean, I said, those gentlemen who tease and torture the strings and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10987"></td>
        <td id="LC10987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rack them on the pegs of the instrument: I might carry on the metaphor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10988"></td>
        <td id="LC10988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and speak after their manner of the blows which the plectrum gives,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10989"></td>
        <td id="LC10989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and make accusations against the strings, both of backwardness and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10990"></td>
        <td id="LC10990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forwardness to sound; but this would be tedious, and therefore I will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10991"></td>
        <td id="LC10991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only say that these are not the men, and that I am referring to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10992"></td>
        <td id="LC10992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pythagoreans, of whom I was just now proposing to enquire about harmony.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10993"></td>
        <td id="LC10993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For they too are in error, like the astronomers; they investigate the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10994"></td>
        <td id="LC10994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">numbers of the harmonies which are heard, but they never attain to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10995"></td>
        <td id="LC10995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">problems--that is to say, they never reach the natural harmonies of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10996"></td>
        <td id="LC10996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">number, or reflect why some numbers are harmonious and others not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10997"></td>
        <td id="LC10997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10998"></td>
        <td id="LC10998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That, he said, is a thing of more than mortal knowledge.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10999"></td>
        <td id="LC10999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11000"></td>
        <td id="LC11000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A thing, I replied, which I would rather call useful; that is, if sought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11001"></td>
        <td id="LC11001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after with a view to the beautiful and good; but if pursued in any other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11002"></td>
        <td id="LC11002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spirit, useless.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11003"></td>
        <td id="LC11003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11004"></td>
        <td id="LC11004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11005"></td>
        <td id="LC11005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11006"></td>
        <td id="LC11006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, when all these studies reach the point of inter-communion and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11007"></td>
        <td id="LC11007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">connection with one another, and come to be considered in their mutual</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11008"></td>
        <td id="LC11008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affinities, then, I think, but not till then, will the pursuit of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11009"></td>
        <td id="LC11009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have a value for our objects; otherwise there is no profit in them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11010"></td>
        <td id="LC11010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11011"></td>
        <td id="LC11011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I suspect so; but you are speaking, Socrates, of a vast work.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11012"></td>
        <td id="LC11012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11013"></td>
        <td id="LC11013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean? I said; the prelude or what? Do you not know that all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11014"></td>
        <td id="LC11014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this is but the prelude to the actual strain which we have to learn? For</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11015"></td>
        <td id="LC11015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you surely would not regard the skilled mathematician as a dialectician?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11016"></td>
        <td id="LC11016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11017"></td>
        <td id="LC11017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Assuredly not, he said; I have hardly ever known a mathematician who was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11018"></td>
        <td id="LC11018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">capable of reasoning.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11019"></td>
        <td id="LC11019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11020"></td>
        <td id="LC11020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But do you imagine that men who are unable to give and take a reason</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11021"></td>
        <td id="LC11021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will have the knowledge which we require of them?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11022"></td>
        <td id="LC11022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11023"></td>
        <td id="LC11023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither can this be supposed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11024"></td>
        <td id="LC11024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11025"></td>
        <td id="LC11025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so, Glaucon, I said, we have at last arrived at the hymn of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11026"></td>
        <td id="LC11026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dialectic. This is that strain which is of the intellect only, but which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11027"></td>
        <td id="LC11027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the faculty of sight will nevertheless be found to imitate; for sight,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11028"></td>
        <td id="LC11028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as you may remember, was imagined by us after a while to behold the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11029"></td>
        <td id="LC11029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">real animals and stars, and last of all the sun himself. And so with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11030"></td>
        <td id="LC11030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dialectic; when a person starts on the discovery of the absolute by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11031"></td>
        <td id="LC11031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the light of reason only, and without any assistance of sense, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11032"></td>
        <td id="LC11032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perseveres until by pure intelligence he arrives at the perception</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11033"></td>
        <td id="LC11033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the absolute good, he at last finds himself at the end of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11034"></td>
        <td id="LC11034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intellectual world, as in the case of sight at the end of the visible.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11035"></td>
        <td id="LC11035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11036"></td>
        <td id="LC11036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Exactly, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11037"></td>
        <td id="LC11037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11038"></td>
        <td id="LC11038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then this is the progress which you call dialectic?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11039"></td>
        <td id="LC11039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11040"></td>
        <td id="LC11040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11041"></td>
        <td id="LC11041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11042"></td>
        <td id="LC11042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the release of the prisoners from chains, and their translation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11043"></td>
        <td id="LC11043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the shadows to the images and to the light, and the ascent from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11044"></td>
        <td id="LC11044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">underground den to the sun, while in his presence they are vainly trying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11045"></td>
        <td id="LC11045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to look on animals and plants and the light of the sun, but are able to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11046"></td>
        <td id="LC11046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perceive even with their weak eyes the images in the water (which are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11047"></td>
        <td id="LC11047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">divine), and are the shadows of true existence (not shadows of images</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11048"></td>
        <td id="LC11048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cast by a light of fire, which compared with the sun is only an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11049"></td>
        <td id="LC11049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">image)--this power of elevating the highest principle in the soul to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11050"></td>
        <td id="LC11050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the contemplation of that which is best in existence, with which we may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11051"></td>
        <td id="LC11051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">compare the raising of that faculty which is the very light of the body</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11052"></td>
        <td id="LC11052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the sight of that which is brightest in the material and visible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11053"></td>
        <td id="LC11053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">world--this power is given, as I was saying, by all that study and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11054"></td>
        <td id="LC11054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pursuit of the arts which has been described.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11055"></td>
        <td id="LC11055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11056"></td>
        <td id="LC11056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I agree in what you are saying, he replied, which may be hard to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11057"></td>
        <td id="LC11057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believe, yet, from another point of view, is harder still to deny. This,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11058"></td>
        <td id="LC11058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, is not a theme to be treated of in passing only, but will have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11059"></td>
        <td id="LC11059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be discussed again and again. And so, whether our conclusion be true</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11060"></td>
        <td id="LC11060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or false, let us assume all this, and proceed at once from the prelude</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11061"></td>
        <td id="LC11061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or preamble to the chief strain (A play upon the Greek word, which means</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11062"></td>
        <td id="LC11062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both &#39;law&#39; and &#39;strain.&#39;), and describe that in like manner. Say, then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11063"></td>
        <td id="LC11063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what is the nature and what are the divisions of dialectic, and what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11064"></td>
        <td id="LC11064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are the paths which lead thither; for these paths will also lead to our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11065"></td>
        <td id="LC11065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">final rest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11066"></td>
        <td id="LC11066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11067"></td>
        <td id="LC11067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dear Glaucon, I said, you will not be able to follow me here, though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11068"></td>
        <td id="LC11068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I would do my best, and you should behold not an image only but the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11069"></td>
        <td id="LC11069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absolute truth, according to my notion. Whether what I told you would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11070"></td>
        <td id="LC11070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or would not have been a reality I cannot venture to say; but you would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11071"></td>
        <td id="LC11071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have seen something like reality; of that I am confident.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11072"></td>
        <td id="LC11072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11073"></td>
        <td id="LC11073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Doubtless, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11074"></td>
        <td id="LC11074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11075"></td>
        <td id="LC11075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But I must also remind you, that the power of dialectic alone can reveal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11076"></td>
        <td id="LC11076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this, and only to one who is a disciple of the previous sciences.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11077"></td>
        <td id="LC11077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11078"></td>
        <td id="LC11078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of that assertion you may be as confident as of the last.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11079"></td>
        <td id="LC11079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11080"></td>
        <td id="LC11080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And assuredly no one will argue that there is any other method</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11081"></td>
        <td id="LC11081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of comprehending by any regular process all true existence or of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11082"></td>
        <td id="LC11082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ascertaining what each thing is in its own nature; for the arts in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11083"></td>
        <td id="LC11083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">general are concerned with the desires or opinions of men, or are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11084"></td>
        <td id="LC11084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cultivated with a view to production and construction, or for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11085"></td>
        <td id="LC11085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preservation of such productions and constructions; and as to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11086"></td>
        <td id="LC11086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mathematical sciences which, as we were saying, have some apprehension</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11087"></td>
        <td id="LC11087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of true being--geometry and the like--they only dream about being,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11088"></td>
        <td id="LC11088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but never can they behold the waking reality so long as they leave the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11089"></td>
        <td id="LC11089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hypotheses which they use unexamined, and are unable to give an account</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11090"></td>
        <td id="LC11090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them. For when a man knows not his own first principle, and when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11091"></td>

        <td id="L11187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11187"></td>
        <td id="LC11187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the body.</td>

        <td id="L11199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11199"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11206"></td>
        <td id="LC11206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the first place, her votary should not have a lame or halting</td>

        <td id="LC11207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">industry--I mean, that he should not be half industrious and half idle:</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC11251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">authors of her disgrace: and my anger made me too vehement.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L11254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11254"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11256"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11270"></td>
        <td id="LC11270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Because a freeman ought not to be a slave in the acquisition of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11271"></td>
        <td id="LC11271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowledge of any kind. Bodily exercise, when compulsory, does no harm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11272"></td>
        <td id="LC11272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the body; but knowledge which is acquired under compulsion obtains no</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11273"></td>
        <td id="LC11273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hold on the mind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11274"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11275"></td>
        <td id="LC11275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11276"></td>
        <td id="LC11276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11277"></td>
        <td id="LC11277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, my good friend, I said, do not use compulsion, but let early</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11278"></td>
        <td id="LC11278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">education be a sort of amusement; you will then be better able to find</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11279"></td>
        <td id="LC11279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out the natural bent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11280"></td>
        <td id="LC11280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11281"></td>
        <td id="LC11281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is a very rational notion, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11282"></td>
        <td id="LC11282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11283"></td>
        <td id="LC11283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Do you remember that the children, too, were to be taken to see the</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11380"></td>
        <td id="LC11380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attract the soul, but do not influence those of us who have any sense of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11381"></td>
        <td id="LC11381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right, and they continue to obey and honour the maxims of their fathers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11382"></td>
        <td id="LC11382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11383"></td>
        <td id="LC11383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11384"></td>
        <td id="LC11384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11385"></td>
        <td id="LC11385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, when a man is in this state, and the questioning spirit asks what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11386"></td>
        <td id="LC11386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is fair or honourable, and he answers as the legislator has taught him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11387"></td>
        <td id="LC11387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and then arguments many and diverse refute his words, until he is driven</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11388"></td>
        <td id="LC11388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into believing that nothing is honourable any more than dishonourable,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11389"></td>
        <td id="LC11389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or just and good any more than the reverse, and so of all the notions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11390"></td>
        <td id="LC11390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which he most valued, do you think that he will still honour and obey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11391"></td>
        <td id="LC11391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them as before?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11392"></td>
        <td id="LC11392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11393"></td>
        <td id="LC11393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Impossible.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11394"></td>
        <td id="LC11394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11395"></td>
        <td id="LC11395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And when he ceases to think them honourable and natural as heretofore,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11396"></td>
        <td id="LC11396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and he fails to discover the true, can he be expected to pursue any life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11397"></td>
        <td id="LC11397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other than that which flatters his desires?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11398"></td>
        <td id="LC11398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11399"></td>
        <td id="LC11399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He cannot.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11400"></td>
        <td id="LC11400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11401"></td>
        <td id="LC11401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And from being a keeper of the law he is converted into a breaker of it?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11402"></td>
        <td id="LC11402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11403"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11405"></td>
        <td id="LC11405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now all this is very natural in students of philosophy such as I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11406"></td>
        <td id="LC11406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">described, and also, as I was just now saying, most excusable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11407"></td>
        <td id="LC11407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11408"></td>
        <td id="LC11408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said; and, I may add, pitiable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11409"></td>
        <td id="LC11409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11410"></td>
        <td id="LC11410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Therefore, that your feelings may not be moved to pity about our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11411"></td>
        <td id="LC11411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">citizens who are now thirty years of age, every care must be taken in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11412"></td>
        <td id="LC11412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">introducing them to dialectic.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11413"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L11415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11415"></td>
