</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11416"></td>
        <td id="LC11416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is a danger lest they should taste the dear delight too early; for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11417"></td>
        <td id="LC11417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">youngsters, as you may have observed, when they first get the taste</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11418"></td>
        <td id="LC11418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in their mouths, argue for amusement, and are always contradicting and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11419"></td>
        <td id="LC11419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">refuting others in imitation of those who refute them; like puppy-dogs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11420"></td>
        <td id="LC11420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they rejoice in pulling and tearing at all who come near them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11421"></td>
        <td id="LC11421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11422"></td>
        <td id="LC11422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, there is nothing which they like better.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11423"></td>
        <td id="LC11423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11424"></td>
        <td id="LC11424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And when they have made many conquests and received defeats at the hands</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC11425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of many, they violently and speedily get into a way of not believing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11426"></td>
        <td id="LC11426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything which they believed before, and hence, not only they, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC11427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosophy and all that relates to it is apt to have a bad name with the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11428"></td>
        <td id="LC11428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest of the world.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11430"></td>
        <td id="LC11430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Too true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11431"></td>
        <td id="LC11431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11432"></td>
        <td id="LC11432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But when a man begins to get older, he will no longer be guilty of such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11433"></td>
        <td id="LC11433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">insanity; he will imitate the dialectician who is seeking for truth, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11434"></td>
        <td id="LC11434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not the eristic, who is contradicting for the sake of amusement; and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11435"></td>
        <td id="LC11435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greater moderation of his character will increase instead of diminishing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11436"></td>
        <td id="LC11436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the honour of the pursuit.</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11438"></td>
        <td id="LC11438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11439"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11440"></td>
        <td id="LC11440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And did we not make special provision for this, when we said that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11441"></td>
        <td id="LC11441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disciples of philosophy were to be orderly and steadfast, not, as now,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11442"></td>

      <tr>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11445"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11446"></td>
        <td id="LC11446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suppose, I said, the study of philosophy to take the place of gymnastics</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11447"></td>
        <td id="LC11447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and to be continued diligently and earnestly and exclusively for twice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11448"></td>
        <td id="LC11448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the number of years which were passed in bodily exercise--will that be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11449"></td>
        <td id="LC11449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11450"></td>
        <td id="LC11450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11451"></td>
        <td id="LC11451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Would you say six or four years? he asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11452"></td>
        <td id="LC11452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11453"></td>
        <td id="LC11453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Say five years, I replied; at the end of the time they must be sent down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11454"></td>
        <td id="LC11454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again into the den and compelled to hold any military or other office</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11455"></td>
        <td id="LC11455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which young men are qualified to hold: in this way they will get their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11456"></td>
        <td id="LC11456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experience of life, and there will be an opportunity of trying whether,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11457"></td>
        <td id="LC11457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when they are drawn all manner of ways by temptation, they will stand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11458"></td>
        <td id="LC11458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">firm or flinch.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11459"></td>
        <td id="LC11459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11460"></td>
        <td id="LC11460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And how long is this stage of their lives to last?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11461"></td>
        <td id="LC11461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11462"></td>
        <td id="LC11462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Fifteen years, I answered; and when they have reached fifty years of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11463"></td>
        <td id="LC11463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">age, then let those who still survive and have distinguished themselves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11464"></td>
        <td id="LC11464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in every action of their lives and in every branch of knowledge come at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11465"></td>
        <td id="LC11465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last to their consummation: the time has now arrived at which they must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11466"></td>
        <td id="LC11466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">raise the eye of the soul to the universal light which lightens all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11467"></td>
        <td id="LC11467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things, and behold the absolute good; for that is the pattern according</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11468"></td>
        <td id="LC11468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to which they are to order the State and the lives of individuals, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11469"></td>
        <td id="LC11469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the remainder of their own lives also; making philosophy their chief</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11470"></td>
        <td id="LC11470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pursuit, but, when their turn comes, toiling also at politics and ruling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11471"></td>
        <td id="LC11471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the public good, not as though they were performing some heroic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11472"></td>
        <td id="LC11472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">action, but simply as a matter of duty; and when they have brought up in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11473"></td>
        <td id="LC11473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">each generation others like themselves and left them in their place to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11474"></td>
        <td id="LC11474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be governors of the State, then they will depart to the Islands of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11475"></td>
        <td id="LC11475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Blest and dwell there; and the city will give them public memorials and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11476"></td>
        <td id="LC11476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sacrifices and honour them, if the Pythian oracle consent, as demigods,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11477"></td>
        <td id="LC11477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but if not, as in any case blessed and divine.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11478"></td>
        <td id="LC11478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11479"></td>
        <td id="LC11479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You are a sculptor, Socrates, and have made statues of our governors</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11480"></td>
        <td id="LC11480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faultless in beauty.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11481"></td>
        <td id="LC11481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11482"></td>
        <td id="LC11482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said, Glaucon, and of our governesses too; for you must not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11483"></td>
        <td id="LC11483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suppose that what I have been saying applies to men only and not to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11484"></td>
        <td id="LC11484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">women as far as their natures can go.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11485"></td>
        <td id="LC11485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11486"></td>
        <td id="LC11486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There you are right, he said, since we have made them to share in all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11487"></td>
        <td id="LC11487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things like the men.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11488"></td>
        <td id="LC11488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11489"></td>
        <td id="LC11489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, I said, and you would agree (would you not?) that what has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11490"></td>
        <td id="LC11490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been said about the State and the government is not a mere dream, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11491"></td>
        <td id="LC11491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">although difficult not impossible, but only possible in the way which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11492"></td>
        <td id="LC11492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has been supposed; that is to say, when the true philosopher kings are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11493"></td>
        <td id="LC11493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">born in a State, one or more of them, despising the honours of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11494"></td>
        <td id="LC11494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present world which they deem mean and worthless, esteeming above all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11495"></td>
        <td id="LC11495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things right and the honour that springs from right, and regarding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11496"></td>
        <td id="LC11496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice as the greatest and most necessary of all things, whose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11497"></td>
        <td id="LC11497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ministers they are, and whose principles will be exalted by them when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11498"></td>
        <td id="LC11498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they set in order their own city?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11499"></td>
        <td id="LC11499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11500"></td>
        <td id="LC11500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How will they proceed?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11501"></td>
        <td id="LC11501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11502"></td>
        <td id="LC11502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They will begin by sending out into the country all the inhabitants of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11503"></td>
        <td id="LC11503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the city who are more than ten years old, and will take possession of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11504"></td>
        <td id="LC11504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their children, who will be unaffected by the habits of their parents;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11505"></td>
        <td id="LC11505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these they will train in their own habits and laws, I mean in the laws</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11506"></td>
        <td id="LC11506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which we have given them: and in this way the State and constitution of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11507"></td>
        <td id="LC11507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which we were speaking will soonest and most easily attain happiness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11508"></td>
        <td id="LC11508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the nation which has such a constitution will gain most.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11509"></td>
        <td id="LC11509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11510"></td>
        <td id="LC11510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, that will be the best way. And I think, Socrates, that you have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11511"></td>
        <td id="LC11511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very well described how, if ever, such a constitution might come into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11512"></td>
        <td id="LC11512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11513"></td>
        <td id="LC11513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11514"></td>
        <td id="LC11514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Enough then of the perfect State, and of the man who bears its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11515"></td>
        <td id="LC11515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">image--there is no difficulty in seeing how we shall describe him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11516"></td>
        <td id="LC11516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11517"></td>
        <td id="LC11517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is no difficulty, he replied; and I agree with you in thinking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11518"></td>
        <td id="LC11518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that nothing more need be said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11519"></td>
        <td id="LC11519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11520"></td>
        <td id="LC11520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11521"></td>
        <td id="LC11521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11522"></td>
        <td id="LC11522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11523"></td>
        <td id="LC11523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">BOOK VIII.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11524"></td>
        <td id="LC11524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11525"></td>
        <td id="LC11525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so, Glaucon, we have arrived at the conclusion that in the perfect</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11526"></td>
        <td id="LC11526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">State wives and children are to be in common; and that all education</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11527"></td>
        <td id="LC11527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the pursuits of war and peace are also to be common, and the best</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11528"></td>
        <td id="LC11528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosophers and the bravest warriors are to be their kings?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11529"></td>
        <td id="LC11529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11530"></td>
        <td id="LC11530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That, replied Glaucon, has been acknowledged.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11531"></td>
        <td id="LC11531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11532"></td>
        <td id="LC11532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said; and we have further acknowledged that the governors, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11533"></td>
        <td id="LC11533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appointed themselves, will take their soldiers and place them in houses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11534"></td>
        <td id="LC11534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such as we were describing, which are common to all, and contain nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11535"></td>
        <td id="LC11535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">private, or individual; and about their property, you remember what we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11536"></td>
        <td id="LC11536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agreed?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11537"></td>
        <td id="LC11537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11538"></td>
        <td id="LC11538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I remember that no one was to have any of the ordinary possessions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11539"></td>
        <td id="LC11539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of mankind; they were to be warrior athletes and guardians, receiving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11540"></td>
        <td id="LC11540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the other citizens, in lieu of annual payment, only their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11541"></td>
        <td id="LC11541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maintenance, and they were to take care of themselves and of the whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11542"></td>
        <td id="LC11542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11543"></td>
        <td id="LC11543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11544"></td>
        <td id="LC11544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, I said; and now that this division of our task is concluded, let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11545"></td>
        <td id="LC11545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us find the point at which we digressed, that we may return into the old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11546"></td>
        <td id="LC11546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">path.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11547"></td>
        <td id="LC11547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11548"></td>
        <td id="LC11548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is no difficulty in returning; you implied, then as now, that you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11549"></td>
        <td id="LC11549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had finished the description of the State: you said that such a State</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11550"></td>
        <td id="LC11550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was good, and that the man was good who answered to it, although, as now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11551"></td>
        <td id="LC11551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appears, you had more excellent things to relate both of State and man.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11552"></td>
        <td id="LC11552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And you said further, that if this was the true form, then the others</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11553"></td>
        <td id="LC11553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were false; and of the false forms, you said, as I remember, that there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11554"></td>
        <td id="LC11554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were four principal ones, and that their defects, and the defects of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11555"></td>
        <td id="LC11555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the individuals corresponding to them, were worth examining. When we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11556"></td>
        <td id="LC11556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen all the individuals, and finally agreed as to who was the best and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11557"></td>
        <td id="LC11557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who was the worst of them, we were to consider whether the best was not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11558"></td>
        <td id="LC11558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also the happiest, and the worst the most miserable. I asked you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11559"></td>
        <td id="LC11559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what were the four forms of government of which you spoke, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11560"></td>
        <td id="LC11560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Polemarchus and Adeimantus put in their word; and you began again, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11561"></td>
        <td id="LC11561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have found your way to the point at which we have now arrived.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11562"></td>
        <td id="LC11562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11563"></td>
        <td id="LC11563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Your recollection, I said, is most exact.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11564"></td>
        <td id="LC11564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11565"></td>
        <td id="LC11565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, like a wrestler, he replied, you must put yourself again in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11566"></td>
        <td id="LC11566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same position; and let me ask the same questions, and do you give me the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11567"></td>
        <td id="LC11567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same answer which you were about to give me then.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11568"></td>
        <td id="LC11568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11569"></td>
        <td id="LC11569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, if I can, I will, I said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11570"></td>
        <td id="LC11570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11571"></td>
        <td id="LC11571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I shall particularly wish to hear what were the four constitutions of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11572"></td>
        <td id="LC11572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which you were speaking.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11573"></td>
        <td id="LC11573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11574"></td>
        <td id="LC11574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That question, I said, is easily answered: the four governments of which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11575"></td>
        <td id="LC11575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I spoke, so far as they have distinct names, are, first, those of Crete</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11576"></td>
        <td id="LC11576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Sparta, which are generally applauded; what is termed oligarchy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11577"></td>
        <td id="LC11577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comes next; this is not equally approved, and is a form of government</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11578"></td>
        <td id="LC11578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which teems with evils: thirdly, democracy, which naturally follows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11579"></td>
        <td id="LC11579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oligarchy, although very different: and lastly comes tyranny, great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11580"></td>
        <td id="LC11580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and famous, which differs from them all, and is the fourth and worst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11581"></td>
        <td id="LC11581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disorder of a State. I do not know, do you? of any other constitution</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11582"></td>
        <td id="LC11582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which can be said to have a distinct character. There are lordships and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11583"></td>
        <td id="LC11583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">principalities which are bought and sold, and some other intermediate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11584"></td>
        <td id="LC11584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forms of government. But these are nondescripts and may be found equally</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11585"></td>
        <td id="LC11585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among Hellenes and among barbarians.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11586"></td>
        <td id="LC11586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11587"></td>
        <td id="LC11587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he replied, we certainly hear of many curious forms of government</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11588"></td>
        <td id="LC11588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which exist among them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11589"></td>
        <td id="LC11589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11590"></td>
        <td id="LC11590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Do you know, I said, that governments vary as the dispositions of men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11591"></td>
        <td id="LC11591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vary, and that there must be as many of the one as there are of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11592"></td>
        <td id="LC11592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other? For we cannot suppose that States are made of &#39;oak and rock,&#39; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11593"></td>
        <td id="LC11593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not out of the human natures which are in them, and which in a figure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11594"></td>
        <td id="LC11594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turn the scale and draw other things after them?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11595"></td>
        <td id="LC11595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11596"></td>
        <td id="LC11596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, the States are as the men are; they grow out of human</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11597"></td>
        <td id="LC11597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">characters.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11598"></td>
        <td id="LC11598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11599"></td>
        <td id="LC11599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then if the constitutions of States are five, the dispositions of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11600"></td>
        <td id="LC11600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">individual minds will also be five?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11601"></td>
        <td id="LC11601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11602"></td>
        <td id="LC11602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11603"></td>
        <td id="LC11603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11604"></td>
        <td id="LC11604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Him who answers to aristocracy, and whom we rightly call just and good,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11605"></td>
        <td id="LC11605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we have already described.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11606"></td>
        <td id="LC11606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11607"></td>
        <td id="LC11607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We have.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11608"></td>
        <td id="LC11608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11609"></td>
        <td id="LC11609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then let us now proceed to describe the inferior sort of natures, being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11610"></td>
        <td id="LC11610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the contentious and ambitious, who answer to the Spartan polity; also</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11611"></td>
        <td id="LC11611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the oligarchical, democratical, and tyrannical. Let us place the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11612"></td>
        <td id="LC11612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just by the side of the most unjust, and when we see them we shall be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11613"></td>
        <td id="LC11613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">able to compare the relative happiness or unhappiness of him who leads</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11614"></td>
        <td id="LC11614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a life of pure justice or pure injustice. The enquiry will then be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11615"></td>
        <td id="LC11615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">completed. And we shall know whether we ought to pursue injustice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11616"></td>
        <td id="LC11616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as Thrasymachus advises, or in accordance with the conclusions of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11617"></td>
        <td id="LC11617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">argument to prefer justice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11618"></td>
        <td id="LC11618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11619"></td>
        <td id="LC11619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, he replied, we must do as you say.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11620"></td>
        <td id="LC11620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11621"></td>
        <td id="LC11621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Shall we follow our old plan, which we adopted with a view to clearness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11622"></td>
        <td id="LC11622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of taking the State first and then proceeding to the individual, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11623"></td>
        <td id="LC11623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">begin with the government of honour?--I know of no name for such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11624"></td>
        <td id="LC11624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">government other than timocracy, or perhaps timarchy. We will compare</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11625"></td>
        <td id="LC11625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with this the like character in the individual; and, after that,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11626"></td>
        <td id="LC11626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consider oligarchy and the oligarchical man; and then again we will turn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11627"></td>
        <td id="LC11627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our attention to democracy and the democratical man; and lastly, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11628"></td>
        <td id="LC11628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will go and view the city of tyranny, and once more take a look into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11629"></td>
        <td id="LC11629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tyrant&#39;s soul, and try to arrive at a satisfactory decision.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11630"></td>
        <td id="LC11630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11631"></td>
        <td id="LC11631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That way of viewing and judging of the matter will be very suitable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11632"></td>
        <td id="LC11632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11633"></td>
        <td id="LC11633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">First, then, I said, let us enquire how timocracy (the government of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11634"></td>
        <td id="LC11634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honour) arises out of aristocracy (the government of the best). Clearly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11635"></td>
        <td id="LC11635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all political changes originate in divisions of the actual governing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11636"></td>
        <td id="LC11636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power; a government which is united, however small, cannot be moved.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11637"></td>
        <td id="LC11637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11638"></td>
        <td id="LC11638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11639"></td>
        <td id="LC11639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11640"></td>
        <td id="LC11640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In what way, then, will our city be moved, and in what manner will the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11641"></td>
        <td id="LC11641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two classes of auxiliaries and rulers disagree among themselves or with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11642"></td>
        <td id="LC11642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one another? Shall we, after the manner of Homer, pray the Muses to tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11643"></td>
        <td id="LC11643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us &#39;how discord first arose&#39;? Shall we imagine them in solemn mockery,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11644"></td>
        <td id="LC11644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to play and jest with us as if we were children, and to address us in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11645"></td>
        <td id="LC11645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lofty tragic vein, making believe to be in earnest?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11646"></td>
        <td id="LC11646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11647"></td>
        <td id="LC11647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How would they address us?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11648"></td>
        <td id="LC11648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11649"></td>
        <td id="LC11649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After this manner:--A city which is thus constituted can hardly be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11650"></td>
        <td id="LC11650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shaken; but, seeing that everything which has a beginning has also an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11651"></td>
        <td id="LC11651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">end, even a constitution such as yours will not last for ever, but will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11652"></td>
        <td id="LC11652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in time be dissolved. And this is the dissolution:--In plants that grow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11653"></td>
        <td id="LC11653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the earth, as well as in animals that move on the earth&#39;s surface,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11654"></td>
        <td id="LC11654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fertility and sterility of soul and body occur when the circumferences</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11655"></td>
        <td id="LC11655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the circles of each are completed, which in short-lived existences</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11656"></td>
        <td id="LC11656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pass over a short space, and in long-lived ones over a long space. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11657"></td>
        <td id="LC11657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the knowledge of human fecundity and sterility all the wisdom and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11658"></td>
        <td id="LC11658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">education of your rulers will not attain; the laws which regulate them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11659"></td>
        <td id="LC11659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will not be discovered by an intelligence which is alloyed with sense,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11660"></td>
        <td id="LC11660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but will escape them, and they will bring children into the world when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11661"></td>
        <td id="LC11661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they ought not. Now that which is of divine birth has a period which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11662"></td>
        <td id="LC11662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contained in a perfect number (i.e. a cyclical number, such as 6, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11663"></td>
        <td id="LC11663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is equal to the sum of its divisors 1, 2, 3, so that when the circle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11664"></td>
        <td id="LC11664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or time represented by 6 is completed, the lesser times or rotations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11665"></td>
        <td id="LC11665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">represented by 1, 2, 3 are also completed.), but the period of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11666"></td>
        <td id="LC11666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">human birth is comprehended in a number in which first increments</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11667"></td>
        <td id="LC11667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by involution and evolution (or squared and cubed) obtaining three</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11668"></td>
        <td id="LC11668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intervals and four terms of like and unlike, waxing and waning numbers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11669"></td>
        <td id="LC11669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make all the terms commensurable and agreeable to one another. (Probably</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11670"></td>
        <td id="LC11670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the numbers 3, 4, 5, 6 of which the three first = the sides of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11671"></td>
        <td id="LC11671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pythagorean triangle. The terms will then be 3 cubed, 4 cubed, 5 cubed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11672"></td>
        <td id="LC11672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which together = 6 cubed = 216.) The base of these (3) with a third</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11673"></td>
        <td id="LC11673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">added (4) when combined with five (20) and raised to the third power</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11674"></td>
        <td id="LC11674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">furnishes two harmonies; the first a square which is a hundred times</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11675"></td>
        <td id="LC11675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as great (400 = 4 x 100) (Or the first a square which is 100 x 100 =</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11676"></td>
        <td id="LC11676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">10,000. The whole number will then be 17,500 = a square of 100, and an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11677"></td>
        <td id="LC11677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oblong of 100 by 75.), and the other a figure having one side equal to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11678"></td>
        <td id="LC11678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the former, but oblong, consisting of a hundred numbers squared upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11679"></td>
        <td id="LC11679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rational diameters of a square (i.e. omitting fractions), the side of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11680"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11681"></td>
        <td id="LC11681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(than the perfect square which includes the fractions, sc. 50) or less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11682"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11684"></td>
        <td id="LC11684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perfect squares of irrational diameters (of a square the side of which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11685"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11686"></td>
        <td id="LC11686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">+ 4900 + 400 = 8000). Now this number represents a geometrical figure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11687"></td>
        <td id="LC11687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which has control over the good and evil of births. For when your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11688"></td>
        <td id="LC11688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guardians are ignorant of the law of births, and unite bride and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11689"></td>
        <td id="LC11689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bridegroom out of season, the children will not be goodly or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11690"></td>
        <td id="LC11690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fortunate. And though only the best of them will be appointed by their</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC11691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">predecessors, still they will be unworthy to hold their fathers&#39; places,</td>

        <td id="L11692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11692"></td>

        <td id="L11693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11693"></td>
        <td id="LC11693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to fail in taking care of us, the Muses, first by under-valuing music;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11694"></td>
        <td id="LC11694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which neglect will soon extend to gymnastic; and hence the young men of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11695"></td>
        <td id="LC11695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your State will be less cultivated. In the succeeding generation rulers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11696"></td>
        <td id="LC11696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be appointed who have lost the guardian power of testing the metal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11697"></td>
        <td id="LC11697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of your different races, which, like Hesiod&#39;s, are of gold and silver</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11698"></td>
        <td id="LC11698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and brass and iron. And so iron will be mingled with silver, and brass</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11699"></td>
        <td id="LC11699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with gold, and hence there will arise dissimilarity and inequality and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11700"></td>
        <td id="LC11700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">irregularity, which always and in all places are causes of hatred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11701"></td>
        <td id="LC11701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and war. This the Muses affirm to be the stock from which discord has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11702"></td>
        <td id="LC11702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sprung, wherever arising; and this is their answer to us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11703"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11704"></td>
        <td id="LC11704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, and we may assume that they answer truly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11705"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L11706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11706"></td>

        <td id="L11707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11707"></td>

        <td id="L11708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11708"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11709"></td>
        <td id="LC11709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what do the Muses say next?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11710"></td>
        <td id="LC11710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11711"></td>
        <td id="LC11711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When discord arose, then the two races were drawn different ways: the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11712"></td>
        <td id="LC11712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">iron and brass fell to acquiring money and land and houses and gold and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11713"></td>
        <td id="LC11713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silver; but the gold and silver races, not wanting money but having the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11714"></td>
        <td id="LC11714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">true riches in their own nature, inclined towards virtue and the ancient</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11715"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11720"></td>
        <td id="LC11720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against them.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11722"></td>
        <td id="LC11722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I believe that you have rightly conceived the origin of the change.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L11727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11727"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11728"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L11729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11729"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11731"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11732"></td>
        <td id="LC11732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will also have some peculiarities.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11734"></td>
        <td id="LC11734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11735"></td>
        <td id="LC11735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11736"></td>
        <td id="LC11736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the honour given to rulers, in the abstinence of the warrior class</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11737"></td>
        <td id="LC11737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from agriculture, handicrafts, and trade in general, in the institution</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11738"></td>
        <td id="LC11738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of common meals, and in the attention paid to gymnastics and military</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11739"></td>
        <td id="LC11739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">training--in all these respects this State will resemble the former.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11740"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11741"></td>
        <td id="LC11741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11742"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11743"></td>
        <td id="LC11743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But in the fear of admitting philosophers to power, because they are no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11744"></td>
        <td id="LC11744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">longer to be had simple and earnest, but are made up of mixed elements;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11745"></td>
        <td id="LC11745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and in turning from them to passionate and less complex characters, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11746"></td>
        <td id="LC11746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are by nature fitted for war rather than peace; and in the value set</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11747"></td>
        <td id="LC11747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by them upon military stratagems and contrivances, and in the waging of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11748"></td>
        <td id="LC11748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everlasting wars--this State will be for the most part peculiar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11749"></td>
        <td id="LC11749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11750"></td>
        <td id="LC11750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11751"></td>
        <td id="LC11751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11752"></td>
        <td id="LC11752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said; and men of this stamp will be covetous of money, like those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11753"></td>
        <td id="LC11753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who live in oligarchies; they will have, a fierce secret longing after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11754"></td>
        <td id="LC11754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gold and silver, which they will hoard in dark places, having magazines</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11755"></td>
        <td id="LC11755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and treasuries of their own for the deposit and concealment of them;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11756"></td>
        <td id="LC11756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also castles which are just nests for their eggs, and in which they will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11757"></td>
        <td id="LC11757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spend large sums on their wives, or on any others whom they please.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11758"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11853"></td>
        <td id="LC11853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and he hears and sees the same sort of thing: those who do their own</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11951"></td>
        <td id="LC11951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">property, and a poor man were refused permission to steer, even though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11952"></td>
        <td id="LC11952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he were a better pilot?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11953"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11954"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11955"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L11956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11956"></td>
        <td id="LC11956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes; and is not this true of the government of anything?</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L11960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11960"></td>
        <td id="LC11960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Except a city?--or would you include a city?</td>

      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L11962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11962"></td>
        <td id="LC11962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nay, he said, the case of a city is the strongest of all, inasmuch as</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11963"></td>
        <td id="LC11963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rule of a city is the greatest and most difficult of all.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11964"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC11965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This, then, will be the first great defect of oligarchy?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11966"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L11969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11969"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC11971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What defect?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11972"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11973"></td>
        <td id="LC11973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The inevitable division: such a State is not one, but two States, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11974"></td>
        <td id="LC11974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one of poor, the other of rich men; and they are living on the same spot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11975"></td>
        <td id="LC11975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and always conspiring against one another.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11976"></td>

</td>
