      <tr>
        <td id="L11977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11977"></td>
        <td id="LC11977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That, surely, is at least as bad.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11978"></td>
        <td id="LC11978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11979"></td>
        <td id="LC11979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Another discreditable feature is, that, for a like reason, they are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11980"></td>
        <td id="LC11980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">incapable of carrying on any war. Either they arm the multitude, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11981"></td>
        <td id="LC11981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then they are more afraid of them than of the enemy; or, if they do not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11982"></td>
        <td id="LC11982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">call them out in the hour of battle, they are oligarchs indeed, few to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11983"></td>
        <td id="LC11983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fight as they are few to rule. And at the same time their fondness for</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11984"></td>
        <td id="LC11984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">money makes them unwilling to pay taxes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11985"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11986"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11987"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11988"></td>
        <td id="LC11988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And, as we said before, under such a constitution the same persons have</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11990"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11999"></td>
        <td id="LC11999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A man may sell all that he has, and another may acquire his property;</td>

        <td id="LC12007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extremes of great wealth and utter poverty.</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC12011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But think again: In his wealthy days, while he was spending his money,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12012"></td>
        <td id="LC12012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a man of this sort a whit more good to the State for the purposes</td>

        <td id="LC12014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body, although in truth he was neither ruler nor subject, but just a</td>

        <td id="LC12015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spendthrift?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12016"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12017"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12018"></td>
        <td id="LC12018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12019"></td>
        <td id="LC12019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">May we not say that this is the drone in the house who is like the drone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12020"></td>
        <td id="LC12020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the honeycomb, and that the one is the plague of the city as the</td>

        <td id="L12021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12021"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L12023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12023"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12024"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12025"></td>
        <td id="LC12025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And God has made the flying drones, Adeimantus, all without stings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12026"></td>
        <td id="LC12026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whereas of the walking drones he has made some without stings but others</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12027"></td>
        <td id="LC12027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have dreadful stings; of the stingless class are those who in their old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12028"></td>
        <td id="LC12028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">age end as paupers; of the stingers come all the criminal class, as they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12029"></td>
        <td id="LC12029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are termed.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L12031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12031"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L12032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12032"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12033"></td>
        <td id="LC12033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Clearly then, whenever you see paupers in a State, somewhere in that</td>

</td>

        <td id="L12039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12039"></td>
        <td id="LC12039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, I said, and in oligarchical States do you not find paupers?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12040"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L12041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12041"></td>
        <td id="LC12041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said; nearly everybody is a pauper who is not a ruler.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12042"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12043"></td>
        <td id="LC12043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And may we be so bold as to affirm that there are also many criminals to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12044"></td>
        <td id="LC12044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be found in them, rogues who have stings, and whom the authorities are</td>

        <td id="L12045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12045"></td>
        <td id="LC12045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">careful to restrain by force?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12046"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12047"></td>
        <td id="LC12047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, we may be so bold.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12048"></td>
        <td id="LC12048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12049"></td>
        <td id="LC12049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The existence of such persons is to be attributed to want of education,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12050"></td>
        <td id="LC12050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ill-training, and an evil constitution of the State?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12051"></td>
        <td id="LC12051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12052"></td>
        <td id="LC12052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12053"></td>
        <td id="LC12053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12054"></td>
        <td id="LC12054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Such, then, is the form and such are the evils of oligarchy; and there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12055"></td>
        <td id="LC12055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may be many other evils.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12057"></td>
        <td id="LC12057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very likely.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12058"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12059"></td>
        <td id="LC12059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then oligarchy, or the form of government in which the rulers are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12060"></td>
        <td id="LC12060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">elected for their wealth, may now be dismissed. Let us next proceed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12061"></td>
        <td id="LC12061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consider the nature and origin of the individual who answers to this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12062"></td>
        <td id="LC12062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12063"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12066"></td>
        <td id="LC12066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Does not the timocratical man change into the oligarchical on this wise?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12067"></td>
        <td id="LC12067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12068"></td>
        <td id="LC12068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12069"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12070"></td>
        <td id="LC12070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A time arrives when the representative of timocracy has a son: at first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12071"></td>
        <td id="LC12071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he begins by emulating his father and walking in his footsteps, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12072"></td>
        <td id="LC12072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presently he sees him of a sudden foundering against the State as upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12073"></td>
        <td id="LC12073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a sunken reef, and he and all that he has is lost; he may have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12074"></td>
        <td id="LC12074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a general or some other high officer who is brought to trial under a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12075"></td>
        <td id="LC12075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prejudice raised by informers, and either put to death, or exiled, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12076"></td>
        <td id="LC12076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deprived of the privileges of a citizen, and all his property taken from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12077"></td>
        <td id="LC12077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him.</td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12081"></td>
        <td id="LC12081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the son has seen and known all this--he is a ruined man, and his</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12082"></td>
        <td id="LC12082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fear has taught him to knock ambition and passion headforemost from his</td>

        <td id="L12084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12084"></td>
        <td id="LC12084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and miserly savings and hard work gets a fortune together. Is not such</td>

        <td id="LC12086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vacant throne and to suffer it to play the great king within him, girt</td>

</td>

        <td id="L12091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12091"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12145"></td>
        <td id="LC12145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You should see him where he has some great opportunity of acting</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC12243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One which is the next best, and has the advantage of compelling the</td>

        <td id="LC12338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has made his choice, he may found his State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12339"></td>
        <td id="LC12339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12340"></td>
        <td id="LC12340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He will be sure to have patterns enough.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12341"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12343"></td>
        <td id="LC12343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even if you have the capacity, or to be governed, unless you like, or</td>

        <td id="L12344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12344"></td>
        <td id="LC12344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go to war when the rest go to war, or to be at peace when others are</td>

        <td id="L12345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12345"></td>
        <td id="LC12345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at peace, unless you are so disposed--there being no necessity also,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12346"></td>
        <td id="LC12346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because some law forbids you to hold office or be a dicast, that you</td>

        <td id="L12347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12347"></td>

        <td id="LC12348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a way of life which for the moment is supremely delightful?</td>

        <td id="L12353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12353"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L12524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12524"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC12526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fatherly counsel of the aged will they listen to them or receive them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12527"></td>
        <td id="LC12527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is a battle and they gain the day, and then modesty, which</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12528"></td>
        <td id="LC12528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they call silliness, is ignominiously thrust into exile by them, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12529"></td>
        <td id="LC12529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">temperance, which they nickname unmanliness, is trampled in the mire and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12530"></td>
        <td id="LC12530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cast forth; they persuade men that moderation and orderly expenditure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12531"></td>
        <td id="LC12531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are vulgarity and meanness, and so, by the help of a rabble of evil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12532"></td>
        <td id="LC12532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appetites, they drive them beyond the border.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12533"></td>
        <td id="LC12533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12534"></td>
        <td id="LC12534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, with a will.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12535"></td>
        <td id="LC12535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12536"></td>
        <td id="LC12536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And when they have emptied and swept clean the soul of him who is now in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12537"></td>
        <td id="LC12537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their power and who is being initiated by them in great mysteries, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12538"></td>
        <td id="LC12538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">next thing is to bring back to their house insolence and anarchy and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12539"></td>
        <td id="LC12539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waste and impudence in bright array having garlands on their heads, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12540"></td>
        <td id="LC12540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a great company with them, hymning their praises and calling them by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12541"></td>
        <td id="LC12541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sweet names; insolence they term breeding, and anarchy liberty, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12542"></td>
        <td id="LC12542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waste magnificence, and impudence courage. And so the young man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12543"></td>
        <td id="LC12543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passes out of his original nature, which was trained in the school of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12544"></td>
        <td id="LC12544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessity, into the freedom and libertinism of useless and unnecessary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12545"></td>
        <td id="LC12545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasures.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12546"></td>
        <td id="LC12546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12547"></td>
        <td id="LC12547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, the change in him is visible enough.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12548"></td>
        <td id="LC12548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12549"></td>
        <td id="LC12549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After this he lives on, spending his money and labour and time on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12550"></td>
        <td id="LC12550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unnecessary pleasures quite as much as on necessary ones; but if he be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12551"></td>
        <td id="LC12551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fortunate, and is not too much disordered in his wits, when years have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12552"></td>
        <td id="LC12552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">elapsed, and the heyday of passion is over--supposing that he then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12553"></td>
        <td id="LC12553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">re-admits into the city some part of the exiled virtues, and does not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12554"></td>
        <td id="LC12554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wholly give himself up to their successors--in that case he balances his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12555"></td>
        <td id="LC12555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasures and lives in a sort of equilibrium, putting the government of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12556"></td>
        <td id="LC12556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself into the hands of the one which comes first and wins the turn;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12557"></td>
        <td id="LC12557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and when he has had enough of that, then into the hands of another; he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12558"></td>
        <td id="LC12558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">despises none of them but encourages them all equally.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12559"></td>
        <td id="LC12559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12560"></td>
        <td id="LC12560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12561"></td>
        <td id="LC12561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12562"></td>
        <td id="LC12562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither does he receive or let pass into the fortress any true word of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12563"></td>
        <td id="LC12563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advice; if any one says to him that some pleasures are the satisfactions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12564"></td>
        <td id="LC12564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of good and noble desires, and others of evil desires, and that he ought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12565"></td>
        <td id="LC12565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to use and honour some and chastise and master the others--whenever this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12566"></td>
        <td id="LC12566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is repeated to him he shakes his head and says that they are all alike,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12567"></td>
        <td id="LC12567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that one is as good as another.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12568"></td>
        <td id="LC12568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12569"></td>
        <td id="LC12569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said; that is the way with him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12570"></td>
        <td id="LC12570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12571"></td>
        <td id="LC12571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said, he lives from day to day indulging the appetite of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12572"></td>
        <td id="LC12572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hour; and sometimes he is lapped in drink and strains of the flute; then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12573"></td>
        <td id="LC12573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he becomes a water-drinker, and tries to get thin; then he takes a turn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12574"></td>
        <td id="LC12574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at gymnastics; sometimes idling and neglecting everything, then once</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12575"></td>
        <td id="LC12575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more living the life of a philosopher; often he is busy with politics,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12576"></td>
        <td id="LC12576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and starts to his feet and says and does whatever comes into his head;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12577"></td>
        <td id="LC12577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, if he is emulous of any one who is a warrior, off he is in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12578"></td>
        <td id="LC12578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">direction, or of men of business, once more in that. His life has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12579"></td>
        <td id="LC12579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neither law nor order; and this distracted existence he terms joy and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12580"></td>
        <td id="LC12580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bliss and freedom; and so he goes on.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12581"></td>
        <td id="LC12581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12582"></td>
        <td id="LC12582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he replied, he is all liberty and equality.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12583"></td>
        <td id="LC12583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12584"></td>
        <td id="LC12584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said; his life is motley and manifold and an epitome of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12585"></td>
        <td id="LC12585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lives of many;--he answers to the State which we described as fair</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12586"></td>
        <td id="LC12586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and spangled. And many a man and many a woman will take him for their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12587"></td>
        <td id="LC12587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pattern, and many a constitution and many an example of manners is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12588"></td>
        <td id="LC12588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contained in him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12589"></td>
        <td id="LC12589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12590"></td>
        <td id="LC12590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just so.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12591"></td>
        <td id="LC12591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12592"></td>
        <td id="LC12592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let him then be set over against democracy; he may truly be called the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12593"></td>
        <td id="LC12593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">democratic man.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12594"></td>
        <td id="LC12594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12595"></td>
        <td id="LC12595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let that be his place, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12596"></td>
        <td id="LC12596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12597"></td>
        <td id="LC12597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Last of all comes the most beautiful of all, man and State alike,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12598"></td>
        <td id="LC12598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tyranny and the tyrant; these we have now to consider.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12599"></td>
        <td id="LC12599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12600"></td>
        <td id="LC12600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quite true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12601"></td>
        <td id="LC12601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12602"></td>
        <td id="LC12602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Say then, my friend, In what manner does tyranny arise?--that it has a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12603"></td>
        <td id="LC12603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">democratic origin is evident.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12604"></td>
        <td id="LC12604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12605"></td>
        <td id="LC12605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Clearly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12606"></td>
        <td id="LC12606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12607"></td>
        <td id="LC12607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And does not tyranny spring from democracy in the same manner as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12608"></td>
        <td id="LC12608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">democracy from oligarchy--I mean, after a sort?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12609"></td>
        <td id="LC12609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12610"></td>
        <td id="LC12610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12611"></td>
        <td id="LC12611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12612"></td>
        <td id="LC12612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The good which oligarchy proposed to itself and the means by which it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12613"></td>
        <td id="LC12613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was maintained was excess of wealth--am I not right?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12614"></td>
        <td id="LC12614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12615"></td>
        <td id="LC12615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12616"></td>
        <td id="LC12616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12617"></td>
        <td id="LC12617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the insatiable desire of wealth and the neglect of all other things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12618"></td>
        <td id="LC12618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the sake of money-getting was also the ruin of oligarchy?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12619"></td>
        <td id="LC12619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12620"></td>
        <td id="LC12620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12621"></td>
        <td id="LC12621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12622"></td>
        <td id="LC12622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And democracy has her own good, of which the insatiable desire brings</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12623"></td>
        <td id="LC12623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her to dissolution?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12624"></td>
        <td id="LC12624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12625"></td>
        <td id="LC12625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What good?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12626"></td>
        <td id="LC12626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12627"></td>
        <td id="LC12627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Freedom, I replied; which, as they tell you in a democracy, is the glory</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12628"></td>
        <td id="LC12628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the State--and that therefore in a democracy alone will the freeman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12629"></td>
        <td id="LC12629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of nature deign to dwell.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12630"></td>
        <td id="LC12630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12631"></td>
        <td id="LC12631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes; the saying is in every body&#39;s mouth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12632"></td>
        <td id="LC12632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12633"></td>
        <td id="LC12633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was going to observe, that the insatiable desire of this and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12634"></td>
        <td id="LC12634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neglect of other things introduces the change in democracy, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12635"></td>
        <td id="LC12635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occasions a demand for tyranny.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12636"></td>
        <td id="LC12636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12637"></td>
        <td id="LC12637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How so?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12638"></td>
        <td id="LC12638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12639"></td>
        <td id="LC12639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When a democracy which is thirsting for freedom has evil cup-bearers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12640"></td>
        <td id="LC12640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presiding over the feast, and has drunk too deeply of the strong wine of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12641"></td>
        <td id="LC12641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">freedom, then, unless her rulers are very amenable and give a plentiful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12642"></td>
        <td id="LC12642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">draught, she calls them to account and punishes them, and says that they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12643"></td>
        <td id="LC12643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are cursed oligarchs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12644"></td>
        <td id="LC12644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12645"></td>
        <td id="LC12645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he replied, a very common occurrence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12646"></td>
        <td id="LC12646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12647"></td>
        <td id="LC12647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said; and loyal citizens are insultingly termed by her slaves who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12648"></td>
        <td id="LC12648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hug their chains and men of naught; she would have subjects who are like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12649"></td>
        <td id="LC12649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rulers, and rulers who are like subjects: these are men after her own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12650"></td>
        <td id="LC12650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart, whom she praises and honours both in private and public. Now, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12651"></td>
        <td id="LC12651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such a State, can liberty have any limit?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12652"></td>
        <td id="LC12652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12653"></td>
        <td id="LC12653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12654"></td>
        <td id="LC12654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12655"></td>
        <td id="LC12655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By degrees the anarchy finds a way into private houses, and ends by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12656"></td>
        <td id="LC12656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">getting among the animals and infecting them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12657"></td>
        <td id="LC12657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12658"></td>
        <td id="LC12658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How do you mean?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12659"></td>
        <td id="LC12659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12660"></td>
        <td id="LC12660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I mean that the father grows accustomed to descend to the level of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12661"></td>
        <td id="LC12661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sons and to fear them, and the son is on a level with his father, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12662"></td>
        <td id="LC12662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">having no respect or reverence for either of his parents; and this is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12663"></td>
        <td id="LC12663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his freedom, and the metic is equal with the citizen and the citizen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12664"></td>
        <td id="LC12664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the metic, and the stranger is quite as good as either.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12665"></td>
        <td id="LC12665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12666"></td>
        <td id="LC12666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, that is the way.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12667"></td>
        <td id="LC12667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12668"></td>
        <td id="LC12668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And these are not the only evils, I said--there are several lesser ones:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12669"></td>
        <td id="LC12669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In such a state of society the master fears and flatters his scholars,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12670"></td>
        <td id="LC12670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the scholars despise their masters and tutors; young and old are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12671"></td>
        <td id="LC12671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all alike; and the young man is on a level with the old, and is ready</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12672"></td>
        <td id="LC12672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to compete with him in word or deed; and old men condescend to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12673"></td>
        <td id="LC12673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young and are full of pleasantry and gaiety; they are loth to be thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12674"></td>
        <td id="LC12674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morose and authoritative, and therefore they adopt the manners of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12675"></td>
        <td id="LC12675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12676"></td>
        <td id="LC12676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12677"></td>
        <td id="LC12677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quite true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12678"></td>
        <td id="LC12678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12679"></td>
        <td id="LC12679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The last extreme of popular liberty is when the slave bought with money,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12680"></td>
        <td id="LC12680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether male or female, is just as free as his or her purchaser; nor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12681"></td>
        <td id="LC12681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must I forget to tell of the liberty and equality of the two sexes in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12682"></td>
        <td id="LC12682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relation to each other.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12683"></td>
        <td id="LC12683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12684"></td>
        <td id="LC12684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why not, as Aeschylus says, utter the word which rises to our lips?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12685"></td>
        <td id="LC12685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12686"></td>
        <td id="LC12686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is what I am doing, I replied; and I must add that no one who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12687"></td>
        <td id="LC12687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">does not know would believe, how much greater is the liberty which the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12688"></td>
        <td id="LC12688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">animals who are under the dominion of man have in a democracy than in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12689"></td>
        <td id="LC12689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any other State: for truly, the she-dogs, as the proverb says, are as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12690"></td>
        <td id="LC12690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good as their she-mistresses, and the horses and asses have a way of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12691"></td>
        <td id="LC12691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marching along with all the rights and dignities of freemen; and they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12692"></td>
        <td id="LC12692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will run at any body who comes in their way if he does not leave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12693"></td>
        <td id="LC12693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the road clear for them: and all things are just ready to burst with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12694"></td>
        <td id="LC12694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">liberty.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12695"></td>
        <td id="LC12695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12696"></td>
        <td id="LC12696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I take a country walk, he said, I often experience what you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12697"></td>
        <td id="LC12697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">describe. You and I have dreamed the same thing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12698"></td>
        <td id="LC12698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12699"></td>
        <td id="LC12699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And above all, I said, and as the result of all, see how sensitive the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12700"></td>
        <td id="LC12700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">citizens become; they chafe impatiently at the least touch of authority,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12701"></td>
        <td id="LC12701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and at length, as you know, they cease to care even for the laws,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12702"></td>
        <td id="LC12702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">written or unwritten; they will have no one over them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12703"></td>
        <td id="LC12703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12704"></td>
        <td id="LC12704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, I know it too well.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12705"></td>
        <td id="LC12705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12706"></td>
        <td id="LC12706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Such, my friend, I said, is the fair and glorious beginning out of which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12707"></td>
        <td id="LC12707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">springs tyranny.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12708"></td>
        <td id="LC12708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12709"></td>
        <td id="LC12709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Glorious indeed, he said. But what is the next step?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12710"></td>
        <td id="LC12710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12711"></td>
        <td id="LC12711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The ruin of oligarchy is the ruin of democracy; the same disease</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12712"></td>
        <td id="LC12712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">magnified and intensified by liberty overmasters democracy--the truth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12713"></td>
        <td id="LC12713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being that the excessive increase of anything often causes a reaction in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12714"></td>
        <td id="LC12714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the opposite direction; and this is the case not only in the seasons and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12715"></td>
        <td id="LC12715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in vegetable and animal life, but above all in forms of government.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12716"></td>
        <td id="LC12716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12717"></td>
        <td id="LC12717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12718"></td>
        <td id="LC12718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12719"></td>
        <td id="LC12719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The excess of liberty, whether in States or individuals, seems only to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12720"></td>
        <td id="LC12720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pass into excess of slavery.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12721"></td>
        <td id="LC12721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12722"></td>
        <td id="LC12722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, the natural order.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12723"></td>
        <td id="LC12723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12724"></td>
        <td id="LC12724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so tyranny naturally arises out of democracy, and the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12725"></td>
        <td id="LC12725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aggravated form of tyranny and slavery out of the most extreme form of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12726"></td>

        <td id="LC12832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This and no other is the root from which a tyrant springs; when he first</td>

        <td id="L12837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12837"></td>
        <td id="LC12837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How then does a protector begin to change into a tyrant? Clearly when</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12838"></td>
        <td id="LC12838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he does what the man is said to do in the tale of the Arcadian temple of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12839"></td>
        <td id="LC12839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lycaean Zeus.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L12841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12841"></td>
        <td id="LC12841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What tale?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12842"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12843"></td>
        <td id="LC12843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The tale is that he who has tasted the entrails of a single human victim</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12844"></td>
        <td id="LC12844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minced up with the entrails of other victims is destined to become a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12845"></td>
        <td id="LC12845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wolf. Did you never hear it?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12847"></td>
        <td id="LC12847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Oh, yes.</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12849"></td>
        <td id="LC12849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the protector of the people is like him; having a mob entirely at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12850"></td>
        <td id="LC12850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his disposal, he is not restrained from shedding the blood of kinsmen;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12851"></td>
        <td id="LC12851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by the favourite method of false accusation he brings them into court</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12852"></td>
        <td id="LC12852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and murders them, making the life of man to disappear, and with unholy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12853"></td>
        <td id="LC12853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tongue and lips tasting the blood of his fellow citizens; some he kills</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC12854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and others he banishes, at the same time hinting at the abolition of</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12855"></td>
        <td id="LC12855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">debts and partition of lands: and after this, what will be his destiny?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12856"></td>
        <td id="LC12856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Must he not either perish at the hands of his enemies, or from being a</td>

        <td id="LC12857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man become a wolf--that is, a tyrant?</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC12920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there is nothing to fear from them, then he is always stirring up some</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12921"></td>
        <td id="LC12921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">war or other, in order that the people may require a leader.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12922"></td>
        <td id="LC12922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12923"></td>
        <td id="LC12923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To be sure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12924"></td>
        <td id="LC12924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12925"></td>
        <td id="LC12925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Has he not also another object, which is that they may be impoverished</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12926"></td>
        <td id="LC12926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by payment of taxes, and thus compelled to devote themselves to their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12927"></td>
        <td id="LC12927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">daily wants and therefore less likely to conspire against him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12928"></td>
        <td id="LC12928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12929"></td>
        <td id="LC12929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Clearly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12930"></td>
        <td id="LC12930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12931"></td>
        <td id="LC12931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And if any of them are suspected by him of having notions of freedom,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12932"></td>
        <td id="LC12932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and of resistance to his authority, he will have a good pretext for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12933"></td>
        <td id="LC12933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destroying them by placing them at the mercy of the enemy; and for all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12934"></td>
        <td id="LC12934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these reasons the tyrant must be always getting up a war.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12935"></td>
        <td id="LC12935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12936"></td>
        <td id="LC12936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He must.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12937"></td>
        <td id="LC12937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12938"></td>
        <td id="LC12938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now he begins to grow unpopular.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12939"></td>
        <td id="LC12939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12940"></td>
        <td id="LC12940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A necessary result.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12941"></td>
        <td id="LC12941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12942"></td>
        <td id="LC12942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then some of those who joined in setting him up, and who are in power,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12943"></td>
        <td id="LC12943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speak their minds to him and to one another, and the more courageous of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12944"></td>
        <td id="LC12944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them cast in his teeth what is being done.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12945"></td>
        <td id="LC12945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12946"></td>
        <td id="LC12946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, that may be expected.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12947"></td>
        <td id="LC12947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12948"></td>
        <td id="LC12948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the tyrant, if he means to rule, must get rid of them; he cannot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12949"></td>
        <td id="LC12949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stop while he has a friend or an enemy who is good for anything.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12950"></td>
        <td id="LC12950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12951"></td>
        <td id="LC12951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He cannot.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12952"></td>
        <td id="LC12952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12953"></td>
        <td id="LC12953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And therefore he must look about him and see who is valiant, who is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12954"></td>
        <td id="LC12954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">high-minded, who is wise, who is wealthy; happy man, he is the enemy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12955"></td>
        <td id="LC12955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them all, and must seek occasion against them whether he will or no,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12956"></td>
        <td id="LC12956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">until he has made a purgation of the State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12957"></td>
        <td id="LC12957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12958"></td>
        <td id="LC12958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, and a rare purgation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12959"></td>
        <td id="LC12959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12960"></td>
        <td id="LC12960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said, not the sort of purgation which the physicians make of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12961"></td>
        <td id="LC12961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body; for they take away the worse and leave the better part, but he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12962"></td>
        <td id="LC12962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">does the reverse.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12963"></td>
        <td id="LC12963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12964"></td>
        <td id="LC12964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If he is to rule, I suppose that he cannot help himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12965"></td>
        <td id="LC12965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12966"></td>
        <td id="LC12966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What a blessed alternative, I said:--to be compelled to dwell only with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12967"></td>
        <td id="LC12967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the many bad, and to be by them hated, or not to live at all!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12968"></td>
        <td id="LC12968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12969"></td>
        <td id="LC12969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, that is the alternative.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12970"></td>
        <td id="LC12970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12971"></td>
        <td id="LC12971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the more detestable his actions are to the citizens the more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12972"></td>
        <td id="LC12972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">satellites and the greater devotion in them will he require?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12973"></td>
        <td id="LC12973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12974"></td>
        <td id="LC12974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12975"></td>
