</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12976"></td>
        <td id="LC12976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And who are the devoted band, and where will he procure them?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12977"></td>
        <td id="LC12977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC12978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They will flock to him, he said, of their own accord, if he pays them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12979"></td>
        <td id="LC12979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12980"></td>
        <td id="LC12980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By the dog! I said, here are more drones, of every sort and from every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12981"></td>
        <td id="LC12981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">land.</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L12983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12983"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12984"></td>
        <td id="LC12984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12985"></td>
        <td id="LC12985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But will he not desire to get them on the spot?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12986"></td>
        <td id="LC12986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12987"></td>
        <td id="LC12987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How do you mean?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12988"></td>
        <td id="LC12988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12989"></td>
        <td id="LC12989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He will rob the citizens of their slaves; he will then set them free and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12990"></td>
        <td id="LC12990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enrol them in his body-guard.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12991"></td>
        <td id="LC12991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12992"></td>
        <td id="LC12992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To be sure, he said; and he will be able to trust them best of all.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12993"></td>
        <td id="LC12993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12994"></td>
        <td id="LC12994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What a blessed creature, I said, must this tyrant be; he has put to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12995"></td>
        <td id="LC12995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death the others and has these for his trusted friends.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12996"></td>
        <td id="LC12996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12997"></td>
        <td id="LC12997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said; they are quite of his sort.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12998"></td>
        <td id="LC12998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12999"></td>
        <td id="LC12999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said, and these are the new citizens whom he has called into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13000"></td>
        <td id="LC13000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">existence, who admire him and are his companions, while the good hate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13001"></td>
        <td id="LC13001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and avoid him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13002"></td>
        <td id="LC13002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13003"></td>
        <td id="LC13003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of course.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13004"></td>
        <td id="LC13004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13005"></td>
        <td id="LC13005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Verily, then, tragedy is a wise thing and Euripides a great tragedian.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13006"></td>
        <td id="LC13006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13007"></td>
        <td id="LC13007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why so?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13008"></td>
        <td id="LC13008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13009"></td>
        <td id="LC13009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, because he is the author of the pregnant saying,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13010"></td>
        <td id="LC13010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13011"></td>
        <td id="LC13011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Tyrants are wise by living with the wise;&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13012"></td>
        <td id="LC13012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13013"></td>
        <td id="LC13013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and he clearly meant to say that they are the wise whom the tyrant makes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13014"></td>
        <td id="LC13014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his companions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13015"></td>
        <td id="LC13015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13016"></td>
        <td id="LC13016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, and he also praises tyranny as godlike; and many other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13017"></td>
        <td id="LC13017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things of the same kind are said by him and by the other poets.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13018"></td>
        <td id="LC13018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13019"></td>
        <td id="LC13019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And therefore, I said, the tragic poets being wise men will forgive us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13020"></td>
        <td id="LC13020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and any others who live after our manner if we do not receive them into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13021"></td>
        <td id="LC13021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our State, because they are the eulogists of tyranny.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13022"></td>
        <td id="LC13022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13023"></td>
        <td id="LC13023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, those who have the wit will doubtless forgive us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13024"></td>
        <td id="LC13024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13025"></td>
        <td id="LC13025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But they will continue to go to other cities and attract mobs, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13026"></td>
        <td id="LC13026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hire voices fair and loud and persuasive, and draw the cities over to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13027"></td>
        <td id="LC13027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tyrannies and democracies.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13028"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13029"></td>
        <td id="LC13029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13030"></td>
        <td id="LC13030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13031"></td>
        <td id="LC13031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Moreover, they are paid for this and receive honour--the greatest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13032"></td>
        <td id="LC13032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honour, as might be expected, from tyrants, and the next greatest from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13033"></td>
        <td id="LC13033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">democracies; but the higher they ascend our constitution hill, the more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13034"></td>
        <td id="LC13034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their reputation fails, and seems unable from shortness of breath to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13035"></td>
        <td id="LC13035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proceed further.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13036"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13037"></td>
        <td id="LC13037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13038"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13039"></td>
        <td id="LC13039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But we are wandering from the subject: Let us therefore return and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13040"></td>
        <td id="LC13040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enquire how the tyrant will maintain that fair and numerous and various</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13041"></td>
        <td id="LC13041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and ever-changing army of his.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13042"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13043"></td>
        <td id="LC13043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If, he said, there are sacred treasures in the city, he will confiscate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13044"></td>
        <td id="LC13044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and spend them; and in so far as the fortunes of attainted persons may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13045"></td>
        <td id="LC13045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suffice, he will be able to diminish the taxes which he would otherwise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13046"></td>
        <td id="LC13046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have to impose upon the people.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13047"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13048"></td>
        <td id="LC13048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And when these fail?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13049"></td>
        <td id="LC13049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13050"></td>
        <td id="LC13050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, clearly, he said, then he and his boon companions, whether male or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13051"></td>
        <td id="LC13051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">female, will be maintained out of his father&#39;s estate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13052"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13053"></td>
        <td id="LC13053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You mean to say that the people, from whom he has derived his being,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13054"></td>
        <td id="LC13054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will maintain him and his companions?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13055"></td>
        <td id="LC13055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13056"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13057"></td>
        <td id="LC13057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13058"></td>
        <td id="LC13058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But what if the people fly into a passion, and aver that a grown-up son</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13059"></td>
        <td id="LC13059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ought not to be supported by his father, but that the father should be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13060"></td>
        <td id="LC13060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supported by the son? The father did not bring him into being, or settle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13061"></td>
        <td id="LC13061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him in life, in order that when his son became a man he should himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13062"></td>
        <td id="LC13062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be the servant of his own servants and should support him and his rabble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13063"></td>
        <td id="LC13063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of slaves and companions; but that his son should protect him, and that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13064"></td>
        <td id="LC13064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by his help he might be emancipated from the government of the rich and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13065"></td>
        <td id="LC13065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aristocratic, as they are termed. And so he bids him and his companions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13066"></td>
        <td id="LC13066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">depart, just as any other father might drive out of the house a riotous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13067"></td>
        <td id="LC13067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">son and his undesirable associates.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13068"></td>
        <td id="LC13068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13069"></td>
        <td id="LC13069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By heaven, he said, then the parent will discover what a monster he has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13070"></td>
        <td id="LC13070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been fostering in his bosom; and, when he wants to drive him out, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13071"></td>
        <td id="LC13071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will find that he is weak and his son strong.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13072"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13073"></td>
        <td id="LC13073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, you do not mean to say that the tyrant will use violence? What!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13074"></td>
        <td id="LC13074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beat his father if he opposes him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13075"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13076"></td>
        <td id="LC13076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he will, having first disarmed him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13077"></td>
        <td id="LC13077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13078"></td>
        <td id="LC13078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then he is a parricide, and a cruel guardian of an aged parent; and this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13079"></td>
        <td id="LC13079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is real tyranny, about which there can be no longer a mistake: as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13080"></td>
        <td id="LC13080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying is, the people who would escape the smoke which is the slavery of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13081"></td>
        <td id="LC13081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">freemen, has fallen into the fire which is the tyranny of slaves. Thus</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13082"></td>
        <td id="LC13082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">liberty, getting out of all order and reason, passes into the harshest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13083"></td>
        <td id="LC13083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and bitterest form of slavery.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13084"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13085"></td>
        <td id="LC13085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13086"></td>
        <td id="LC13086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13087"></td>
        <td id="LC13087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very well; and may we not rightly say that we have sufficiently</td>

        <td id="L13088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13088"></td>
        <td id="LC13088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discussed the nature of tyranny, and the manner of the transition from</td>

        <td id="L13089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13089"></td>
        <td id="LC13089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">democracy to tyranny?</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13091"></td>
        <td id="LC13091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, quite enough, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13092"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13096"></td>
        <td id="LC13096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">BOOK IX.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13097"></td>
        <td id="LC13097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13098"></td>
        <td id="LC13098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Last of all comes the tyrannical man; about whom we have once more to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13099"></td>
        <td id="LC13099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ask, how is he formed out of the democratical? and how does he live, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13100"></td>
        <td id="LC13100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happiness or in misery?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13101"></td>
        <td id="LC13101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13102"></td>
        <td id="LC13102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, he is the only one remaining.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13103"></td>
        <td id="LC13103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13104"></td>
        <td id="LC13104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is, however, I said, a previous question which remains unanswered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13105"></td>
        <td id="LC13105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13106"></td>
        <td id="LC13106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What question?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13107"></td>
        <td id="LC13107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13108"></td>
        <td id="LC13108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do not think that we have adequately determined the nature and number</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13109"></td>
        <td id="LC13109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the appetites, and until this is accomplished the enquiry will always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13110"></td>
        <td id="LC13110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be confused.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13111"></td>
        <td id="LC13111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13112"></td>
        <td id="LC13112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, he said, it is not too late to supply the omission.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13113"></td>
        <td id="LC13113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13114"></td>
        <td id="LC13114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, I said; and observe the point which I want to understand:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13115"></td>
        <td id="LC13115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certain of the unnecessary pleasures and appetites I conceive to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13116"></td>
        <td id="LC13116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unlawful; every one appears to have them, but in some persons they are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13117"></td>
        <td id="LC13117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">controlled by the laws and by reason, and the better desires prevail</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13118"></td>
        <td id="LC13118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over them--either they are wholly banished or they become few and weak;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13119"></td>
        <td id="LC13119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">while in the case of others they are stronger, and there are more of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13120"></td>
        <td id="LC13120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13121"></td>
        <td id="LC13121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13122"></td>
        <td id="LC13122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Which appetites do you mean?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13123"></td>
        <td id="LC13123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13124"></td>
        <td id="LC13124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I mean those which are awake when the reasoning and human and ruling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13125"></td>
        <td id="LC13125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power is asleep; then the wild beast within us, gorged with meat or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13126"></td>
        <td id="LC13126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drink, starts up and having shaken off sleep, goes forth to satisfy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13127"></td>
        <td id="LC13127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his desires; and there is no conceivable folly or crime--not excepting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13128"></td>
        <td id="LC13128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">incest or any other unnatural union, or parricide, or the eating of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13129"></td>
        <td id="LC13129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forbidden food--which at such a time, when he has parted company with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13130"></td>
        <td id="LC13130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all shame and sense, a man may not be ready to commit.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13131"></td>
        <td id="LC13131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13132"></td>
        <td id="LC13132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13133"></td>
        <td id="LC13133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13134"></td>
        <td id="LC13134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But when a man&#39;s pulse is healthy and temperate, and when before going</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13135"></td>
        <td id="LC13135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to sleep he has awakened his rational powers, and fed them on noble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13136"></td>
        <td id="LC13136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thoughts and enquiries, collecting himself in meditation; after having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13137"></td>
        <td id="LC13137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first indulged his appetites neither too much nor too little, but just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13138"></td>
        <td id="LC13138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough to lay them to sleep, and prevent them and their enjoyments and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13139"></td>
        <td id="LC13139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pains from interfering with the higher principle--which he leaves in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13140"></td>
        <td id="LC13140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the solitude of pure abstraction, free to contemplate and aspire to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13141"></td>
        <td id="LC13141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the knowledge of the unknown, whether in past, present, or future: when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13142"></td>
        <td id="LC13142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again he has allayed the passionate element, if he has a quarrel against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13143"></td>
        <td id="LC13143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any one--I say, when, after pacifying the two irrational principles, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13144"></td>
        <td id="LC13144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rouses up the third, which is reason, before he takes his rest, then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13145"></td>
        <td id="LC13145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as you know, he attains truth most nearly, and is least likely to be the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13146"></td>
        <td id="LC13146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sport of fantastic and lawless visions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13147"></td>
        <td id="LC13147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13148"></td>
        <td id="LC13148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I quite agree.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13149"></td>
        <td id="LC13149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13150"></td>
        <td id="LC13150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In saying this I have been running into a digression; but the point</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13151"></td>
        <td id="LC13151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I desire to note is that in all of us, even in good men, there is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13152"></td>
        <td id="LC13152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a lawless wild-beast nature, which peers out in sleep. Pray, consider</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13153"></td>
        <td id="LC13153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether I am right, and you agree with me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13154"></td>
        <td id="LC13154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13155"></td>
        <td id="LC13155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I agree.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13156"></td>
        <td id="LC13156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13157"></td>
        <td id="LC13157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now remember the character which we attributed to the democratic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13158"></td>
        <td id="LC13158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man. He was supposed from his youth upwards to have been trained under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13159"></td>
        <td id="LC13159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a miserly parent, who encouraged the saving appetites in him, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13160"></td>
        <td id="LC13160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discountenanced the unnecessary, which aim only at amusement and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13161"></td>
        <td id="LC13161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ornament?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13162"></td>
        <td id="LC13162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13163"></td>
        <td id="LC13163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13164"></td>
        <td id="LC13164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13165"></td>
        <td id="LC13165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And then he got into the company of a more refined, licentious sort of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13166"></td>
        <td id="LC13166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people, and taking to all their wanton ways rushed into the opposite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13167"></td>
        <td id="LC13167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extreme from an abhorrence of his father&#39;s meanness. At last, being a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13168"></td>
        <td id="LC13168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better man than his corruptors, he was drawn in both directions until he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13169"></td>
        <td id="LC13169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">halted midway and led a life, not of vulgar and slavish passion, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13170"></td>
        <td id="LC13170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of what he deemed moderate indulgence in various pleasures. After this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13171"></td>
        <td id="LC13171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner the democrat was generated out of the oligarch?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13172"></td>
        <td id="LC13172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13173"></td>
        <td id="LC13173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said; that was our view of him, and is so still.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13174"></td>
        <td id="LC13174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13175"></td>
        <td id="LC13175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now, I said, years will have passed away, and you must conceive this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13176"></td>
        <td id="LC13176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man, such as he is, to have a son, who is brought up in his father&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13177"></td>
        <td id="LC13177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">principles.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13178"></td>
        <td id="LC13178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13179"></td>
        <td id="LC13179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I can imagine him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13180"></td>
        <td id="LC13180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13181"></td>
        <td id="LC13181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then you must further imagine the same thing to happen to the son</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13182"></td>
        <td id="LC13182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which has already happened to the father:--he is drawn into a perfectly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13183"></td>
        <td id="LC13183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lawless life, which by his seducers is termed perfect liberty; and his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13184"></td>
        <td id="LC13184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father and friends take part with his moderate desires, and the opposite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13185"></td>
        <td id="LC13185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">party assist the opposite ones. As soon as these dire magicians and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13186"></td>
        <td id="LC13186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tyrant-makers find that they are losing their hold on him, they contrive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13187"></td>
        <td id="LC13187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to implant in him a master passion, to be lord over his idle and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13188"></td>
        <td id="LC13188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spendthrift lusts--a sort of monstrous winged drone--that is the only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13189"></td>
        <td id="LC13189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">image which will adequately describe him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13190"></td>
        <td id="LC13190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13191"></td>
        <td id="LC13191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, that is the only adequate image of him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13192"></td>
        <td id="LC13192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13193"></td>
        <td id="LC13193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And when his other lusts, amid clouds of incense and perfumes and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13194"></td>
        <td id="LC13194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">garlands and wines, and all the pleasures of a dissolute life, now let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13195"></td>
        <td id="LC13195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">loose, come buzzing around him, nourishing to the utmost the sting of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13196"></td>
        <td id="LC13196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desire which they implant in his drone-like nature, then at last this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13197"></td>
        <td id="LC13197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lord of the soul, having Madness for the captain of his guard, breaks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13198"></td>
        <td id="LC13198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out into a frenzy: and if he finds in himself any good opinions or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13199"></td>
        <td id="LC13199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appetites in process of formation, and there is in him any sense of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13200"></td>
        <td id="LC13200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shame remaining, to these better principles he puts an end, and casts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13201"></td>
        <td id="LC13201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them forth until he has purged away temperance and brought in madness to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13202"></td>
        <td id="LC13202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the full.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13203"></td>
        <td id="LC13203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13204"></td>
        <td id="LC13204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, that is the way in which the tyrannical man is generated.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13205"></td>
        <td id="LC13205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13206"></td>
        <td id="LC13206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is not this the reason why of old love has been called a tyrant?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13207"></td>
        <td id="LC13207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13208"></td>
        <td id="LC13208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should not wonder.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13209"></td>
        <td id="LC13209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13210"></td>
        <td id="LC13210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Further, I said, has not a drunken man also the spirit of a tyrant?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13211"></td>
        <td id="LC13211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13212"></td>
        <td id="LC13212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He has.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13213"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13214"></td>
        <td id="LC13214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And you know that a man who is deranged and not right in his mind, will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13215"></td>
        <td id="LC13215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fancy that he is able to rule, not only over men, but also over the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13216"></td>
        <td id="LC13216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gods?</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L13220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13220"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13221"></td>
        <td id="LC13221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when, either under the influence of nature, or habit, or both, he</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13300"></td>
        <td id="LC13300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He first takes their property, and when that fails, and pleasures are</td>

        <td id="L13301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13301"></td>
        <td id="LC13301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beginning to swarm in the hive of his soul, then he breaks into a house,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13302"></td>
        <td id="LC13302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or steals the garments of some nightly wayfarer; next he proceeds to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13303"></td>
        <td id="LC13303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clear a temple. Meanwhile the old opinions which he had when a child,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13304"></td>
        <td id="LC13304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and which gave judgment about good and evil, are overthrown by those</td>
      </tr>
