        <td id="LC13305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others which have just been emancipated, and are now the body-guard of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13306"></td>
        <td id="LC13306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">love and share his empire. These in his democratic days, when he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13307"></td>
        <td id="LC13307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still subject to the laws and to his father, were only let loose in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13308"></td>
        <td id="LC13308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dreams of sleep. But now that he is under the dominion of love, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13309"></td>
        <td id="LC13309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">becomes always and in waking reality what he was then very rarely and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13310"></td>
        <td id="LC13310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a dream only; he will commit the foulest murder, or eat forbidden food,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13311"></td>
        <td id="LC13311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or be guilty of any other horrid act. Love is his tyrant, and lives</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13312"></td>
        <td id="LC13312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lordly in him and lawlessly, and being himself a king, leads him on, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13313"></td>
        <td id="LC13313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a tyrant leads a State, to the performance of any reckless deed by which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13314"></td>
        <td id="LC13314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he can maintain himself and the rabble of his associates, whether those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13315"></td>
        <td id="LC13315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom evil communications have brought in from without, or those whom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13316"></td>
        <td id="LC13316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he himself has allowed to break loose within him by reason of a similar</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13317"></td>
        <td id="LC13317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evil nature in himself. Have we not here a picture of his way of life?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13318"></td>
        <td id="LC13318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13319"></td>
        <td id="LC13319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, indeed, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13320"></td>
        <td id="LC13320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13321"></td>
        <td id="LC13321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And if there are only a few of them in the State, and the rest of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13322"></td>
        <td id="LC13322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people are well disposed, they go away and become the body-guard or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13323"></td>
        <td id="LC13323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mercenary soldiers of some other tyrant who may probably want them for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13324"></td>
        <td id="LC13324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">war; and if there is no war, they stay at home and do many little pieces</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13325"></td>
        <td id="LC13325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of mischief in the city.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13326"></td>
        <td id="LC13326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13327"></td>
        <td id="LC13327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What sort of mischief?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13328"></td>
        <td id="LC13328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13329"></td>
        <td id="LC13329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For example, they are the thieves, burglars, cut-purses, foot-pads,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13330"></td>
        <td id="LC13330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">robbers of temples, man-stealers of the community; or if they are able</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13331"></td>
        <td id="LC13331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to speak they turn informers, and bear false witness, and take bribes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13332"></td>
        <td id="LC13332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13333"></td>
        <td id="LC13333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A small catalogue of evils, even if the perpetrators of them are few in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13334"></td>
        <td id="LC13334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">number.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13335"></td>
        <td id="LC13335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13336"></td>
        <td id="LC13336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said; but small and great are comparative terms, and all these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13337"></td>
        <td id="LC13337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things, in the misery and evil which they inflict upon a State, do not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13338"></td>
        <td id="LC13338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come within a thousand miles of the tyrant; when this noxious class and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13339"></td>
        <td id="LC13339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their followers grow numerous and become conscious of their strength,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13340"></td>
        <td id="LC13340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assisted by the infatuation of the people, they choose from among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13341"></td>
        <td id="LC13341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves the one who has most of the tyrant in his own soul, and him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13342"></td>
        <td id="LC13342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they create their tyrant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13343"></td>
        <td id="LC13343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13344"></td>
        <td id="LC13344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, and he will be the most fit to be a tyrant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13345"></td>
        <td id="LC13345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13346"></td>
        <td id="LC13346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If the people yield, well and good; but if they resist him, as he began</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13347"></td>
        <td id="LC13347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by beating his own father and mother, so now, if he has the power, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13348"></td>
        <td id="LC13348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beats them, and will keep his dear old fatherland or motherland, as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13349"></td>
        <td id="LC13349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Cretans say, in subjection to his young retainers whom he has introduced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13350"></td>
        <td id="LC13350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be their rulers and masters. This is the end of his passions and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13351"></td>
        <td id="LC13351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desires.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13352"></td>
        <td id="LC13352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13353"></td>
        <td id="LC13353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Exactly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13354"></td>
        <td id="LC13354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13355"></td>
        <td id="LC13355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When such men are only private individuals and before they get power,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13356"></td>
        <td id="LC13356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this is their character; they associate entirely with their own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13357"></td>
        <td id="LC13357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flatterers or ready tools; or if they want anything from anybody, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13358"></td>
        <td id="LC13358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in their turn are equally ready to bow down before them: they profess</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13359"></td>
        <td id="LC13359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every sort of affection for them; but when they have gained their point</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13360"></td>
        <td id="LC13360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they know them no more.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13361"></td>
        <td id="LC13361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13362"></td>
        <td id="LC13362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, truly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13363"></td>
        <td id="LC13363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13364"></td>
        <td id="LC13364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They are always either the masters or servants and never the friends of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13365"></td>
        <td id="LC13365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anybody; the tyrant never tastes of true freedom or friendship.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13366"></td>
        <td id="LC13366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13367"></td>
        <td id="LC13367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13368"></td>
        <td id="LC13368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13369"></td>
        <td id="LC13369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And may we not rightly call such men treacherous?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13370"></td>
        <td id="LC13370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13371"></td>
        <td id="LC13371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No question.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13372"></td>
        <td id="LC13372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13373"></td>
        <td id="LC13373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Also they are utterly unjust, if we were right in our notion of justice?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13374"></td>
        <td id="LC13374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13375"></td>
        <td id="LC13375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, and we were perfectly right.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13376"></td>
        <td id="LC13376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13377"></td>
        <td id="LC13377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let us then sum up in a word, I said, the character of the worst man: he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13378"></td>
        <td id="LC13378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is the waking reality of what we dreamed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13379"></td>
        <td id="LC13379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13380"></td>
        <td id="LC13380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13381"></td>
        <td id="LC13381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13382"></td>
        <td id="LC13382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And this is he who being by nature most of a tyrant bears rule, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13383"></td>
        <td id="LC13383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">longer he lives the more of a tyrant he becomes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13384"></td>
        <td id="LC13384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13385"></td>
        <td id="LC13385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is certain, said Glaucon, taking his turn to answer.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13386"></td>
        <td id="LC13386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13387"></td>
        <td id="LC13387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And will not he who has been shown to be the wickedest, be also the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13388"></td>
        <td id="LC13388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">miserable? and he who has tyrannized longest and most, most continually</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13389"></td>
        <td id="LC13389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and truly miserable; although this may not be the opinion of men in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13390"></td>
        <td id="LC13390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">general?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13391"></td>
        <td id="LC13391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13392"></td>
        <td id="LC13392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, inevitably.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13393"></td>
        <td id="LC13393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13394"></td>
        <td id="LC13394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And must not the tyrannical man be like the tyrannical State, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13395"></td>
        <td id="LC13395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the democratical man like the democratical State; and the same of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13396"></td>
        <td id="LC13396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13397"></td>
        <td id="LC13397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13398"></td>
        <td id="LC13398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13399"></td>
        <td id="LC13399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13400"></td>
        <td id="LC13400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And as State is to State in virtue and happiness, so is man in relation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13401"></td>
        <td id="LC13401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to man?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13402"></td>
        <td id="LC13402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13403"></td>
        <td id="LC13403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To be sure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13404"></td>
        <td id="LC13404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13405"></td>
        <td id="LC13405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then comparing our original city, which was under a king, and the city</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13406"></td>
        <td id="LC13406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which is under a tyrant, how do they stand as to virtue?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13407"></td>
        <td id="LC13407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13408"></td>
        <td id="LC13408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They are the opposite extremes, he said, for one is the very best and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13409"></td>
        <td id="LC13409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other is the very worst.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13410"></td>
        <td id="LC13410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13411"></td>
        <td id="LC13411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There can be no mistake, I said, as to which is which, and therefore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13412"></td>
        <td id="LC13412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will at once enquire whether you would arrive at a similar decision</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13413"></td>
        <td id="LC13413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about their relative happiness and misery. And here we must not allow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13414"></td>
        <td id="LC13414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ourselves to be panic-stricken at the apparition of the tyrant, who is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13415"></td>
        <td id="LC13415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only a unit and may perhaps have a few retainers about him; but let us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13416"></td>
        <td id="LC13416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go as we ought into every corner of the city and look all about, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13417"></td>
        <td id="LC13417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then we will give our opinion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13418"></td>
        <td id="LC13418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13419"></td>
        <td id="LC13419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A fair invitation, he replied; and I see, as every one must, that a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13420"></td>
        <td id="LC13420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tyranny is the wretchedest form of government, and the rule of a king</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13421"></td>
        <td id="LC13421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the happiest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13422"></td>
        <td id="LC13422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13423"></td>
        <td id="LC13423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And in estimating the men too, may I not fairly make a like request,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13424"></td>
        <td id="LC13424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I should have a judge whose mind can enter into and see through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13425"></td>
        <td id="LC13425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">human nature? he must not be like a child who looks at the outside and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13426"></td>
        <td id="LC13426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is dazzled at the pompous aspect which the tyrannical nature assumes to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13427"></td>
        <td id="LC13427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the beholder, but let him be one who has a clear insight. May I suppose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13428"></td>
        <td id="LC13428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the judgment is given in the hearing of us all by one who is able</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13429"></td>
        <td id="LC13429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to judge, and has dwelt in the same place with him, and been present at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13430"></td>
        <td id="LC13430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his dally life and known him in his family relations, where he may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13431"></td>
        <td id="LC13431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen stripped of his tragedy attire, and again in the hour of public</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13432"></td>
        <td id="LC13432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">danger--he shall tell us about the happiness and misery of the tyrant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13433"></td>
        <td id="LC13433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when compared with other men?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13434"></td>
        <td id="LC13434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13435"></td>
        <td id="LC13435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That again, he said, is a very fair proposal.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13436"></td>
        <td id="LC13436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13437"></td>
        <td id="LC13437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Shall I assume that we ourselves are able and experienced judges and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13438"></td>
        <td id="LC13438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have before now met with such a person? We shall then have some one who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13439"></td>
        <td id="LC13439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will answer our enquiries.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13440"></td>
        <td id="LC13440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13441"></td>
        <td id="LC13441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By all means.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13442"></td>
        <td id="LC13442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13443"></td>
        <td id="LC13443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let me ask you not to forget the parallel of the individual and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13444"></td>
        <td id="LC13444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">State; bearing this in mind, and glancing in turn from one to the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13445"></td>
        <td id="LC13445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them, will you tell me their respective conditions?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13446"></td>
        <td id="LC13446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13447"></td>
        <td id="LC13447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean? he asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13448"></td>
        <td id="LC13448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13449"></td>
        <td id="LC13449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Beginning with the State, I replied, would you say that a city which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13450"></td>
        <td id="LC13450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">governed by a tyrant is free or enslaved?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13451"></td>
        <td id="LC13451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13452"></td>
        <td id="LC13452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No city, he said, can be more completely enslaved.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13453"></td>
        <td id="LC13453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13454"></td>
        <td id="LC13454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And yet, as you see, there are freemen as well as masters in such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13455"></td>
        <td id="LC13455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">State?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13456"></td>
        <td id="LC13456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13457"></td>
        <td id="LC13457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, I see that there are--a few; but the people, speaking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13458"></td>
        <td id="LC13458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">generally, and the best of them are miserably degraded and enslaved.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13459"></td>
        <td id="LC13459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13460"></td>
        <td id="LC13460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then if the man is like the State, I said, must not the same rule</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13461"></td>
        <td id="LC13461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prevail? his soul is full of meanness and vulgarity--the best elements</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13462"></td>
        <td id="LC13462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in him are enslaved; and there is a small ruling part, which is also the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13463"></td>
        <td id="LC13463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worst and maddest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13464"></td>
        <td id="LC13464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13465"></td>
        <td id="LC13465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Inevitably.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13466"></td>
        <td id="LC13466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13467"></td>
        <td id="LC13467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And would you say that the soul of such an one is the soul of a freeman,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13468"></td>
        <td id="LC13468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or of a slave?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13469"></td>
        <td id="LC13469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13470"></td>
        <td id="LC13470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He has the soul of a slave, in my opinion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13471"></td>
        <td id="LC13471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13472"></td>
        <td id="LC13472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the State which is enslaved under a tyrant is utterly incapable of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13473"></td>
        <td id="LC13473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acting voluntarily?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13474"></td>
        <td id="LC13474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13475"></td>
        <td id="LC13475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Utterly incapable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13476"></td>
        <td id="LC13476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13477"></td>
        <td id="LC13477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And also the soul which is under a tyrant (I am speaking of the soul</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13478"></td>
        <td id="LC13478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taken as a whole) is least capable of doing what she desires; there is a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13479"></td>
        <td id="LC13479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gadfly which goads her, and she is full of trouble and remorse?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13480"></td>
        <td id="LC13480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13481"></td>
        <td id="LC13481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13482"></td>
        <td id="LC13482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13483"></td>
        <td id="LC13483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is the city which is under a tyrant rich or poor?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13484"></td>
        <td id="LC13484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13485"></td>
        <td id="LC13485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Poor.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13486"></td>
        <td id="LC13486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13487"></td>
        <td id="LC13487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the tyrannical soul must be always poor and insatiable?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13488"></td>
        <td id="LC13488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13489"></td>
        <td id="LC13489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13490"></td>
        <td id="LC13490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13491"></td>
        <td id="LC13491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And must not such a State and such a man be always full of fear?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13492"></td>
        <td id="LC13492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13493"></td>
        <td id="LC13493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, indeed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13494"></td>
        <td id="LC13494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13495"></td>
        <td id="LC13495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Is there any State in which you will find more of lamentation and sorrow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13496"></td>
        <td id="LC13496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and groaning and pain?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13497"></td>
        <td id="LC13497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13498"></td>
        <td id="LC13498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13499"></td>
        <td id="LC13499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13500"></td>
        <td id="LC13500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is there any man in whom you will find more of this sort of misery</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13501"></td>
        <td id="LC13501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than in the tyrannical man, who is in a fury of passions and desires?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13502"></td>
        <td id="LC13502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13503"></td>
        <td id="LC13503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Impossible.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13504"></td>
        <td id="LC13504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13505"></td>
        <td id="LC13505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Reflecting upon these and similar evils, you held the tyrannical State</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13506"></td>
        <td id="LC13506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be the most miserable of States?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13507"></td>
        <td id="LC13507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13508"></td>
        <td id="LC13508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And I was right, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13509"></td>
        <td id="LC13509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13510"></td>
        <td id="LC13510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, I said. And when you see the same evils in the tyrannical</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13511"></td>
        <td id="LC13511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man, what do you say of him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13512"></td>
        <td id="LC13512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13513"></td>
        <td id="LC13513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I say that he is by far the most miserable of all men.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13514"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC13515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There, I said, I think that you are beginning to go wrong.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L13517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13517"></td>
        <td id="LC13517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean?</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13520"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L13521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13521"></td>
        <td id="LC13521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then who is more miserable?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13522"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L13527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13527"></td>
        <td id="LC13527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He who is of a tyrannical nature, and instead of leading a private life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13528"></td>
        <td id="LC13528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has been cursed with the further misfortune of being a public tyrant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13529"></td>
        <td id="LC13529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13530"></td>
        <td id="LC13530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">From what has been said, I gather that you are right.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13531"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L13532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13532"></td>
        <td id="LC13532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I replied, but in this high argument you should be a little more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13533"></td>
        <td id="LC13533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain, and should not conjecture only; for of all questions, this</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13534"></td>
        <td id="LC13534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">respecting good and evil is the greatest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13535"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13536"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13537"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13538"></td>
        <td id="LC13538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let me then offer you an illustration, which may, I think, throw a light</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13539"></td>
        <td id="LC13539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon this subject.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13540"></td>
        <td id="LC13540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13541"></td>
        <td id="LC13541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What is your illustration?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13542"></td>
        <td id="LC13542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13543"></td>
        <td id="LC13543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The case of rich individuals in cities who possess many slaves: from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13544"></td>
        <td id="LC13544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them you may form an idea of the tyrant&#39;s condition, for they both have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13545"></td>
        <td id="LC13545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slaves; the only difference is that he has more slaves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13546"></td>
        <td id="LC13546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13547"></td>
        <td id="LC13547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, that is the difference.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13548"></td>
        <td id="LC13548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13549"></td>
        <td id="LC13549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You know that they live securely and have nothing to apprehend from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13550"></td>
        <td id="LC13550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their servants?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13551"></td>
        <td id="LC13551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13552"></td>
        <td id="LC13552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What should they fear?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13553"></td>
        <td id="LC13553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13554"></td>
        <td id="LC13554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nothing. But do you observe the reason of this?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13555"></td>
        <td id="LC13555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13556"></td>
        <td id="LC13556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes; the reason is, that the whole city is leagued together for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13557"></td>
        <td id="LC13557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">protection of each individual.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13558"></td>
        <td id="LC13558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13559"></td>
        <td id="LC13559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, I said. But imagine one of these owners, the master say of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13560"></td>
        <td id="LC13560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some fifty slaves, together with his family and property and slaves,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13561"></td>
        <td id="LC13561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carried off by a god into the wilderness, where there are no freemen to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13562"></td>
        <td id="LC13562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">help him--will he not be in an agony of fear lest he and his wife and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13563"></td>
        <td id="LC13563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">children should be put to death by his slaves?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13564"></td>
        <td id="LC13564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13565"></td>
        <td id="LC13565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, he will be in the utmost fear.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13566"></td>
        <td id="LC13566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13567"></td>
        <td id="LC13567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The time has arrived when he will be compelled to flatter divers of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13568"></td>
        <td id="LC13568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slaves, and make many promises to them of freedom and other things, much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13569"></td>
        <td id="LC13569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against his will--he will have to cajole his own servants.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13570"></td>
        <td id="LC13570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13571"></td>
        <td id="LC13571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, that will be the only way of saving himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13572"></td>
        <td id="LC13572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13573"></td>
        <td id="LC13573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And suppose the same god, who carried him away, to surround him with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13574"></td>
        <td id="LC13574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neighbours who will not suffer one man to be the master of another, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13575"></td>
        <td id="LC13575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who, if they could catch the offender, would take his life?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13576"></td>
        <td id="LC13576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13577"></td>
        <td id="LC13577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His case will be still worse, if you suppose him to be everywhere</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13578"></td>
        <td id="LC13578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surrounded and watched by enemies.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13579"></td>
        <td id="LC13579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13580"></td>
        <td id="LC13580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And is not this the sort of prison in which the tyrant will be bound--he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13581"></td>
        <td id="LC13581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who being by nature such as we have described, is full of all sorts of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13582"></td>
        <td id="LC13582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fears and lusts? His soul is dainty and greedy, and yet alone, of all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13583"></td>
        <td id="LC13583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men in the city, he is never allowed to go on a journey, or to see the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13584"></td>
        <td id="LC13584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things which other freemen desire to see, but he lives in his hole like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13585"></td>
        <td id="LC13585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a woman hidden in the house, and is jealous of any other citizen who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13586"></td>
        <td id="LC13586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">goes into foreign parts and sees anything of interest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13587"></td>
        <td id="LC13587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13588"></td>
        <td id="LC13588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13589"></td>
        <td id="LC13589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13590"></td>
        <td id="LC13590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And amid evils such as these will not he who is ill-governed in his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13591"></td>
        <td id="LC13591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">person--the tyrannical man, I mean--whom you just now decided to be the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13592"></td>
        <td id="LC13592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most miserable of all--will not he be yet more miserable when, instead</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13593"></td>
        <td id="LC13593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of leading a private life, he is constrained by fortune to be a public</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13594"></td>
        <td id="LC13594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tyrant? He has to be master of others when he is not master of himself:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13595"></td>
        <td id="LC13595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he is like a diseased or paralytic man who is compelled to pass his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13596"></td>
        <td id="LC13596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life, not in retirement, but fighting and combating with other men.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13597"></td>
        <td id="LC13597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13598"></td>
        <td id="LC13598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, the similitude is most exact.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13599"></td>
        <td id="LC13599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13600"></td>
        <td id="LC13600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Is not his case utterly miserable? and does not the actual tyrant lead a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13601"></td>
        <td id="LC13601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worse life than he whose life you determined to be the worst?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13602"></td>
        <td id="LC13602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13603"></td>
        <td id="LC13603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13604"></td>
        <td id="LC13604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13605"></td>
        <td id="LC13605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He who is the real tyrant, whatever men may think, is the real slave,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13606"></td>
        <td id="LC13606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and is obliged to practise the greatest adulation and servility, and to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13607"></td>
        <td id="LC13607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be the flatterer of the vilest of mankind. He has desires which he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13608"></td>
        <td id="LC13608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">utterly unable to satisfy, and has more wants than any one, and is truly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13609"></td>
        <td id="LC13609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor, if you know how to inspect the whole soul of him: all his life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13610"></td>
        <td id="LC13610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long he is beset with fear and is full of convulsions and distractions,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13611"></td>
        <td id="LC13611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even as the State which he resembles: and surely the resemblance holds?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13612"></td>
        <td id="LC13612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13613"></td>
        <td id="LC13613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13614"></td>
        <td id="LC13614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13615"></td>
        <td id="LC13615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Moreover, as we were saying before, he grows worse from having power: he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13616"></td>
        <td id="LC13616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">becomes and is of necessity more jealous, more faithless, more unjust,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13617"></td>
        <td id="LC13617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more friendless, more impious, than he was at first; he is the purveyor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13618"></td>
        <td id="LC13618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and cherisher of every sort of vice, and the consequence is that he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13619"></td>
        <td id="LC13619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supremely miserable, and that he makes everybody else as miserable as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13620"></td>
        <td id="LC13620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13621"></td>
        <td id="LC13621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13622"></td>
        <td id="LC13622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No man of any sense will dispute your words.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13623"></td>
        <td id="LC13623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13624"></td>
        <td id="LC13624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Come then, I said, and as the general umpire in theatrical contests</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13625"></td>
        <td id="LC13625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proclaims the result, do you also decide who in your opinion is first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13626"></td>
        <td id="LC13626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the scale of happiness, and who second, and in what order the others</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13627"></td>
        <td id="LC13627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follow: there are five of them in all--they are the royal, timocratical,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13628"></td>
        <td id="LC13628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oligarchical, democratical, tyrannical.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13629"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13630"></td>
        <td id="LC13630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The decision will be easily given, he replied; they shall be choruses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13631"></td>
        <td id="LC13631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming on the stage, and I must judge them in the order in which they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13632"></td>
        <td id="LC13632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enter, by the criterion of virtue and vice, happiness and misery.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13633"></td>
        <td id="LC13633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13634"></td>
        <td id="LC13634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Need we hire a herald, or shall I announce, that the son of Ariston (the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13635"></td>
        <td id="LC13635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">best) has decided that the best and justest is also the happiest, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13636"></td>
        <td id="LC13636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that this is he who is the most royal man and king over himself; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13637"></td>
        <td id="LC13637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the worst and most unjust man is also the most miserable, and that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13638"></td>
        <td id="LC13638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this is he who being the greatest tyrant of himself is also the greatest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13639"></td>
        <td id="LC13639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tyrant of his State?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13640"></td>
        <td id="LC13640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13641"></td>
        <td id="LC13641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Make the proclamation yourself, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13643"></td>
        <td id="LC13643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And shall I add, &#39;whether seen or unseen by gods and men&#39;?</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13647"></td>
        <td id="LC13647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then this, I said, will be our first proof; and there is another, which</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13648"></td>
        <td id="LC13648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may also have some weight.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L13650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13650"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13651"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13652"></td>
        <td id="LC13652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The second proof is derived from the nature of the soul: seeing that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13653"></td>
        <td id="LC13653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the individual soul, like the State, has been divided by us into three</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13654"></td>
        <td id="LC13654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">principles, the division may, I think, furnish a new demonstration.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13655"></td>
        <td id="LC13655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13656"></td>
        <td id="LC13656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of what nature?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13657"></td>
        <td id="LC13657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13658"></td>
        <td id="LC13658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It seems to me that to these three principles three pleasures</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13659"></td>
        <td id="LC13659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">correspond; also three desires and governing powers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13660"></td>
        <td id="LC13660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13661"></td>
        <td id="LC13661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How do you mean? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13662"></td>
        <td id="LC13662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13663"></td>
        <td id="LC13663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is one principle with which, as we were saying, a man learns,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13664"></td>
        <td id="LC13664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another with which he is angry; the third, having many forms, has no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13665"></td>
        <td id="LC13665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">special name, but is denoted by the general term appetitive, from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13666"></td>
        <td id="LC13666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the extraordinary strength and vehemence of the desires of eating and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13667"></td>
        <td id="LC13667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drinking and the other sensual appetites which are the main elements of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13668"></td>
        <td id="LC13668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it; also money-loving, because such desires are generally satisfied by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13669"></td>
        <td id="LC13669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the help of money.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13670"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13671"></td>
        <td id="LC13671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13672"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13673"></td>
        <td id="LC13673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If we were to say that the loves and pleasures of this third part were</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13690"></td>
        <td id="LC13690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On the other hand, every one sees that the principle of knowledge is</td>
