        <td id="L13691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13691"></td>
        <td id="LC13691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wholly directed to the truth, and cares less than either of the others</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13692"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13695"></td>
        <td id="LC13695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13696"></td>
        <td id="LC13696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Lover of wisdom,&#39; &#39;lover of knowledge,&#39; are titles which we may fitly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13697"></td>
        <td id="LC13697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apply to that part of the soul?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13698"></td>
        <td id="LC13698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13699"></td>
        <td id="LC13699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13700"></td>
        <td id="LC13700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13701"></td>
        <td id="LC13701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One principle prevails in the souls of one class of men, another in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13702"></td>
        <td id="LC13702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others, as may happen?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13703"></td>
        <td id="LC13703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13704"></td>
        <td id="LC13704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13705"></td>
        <td id="LC13705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13706"></td>
        <td id="LC13706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then we may begin by assuming that there are three classes of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13707"></td>
        <td id="LC13707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men--lovers of wisdom, lovers of honour, lovers of gain?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13708"></td>
        <td id="LC13708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13709"></td>
        <td id="LC13709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Exactly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13710"></td>
        <td id="LC13710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13711"></td>
        <td id="LC13711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And there are three kinds of pleasure, which are their several objects?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13712"></td>
        <td id="LC13712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13713"></td>
        <td id="LC13713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13714"></td>
        <td id="LC13714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13715"></td>
        <td id="LC13715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, if you examine the three classes of men, and ask of them in turn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13716"></td>
        <td id="LC13716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which of their lives is pleasantest, each will be found praising his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13717"></td>
        <td id="LC13717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own and depreciating that of others: the money-maker will contrast the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13718"></td>
        <td id="LC13718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vanity of honour or of learning if they bring no money with the solid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13719"></td>
        <td id="LC13719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantages of gold and silver?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13720"></td>
        <td id="LC13720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13721"></td>
        <td id="LC13721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13722"></td>
        <td id="LC13722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13723"></td>
        <td id="LC13723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the lover of honour--what will be his opinion? Will he not think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13724"></td>
        <td id="LC13724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the pleasure of riches is vulgar, while the pleasure of learning,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13725"></td>
        <td id="LC13725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if it brings no distinction, is all smoke and nonsense to him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13726"></td>
        <td id="LC13726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13727"></td>
        <td id="LC13727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13728"></td>
        <td id="LC13728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13729"></td>
        <td id="LC13729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And are we to suppose, I said, that the philosopher sets any value on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13730"></td>
        <td id="LC13730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other pleasures in comparison with the pleasure of knowing the truth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13731"></td>
        <td id="LC13731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and in that pursuit abiding, ever learning, not so far indeed from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13732"></td>
        <td id="LC13732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heaven of pleasure? Does he not call the other pleasures necessary,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13733"></td>
        <td id="LC13733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under the idea that if there were no necessity for them, he would rather</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13734"></td>
        <td id="LC13734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not have them?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13735"></td>
        <td id="LC13735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13736"></td>
        <td id="LC13736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There can be no doubt of that, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13737"></td>
        <td id="LC13737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13738"></td>
        <td id="LC13738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Since, then, the pleasures of each class and the life of each are in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13739"></td>
        <td id="LC13739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dispute, and the question is not which life is more or less honourable,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13740"></td>
        <td id="LC13740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or better or worse, but which is the more pleasant or painless--how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13741"></td>
        <td id="LC13741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall we know who speaks truly?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13742"></td>
        <td id="LC13742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13743"></td>
        <td id="LC13743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I cannot myself tell, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13744"></td>
        <td id="LC13744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13745"></td>
        <td id="LC13745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, but what ought to be the criterion? Is any better than experience</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13746"></td>
        <td id="LC13746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and wisdom and reason?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13747"></td>
        <td id="LC13747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13748"></td>
        <td id="LC13748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There cannot be a better, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13749"></td>
        <td id="LC13749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13750"></td>
        <td id="LC13750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, I said, reflect. Of the three individuals, which has the greatest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13751"></td>
        <td id="LC13751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experience of all the pleasures which we enumerated? Has the lover of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13752"></td>
        <td id="LC13752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gain, in learning the nature of essential truth, greater experience of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13753"></td>
        <td id="LC13753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the pleasure of knowledge than the philosopher has of the pleasure of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13754"></td>
        <td id="LC13754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gain?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13755"></td>
        <td id="LC13755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13756"></td>
        <td id="LC13756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The philosopher, he replied, has greatly the advantage; for he has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13757"></td>
        <td id="LC13757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of necessity always known the taste of the other pleasures from his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13758"></td>
        <td id="LC13758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">childhood upwards: but the lover of gain in all his experience has not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13759"></td>
        <td id="LC13759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of necessity tasted--or, I should rather say, even had he desired, could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13760"></td>
        <td id="LC13760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hardly have tasted--the sweetness of learning and knowing truth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13761"></td>
        <td id="LC13761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13762"></td>
        <td id="LC13762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the lover of wisdom has a great advantage over the lover of gain,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13763"></td>
        <td id="LC13763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for he has a double experience?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13764"></td>
        <td id="LC13764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13765"></td>
        <td id="LC13765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, very great.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13766"></td>
        <td id="LC13766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13767"></td>
        <td id="LC13767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Again, has he greater experience of the pleasures of honour, or the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13768"></td>
        <td id="LC13768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lover of honour of the pleasures of wisdom?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13769"></td>
        <td id="LC13769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13770"></td>
        <td id="LC13770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nay, he said, all three are honoured in proportion as they attain their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13771"></td>
        <td id="LC13771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">object; for the rich man and the brave man and the wise man alike have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13772"></td>
        <td id="LC13772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their crowd of admirers, and as they all receive honour they all have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13773"></td>
        <td id="LC13773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experience of the pleasures of honour; but the delight which is to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13774"></td>
        <td id="LC13774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found in the knowledge of true being is known to the philosopher only.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13775"></td>
        <td id="LC13775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13776"></td>
        <td id="LC13776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His experience, then, will enable him to judge better than any one?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13777"></td>
        <td id="LC13777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13778"></td>
        <td id="LC13778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Far better.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13779"></td>
        <td id="LC13779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13780"></td>
        <td id="LC13780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And he is the only one who has wisdom as well as experience?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13781"></td>
        <td id="LC13781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13782"></td>
        <td id="LC13782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13783"></td>
        <td id="LC13783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13784"></td>
        <td id="LC13784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Further, the very faculty which is the instrument of judgment is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13785"></td>
        <td id="LC13785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possessed by the covetous or ambitious man, but only by the philosopher?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13786"></td>
        <td id="LC13786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13787"></td>
        <td id="LC13787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What faculty?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13788"></td>
        <td id="LC13788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13789"></td>
        <td id="LC13789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Reason, with whom, as we were saying, the decision ought to rest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13790"></td>
        <td id="LC13790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13791"></td>
        <td id="LC13791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13792"></td>
        <td id="LC13792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13793"></td>
        <td id="LC13793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And reasoning is peculiarly his instrument?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13794"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L13797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13797"></td>
        <td id="LC13797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If wealth and gain were the criterion, then the praise or blame of the</td>

        <td id="L13798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13798"></td>
        <td id="LC13798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lover of gain would surely be the most trustworthy?</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13799"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L13802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13802"></td>
        <td id="LC13802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Or if honour or victory or courage, in that case the judgment of the</td>

        <td id="LC13803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ambitious or pugnacious would be the truest?</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13804"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC13810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">approved by the lover of wisdom and reason are the truest.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L13812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13812"></td>

        <td id="L13813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13813"></td>
        <td id="LC13813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part of the soul is the pleasantest of the three, and that he of us in</td>

        <td id="LC13814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom this is the ruling principle has the pleasantest life.</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L13993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13993"></td>
        <td id="LC13993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13994"></td>
        <td id="LC13994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Clearly, from that which has more.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13995"></td>
        <td id="LC13995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13996"></td>
        <td id="LC13996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What classes of things have a greater share of pure existence in your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13997"></td>
        <td id="LC13997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judgment--those of which food and drink and condiments and all kinds of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13998"></td>
        <td id="LC13998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sustenance are examples, or the class which contains true opinion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13999"></td>
        <td id="LC13999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and knowledge and mind and all the different kinds of virtue? Put</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14000"></td>
        <td id="LC14000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the question in this way:--Which has a more pure being--that which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14001"></td>
        <td id="LC14001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concerned with the invariable, the immortal, and the true, and is of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14002"></td>
        <td id="LC14002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such a nature, and is found in such natures; or that which is concerned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14003"></td>
        <td id="LC14003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with and found in the variable and mortal, and is itself variable and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14004"></td>
        <td id="LC14004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mortal?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14005"></td>
        <td id="LC14005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14006"></td>
        <td id="LC14006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Far purer, he replied, is the being of that which is concerned with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14007"></td>
        <td id="LC14007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invariable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14008"></td>
        <td id="LC14008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14009"></td>
        <td id="LC14009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And does the essence of the invariable partake of knowledge in the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14010"></td>
        <td id="LC14010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">degree as of essence?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14011"></td>
        <td id="LC14011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14012"></td>
        <td id="LC14012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, of knowledge in the same degree.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14013"></td>
        <td id="LC14013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14014"></td>
        <td id="LC14014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And of truth in the same degree?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14015"></td>
        <td id="LC14015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14016"></td>
        <td id="LC14016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14017"></td>
        <td id="LC14017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14018"></td>
        <td id="LC14018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And, conversely, that which has less of truth will also have less of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14019"></td>
        <td id="LC14019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">essence?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14020"></td>
        <td id="LC14020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14021"></td>
        <td id="LC14021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Necessarily.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14022"></td>
        <td id="LC14022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14023"></td>
        <td id="LC14023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, in general, those kinds of things which are in the service of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14024"></td>
        <td id="LC14024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body have less of truth and essence than those which are in the service</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14025"></td>
        <td id="LC14025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the soul?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14026"></td>
        <td id="LC14026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14027"></td>
        <td id="LC14027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Far less.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14028"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14029"></td>
        <td id="LC14029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And has not the body itself less of truth and essence than the soul?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14030"></td>
        <td id="LC14030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14031"></td>
        <td id="LC14031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14032"></td>
        <td id="LC14032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14033"></td>
        <td id="LC14033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What is filled with more real existence, and actually has a more real</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14034"></td>
        <td id="LC14034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">existence, is more really filled than that which is filled with less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14035"></td>
        <td id="LC14035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">real existence and is less real?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14036"></td>
        <td id="LC14036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14037"></td>
        <td id="LC14037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of course.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14038"></td>
        <td id="LC14038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14039"></td>
        <td id="LC14039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And if there be a pleasure in being filled with that which is according</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14040"></td>
        <td id="LC14040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to nature, that which is more really filled with more real being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14041"></td>
        <td id="LC14041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will more really and truly enjoy true pleasure; whereas that which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14042"></td>
        <td id="LC14042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">participates in less real being will be less truly and surely satisfied,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14043"></td>
        <td id="LC14043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and will participate in an illusory and less real pleasure?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14044"></td>
        <td id="LC14044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14045"></td>
        <td id="LC14045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Unquestionably.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14046"></td>
        <td id="LC14046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14047"></td>
        <td id="LC14047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Those then who know not wisdom and virtue, and are always busy with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14048"></td>
        <td id="LC14048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gluttony and sensuality, go down and up again as far as the mean; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14049"></td>
        <td id="LC14049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in this region they move at random throughout life, but they never pass</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14050"></td>
        <td id="LC14050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the true upper world; thither they neither look, nor do they ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14051"></td>
        <td id="LC14051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">find their way, neither are they truly filled with true being, nor do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14052"></td>
        <td id="LC14052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they taste of pure and abiding pleasure. Like cattle, with their eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14053"></td>
        <td id="LC14053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always looking down and their heads stooping to the earth, that is,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14054"></td>
        <td id="LC14054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the dining-table, they fatten and feed and breed, and, in their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14055"></td>
        <td id="LC14055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excessive love of these delights, they kick and butt at one another with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14056"></td>
        <td id="LC14056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horns and hoofs which are made of iron; and they kill one another by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14057"></td>
        <td id="LC14057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reason of their insatiable lust. For they fill themselves with that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14058"></td>
        <td id="LC14058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which is not substantial, and the part of themselves which they fill is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14059"></td>
        <td id="LC14059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also unsubstantial and incontinent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14060"></td>
        <td id="LC14060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14061"></td>
        <td id="LC14061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Verily, Socrates, said Glaucon, you describe the life of the many like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14062"></td>
        <td id="LC14062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an oracle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14063"></td>
        <td id="LC14063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14064"></td>
        <td id="LC14064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their pleasures are mixed with pains--how can they be otherwise? For</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14065"></td>
        <td id="LC14065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they are mere shadows and pictures of the true, and are coloured by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14066"></td>
        <td id="LC14066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contrast, which exaggerates both light and shade, and so they implant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14067"></td>
        <td id="LC14067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the minds of fools insane desires of themselves; and they are fought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14068"></td>
        <td id="LC14068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about as Stesichorus says that the Greeks fought about the shadow of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14069"></td>
        <td id="LC14069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helen at Troy in ignorance of the truth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14070"></td>
        <td id="LC14070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14071"></td>
        <td id="LC14071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Something of that sort must inevitably happen.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14072"></td>
        <td id="LC14072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14073"></td>
        <td id="LC14073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And must not the like happen with the spirited or passionate element</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14074"></td>
        <td id="LC14074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the soul? Will not the passionate man who carries his passion into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14075"></td>
        <td id="LC14075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">action, be in the like case, whether he is envious and ambitious, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14076"></td>
        <td id="LC14076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">violent and contentious, or angry and discontented, if he be seeking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14077"></td>
        <td id="LC14077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to attain honour and victory and the satisfaction of his anger without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14078"></td>
        <td id="LC14078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reason or sense?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14079"></td>
        <td id="LC14079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14080"></td>
        <td id="LC14080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, the same will happen with the spirited element also.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14081"></td>
        <td id="LC14081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14082"></td>
        <td id="LC14082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then may we not confidently assert that the lovers of money and honour,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14083"></td>
        <td id="LC14083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when they seek their pleasures under the guidance and in the company</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14084"></td>
        <td id="LC14084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of reason and knowledge, and pursue after and win the pleasures which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14085"></td>
        <td id="LC14085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wisdom shows them, will also have the truest pleasures in the highest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14086"></td>
        <td id="LC14086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">degree which is attainable to them, inasmuch as they follow truth; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14087"></td>
        <td id="LC14087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they will have the pleasures which are natural to them, if that which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14088"></td>
        <td id="LC14088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">best for each one is also most natural to him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14089"></td>
        <td id="LC14089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC14189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14190"></td>
        <td id="LC14190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then if the good and just man be thus superior in pleasure to the evil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14191"></td>
        <td id="LC14191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and unjust, his superiority will be infinitely greater in propriety of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14192"></td>
        <td id="LC14192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life and in beauty and virtue?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14193"></td>
        <td id="LC14193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14194"></td>
        <td id="LC14194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Immeasurably greater.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14195"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14196"></td>
        <td id="LC14196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, I said, and now having arrived at this stage of the argument, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14197"></td>
        <td id="LC14197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may revert to the words which brought us hither: Was not some one saying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14198"></td>
        <td id="LC14198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that injustice was a gain to the perfectly unjust who was reputed to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14199"></td>
        <td id="LC14199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14200"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L14201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14201"></td>
        <td id="LC14201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, that was said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14202"></td>
        <td id="LC14202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14203"></td>
        <td id="LC14203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now then, having determined the power and quality of justice and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14204"></td>
        <td id="LC14204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injustice, let us have a little conversation with him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14205"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L14206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14206"></td>
        <td id="LC14206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What shall we say to him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14207"></td>
        <td id="LC14207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14208"></td>
        <td id="LC14208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let us make an image of the soul, that he may have his own words</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L14209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14209"></td>
        <td id="LC14209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presented before his eyes.</td>

        <td id="L14210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14210"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14211"></td>
        <td id="LC14211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of what sort?</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L14212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14212"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14213"></td>
        <td id="LC14213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">An ideal image of the soul, like the composite creations of ancient</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14214"></td>
        <td id="LC14214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mythology, such as the Chimera or Scylla or Cerberus, and there are many</td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L14220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14220"></td>
        <td id="LC14220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">having a ring of heads of all manner of beasts, tame and wild, which he</td>

</td>

        <td id="L14223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14223"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14237"></td>
        <td id="LC14237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Next fashion the outside of them into a single image, as of a man, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14238"></td>
        <td id="LC14238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he who is not able to look within, and sees only the outer hull,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L14239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14239"></td>
        <td id="LC14239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may believe the beast to be a single human creature.</td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L14242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14242"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14243"></td>
        <td id="LC14243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now, to him who maintains that it is profitable for the human</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14244"></td>
        <td id="LC14244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creature to be unjust, and unprofitable to be just, let us reply</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14245"></td>
        <td id="LC14245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that, if he be right, it is profitable for this creature to feast</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14246"></td>
        <td id="LC14246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the multitudinous monster and strengthen the lion and the lion-like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14247"></td>
        <td id="LC14247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">qualities, but to starve and weaken the man, who is consequently liable</td>

        <td id="L14248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14248"></td>
        <td id="LC14248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be dragged about at the mercy of either of the other two; and he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14249"></td>
        <td id="LC14249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not to attempt to familiarize or harmonize them with one another--he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14250"></td>
        <td id="LC14250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ought rather to suffer them to fight and bite and devour one another.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14251"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14252"></td>
        <td id="LC14252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, he said; that is what the approver of injustice says.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14253"></td>
        <td id="LC14253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14254"></td>
        <td id="LC14254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To him the supporter of justice makes answer that he should ever so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14255"></td>
        <td id="LC14255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speak and act as to give the man within him in some way or other the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14256"></td>
        <td id="LC14256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most complete mastery over the entire human creature. He should watch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14257"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14258"></td>
        <td id="LC14258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cultivating the gentle qualities, and preventing the wild ones from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14259"></td>
        <td id="LC14259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">growing; he should be making the lion-heart his ally, and in common care</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14260"></td>
        <td id="LC14260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them all should be uniting the several parts with one another and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14261"></td>
        <td id="LC14261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14262"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14263"></td>
        <td id="LC14263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, that is quite what the maintainer of justice say.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14264"></td>
        <td id="LC14264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14265"></td>
        <td id="LC14265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so from every point of view, whether of pleasure, honour, or</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC14266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantage, the approver of justice is right and speaks the truth, and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14267"></td>
        <td id="LC14267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the disapprover is wrong and false and ignorant?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14268"></td>
        <td id="LC14268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14269"></td>
        <td id="LC14269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, from every point of view.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L14270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14270"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14271"></td>
        <td id="LC14271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Come, now, and let us gently reason with the unjust, who is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14272"></td>
        <td id="LC14272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intentionally in error. &#39;Sweet Sir,&#39; we will say to him, &#39;what think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14273"></td>
        <td id="LC14273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you of things esteemed noble and ignoble? Is not the noble that which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14274"></td>
        <td id="LC14274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subjects the beast to the man, or rather to the god in man; and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14275"></td>
        <td id="LC14275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ignoble that which subjects the man to the beast?&#39; He can hardly avoid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14276"></td>
        <td id="LC14276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying Yes--can he now?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14277"></td>
        <td id="LC14277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14278"></td>
        <td id="LC14278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Not if he has any regard for my opinion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14279"></td>
        <td id="LC14279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14280"></td>
        <td id="LC14280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, if he agree so far, we may ask him to answer another question:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14281"></td>
        <td id="LC14281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Then how would a man profit if he received gold and silver on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14282"></td>
        <td id="LC14282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">condition that he was to enslave the noblest part of him to the worst?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14283"></td>
        <td id="LC14283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Who can imagine that a man who sold his son or daughter into slavery for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14284"></td>
        <td id="LC14284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">money, especially if he sold them into the hands of fierce and evil men,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14285"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC14477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and similar instances--but no artificer makes the ideas themselves: how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14478"></td>
        <td id="LC14478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could he?</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L14491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14491"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14492"></td>
        <td id="LC14492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this is he who is able to make not only vessels of every kind, but</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC14562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Beds, then, are of three kinds, and there are three artists who</td>

        <td id="L14563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14563"></td>
        <td id="LC14563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">superintend them: God, the maker of the bed, and the painter?</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14567"></td>
        <td id="LC14567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">God, whether from choice or from necessity, made one bed in nature and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14568"></td>
        <td id="LC14568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one only; two or more such ideal beds neither ever have been nor ever</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14569"></td>
        <td id="LC14569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be made by God.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14570"></td>
        <td id="LC14570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14571"></td>
        <td id="LC14571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why is that?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14572"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14573"></td>
        <td id="LC14573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Because even if He had made but two, a third would still appear behind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14574"></td>
        <td id="LC14574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them which both of them would have for their idea, and that would be the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14575"></td>
        <td id="LC14575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ideal bed and not the two others.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14576"></td>
        <td id="LC14576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14577"></td>
        <td id="LC14577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14578"></td>
        <td id="LC14578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14579"></td>
        <td id="LC14579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">God knew this, and He desired to be the real maker of a real bed, not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14580"></td>
        <td id="LC14580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a particular maker of a particular bed, and therefore He created a bed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14581"></td>
        <td id="LC14581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which is essentially and by nature one only.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14582"></td>
        <td id="LC14582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14583"></td>
        <td id="LC14583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So we believe.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14584"></td>
        <td id="LC14584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14585"></td>
        <td id="LC14585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Shall we, then, speak of Him as the natural author or maker of the bed?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14586"></td>
        <td id="LC14586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14587"></td>
        <td id="LC14587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he replied; inasmuch as by the natural process of creation He is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14588"></td>
        <td id="LC14588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the author of this and of all other things.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14589"></td>
        <td id="LC14589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14590"></td>
        <td id="LC14590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And what shall we say of the carpenter--is not he also the maker of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14591"></td>
        <td id="LC14591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14592"></td>
        <td id="LC14592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14593"></td>
        <td id="LC14593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14594"></td>
        <td id="LC14594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14595"></td>
        <td id="LC14595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But would you call the painter a creator and maker?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14596"></td>
        <td id="LC14596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L14597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14597"></td>
        <td id="LC14597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14598"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14599"></td>
        <td id="LC14599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yet if he is not the maker, what is he in relation to the bed?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14600"></td>
        <td id="LC14600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
