      <tr>
        <td id="L14601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14601"></td>
        <td id="LC14601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I think, he said, that we may fairly designate him as the imitator of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14602"></td>
        <td id="LC14602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that which the others make.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14603"></td>
        <td id="LC14603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14604"></td>
        <td id="LC14604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Good, I said; then you call him who is third in the descent from nature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14605"></td>
        <td id="LC14605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an imitator?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14606"></td>
        <td id="LC14606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14607"></td>
        <td id="LC14607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14608"></td>
        <td id="LC14608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14609"></td>
        <td id="LC14609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the tragic poet is an imitator, and therefore, like all other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14610"></td>
        <td id="LC14610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imitators, he is thrice removed from the king and from the truth?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14611"></td>
        <td id="LC14611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14612"></td>
        <td id="LC14612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That appears to be so.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14613"></td>
        <td id="LC14613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14614"></td>
        <td id="LC14614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then about the imitator we are agreed. And what about the painter?--I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14615"></td>
        <td id="LC14615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would like to know whether he may be thought to imitate that which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14616"></td>
        <td id="LC14616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">originally exists in nature, or only the creations of artists?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14617"></td>
        <td id="LC14617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14618"></td>
        <td id="LC14618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The latter.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14619"></td>
        <td id="LC14619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14620"></td>
        <td id="LC14620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As they are or as they appear? you have still to determine this.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14621"></td>
        <td id="LC14621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14622"></td>
        <td id="LC14622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14623"></td>
        <td id="LC14623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14624"></td>
        <td id="LC14624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I mean, that you may look at a bed from different points of view,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14625"></td>
        <td id="LC14625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">obliquely or directly or from any other point of view, and the bed will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14626"></td>
        <td id="LC14626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appear different, but there is no difference in reality. And the same of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14627"></td>
        <td id="LC14627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all things.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14628"></td>
        <td id="LC14628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14629"></td>
        <td id="LC14629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, the difference is only apparent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14630"></td>
        <td id="LC14630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14631"></td>
        <td id="LC14631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now let me ask you another question: Which is the art of painting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14632"></td>
        <td id="LC14632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">designed to be--an imitation of things as they are, or as they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14633"></td>
        <td id="LC14633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appear--of appearance or of reality?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14634"></td>
        <td id="LC14634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14635"></td>
        <td id="LC14635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of appearance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14636"></td>
        <td id="LC14636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14637"></td>
        <td id="LC14637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the imitator, I said, is a long way off the truth, and can do all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14638"></td>
        <td id="LC14638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things because he lightly touches on a small part of them, and that part</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14639"></td>
        <td id="LC14639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an image. For example: A painter will paint a cobbler, carpenter, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14640"></td>
        <td id="LC14640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any other artist, though he knows nothing of their arts; and, if he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14641"></td>
        <td id="LC14641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a good artist, he may deceive children or simple persons, when he shows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14642"></td>
        <td id="LC14642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them his picture of a carpenter from a distance, and they will fancy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14643"></td>
        <td id="LC14643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that they are looking at a real carpenter.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14644"></td>
        <td id="LC14644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14645"></td>
        <td id="LC14645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14646"></td>
        <td id="LC14646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14647"></td>
        <td id="LC14647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And whenever any one informs us that he has found a man who knows all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14648"></td>
        <td id="LC14648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the arts, and all things else that anybody knows, and every single thing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14649"></td>
        <td id="LC14649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a higher degree of accuracy than any other man--whoever tells us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14650"></td>
        <td id="LC14650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this, I think that we can only imagine him to be a simple creature who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14651"></td>
        <td id="LC14651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is likely to have been deceived by some wizard or actor whom he met, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14652"></td>
        <td id="LC14652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom he thought all-knowing, because he himself was unable to analyse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14653"></td>
        <td id="LC14653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the nature of knowledge and ignorance and imitation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14654"></td>
        <td id="LC14654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14655"></td>
        <td id="LC14655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14656"></td>
        <td id="LC14656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14657"></td>
        <td id="LC14657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so, when we hear persons saying that the tragedians, and Homer, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14658"></td>
        <td id="LC14658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is at their head, know all the arts and all things human, virtue as well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14659"></td>
        <td id="LC14659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as vice, and divine things too, for that the good poet cannot compose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14660"></td>
        <td id="LC14660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well unless he knows his subject, and that he who has not this knowledge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14661"></td>
        <td id="LC14661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can never be a poet, we ought to consider whether here also there may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14662"></td>
        <td id="LC14662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not be a similar illusion. Perhaps they may have come across imitators</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14663"></td>
        <td id="LC14663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and been deceived by them; they may not have remembered when they saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14664"></td>
        <td id="LC14664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their works that these were but imitations thrice removed from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14665"></td>
        <td id="LC14665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">truth, and could easily be made without any knowledge of the truth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14666"></td>
        <td id="LC14666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because they are appearances only and not realities? Or, after all, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14667"></td>
        <td id="LC14667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may be in the right, and poets do really know the things about which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14668"></td>
        <td id="LC14668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they seem to the many to speak so well?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14669"></td>
        <td id="LC14669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14670"></td>
        <td id="LC14670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The question, he said, should by all means be considered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14671"></td>
        <td id="LC14671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14672"></td>
        <td id="LC14672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now do you suppose that if a person were able to make the original as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14673"></td>
        <td id="LC14673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well as the image, he would seriously devote himself to the image-making</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14674"></td>
        <td id="LC14674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">branch? Would he allow imitation to be the ruling principle of his life,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14675"></td>
        <td id="LC14675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as if he had nothing higher in him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14676"></td>
        <td id="LC14676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14677"></td>
        <td id="LC14677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should say not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14678"></td>
        <td id="LC14678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14679"></td>
        <td id="LC14679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The real artist, who knew what he was imitating, would be interested in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14680"></td>
        <td id="LC14680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">realities and not in imitations; and would desire to leave as memorials</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14681"></td>
        <td id="LC14681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of himself works many and fair; and, instead of being the author of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14682"></td>
        <td id="LC14682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">encomiums, he would prefer to be the theme of them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14683"></td>
        <td id="LC14683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14684"></td>
        <td id="LC14684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, that would be to him a source of much greater honour and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14685"></td>
        <td id="LC14685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">profit.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14686"></td>
        <td id="LC14686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14687"></td>
        <td id="LC14687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, I said, we must put a question to Homer; not about medicine, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14688"></td>
        <td id="LC14688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any of the arts to which his poems only incidentally refer: we are not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14689"></td>
        <td id="LC14689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going to ask him, or any other poet, whether he has cured patients</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14690"></td>
        <td id="LC14690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like Asclepius, or left behind him a school of medicine such as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14691"></td>
        <td id="LC14691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Asclepiads were, or whether he only talks about medicine and other arts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14692"></td>
        <td id="LC14692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at second-hand; but we have a right to know respecting military tactics,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14693"></td>
        <td id="LC14693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">politics, education, which are the chiefest and noblest subjects of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14694"></td>
        <td id="LC14694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poems, and we may fairly ask him about them. &#39;Friend Homer,&#39; then we say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14695"></td>
        <td id="LC14695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him, &#39;if you are only in the second remove from truth in what you say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14696"></td>
        <td id="LC14696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of virtue, and not in the third--not an image maker or imitator--and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14697"></td>
        <td id="LC14697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if you are able to discern what pursuits make men better or worse in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14698"></td>
        <td id="LC14698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">private or public life, tell us what State was ever better governed by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14699"></td>
        <td id="LC14699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your help? The good order of Lacedaemon is due to Lycurgus, and many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14700"></td>
        <td id="LC14700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other cities great and small have been similarly benefited by others;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14701"></td>
        <td id="LC14701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but who says that you have been a good legislator to them and have done</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14702"></td>
        <td id="LC14702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them any good? Italy and Sicily boast of Charondas, and there is Solon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14703"></td>
        <td id="LC14703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who is renowned among us; but what city has anything to say about you?&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14704"></td>
        <td id="LC14704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Is there any city which he might name?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14705"></td>
        <td id="LC14705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14706"></td>
        <td id="LC14706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I think not, said Glaucon; not even the Homerids themselves pretend that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14707"></td>
        <td id="LC14707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was a legislator.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14708"></td>
        <td id="LC14708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14709"></td>
        <td id="LC14709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, but is there any war on record which was carried on successfully</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14710"></td>
        <td id="LC14710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by him, or aided by his counsels, when he was alive?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14711"></td>
        <td id="LC14711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14712"></td>
        <td id="LC14712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14713"></td>
        <td id="LC14713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14714"></td>
        <td id="LC14714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Or is there any invention of his, applicable to the arts or to human</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14715"></td>
        <td id="LC14715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life, such as Thales the Milesian or Anacharsis the Scythian, and other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14716"></td>
        <td id="LC14716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ingenious men have conceived, which is attributed to him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14717"></td>
        <td id="LC14717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14718"></td>
        <td id="LC14718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is absolutely nothing of the kind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14719"></td>
        <td id="LC14719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14720"></td>
        <td id="LC14720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, if Homer never did any public service, was he privately a guide or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14721"></td>
        <td id="LC14721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">teacher of any? Had he in his lifetime friends who loved to associate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14722"></td>
        <td id="LC14722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with him, and who handed down to posterity an Homeric way of life, such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14723"></td>
        <td id="LC14723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as was established by Pythagoras who was so greatly beloved for his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14724"></td>
        <td id="LC14724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wisdom, and whose followers are to this day quite celebrated for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14725"></td>
        <td id="LC14725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">order which was named after him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14726"></td>
        <td id="LC14726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14727"></td>
        <td id="LC14727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nothing of the kind is recorded of him. For surely, Socrates,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14728"></td>
        <td id="LC14728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Creophylus, the companion of Homer, that child of flesh, whose name</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14729"></td>
        <td id="LC14729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always makes us laugh, might be more justly ridiculed for his stupidity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14730"></td>
        <td id="LC14730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if, as is said, Homer was greatly neglected by him and others in his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14731"></td>
        <td id="LC14731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">day when he was alive?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14732"></td>
        <td id="LC14732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14733"></td>
        <td id="LC14733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I replied, that is the tradition. But can you imagine, Glaucon,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14734"></td>
        <td id="LC14734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that if Homer had really been able to educate and improve mankind--if he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14735"></td>
        <td id="LC14735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had possessed knowledge and not been a mere imitator--can you imagine,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14736"></td>
        <td id="LC14736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I say, that he would not have had many followers, and been honoured and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14737"></td>
        <td id="LC14737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">loved by them? Protagoras of Abdera, and Prodicus of Ceos, and a host of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14738"></td>
        <td id="LC14738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others, have only to whisper to their contemporaries: &#39;You will never be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14739"></td>
        <td id="LC14739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">able to manage either your own house or your own State until you appoint</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14740"></td>
        <td id="LC14740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us to be your ministers of education&#39;--and this ingenious device of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14741"></td>
        <td id="LC14741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">theirs has such an effect in making men love them that their companions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14742"></td>
        <td id="LC14742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all but carry them about on their shoulders. And is it conceivable that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14743"></td>
        <td id="LC14743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the contemporaries of Homer, or again of Hesiod, would have allowed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14744"></td>
        <td id="LC14744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either of them to go about as rhapsodists, if they had really been able</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14745"></td>
        <td id="LC14745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to make mankind virtuous? Would they not have been as unwilling to part</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14746"></td>
        <td id="LC14746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with them as with gold, and have compelled them to stay at home with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14747"></td>
        <td id="LC14747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them? Or, if the master would not stay, then the disciples would have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14748"></td>
        <td id="LC14748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">followed him about everywhere, until they had got education enough?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14749"></td>
        <td id="LC14749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14750"></td>
        <td id="LC14750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, Socrates, that, I think, is quite true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14751"></td>
        <td id="LC14751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14752"></td>
        <td id="LC14752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then must we not infer that all these poetical individuals, beginning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14753"></td>
        <td id="LC14753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with Homer, are only imitators; they copy images of virtue and the like,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14754"></td>
        <td id="LC14754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but the truth they never reach? The poet is like a painter who, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14755"></td>
        <td id="LC14755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we have already observed, will make a likeness of a cobbler though he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14756"></td>
        <td id="LC14756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understands nothing of cobbling; and his picture is good enough for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14757"></td>
        <td id="LC14757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those who know no more than he does, and judge only by colours and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14758"></td>
        <td id="LC14758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">figures.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14759"></td>
        <td id="LC14759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14760"></td>
        <td id="LC14760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quite so.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14761"></td>
        <td id="LC14761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14762"></td>
        <td id="LC14762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In like manner the poet with his words and phrases may be said to lay on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14763"></td>
        <td id="LC14763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the colours of the several arts, himself understanding their nature only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14764"></td>
        <td id="LC14764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough to imitate them; and other people, who are as ignorant as he is,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14765"></td>
        <td id="LC14765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and judge only from his words, imagine that if he speaks of cobbling,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14766"></td>
        <td id="LC14766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or of military tactics, or of anything else, in metre and harmony and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14767"></td>

        <td id="L15062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15062"></td>
        <td id="LC15062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inferior degree of truth--in this, I say, he is like him; and he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15063"></td>
        <td id="LC15063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also like him in being concerned with an inferior part of the soul; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15064"></td>
        <td id="LC15064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">therefore we shall be right in refusing to admit him into a well-ordered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15065"></td>
        <td id="LC15065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">State, because he awakens and nourishes and strengthens the feelings</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15066"></td>
        <td id="LC15066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and impairs the reason. As in a city when the evil are permitted to have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15067"></td>
        <td id="LC15067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">authority and the good are put out of the way, so in the soul of man,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15068"></td>
        <td id="LC15068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as we maintain, the imitative poet implants an evil constitution, for he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15069"></td>
        <td id="LC15069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indulges the irrational nature which has no discernment of greater</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15070"></td>
        <td id="LC15070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and less, but thinks the same thing at one time great and at another</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15071"></td>
        <td id="LC15071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">small--he is a manufacturer of images and is very far removed from the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC15072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">truth.</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L15116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15116"></td>

        <td id="L15117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15117"></td>
        <td id="LC15117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too? Few persons ever reflect, as I should imagine, that from the evil</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L15149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15149"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15150"></td>
        <td id="LC15150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extend; and we are ready to acknowledge that Homer is the greatest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15151"></td>
        <td id="LC15151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of poets and first of tragedy writers; but we must remain firm in our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15152"></td>
        <td id="LC15152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conviction that hymns to the gods and praises of famous men are the only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15153"></td>
        <td id="LC15153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poetry which ought to be admitted into our State. For if you go beyond</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15154"></td>
        <td id="LC15154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this and allow the honeyed muse to enter, either in epic or lyric verse,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15155"></td>
        <td id="LC15155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not law and the reason of mankind, which by common consent have ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15156"></td>
        <td id="LC15156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been deemed best, but pleasure and pain will be the rulers in our State.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15157"></td>
        <td id="LC15157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15158"></td>
        <td id="LC15158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is most true, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15159"></td>
        <td id="LC15159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15160"></td>
        <td id="LC15160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now since we have reverted to the subject of poetry, let this our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15161"></td>
        <td id="LC15161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">defence serve to show the reasonableness of our former judgment in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15162"></td>
        <td id="LC15162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sending away out of our State an art having the tendencies which we have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15163"></td>
        <td id="LC15163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">described; for reason constrained us. But that she may not impute to us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15164"></td>
        <td id="LC15164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any harshness or want of politeness, let us tell her that there is an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15165"></td>
        <td id="LC15165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ancient quarrel between philosophy and poetry; of which there are many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15166"></td>
        <td id="LC15166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proofs, such as the saying of &#39;the yelping hound howling at her lord,&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15167"></td>
        <td id="LC15167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or of one &#39;mighty in the vain talk of fools,&#39; and &#39;the mob of sages</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15168"></td>
        <td id="LC15168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circumventing Zeus,&#39; and the &#39;subtle thinkers who are beggars after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15169"></td>
        <td id="LC15169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all&#39;; and there are innumerable other signs of ancient enmity between</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15170"></td>
        <td id="LC15170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them. Notwithstanding this, let us assure our sweet friend and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15171"></td>
        <td id="LC15171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sister arts of imitation, that if she will only prove her title to exist</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15172"></td>
        <td id="LC15172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a well-ordered State we shall be delighted to receive her--we are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15173"></td>
        <td id="LC15173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very conscious of her charms; but we may not on that account betray the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15174"></td>
        <td id="LC15174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">truth. I dare say, Glaucon, that you are as much charmed by her as I am,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15175"></td>
        <td id="LC15175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">especially when she appears in Homer?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15176"></td>
        <td id="LC15176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15177"></td>
        <td id="LC15177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, indeed, I am greatly charmed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15178"></td>
        <td id="LC15178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15179"></td>
        <td id="LC15179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Shall I propose, then, that she be allowed to return from exile, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15180"></td>
        <td id="LC15180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon this condition only--that she make a defence of herself in lyrical</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15181"></td>
        <td id="LC15181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or some other metre?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15182"></td>
        <td id="LC15182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15183"></td>
        <td id="LC15183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15184"></td>
        <td id="LC15184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15185"></td>
        <td id="LC15185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And we may further grant to those of her defenders who are lovers of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15186"></td>
        <td id="LC15186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poetry and yet not poets the permission to speak in prose on her behalf:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15187"></td>
        <td id="LC15187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">let them show not only that she is pleasant but also useful to States</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15188"></td>
        <td id="LC15188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and to human life, and we will listen in a kindly spirit; for if this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15189"></td>
        <td id="LC15189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can be proved we shall surely be the gainers--I mean, if there is a use</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15190"></td>
        <td id="LC15190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in poetry as well as a delight?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15191"></td>
        <td id="LC15191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15192"></td>
        <td id="LC15192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly, he said, we shall be the gainers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15193"></td>
        <td id="LC15193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15194"></td>
        <td id="LC15194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If her defence fails, then, my dear friend, like other persons who are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15195"></td>
        <td id="LC15195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enamoured of something, but put a restraint upon themselves when they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15196"></td>
        <td id="LC15196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think their desires are opposed to their interests, so too must we after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15197"></td>
        <td id="LC15197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the manner of lovers give her up, though not without a struggle. We too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15198"></td>
        <td id="LC15198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are inspired by that love of poetry which the education of noble States</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15199"></td>
        <td id="LC15199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has implanted in us, and therefore we would have her appear at her best</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15200"></td>
        <td id="LC15200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and truest; but so long as she is unable to make good her defence,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15201"></td>
        <td id="LC15201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this argument of ours shall be a charm to us, which we will repeat to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15202"></td>
        <td id="LC15202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ourselves while we listen to her strains; that we may not fall away into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15203"></td>
        <td id="LC15203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the childish love of her which captivates the many. At all events we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15204"></td>
        <td id="LC15204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are well aware that poetry being such as we have described is not to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15205"></td>
        <td id="LC15205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">regarded seriously as attaining to the truth; and he who listens to her,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15206"></td>
        <td id="LC15206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fearing for the safety of the city which is within him, should be on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15207"></td>
        <td id="LC15207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guard against her seductions and make our words his law.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15208"></td>
        <td id="LC15208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15209"></td>
        <td id="LC15209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, I quite agree with you.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15210"></td>
        <td id="LC15210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15211"></td>
        <td id="LC15211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said, my dear Glaucon, for great is the issue at stake, greater</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15212"></td>
        <td id="LC15212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than appears, whether a man is to be good or bad. And what will any one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15213"></td>
        <td id="LC15213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be profited if under the influence of honour or money or power, aye, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15214"></td>
        <td id="LC15214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under the excitement of poetry, he neglect justice and virtue?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15215"></td>
        <td id="LC15215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15216"></td>
        <td id="LC15216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said; I have been convinced by the argument, as I believe that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15217"></td>
        <td id="LC15217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any one else would have been.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15218"></td>
        <td id="LC15218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15219"></td>
        <td id="LC15219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And yet no mention has been made of the greatest prizes and rewards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15220"></td>
        <td id="LC15220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which await virtue.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15221"></td>
        <td id="LC15221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15222"></td>
        <td id="LC15222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What, are there any greater still? If there are, they must be of an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15223"></td>
        <td id="LC15223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inconceivable greatness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15224"></td>
        <td id="LC15224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15225"></td>
        <td id="LC15225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why, I said, what was ever great in a short time? The whole period of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15226"></td>
        <td id="LC15226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three score years and ten is surely but a little thing in comparison</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15227"></td>
        <td id="LC15227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with eternity?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15228"></td>
        <td id="LC15228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15229"></td>
        <td id="LC15229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Say rather &#39;nothing,&#39; he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15230"></td>
        <td id="LC15230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15231"></td>
        <td id="LC15231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And should an immortal being seriously think of this little space rather</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15232"></td>
        <td id="LC15232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than of the whole?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15233"></td>
