</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15234"></td>
        <td id="LC15234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of the whole, certainly. But why do you ask?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15235"></td>
        <td id="LC15235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15236"></td>
        <td id="LC15236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Are you not aware, I said, that the soul of man is immortal and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15237"></td>
        <td id="LC15237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imperishable?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15238"></td>
        <td id="LC15238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15239"></td>
        <td id="LC15239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He looked at me in astonishment, and said: No, by heaven: And are you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15240"></td>
        <td id="LC15240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">really prepared to maintain this?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15241"></td>
        <td id="LC15241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15242"></td>
        <td id="LC15242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I said, I ought to be, and you too--there is no difficulty in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15243"></td>
        <td id="LC15243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proving it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15244"></td>
        <td id="LC15244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15245"></td>
        <td id="LC15245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I see a great difficulty; but I should like to hear you state this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15246"></td>
        <td id="LC15246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">argument of which you make so light.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15247"></td>
        <td id="LC15247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15248"></td>
        <td id="LC15248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Listen then.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15249"></td>
        <td id="LC15249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15250"></td>
        <td id="LC15250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am attending.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15251"></td>
        <td id="LC15251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15252"></td>
        <td id="LC15252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is a thing which you call good and another which you call evil?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15253"></td>
        <td id="LC15253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15254"></td>
        <td id="LC15254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15255"></td>
        <td id="LC15255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15256"></td>
        <td id="LC15256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Would you agree with me in thinking that the corrupting and destroying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15257"></td>
        <td id="LC15257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">element is the evil, and the saving and improving element the good?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15258"></td>
        <td id="LC15258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15259"></td>
        <td id="LC15259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15260"></td>
        <td id="LC15260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15261"></td>
        <td id="LC15261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And you admit that every thing has a good and also an evil; as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15262"></td>
        <td id="LC15262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ophthalmia is the evil of the eyes and disease of the whole body; as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15263"></td>
        <td id="LC15263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mildew is of corn, and rot of timber, or rust of copper and iron: in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15264"></td>
        <td id="LC15264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything, or in almost everything, there is an inherent evil and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15265"></td>
        <td id="LC15265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disease?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15266"></td>
        <td id="LC15266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15267"></td>
        <td id="LC15267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15268"></td>
        <td id="LC15268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15269"></td>
        <td id="LC15269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And anything which is infected by any of these evils is made evil, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15270"></td>
        <td id="LC15270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at last wholly dissolves and dies?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15271"></td>
        <td id="LC15271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15272"></td>
        <td id="LC15272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15273"></td>
        <td id="LC15273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15274"></td>
        <td id="LC15274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The vice and evil which is inherent in each is the destruction of each;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15275"></td>
        <td id="LC15275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and if this does not destroy them there is nothing else that will; for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15276"></td>
        <td id="LC15276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good certainly will not destroy them, nor again, that which is neither</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15277"></td>
        <td id="LC15277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good nor evil.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15278"></td>
        <td id="LC15278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15279"></td>
        <td id="LC15279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15280"></td>
        <td id="LC15280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15281"></td>
        <td id="LC15281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If, then, we find any nature which having this inherent corruption</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15282"></td>
        <td id="LC15282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cannot be dissolved or destroyed, we may be certain that of such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15283"></td>
        <td id="LC15283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature there is no destruction?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15284"></td>
        <td id="LC15284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15285"></td>
        <td id="LC15285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That may be assumed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15286"></td>
        <td id="LC15286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15287"></td>
        <td id="LC15287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, I said, and is there no evil which corrupts the soul?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15288"></td>
        <td id="LC15288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15289"></td>
        <td id="LC15289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, there are all the evils which we were just now passing in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15290"></td>
        <td id="LC15290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">review: unrighteousness, intemperance, cowardice, ignorance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15291"></td>
        <td id="LC15291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15292"></td>
        <td id="LC15292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But does any of these dissolve or destroy her?--and here do not let us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15293"></td>
        <td id="LC15293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fall into the error of supposing that the unjust and foolish man, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15294"></td>
        <td id="LC15294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he is detected, perishes through his own injustice, which is an evil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15295"></td>
        <td id="LC15295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the soul. Take the analogy of the body: The evil of the body is a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15296"></td>
        <td id="LC15296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disease which wastes and reduces and annihilates the body; and all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15297"></td>
        <td id="LC15297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things of which we were just now speaking come to annihilation through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15298"></td>
        <td id="LC15298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their own corruption attaching to them and inhering in them and so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15299"></td>
        <td id="LC15299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destroying them. Is not this true?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15300"></td>
        <td id="LC15300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15301"></td>
        <td id="LC15301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15302"></td>
        <td id="LC15302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15303"></td>
        <td id="LC15303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Consider the soul in like manner. Does the injustice or other evil which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15304"></td>
        <td id="LC15304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exists in the soul waste and consume her? Do they by attaching to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15305"></td>
        <td id="LC15305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soul and inhering in her at last bring her to death, and so separate her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15306"></td>
        <td id="LC15306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the body?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15307"></td>
        <td id="LC15307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15308"></td>
        <td id="LC15308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15309"></td>
        <td id="LC15309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15310"></td>
        <td id="LC15310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And yet, I said, it is unreasonable to suppose that anything can perish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15311"></td>
        <td id="LC15311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from without through affection of external evil which could not be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15312"></td>
        <td id="LC15312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destroyed from within by a corruption of its own?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15313"></td>
        <td id="LC15313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15314"></td>
        <td id="LC15314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15315"></td>
        <td id="LC15315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15316"></td>
        <td id="LC15316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Consider, I said, Glaucon, that even the badness of food, whether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15317"></td>
        <td id="LC15317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">staleness, decomposition, or any other bad quality, when confined to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15318"></td>
        <td id="LC15318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the actual food, is not supposed to destroy the body; although, if the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15319"></td>
        <td id="LC15319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">badness of food communicates corruption to the body, then we should say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15320"></td>
        <td id="LC15320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the body has been destroyed by a corruption of itself, which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15321"></td>
        <td id="LC15321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disease, brought on by this; but that the body, being one thing, can be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15322"></td>
        <td id="LC15322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destroyed by the badness of food, which is another, and which does not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15323"></td>
        <td id="LC15323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">engender any natural infection--this we shall absolutely deny?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15324"></td>
        <td id="LC15324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15325"></td>
        <td id="LC15325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15326"></td>
        <td id="LC15326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15327"></td>
        <td id="LC15327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And, on the same principle, unless some bodily evil can produce an evil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15328"></td>
        <td id="LC15328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the soul, we must not suppose that the soul, which is one thing, can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15329"></td>
        <td id="LC15329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be dissolved by any merely external evil which belongs to another?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15330"></td>
        <td id="LC15330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15331"></td>
        <td id="LC15331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, he said, there is reason in that.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15332"></td>
        <td id="LC15332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15333"></td>
        <td id="LC15333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Either, then, let us refute this conclusion, or, while it remains</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15334"></td>
        <td id="LC15334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unrefuted, let us never say that fever, or any other disease, or the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15335"></td>
        <td id="LC15335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knife put to the throat, or even the cutting up of the whole body into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15336"></td>
        <td id="LC15336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the minutest pieces, can destroy the soul, until she herself is proved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15337"></td>
        <td id="LC15337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to become more unholy or unrighteous in consequence of these things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15338"></td>
        <td id="LC15338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being done to the body; but that the soul, or anything else if not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15339"></td>
        <td id="LC15339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destroyed by an internal evil, can be destroyed by an external one, is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15340"></td>
        <td id="LC15340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not to be affirmed by any man.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15341"></td>
        <td id="LC15341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15342"></td>
        <td id="LC15342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And surely, he replied, no one will ever prove that the souls of men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15343"></td>
        <td id="LC15343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">become more unjust in consequence of death.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15344"></td>
        <td id="LC15344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15345"></td>
        <td id="LC15345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But if some one who would rather not admit the immortality of the soul</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15346"></td>
        <td id="LC15346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boldly denies this, and says that the dying do really become more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15347"></td>
        <td id="LC15347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evil and unrighteous, then, if the speaker is right, I suppose that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15348"></td>
        <td id="LC15348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injustice, like disease, must be assumed to be fatal to the unjust, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15349"></td>
        <td id="LC15349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that those who take this disorder die by the natural inherent power of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15350"></td>
        <td id="LC15350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destruction which evil has, and which kills them sooner or later, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15351"></td>
        <td id="LC15351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in quite another way from that in which, at present, the wicked receive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15352"></td>
        <td id="LC15352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death at the hands of others as the penalty of their deeds?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15353"></td>
        <td id="LC15353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15354"></td>
        <td id="LC15354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nay, he said, in that case injustice, if fatal to the unjust, will not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15355"></td>
        <td id="LC15355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be so very terrible to him, for he will be delivered from evil. But I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15356"></td>
        <td id="LC15356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rather suspect the opposite to be the truth, and that injustice which,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15357"></td>
        <td id="LC15357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if it have the power, will murder others, keeps the murderer alive--aye,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15358"></td>
        <td id="LC15358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and well awake too; so far removed is her dwelling-place from being a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15359"></td>
        <td id="LC15359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house of death.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15360"></td>
        <td id="LC15360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15361"></td>
        <td id="LC15361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, I said; if the inherent natural vice or evil of the soul is unable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15362"></td>
        <td id="LC15362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to kill or destroy her, hardly will that which is appointed to be the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15363"></td>
        <td id="LC15363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destruction of some other body, destroy a soul or anything else except</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15364"></td>
        <td id="LC15364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that of which it was appointed to be the destruction.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15365"></td>
        <td id="LC15365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15366"></td>
        <td id="LC15366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, that can hardly be.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15367"></td>
        <td id="LC15367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15368"></td>
        <td id="LC15368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the soul which cannot be destroyed by an evil, whether inherent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15369"></td>
        <td id="LC15369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or external, must exist for ever, and if existing for ever, must be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15370"></td>
        <td id="LC15370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">immortal?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15371"></td>
        <td id="LC15371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15372"></td>
        <td id="LC15372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15373"></td>
        <td id="LC15373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15374"></td>
        <td id="LC15374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is the conclusion, I said; and, if a true conclusion, then the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15375"></td>
        <td id="LC15375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">souls must always be the same, for if none be destroyed they will not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15376"></td>
        <td id="LC15376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">diminish in number. Neither will they increase, for the increase of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15377"></td>
        <td id="LC15377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">immortal natures must come from something mortal, and all things would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15378"></td>
        <td id="LC15378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thus end in immortality.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15379"></td>
        <td id="LC15379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15380"></td>
        <td id="LC15380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15381"></td>
        <td id="LC15381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15382"></td>
        <td id="LC15382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But this we cannot believe--reason will not allow us--any more than we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15383"></td>
        <td id="LC15383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can believe the soul, in her truest nature, to be full of variety and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15384"></td>
        <td id="LC15384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difference and dissimilarity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15385"></td>
        <td id="LC15385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15386"></td>
        <td id="LC15386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What do you mean? he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15387"></td>
        <td id="LC15387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15388"></td>
        <td id="LC15388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The soul, I said, being, as is now proven, immortal, must be the fairest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15389"></td>
        <td id="LC15389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of compositions and cannot be compounded of many elements?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15390"></td>
        <td id="LC15390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15391"></td>
        <td id="LC15391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15392"></td>
        <td id="LC15392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15393"></td>
        <td id="LC15393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her immortality is demonstrated by the previous argument, and there are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15394"></td>
        <td id="LC15394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many other proofs; but to see her as she really is, not as we now behold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15395"></td>
        <td id="LC15395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her, marred by communion with the body and other miseries, you must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15396"></td>
        <td id="LC15396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contemplate her with the eye of reason, in her original purity; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15397"></td>
        <td id="LC15397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then her beauty will be revealed, and justice and injustice and all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15398"></td>
        <td id="LC15398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things which we have described will be manifested more clearly. Thus</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15399"></td>
        <td id="LC15399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far, we have spoken the truth concerning her as she appears at present,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15400"></td>
        <td id="LC15400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but we must remember also that we have seen her only in a condition</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15401"></td>
        <td id="LC15401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which may be compared to that of the sea-god Glaucus, whose original</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15402"></td>
        <td id="LC15402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">image can hardly be discerned because his natural members are broken</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15403"></td>
        <td id="LC15403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off and crushed and damaged by the waves in all sorts of ways, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15404"></td>
        <td id="LC15404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">incrustations have grown over them of seaweed and shells and stones, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15405"></td>
        <td id="LC15405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he is more like some monster than he is to his own natural form.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15406"></td>
        <td id="LC15406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the soul which we behold is in a similar condition, disfigured by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15407"></td>
        <td id="LC15407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ten thousand ills. But not there, Glaucon, not there must we look.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15408"></td>
        <td id="LC15408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15409"></td>
        <td id="LC15409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Where then?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15410"></td>
        <td id="LC15410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15411"></td>
        <td id="LC15411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At her love of wisdom. Let us see whom she affects, and what society and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15412"></td>
        <td id="LC15412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">converse she seeks in virtue of her near kindred with the immortal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15413"></td>
        <td id="LC15413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and eternal and divine; also how different she would become if wholly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15414"></td>
        <td id="LC15414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">following this superior principle, and borne by a divine impulse out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15415"></td>
        <td id="LC15415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ocean in which she now is, and disengaged from the stones and shells</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15416"></td>
        <td id="LC15416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and things of earth and rock which in wild variety spring up around her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15417"></td>
        <td id="LC15417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because she feeds upon earth, and is overgrown by the good things of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15418"></td>
        <td id="LC15418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this life as they are termed: then you would see her as she is, and know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15419"></td>
        <td id="LC15419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether she have one shape only or many, or what her nature is. Of her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15420"></td>
        <td id="LC15420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affections and of the forms which she takes in this present life I think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15421"></td>
        <td id="LC15421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that we have now said enough.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15422"></td>
        <td id="LC15422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15423"></td>
        <td id="LC15423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">True, he replied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15424"></td>
        <td id="LC15424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15425"></td>
        <td id="LC15425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And thus, I said, we have fulfilled the conditions of the argument; we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15426"></td>
        <td id="LC15426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have not introduced the rewards and glories of justice, which, as you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15427"></td>
        <td id="LC15427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were saying, are to be found in Homer and Hesiod; but justice in her own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15428"></td>
        <td id="LC15428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature has been shown to be best for the soul in her own nature. Let a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15429"></td>
        <td id="LC15429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man do what is just, whether he have the ring of Gyges or not, and even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15430"></td>
        <td id="LC15430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if in addition to the ring of Gyges he put on the helmet of Hades.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15431"></td>
        <td id="LC15431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15432"></td>
        <td id="LC15432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very true.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15433"></td>
        <td id="LC15433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15434"></td>
        <td id="LC15434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now, Glaucon, there will be no harm in further enumerating how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15435"></td>
        <td id="LC15435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many and how great are the rewards which justice and the other virtues</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15436"></td>
        <td id="LC15436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">procure to the soul from gods and men, both in life and after death.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15437"></td>
        <td id="LC15437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15438"></td>
        <td id="LC15438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Certainly not, he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15439"></td>
        <td id="LC15439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15440"></td>
        <td id="LC15440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Will you repay me, then, what you borrowed in the argument?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15441"></td>
        <td id="LC15441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15442"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15538"></td>
        <td id="LC15538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, I said, I will tell you a tale; not one of the tales which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15539"></td>
        <td id="LC15539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Odysseus tells to the hero Alcinous, yet this too is a tale of a hero,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15540"></td>
        <td id="LC15540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Er the son of Armenius, a Pamphylian by birth. He was slain in battle,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15541"></td>
        <td id="LC15541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and ten days afterwards, when the bodies of the dead were taken up</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15542"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15544"></td>

        <td id="L15545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15545"></td>
        <td id="LC15545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had seen in the other world. He said that when his soul left the body</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15546"></td>
        <td id="LC15546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he went on a journey with a great company, and that they came to a</td>

</td>

        <td id="L15626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15626"></td>
        <td id="LC15626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">edges on the upper side, and on their lower side all together form one</td>
