      <tr>
        <td id="L15627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15627"></td>
        <td id="LC15627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continuous whorl. This is pierced by the spindle, which is driven home</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15628"></td>
        <td id="LC15628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the centre of the eighth. The first and outermost whorl has the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15629"></td>
        <td id="LC15629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rim broadest, and the seven inner whorls are narrower, in the following</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15630"></td>
        <td id="LC15630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proportions--the sixth is next to the first in size, the fourth next</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15631"></td>
        <td id="LC15631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the sixth; then comes the eighth; the seventh is fifth, the fifth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15632"></td>
        <td id="LC15632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is sixth, the third is seventh, last and eighth comes the second.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15633"></td>
        <td id="LC15633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The largest (or fixed stars) is spangled, and the seventh (or sun) is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15634"></td>
        <td id="LC15634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brightest; the eighth (or moon) coloured by the reflected light of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15635"></td>
        <td id="LC15635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seventh; the second and fifth (Saturn and Mercury) are in colour like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15636"></td>
        <td id="LC15636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one another, and yellower than the preceding; the third (Venus) has the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15637"></td>
        <td id="LC15637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whitest light; the fourth (Mars) is reddish; the sixth (Jupiter) is in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15638"></td>
        <td id="LC15638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whiteness second. Now the whole spindle has the same motion; but, as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15639"></td>
        <td id="LC15639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whole revolves in one direction, the seven inner circles move slowly in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15640"></td>
        <td id="LC15640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other, and of these the swiftest is the eighth; next in swiftness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15641"></td>
        <td id="LC15641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are the seventh, sixth, and fifth, which move together; third in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15642"></td>
        <td id="LC15642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swiftness appeared to move according to the law of this reversed motion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15643"></td>
        <td id="LC15643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the fourth; the third appeared fourth and the second fifth. The spindle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15644"></td>
        <td id="LC15644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turns on the knees of Necessity; and on the upper surface of each circle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15645"></td>
        <td id="LC15645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is a siren, who goes round with them, hymning a single tone or note. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15646"></td>
        <td id="LC15646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eight together form one harmony; and round about, at equal intervals,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15647"></td>
        <td id="LC15647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there is another band, three in number, each sitting upon her throne:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15648"></td>
        <td id="LC15648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these are the Fates, daughters of Necessity, who are clothed in white</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15649"></td>
        <td id="LC15649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">robes and have chaplets upon their heads, Lachesis and Clotho</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15650"></td>
        <td id="LC15650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Atropos, who accompany with their voices the harmony of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15651"></td>
        <td id="LC15651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sirens--Lachesis singing of the past, Clotho of the present, Atropos of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15652"></td>
        <td id="LC15652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the future; Clotho from time to time assisting with a touch of her right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15653"></td>
        <td id="LC15653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand the revolution of the outer circle of the whorl or spindle, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15654"></td>
        <td id="LC15654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Atropos with her left hand touching and guiding the inner ones, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15655"></td>
        <td id="LC15655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lachesis laying hold of either in turn, first with one hand and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15656"></td>
        <td id="LC15656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the other.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15657"></td>
        <td id="LC15657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15658"></td>
        <td id="LC15658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When Er and the spirits arrived, their duty was to go at once to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15659"></td>
        <td id="LC15659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lachesis; but first of all there came a prophet who arranged them in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15660"></td>
        <td id="LC15660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">order; then he took from the knees of Lachesis lots and samples of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15661"></td>
        <td id="LC15661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lives, and having mounted a high pulpit, spoke as follows: &#39;Hear the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15662"></td>
        <td id="LC15662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">word of Lachesis, the daughter of Necessity. Mortal souls, behold a new</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15663"></td>
        <td id="LC15663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cycle of life and mortality. Your genius will not be allotted to you,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15664"></td>
        <td id="LC15664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but you will choose your genius; and let him who draws the first lot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15665"></td>
        <td id="LC15665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have the first choice, and the life which he chooses shall be his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15666"></td>
        <td id="LC15666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destiny. Virtue is free, and as a man honours or dishonours her he will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15667"></td>
        <td id="LC15667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have more or less of her; the responsibility is with the chooser--God</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15668"></td>
        <td id="LC15668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is justified.&#39; When the Interpreter had thus spoken he scattered lots</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15669"></td>
        <td id="LC15669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indifferently among them all, and each of them took up the lot which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15670"></td>
        <td id="LC15670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fell near him, all but Er himself (he was not allowed), and each as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15671"></td>
        <td id="LC15671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he took his lot perceived the number which he had obtained. Then the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15672"></td>
        <td id="LC15672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Interpreter placed on the ground before them the samples of lives; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15673"></td>
        <td id="LC15673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there were many more lives than the souls present, and they were of all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15674"></td>
        <td id="LC15674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sorts. There were lives of every animal and of man in every condition.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15675"></td>
        <td id="LC15675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And there were tyrannies among them, some lasting out the tyrant&#39;s life,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15676"></td>
        <td id="LC15676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others which broke off in the middle and came to an end in poverty and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15677"></td>
        <td id="LC15677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exile and beggary; and there were lives of famous men, some who were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15678"></td>
        <td id="LC15678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">famous for their form and beauty as well as for their strength and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15679"></td>
        <td id="LC15679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">success in games, or, again, for their birth and the qualities of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15680"></td>
        <td id="LC15680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ancestors; and some who were the reverse of famous for the opposite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15681"></td>
        <td id="LC15681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">qualities. And of women likewise; there was not, however, any definite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15682"></td>
        <td id="LC15682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">character in them, because the soul, when choosing a new life, must of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15683"></td>
        <td id="LC15683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessity become different. But there was every other quality, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15684"></td>
        <td id="LC15684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the all mingled with one another, and also with elements of wealth and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15685"></td>
        <td id="LC15685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poverty, and disease and health; and there were mean states also. And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15686"></td>
        <td id="LC15686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here, my dear Glaucon, is the supreme peril of our human state; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15687"></td>
        <td id="LC15687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">therefore the utmost care should be taken. Let each one of us leave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15688"></td>
        <td id="LC15688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every other kind of knowledge and seek and follow one thing only, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15689"></td>
        <td id="LC15689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peradventure he may be able to learn and may find some one who will make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15690"></td>
        <td id="LC15690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him able to learn and discern between good and evil, and so to choose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15691"></td>
        <td id="LC15691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always and everywhere the better life as he has opportunity. He should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15692"></td>
        <td id="LC15692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consider the bearing of all these things which have been mentioned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15693"></td>
        <td id="LC15693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">severally and collectively upon virtue; he should know what the effect</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15694"></td>
        <td id="LC15694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of beauty is when combined with poverty or wealth in a particular soul,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15695"></td>
        <td id="LC15695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and what are the good and evil consequences of noble and humble birth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15696"></td>
        <td id="LC15696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of private and public station, of strength and weakness, of cleverness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15697"></td>
        <td id="LC15697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and dullness, and of all the natural and acquired gifts of the soul, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15698"></td>
        <td id="LC15698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the operation of them when conjoined; he will then look at the nature of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15699"></td>
        <td id="LC15699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the soul, and from the consideration of all these qualities he will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15700"></td>
        <td id="LC15700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">able to determine which is the better and which is the worse; and so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15701"></td>
        <td id="LC15701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he will choose, giving the name of evil to the life which will make his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15702"></td>
        <td id="LC15702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soul more unjust, and good to the life which will make his soul more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15703"></td>
        <td id="LC15703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just; all else he will disregard. For we have seen and know that this is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15704"></td>
        <td id="LC15704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the best choice both in life and after death. A man must take with him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15705"></td>
        <td id="LC15705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the world below an adamantine faith in truth and right, that there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15706"></td>
        <td id="LC15706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too he may be undazzled by the desire of wealth or the other allurements</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15707"></td>
        <td id="LC15707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of evil, lest, coming upon tyrannies and similar villainies, he do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15708"></td>
        <td id="LC15708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">irremediable wrongs to others and suffer yet worse himself; but let him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15709"></td>
        <td id="LC15709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know how to choose the mean and avoid the extremes on either side, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15710"></td>
        <td id="LC15710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far as possible, not only in this life but in all that which is to come.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15711"></td>
        <td id="LC15711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For this is the way of happiness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15712"></td>
        <td id="LC15712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15713"></td>
        <td id="LC15713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And according to the report of the messenger from the other world this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15714"></td>
        <td id="LC15714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was what the prophet said at the time: &#39;Even for the last comer, if he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15715"></td>
        <td id="LC15715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chooses wisely and will live diligently, there is appointed a happy and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15716"></td>
        <td id="LC15716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not undesirable existence. Let not him who chooses first be careless,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15717"></td>
        <td id="LC15717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and let not the last despair.&#39; And when he had spoken, he who had the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15718"></td>
        <td id="LC15718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first choice came forward and in a moment chose the greatest tyranny;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15719"></td>
        <td id="LC15719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his mind having been darkened by folly and sensuality, he had not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15720"></td>
        <td id="LC15720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought out the whole matter before he chose, and did not at first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15721"></td>
        <td id="LC15721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sight perceive that he was fated, among other evils, to devour his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15722"></td>
        <td id="LC15722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">children. But when he had time to reflect, and saw what was in the lot,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15723"></td>
        <td id="LC15723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he began to beat his breast and lament over his choice, forgetting the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15724"></td>
        <td id="LC15724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proclamation of the prophet; for, instead of throwing the blame of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15725"></td>
        <td id="LC15725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">misfortune on himself, he accused chance and the gods, and everything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15726"></td>
        <td id="LC15726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rather than himself. Now he was one of those who came from heaven, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15727"></td>
        <td id="LC15727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a former life had dwelt in a well-ordered State, but his virtue was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15728"></td>
        <td id="LC15728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a matter of habit only, and he had no philosophy. And it was true of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15729"></td>
        <td id="LC15729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others who were similarly overtaken, that the greater number of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15730"></td>
        <td id="LC15730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came from heaven and therefore they had never been schooled by trial,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15731"></td>
        <td id="LC15731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whereas the pilgrims who came from earth having themselves suffered and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15732"></td>
        <td id="LC15732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen others suffer, were not in a hurry to choose. And owing to this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15733"></td>
        <td id="LC15733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inexperience of theirs, and also because the lot was a chance, many of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15734"></td>
        <td id="LC15734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the souls exchanged a good destiny for an evil or an evil for a good.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15735"></td>
        <td id="LC15735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For if a man had always on his arrival in this world dedicated himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15736"></td>
        <td id="LC15736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the first to sound philosophy, and had been moderately fortunate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15737"></td>
        <td id="LC15737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the number of the lot, he might, as the messenger reported, be happy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15738"></td>
        <td id="LC15738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here, and also his journey to another life and return to this, instead</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15739"></td>
        <td id="LC15739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of being rough and underground, would be smooth and heavenly. Most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15740"></td>
        <td id="LC15740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curious, he said, was the spectacle--sad and laughable and strange; for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15741"></td>
        <td id="LC15741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the choice of the souls was in most cases based on their experience of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15742"></td>
        <td id="LC15742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a previous life. There he saw the soul which had once been Orpheus</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15743"></td>
        <td id="LC15743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">choosing the life of a swan out of enmity to the race of women, hating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15744"></td>
        <td id="LC15744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be born of a woman because they had been his murderers; he beheld</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15745"></td>
        <td id="LC15745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also the soul of Thamyras choosing the life of a nightingale; birds, on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15746"></td>
        <td id="LC15746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other hand, like the swan and other musicians, wanting to be men.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15747"></td>
        <td id="LC15747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The soul which obtained the twentieth lot chose the life of a lion, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15748"></td>
        <td id="LC15748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this was the soul of Ajax the son of Telamon, who would not be a man,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15749"></td>
        <td id="LC15749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remembering the injustice which was done him in the judgment about the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15750"></td>
        <td id="LC15750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arms. The next was Agamemnon, who took the life of an eagle, because,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15751"></td>
        <td id="LC15751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like Ajax, he hated human nature by reason of his sufferings. About</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15752"></td>
        <td id="LC15752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the middle came the lot of Atalanta; she, seeing the great fame of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15753"></td>
        <td id="LC15753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an athlete, was unable to resist the temptation: and after her there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15754"></td>
        <td id="LC15754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">followed the soul of Epeus the son of Panopeus passing into the nature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15755"></td>
        <td id="LC15755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a woman cunning in the arts; and far away among the last who chose,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15756"></td>
        <td id="LC15756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the soul of the jester Thersites was putting on the form of a monkey.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15757"></td>
        <td id="LC15757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There came also the soul of Odysseus having yet to make a choice, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15758"></td>
        <td id="LC15758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his lot happened to be the last of them all. Now the recollection of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15759"></td>
        <td id="LC15759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">former toils had disenchanted him of ambition, and he went about for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15760"></td>
        <td id="LC15760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a considerable time in search of the life of a private man who had no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15761"></td>
        <td id="LC15761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cares; he had some difficulty in finding this, which was lying about and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15762"></td>
        <td id="LC15762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been neglected by everybody else; and when he saw it, he said that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15763"></td>
        <td id="LC15763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he would have done the same had his lot been first instead of last,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15764"></td>
        <td id="LC15764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that he was delighted to have it. And not only did men pass into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15765"></td>
        <td id="LC15765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">animals, but I must also mention that there were animals tame and wild</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15766"></td>
        <td id="LC15766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who changed into one another and into corresponding human natures--the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15767"></td>
        <td id="LC15767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good into the gentle and the evil into the savage, in all sorts of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15768"></td>
        <td id="LC15768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">combinations.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15769"></td>
        <td id="LC15769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15770"></td>
        <td id="LC15770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All the souls had now chosen their lives, and they went in the order of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15771"></td>
        <td id="LC15771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their choice to Lachesis, who sent with them the genius whom they had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15772"></td>
        <td id="LC15772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">severally chosen, to be the guardian of their lives and the fulfiller</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15773"></td>
        <td id="LC15773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the choice: this genius led the souls first to Clotho, and drew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15774"></td>
        <td id="LC15774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them within the revolution of the spindle impelled by her hand, thus</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15775"></td>
        <td id="LC15775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ratifying the destiny of each; and then, when they were fastened to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15776"></td>
        <td id="LC15776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this, carried them to Atropos, who spun the threads and made them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15777"></td>
        <td id="LC15777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">irreversible, whence without turning round they passed beneath the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15778"></td>
        <td id="LC15778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throne of Necessity; and when they had all passed, they marched on in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15779"></td>
        <td id="LC15779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scorching heat to the plain of Forgetfulness, which was a barren waste</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15780"></td>
        <td id="LC15780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destitute of trees and verdure; and then towards evening they encamped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15781"></td>
        <td id="LC15781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by the river of Unmindfulness, whose water no vessel can hold; of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15782"></td>
        <td id="LC15782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were all obliged to drink a certain quantity, and those who were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15783"></td>
        <td id="LC15783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not saved by wisdom drank more than was necessary; and each one as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15784"></td>
        <td id="LC15784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drank forgot all things. Now after they had gone to rest, about the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15785"></td>
        <td id="LC15785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">middle of the night there was a thunderstorm and earthquake, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15786"></td>
        <td id="LC15786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in an instant they were driven upwards in all manner of ways to their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15787"></td>
        <td id="LC15787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">birth, like stars shooting. He himself was hindered from drinking the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15788"></td>
        <td id="LC15788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water. But in what manner or by what means he returned to the body he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15789"></td>
        <td id="LC15789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not say; only, in the morning, awaking suddenly, he found himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15790"></td>
        <td id="LC15790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lying on the pyre.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15791"></td>
        <td id="LC15791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15792"></td>
        <td id="LC15792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And thus, Glaucon, the tale has been saved and has not perished, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15793"></td>
        <td id="LC15793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will save us if we are obedient to the word spoken; and we shall pass</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15794"></td>
        <td id="LC15794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">safely over the river of Forgetfulness and our soul will not be defiled.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15795"></td>
        <td id="LC15795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wherefore my counsel is, that we hold fast ever to the heavenly way and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15796"></td>
        <td id="LC15796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follow after justice and virtue always, considering that the soul is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15797"></td>
        <td id="LC15797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">immortal and able to endure every sort of good and every sort of evil.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15798"></td>
        <td id="LC15798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thus shall we live dear to one another and to the gods, both while</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15799"></td>
        <td id="LC15799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remaining here and when, like conquerors in the games who go round to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15800"></td>
        <td id="LC15800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gather gifts, we receive our reward. And it shall be well with us both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15801"></td>
        <td id="LC15801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in this life and in the pilgrimage of a thousand years which we have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15802"></td>
        <td id="LC15802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been describing.</td>
      </tr>
</table>

          </clipboard-copy>

        <li><a class="dropdown-item js-update-url-with-hash" id="js-view-git-blame" role="menuitem" href="/Practical-AI/AdvancedDeepLearning/blame/b9343df6cd817bc6bafe29d8d04acd1ac8ab8e74/Session_06/part_04_language_model/republic.txt">View git blame</a></li>
          <li><a class="dropdown-item" id="js-new-issue" role="menuitem" href="/Practical-AI/AdvancedDeepLearning/issues/new">Reference in new issue</a></li>
      </ul>
    </details-menu>
  </details>

  </div>

    </div>
